title: Mashup: WeatherCalls
description: A voice-based telephony mashup that provides comprehensive weather updates. Users can access up-to-date weather forecasts, including temperature, atmospheric conditions, wind information, and sunrise and sunset times. The mashup also supports automatic weather updates via phone calls, making it convenient for users to stay informed about weather changes in real-time.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: Climate Change 2030
description: A visual study of the impact of climate-induced sea level rise on coastal cities in the United States, based on the Architecture 2030 report. The mashup provides side-by-side comparisons of current cityscapes and how they will appear in 2030 with projected sea level increases, using satellite imagery and digital elevation models. It serves as a tool for understanding the potential consequences of climate change on urban infrastructure and coastal ecosystems.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: WAP Based Image Search
description: A mobile-friendly image search platform that aggregates photos and images from various sources, including Flickr, Yahoo, Riya, Webshots, and news websites, allowing users to search and access these visual assets directly from a WAP-capable phone. The mashup leverages multiple APIs for image retrieval and integrates with mobile web protocols to ensure compatibility with a wide range of devices.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: Forbes List of Expensive Preschools
description: This mashup presents a curated list of high-priced preschools, sourced from Forbes, with tuition fees starting at $30,000 USD. The mashup combines educational data sources with mapping technology to provide a detailed view of the location of these expensive preschools. It serves as a useful resource for parents and educational planners looking to understand the geographical distribution and pricing of premium early childhood education institutions. The mashup integrates educational data with geospatial data to offer insights into the accessibility and affordability of top-tier preschools across various regions.

title: Mashup: 2008 Formula One Map
description: A map mashup displaying satellite images of all 2008 Formula One Grand Prix Circuits, integrated with race results and detailed grand prix information. This mashup combines satellite imagery services with sports data to provide users with a visual and informative overview of the 2008 Formula One racing season.

title: Mashup: FxFoto
description: A Windows desktop application designed for comprehensive photo management, enabling users to create, organize, and manage photo scrapbooks. The application features photo editing capabilities, an intuitive interface for photo viewing, and the ability to upload photos to a photo service for cloud storage and sharing. Users can seamlessly sync their photo scrapbooks across devices, making it ideal for photographers, hobbyists, and anyone looking for a robust photo management solution.

related_apis.title: Smugmug API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From the site: Everything in the hacks section is provided as-is unless you specifically have a contract with smugmug. They're not supported, endorsed, or guaranteed in any way. We'd love to fully support the API and other goodies with smugmug's AAA customer service, but we're just not there yet. Soon, we hope." Note they also offer a WebDAV interface for upload, as https://upload.smugmug.com/smugdav.mg.

title: Mashup: Vanilla Forums and Google Course Builder Python Mashup
description: This mashup integrates Vanilla Forums, a leading forum platform, with Google Course Builder, an open-source course development tool, to enhance educational experiences. By embedding Vanilla Forums within Google Course Builder, it aims to boost student engagement through interactive discussions, peer support, and collaborative learning opportunities. The integration leverages APIs provided by both platforms to enable seamless forum creation, management, and participation directly within the course builder environment. This mashup is particularly useful for educators looking to foster a more dynamic and connected classroom setting.

related_apis.title: Vanilla Forums API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Vanilla Forums allows users to create, customize, and manage their own online forums. In addition to basic forum functions, Vanilla also supports gamification, Q&As, and notifications. It also comes with social integrations and sharing functions to help draw new forum members. Users can localize their forums with any of 25 supported languages or let members choose their preferred language from a list of options. Vanilla Forums is designed to display natively on mobile devices. The Vanilla Forums REST API gives users the ability to manage and retrieve information from their forums programmatically.

title: Mashup: Statr for Flickr
description: Statr for Flickr is a data visualization tool that provides real-time statistical analysis of page views for Flickr accounts. It automatically generates and updates graphs to reflect daily changes in page views. These graphs can be embedded on external websites, offering a simple way to share viewing statistics with a broader audience.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: SOSMS
description: SOSMS is a mobile messaging application designed to facilitate communication between disaster survivors and their family members and friends. Users can create an account, establish a network of contacts to be notified in case of emergencies, and send a text message with the keyword "SAFE" to the SOSMS number provided, which automatically informs the designated contacts. This service primarily operates through a combination of SMS and telephony infrastructure, allowing for a rapid and reliable notification system in critical situations. The application is specifically tailored for disaster scenarios, ensuring efficient communication channels even in areas with limited connectivity. It leverages the existing telecommunication network and SMS capabilities of mobile devices to provide a simple, yet robust solution for emergency communication.

title: Mashup: Flickrball
description: Flickrball is a social and location-based game that utilizes the Flickr API to create a six-degrees-of-separation scavenger hunt. The game presents users with a series of tagged Flickr images as clues, which they must use to navigate to a specific location or find the next clue. Users earn points by correctly solving the clues and reaching their destination. The game encourages community interaction and competition.

title: Mashup: Startcubes.com
description: A user-friendly personal startpage creation platform designed as an alternative to services like iGoogle and Netvibes. It allows users to easily set up customizable pages with blogs, search functionalities, and feeds. Currently supporting Dutch and English-speaking communities.

title: Mashup: Serendipities
description: Serendipities is an innovative mashup application that leverages the Moves app to allow users to explore where they have crossed paths with their friends, creating a social map of shared experiences. The app integrates the Moves API to access users' location data, enabling the creation of a visual representation of their interactions. By combining fitness tracking with social networking, Serendipities provides a unique way for users to connect and discover common ground with their friends.

title: Mashup: World Port Source
description: A comprehensive mapping and port information service that provides interactive satellite images, detailed maps, and contact information for 645 global ports. This mashup integrates satellite imagery APIs with port data to offer users a visual and informational guide to ports worldwide, enhancing navigation, logistics planning, and maritime research.

related_apis.title: Google AdWords API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google AdWords API allows apps to interact directly with the Google Ads platform, vastly increasing the efficiency of managing large or complex Google Ads accounts and campaigns. Some typical use cases include:Automated account managementCustom reportingAd management based on inventoryBid management based on business dataWith the AdWords API you can build software that manages accounts from the customer level down to the keyword level. The API can do almost everything the Google Ads UI does, but programmatically.The types of companies that have benefited from the AdWords API include:Ad agenciesSearch Engine Marketing (SEM) companiesBig brands managing a large number of accounts, with needs beyond what's possible within the Google Ads UI.The API relies on SOAP and WSDL technologies to offer its services. You set up API access by obtaining a few required authentication credentials, creating some test accounts, and adding the authentication and account details to a configuration file for your client library. Authentication is via OAuth2.To help you get started, they offer client libraries in Java, .NET, Python, PHP, Perl, and Ruby.

title: Mashup: Rest Area Near Me
description: A location-aware web application that leverages mapping APIs to display a comprehensive map of United States rest areas, including detailed descriptions and facilities lists for each location. Users can pinpoint their current position on the map and compute the distance to each rest stop, facilitating navigation and planning for travelers.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. title: Mashup: Dex CityCentral
description: Dex CityCentral is an iPad app that offers a hyper-local, comprehensive city experience. It leverages FanFeedr's Sports and Image APIs to deliver sports news, photos, and information about local teams, creating a rich, contextually relevant urban discovery platform.

title: Mashup: MySchoolPride (NBC Universal)
description: A collaboration between NBC Universal and DonorsChoose.org, MySchoolPride is an educational and charity-focused platform that enables users to search for schools in their local area that are in need of financial or material support. The mashup leverages NBC Universal's media resources with DonorsChoose.org's school support network to facilitate donations and community engagement. Users can browse through profiles of schools, view specific needs and projects, and directly contribute to the schools' educational initiatives. This mashup serves as a bridge between media exposure and direct community support, combining educational resources with charitable giving opportunities.

related_apis.title: DonorsChoose API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DonorsChoose.org is an online charity that makes it easy for anyone to help students in need.Here's how it works: public school teachers from every corner of America post classroom project requests on DonorsChoose.org. Requests range from pencils for a poetry writing unit, to violins for a school recital, to microscope slides for a biology class.
Then, you can browse project requests and give any amount to the one that inspires you. Once a project reaches its funding goal, we deliver the materials to the school.You'll get photos of your project taking place, a thank-you letter from the teacher, and a cost report showing how each dollar was spent. If you give over $100, you'll also receive hand-written thank-you letters from the students.DonorsChoose.org's simple JSON API allows developers to pull DonorsChoose.org classroom project listings into their website or application using project selection criteria of their choosing.The JSON API has been used by DonorsChoose.org partners like Chevron, SONIC Drive-In, NBC Universal, Bing, PayPal, and others to build high-profile highly customized giving and cause marketing experiences.The API also enables developers to donate to projects or purchase gift cards without routing users to DonorsChoose.org for payment.

title: Mashup: Boston Events by Phone
description: A mobile-based service that delivers a list of events happening in Boston this week via SMS, WAP, or email. Users can access this information using the keyword 'bostonweek'. The service aggregates event data from various sources and provides it in a convenient, location-specific format, catering to users who prefer to receive information through messaging platforms.

title: Mashup: Intel Mash Maker
description: A browser extension that empowers users to customize their web browsing experience by applying mashups to enhance the pages they are viewing. These mashups can add extra information or visualizations to the existing content, thereby enriching the user's interaction with the webpage. The tool leverages web APIs and data sources to integrate additional layers of data, making the browsing experience more informative and interactive.

title: Mashup: BookFresh
description: A comprehensive online scheduling and appointment booking application that leverages the Twilio API for seamless voice integration. Users can schedule meetings, appointments, and events directly through the app, and receive voice confirmations and reminders. The system is designed to improve efficiency in both personal and professional settings, with a focus on enterprise-level telephony solutions. It allows for real-time booking updates and supports integration with various office and sales tools for enhanced management capabilities.

description: A minimalistic proof-of-concept mashup that converts Irish street addresses into geographic coordinates, utilizing the Lycos Route Planner API for basic street-level geocoding. This tool is designed for demonstrating the integration of geocoding services into mapping applications focused on Irish streets.

title: Mashup: ScanMyBack
description: A customizable clothing creation platform that utilizes QR code technology to encode personal messages, links to websites, videos, and pictures onto apparel items. Users can design unique t-shirts and other garments with QR codes, allowing others to scan these codes using QR applications on their smartphones, thereby decoding the encoded content and accessing the linked resources. This mashup combines fashion with digital interaction, providing a novel way to share information and personal messages through clothing.

related_apis.title: Zazzle API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Zazzle provides a simple URL linkover-based API that allows any third party to automatically generate a customized product with dynamic images and text. The Zazzle Create-a-Product API can be used to automatically generate over 200 different types of customized products: t-shirts, mugs, cards, postage, and posters. Detailed documentation requires registration.

title: Mashup: similags
description: This mashup analyzes data from Flickr and Delicious to create visualizations showing relationships between users who use similar tags. It provides a way to discover connections between users based on their interests and shared tags, offering insights into communities and user behavior on these platforms.

related_apis.title: del.icio.us API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: del.icio.us is a social bookmarking website -- the primary use of del.icio.us is to store your bookmarks online, which allows you to access the same bookmarks from any computer and add bookmarks from anywhere, too. On del.icio.us, you can use tags to organize and remember your bookmarks, which is a much more flexible system than folders.
The API provides read/write access to Delicious bookmarks and tags via an HTTP-based interface. The RESTful API returns responses in XML.

title: Mashup: Clickincity Food and Travel Guide
description: A comprehensive travel and dining guide that aggregates data from various sources to provide users with recommendations for the best places to stay, eat, and explore in popular cities such as Sydney, New York, Singapore, and the Philippines. The service combines hotel and restaurant ratings with local reviews to offer personalized travel itineraries and recommendations for top-rated accommodations, dining options, and entertainment venues.

related_apis.title: CityGrid API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The CityGrid network APIs give developers access to premium local content including user reviews, editorial content, merchant messages & more, across 75K neighborhoods nationwide. CityGrid Media is an online media company that connects web and mobile publishers with local advertising organizations by linking them through CityGrid, its local content and advertising network. Currently CityGrid offers the following APIs:
Places API - Provides functionality for information on local businesses, including search, detail, user content submission, and predictive text.
Offers API - Provides coupons and special offers from businesses based on geographical location and category
Reviews API - Displays customer reviews based on listing IDs for certain geographic/category attributes All APIs have been instrumented with impression tracking feeding our new beta reporting dashboard.

title: Mashup: Cap Cod Maps
description: A travel-focused mashup that provides a comprehensive guide to places on Cape Cod, including fishing spots, sites of historical significance, and unique locations. The mashup integrates mapping data with local information to offer users a detailed and interactive tour of the Cape Cod region.

title: Mashup: Fone Findr
description: A telephony-based service that utilizes GPS and cellular data to initiate calls to the user when their lost phone is located. It provides a message recording functionality for users to communicate with the person who found their phone, guiding them on how to return it safely. The service integrates location tracking and messaging capabilities to facilitate the recovery of misplaced mobile devices.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

related_apis.title: Tropo Scripting API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Tropo makes it simple to build phone, SMS and Instant messaging applications. You use the web technologies you already know and Tropo's powerful cloud API to bring real-time communications to your apps.
If you can create a web site, you can make and receive phone calls, use voice recognition, interact over SMS, IM, or Twitter. You can even create conference calls and transcribe calls. There's no need to learn new languages, wrestle with VoIP software, or learn about telephony. Host your code with us, or use your existing web server in the language of your choice.
Coverage:
usa, canada, australia, austria, belgium, brazil, bulgaria, croatia, Cyprus, CzechRepublic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, HongKong, Hungary, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Mexico, Netherlands, NewZealand, Norway, Panama, Peru, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, and the uk.

title: Mashup: bookfriend
description: bookfriend is a mobile, social, educational mashup application designed specifically for Android devices, which instantly and seamlessly generates companion guides for any book, providing additional context and information directly within the reading experience.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: ISBN db API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: ISBNdb.com's remote access application programming interface (API) is designed to allow other websites and standalone applications use the vast collection of data collected by ISBNdb.com since 2003. As of this writing, in July 2005, the data includes nearly 1,800,000 books almost 3,000,000 library records close to a million subjects hundreds of thousands of author and publisher records parsed out of library data more than 10,000,000 records of actual and historic prices. Using the API you can look up information by keywords, by ISBN, by authors or publishers, etc. In most situations the API is fast enough to be used in interactive applications.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: LibraryThing API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Three APIs available: (1) thingISBN takes an ISBN and returns a list of ISBNs from the same "work" (ie., other editions and translations); (2) thingTitle takes a title and returns a list of ISBNs from the most likely LibraryThing "work," the LibraryThing title and a link to the LibraryThing work page; and (3) thingLang takes an ISBN and returns the language of the book, using language codes from MARC records, and from the Group Identifiers embedded at the start of the ISBN format.

related_apis.title: BookMooch API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: BookMooch is a community for exchanging used books. BookMooch lets you give away books you no longer need in exchange for books you really want. All the API calls support XML output, by adding &o=xml on the GET url line.

related_apis.title: Google Books API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Google Book Search Data API to get and modify Book Search content via feeds. Submit full-text searches for books and get book information, ratings, and reviews. Optionally get individual users' library collections and public reviews. Submit authenticated requests to create and modify library collections, ratings, labels, reviews, and more.

related_apis.title: Goodreads API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Use the Goodreads API to get the books on a shelf, get your friends' updates, link to a book by ISBN or other method, get the url for a book or author, get a members' friends, look up a member by email address, and get reviews by ISBN.
The Goodreads API allows developers access to Goodreads data in order to help websites or applications that deal with books be more personalized, social, and engaging. The API can be used in many ways, including:
Review Syndication: Goodreads has 10 million reviews across 700,000 titles. The API lets users display these reviews on their website.
Goodreads Connect: Members can connect to their Goodreads account, and developers have full access to the books, ratings, and reviews the member has in their shelves, as well as the member's friends. This can be used to personalize an ecommerce store, power recommendations, show a widget of a member's favorite books, build a mobile or desktop client app, and more.
The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in XML.

title: Mashup: EasySlip
description: An Android application designed for real-time delivery confirmation and electronic signature capture, facilitating seamless delivery sign-off processes. This mashup integrates telephony services for direct driver communication, electronic signature capabilities for secure document approval, and GPS tracking for delivery location verification.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: Plantmaps
description: An interactive mashup that combines mapping technologies with gardening information to provide users with an online USDA zone hardiness map, allowing them to easily locate and identify plant zones suitable for their specific geographical location. The mashup enhances the traditional understanding of plant zones by integrating online mapping tools, making it a valuable resource for gardeners, horticulturists, and anyone interested in plant science and environmental education.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Qibla Direction
description: A location-based service designed to help Muslims determine the direction of Qibla (the direction of Mecca) for prayer purposes. By integrating mapping technology with geolocation services, users can input their address to receive highly accurate directions to Mecca, surpassing traditional compass readings. This mashup simplifies the process of locating the correct prayer direction, making it accessible and accurate for users worldwide.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Initt
description: Initt is a user-friendly start page tailored specifically for Spanish-speaking countries. It integrates various functionalities such as photo sharing, blogging, and mapping services, making it a comprehensive platform for individuals in these regions. The mashup also includes widgets for easy customization and enhanced user experience. It serves as a one-stop destination for content creation, sharing, and navigation, catering to the unique needs of Spanish speakers worldwide.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Google Calendar API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Calendar Data API lets users perform most of the operations a normal Google Calendar user can on the Google Calendar website. Google Calendar allows client applications to view and update calendar events in the form of Google data API, GData, feeds. The Calendar Data API lets users incorporate Calendar functionality into their own application or website. Users can edit calendars, create and delete events, query for events that match particular criteria, send invitations, and more.
There are many possible uses for the Calendar data API. For example, users can create a web front end for a group calendar that uses Google Calendar as a back end. Or a public calendar can be generated for Google Calendar to display, based on a company event database. Or users can search relevant calendars to display a list of upcoming events on those calendars.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Mail API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Yahoo Mail Web Service API is a full-featured interface to Yahoo! Mail. With it, you can build applications that display message summary information, parse message contents, manage folders, and even compose and send messages. The Web Service uses OAuth for authentication and access to mailbox contents.

related_apis.title: Weather Channel API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: (This API is now part of IBM Cloud's The Weather Company APIs) From their site: Since 1982, The Weather Channel has brought timely weather information to the world. Now you can include weather from The Weather Channel in your own application by signing up for access to our XML data feed. We'll enable you to search for a location and to integrate current conditions and the forecast for today and tomorrow in your application for free.

title: Mashup: BanzaiApp
description: A social platform for app developers to showcase and promote their iPhone, Google Android, and Nokia apps. Users can upload and share their apps, YouTube videos, screenshots, and descriptions, creating a community-driven marketplace for app discovery and review.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: CustomSync for The Education Edge
description: CustomSync is a versatile data management solution for The Education Edge designed to streamline the synchronization of data between your Education Edge platform and your eLearning Management Provider (ELMP) such as Finalsite, Schoology, or WhippleHill. This application is offered in two formats - as a plugin directly integrated into the Education Edge platform, and as a fully-automated Windows service, providing convenient options for different user preferences and system configurations.

related_apis.title: Finalsite API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Finalsite API is a REST-based web service which provides access to data in the Finalsite CMS.
To best use the Finalsite API you should be familiar with the back-end modules and tools of the Finalsite CMS, such Constituent Manager and Group Manager.

related_apis.title: Whipplehill API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The service provides functions for managing school records via a software as a service (SaaS) platform. Its Podium module supports faculty needs for instructional resources, class roster management, grading, and related tasks. Student-focused functions include course information access, faculty and staff directory, attendance records, etc. Web access is provided via specialized web content management system (CMS) capabilities.
API methods support interaction by partners within the provider's "Ecosystem" to deliver specific functions and services. Methods handle user profile settings and access permissions, athletic and other school event information, posting and dissemination of news updates, etc.

related_apis.title: Schoology API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Schoology is an online and mobile application for classroom and education management. Schoology offers features for teachers and schools to manage homework and assignments, engage students, and manage education materials.
The Schoology API allows developers to access and integrate the functionality of Schoology with other applications and to create new applications. Some example API methods include managing comments and email messages, managing user and account information, and uploading and managing documents.

title: Mashup: Cheese Nachos Product Search
description: A comprehensive product search engine that integrates and searches across multiple platforms including eBay, Amazon, and Shopping.com simultaneously. Utilizes an intelligent algorithm to provide relevant search suggestions based on user queries, enhancing the search experience by making related product recommendations. Key features include cross-platform search capabilities, intelligent search suggestion algorithms, and user-friendly product integration.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

related_apis.title: Shopping.com API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API has been acquired by eBay and now exists as eBay Commerce Network. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]With the Shopping.com API you can integrate relevant product content with the deepest product catalog available online. Add millions of unique products and merchant offers to your site. Shopping.com, an eBay company, is the world's online comparison shopping service leader. Its global websites (Shopping.com, DealTime, and DoorOne) carry one of the world's largest product catalogs and offers from more than 6000 merchants.
The Shopping.com XML API uses a RESTful interface and can be used to feature dynamic Shopping.com content on your web pages. It offers capabilities such as keyword search, refining and sorting search results, finding product reviews, reading product specs, comparing products and prices from different merchants and controlling the number of results and navigating between pages.

title: Mashup: QuickFuse Amazon Mashup
description: This mashup provides a quick and efficient way for book enthusiasts to access detailed information about books using their ISBN. By entering an ISBN, users can obtain comprehensive details such as the title, author, price, and average user ratings directly from Amazon.com. Ideal for mobile users, this mashup offers immediate access to essential book information, enhancing the reading experience. Users must be logged in to QuickFuse to utilize this feature.

related_apis.title: Plum Fuse API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Plum Fuse is a cloud-based, visual voice application editor and programmable platform that offers API connectivity to automate customer interactions over the phone. The Fuse API uses REST, SOAP, and CSV for uploading and downloading data. The Fuse platform contains pre-built modules that allow users to rapidly piece together components, test, and deploy voice applications. Fuse also offers optimized, pre-built applications for common tasks and verticals to accelerate the process even more. This makes Fuse accessible to developers and non-developers alike. Developers use Fuse to build and manage advanced voice applications including IVR, outbound calling, messaging and notifications (voice or SMS/MMS), automated phone surveys, and call routing systems. Granular sharing permissions simplify application management and make Fuse an ideal product for on-going team collaboration. Fuse supports speech recognition and text-to-speech and offers a diverse security portfolio with PCI-DSS (level 1), HIPAA, SOC2, Visa Verified, and Cyber Essentials (GDPR) compliance. Fuse users also have access to Plum’s analytics and data tool, VoiceTrends, which provides actionable data on voice application performance.

title: Mashup: Coming to Town Concerts - Rdio - Seatwave
description: A music discovery mashup that combines event listings with real-time audio previews. Users can search for upcoming concerts in their city, such as London, by visiting a URL like http://mhd2012.heroku.com/events?city=london. Each event listing provides a link to a dedicated page where they can browse and listen to the band's albums through the Rdio service. This mashup simplifies the process of finding and previewing live music performances, leveraging event data and streaming capabilities.

title: Mashup: Open Stock Photography
description: A comprehensive, free, and searchable collection of high-quality stock photography, powered by the extensive Wikimedia Commons platform. This mashup allows users to browse and download images from a wide range of categories, all while keeping the images royalty-free and accessible to everyone. The mashup integrates the powerful search capabilities of Wikimedia Commons, providing users with a simple interface to find the perfect image for their needs.

title: Mashup: Your Own Music Television
description: A personalized music video streaming platform that dynamically generates playlists from the user's top 50 artists and their friends' Last.fm favorites. The mashup offers a full-screen viewing experience with random music video playback, providing an immersive and curated audiovisual experience tailored to individual preferences. It leverages Last.fm's API for artist data and integrates with video hosting platforms for seamless playback.

It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

title: Mashup: MyGuestmap
description: A mapping mashup that enables website visitors to contribute to a dynamic, interactive map by adding pins that represent their location and including personal messages. This tool supports various map types, including public maps for general visitor engagement, private bookmark maps for exclusive user posting, password-protected maps for secure data sharing, and the ability to upload photos, enhancing the visual representation of the map. The mashup utilizes geolocation services, user-generated content features, and secure authentication mechanisms.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. title: Mashup: AccentTraining.net
description: AccentTraining.net leverages Twilio's voice communication capabilities, Amazon Mechanical Turk's human intelligence services, and Recurly's subscription management API to offer an accent rating and training platform. Users can record their speech, which is then assessed by native English speakers in the United States through the Amazon Mechanical Turk network. Subscribers gain access to personalized training sessions based on their performance ratings via the Recurly subscription management system.

related_apis.title: Amazon Mechanical Turk API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Amazon Mechanical Turk provides a web services API for computers to integrate Artificial Artificial Intelligence directly into their processing by making requests of humans. Developers use the Amazon Mechanical Turk web services API to submit tasks to the Amazon Mechanical Turk web site, approve completed tasks, and incorporate the answers into their software applications. To the application, the transaction looks very much like any remote procedure call - the application sends the request, and the service returns the results. In reality, a network of humans fuels this Artificial Artificial Intelligence by coming to the web site, searching for and completing tasks, and receiving payment for their work.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Recurly API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Recurly API provides a recurring subscription billing system for online businesses. It is available in REST architecture with XML and JSON formats, public key, basic auth, and token as authentication methods secured in SSL, and HTTP status codes. With the API, developers can integrate recurring billing features including adjustments, invoices, plans, and subscriptions.

title: Mashup: Twick.it explanations
description: A mashup that displays short explanations from Twick.it on a Google Map. Users can explore Twick.it's content using an interactive map interface, allowing for location-based discovery and browsing of explanatory content.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: KnoWorld
description: A comprehensive data analysis tool that provides access to global economic and social indicators such as GDP and infant mortality rates. KnoWorld enables users to visualize this data through interactive graphs and maps, facilitating comparison with real-world events to identify trends, causes, and potential consequences. The mashup integrates various data sources and APIs to offer a detailed, dynamic view of global indicators and their implications.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: EmployShark
description: EmployShark is a job search mashup that aggregates job listings from various sources into a single platform, allowing users to filter and find jobs based on state and zip code. The mashup leverages advanced search algorithms and real-time data feeds to ensure that users have access to the most up-to-date job listings available. It is designed to provide a streamlined and efficient job search experience for users seeking employment in specific geographic locations.

related_apis.title: CareerBuilder API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Currently a private API, the CareerBuilder API allows you to integrate their database of over 1.5 million jobs with your software or website. The API provides methods for basic job searching, retrieving data for a specific job, and applying to a job.

title: Mashup: Realtor Listings Mobile
description: A mobile real estate listing service that provides on-the-go access to property listings via WAP technology. Users can search for real estate listings by sending a message with the keyword 'realtor' followed by the desired ZIP code. The service is limited to WAP-enabled devices.

title: Mashup: Pikter
description: A social media platform that seamlessly integrates photo sharing features with microblogging capabilities, enabling users to post and share photos directly on Twitter and/or Jaiku.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: [t]Space
description: TopTechPhoto Space is a Lightroom plug-in that facilitates the storage of catalog content (including images) on a network server such as Dropbox, FTP, sFTP, or Samba, thereby freeing up storage space on the user's local hard drive. This Lightroom plug-in also enables users to share their catalog images with others via these network storage solutions, making collaboration and distribution of photo content more efficient.

related_apis.title: Amazon S3 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Since 2006 Amazon Web Services has been offering web services commonly known as cloud computing. AWS Provides a reliable, low cost infrastructure platform that powers hundreds of thousands of businesses.
Amazon S3 API, the Simple Storage Service provides a simple web services interface used to store objects using the Amazon online storage infrastructure. Users can then download the data or use the data with other AWS services, such as Amazon Elastic Cloud Computer (EC2). Using this web service, developers can build applications that make use of Internet storage.
The API uses Buckets, Objects, Keys and Operations. An object has four parts: value, key, metadata, and an access control policy. Objects are stored in buckets. The API is REST based. Responses are formatted in JSON.

related_apis.title: Google Storage API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Google Storage for Developers is a RESTful web service API for storing and accessing your data on Google's infrastructure. The service combines the performance and scalability of Google's cloud with advanced security and sharing capabilities. With this API: all data is replicated to multiple U.S. data centers, offers read-your-writes data consistency, and allows objects of hundreds of gigabytes in size per request with range-get support.

related_apis.title: Dropbox API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Dropbox is a storage service that syncs files online and across your computers via installed software. The API allows read/write access to the same files, piggybacking on Dropbox's file synchronization and storage.

related_apis.title: MediaFire API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: MediaFire is a cloud-based service for storing and sharing files. Users can host and share any file type including documents, presentations, videos, and images. All accounts can upload and share an unlimited number of files, with the maximum file size being 200MB for free accounts. Users can access and manage their MediaFire cloud using a RESTful API.

title: Mashup: tweedly
description: A Twitter influence tracking service that uses SMS communications to provide users with real-time updates on their Twitter account's ranking from 1 to 10. The service integrates Twitter's API for user data retrieval and SMS gateways for communication, targeting users who want to monitor their social media influence without constant app usage. It offers a mobile-friendly solution for active Twitter users, providing a quick way to check their Twitter influence through text messaging.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: LiveMap English Football Ground Guide
description: A comprehensive location guide to football clubs across the top 16 divisions of English Football, including the Premier League, Football League, and the top twelve divisions in non-league football. This mashup integrates mapping and search technologies to provide users with a detailed visual representation of each club's location, stadium information, and travel directions. It serves as an invaluable resource for football enthusiasts, journalists, and fans planning to attend matches across various leagues.

title: Mashup: PXN8
description: A web-based image editing solution specifically designed to seamlessly integrate with Flickr, providing users with an intuitive platform to edit and enhance their photos before uploading or sharing them on the popular photo-sharing site. The mashup offers a wide array of editing tools and features, all accessible directly from Flickr, enabling users to streamline their workflow and improve their overall photo editing experience.

Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: EEMap
description: EEMap is a Chinese language wiki service that leverages Google Maps for geographical data. Users can contribute to and view information on various topics, with a particular focus on Chinese culture and geography. The service integrates Google's mapping API to provide a visual interface for wiki content, making it easier to explore and understand information based on location. It is particularly useful for those interested in learning about or contributing to Chinese-related topics with a visual, geographical context.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Best Beauty Search
description: A comprehensive search platform for health, beauty, and fashion products, incorporating user-generated content, social media feeds, customer reviews, and contests to provide enriched search results. The mashup aggregates data from multiple e-commerce sites and blogs, allowing users to discover and compare products across various categories while engaging with their friends and community.

related_apis.title: Blogger API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Blogger Data API allows client applications to view and update Blogger content in the form of Google Data API feeds. Your client application can use the Data API to create new blog posts, edit or delete existing posts, and query for posts that match particular criteria.

related_apis.title: Google AdWords API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google AdWords API allows apps to interact directly with the Google Ads platform, vastly increasing the efficiency of managing large or complex Google Ads accounts and campaigns. Some typical use cases include:Automated account managementCustom reportingAd management based on inventoryBid management based on business dataWith the AdWords API you can build software that manages accounts from the customer level down to the keyword level. The API can do almost everything the Google Ads UI does, but programmatically.The types of companies that have benefited from the AdWords API include:Ad agenciesSearch Engine Marketing (SEM) companiesBig brands managing a large number of accounts, with needs beyond what's possible within the Google Ads UI.The API relies on SOAP and WSDL technologies to offer its services. You set up API access by obtaining a few required authentication credentials, creating some test accounts, and adding the authentication and account details to a configuration file for your client library. Authentication is via OAuth2.To help you get started, they offer client libraries in Java, .NET, Python, PHP, Perl, and Ruby.

related_apis.title: Ning API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Ning is a platform for creating social networks. The Ning REST API integrates with any Ning Pro account to import, export, and share data from apps running on Ning across the web or onto your desktop. Manage users, blog posts, photos, comments and other elements of your Ning Network. The company also has an API that supports the OpenSocial standard.

related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

title: Mashup: Fuzwire
description: Fuzwire is an employment search platform that integrates with the CareerBuilder job database. It enables users to perform job searches based on location and job function, providing access to a wide range of employment opportunities. The platform offers a streamlined interface for job seekers to find relevant positions and apply directly through the mashup.

related_apis.title: CareerBuilder API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Currently a private API, the CareerBuilder API allows you to integrate their database of over 1.5 million jobs with your software or website. The API provides methods for basic job searching, retrieving data for a specific job, and applying to a job.

title: Mashup: Qup
description: Qup is a notification service that seamlessly integrates Netflix and Rotten Tomatoes to provide movie enthusiasts with real-time updates on new releases, ratings, and reviews. The mashup leverages the APIs of both platforms to deliver personalized movie recommendations and notifications, ensuring users are always up-to-date on the latest cinematic offerings. It is designed for movie lovers who want to stay informed and engaged with the latest trends in the film industry.

related_apis.title: Rotten Tomatoes API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Rotten Tomatoes is a website containing information about movies: information, news, reviews and ratings, pictures, etx. The Rotten Tomatoes API is RESTful web service that was designed to be easy to explore and use. Developers can use the API to access the Rotten Tomatoes' database of movie data by using the Lists, Movies, or DVDs sections of the API.

title: Mashup: Showtime Plugin Youtube
description: This is a plugin designed to integrate Youtube content into the Showtime platform. The primary functionality of this mashup is to enable Showtime users to access and utilize Youtube's full range of features and content, including video playback, search, and sharing functionalities, directly within the Showtime ecosystem.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: STORET Watershed Summary
description: STORET Watershed Summary is a data-driven mashup that provides a comprehensive overview of environmental data available for a specific watershed identified by its 8-digit Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC). This mashup serves as a reference tool for environmental scientists, policymakers, and researchers, allowing them to explore various types of environmental data such as metals, nutrients, and pesticides. Users can access detailed information about the data sources, the agencies or organizations that have entered the data, the historical record of data collection, and the total volume of data available for each type of data. The mashup also facilitates the discovery of new data by enabling users to locate their nearest watershed by entering their zip code in the "Find Your Watershed" data field. This feature is particularly useful for users who need to quickly identify and analyze environmental data in their local area.

related_apis.title: EPA Watershed Summary API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The EPA's Watershed Summary API provides a summary of information for the types of data available within a given watershed, which is identified by an 8-digit HUC (Hydrologic Unit Code). This data includes which organizations have data, the number of stations, and result counts by characteristic type.

related_apis.title: EPA Station Catalog API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The EPA's Station Catalog API provides a summary of information on water quality monitoring stations such as the station's name, period of record, and result counts by characteristic type. This API operates over both SOAP and HTTP GET protocols.

title: Mashup: Airport Parking
description: A comprehensive platform that integrates airport parking facilities' information, enabling users to quickly locate the nearest parking options to their destination or the airport, compare prices, and book reservations. The mashup leverages mapping APIs for real-time location services and travel data for accurate pricing and availability information, streamlining the airport parking experience.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: LastGraph
description: A personalized graphing system that utilizes the Last.fm API to analyze user music history data, performing complex data transformations to generate visual representations of music trends and listening habits. The system processes user data, applies mathematical and data processing techniques, and presents the results in the form of graphs, offering users a unique perspective on their music preferences and patterns.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

title: Mashup: Geoviu
description: A location-based information and news aggregation platform that utilizes Google Maps API to provide users with geographically relevant news and information. Users can browse and explore news based on their current location or any other location of interest, leveraging the mapping capabilities of Google Maps to visualize and understand the context of the news and information presented.

title: Mashup: Moment
description: A social messaging service that allows users to send heartfelt best wishes and messages to their loved ones at special moments using Twitter. It can be used to celebrate various occasions such as a baby shower, the start of a journey, or a birthday, by creating a timeline filled with personal messages and well-wishes.

related_apis.title: Amazon EC2 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) API is a web service that enables you to launch and manage Linux/UNIX and Windows server instances in Amazon's data centers. Giving users the ability to "compute" in the cloud, it provides users with complete control of their computing resources and lets them run on Amazon's computing environment. Amazon EC2 changes the economics of computing by allowing users to pay only for capacity that is actually used.
This is a REST-based API. The SOAP interface was deprecated on 1 December 2015.
The WSDL for each supported API version is available from the following URI:
http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc//AmazonEC2.wsdl

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: FedEx Office and Box.net
description: A document processing and shipping service that allows Box.net users to seamlessly transfer files directly from their Box.net account to FedEx Office for printing and shipping. The mashup integrates Box.net's cloud storage capabilities with FedEx's shipping and printing services, enabling users to manage their documents and shipping needs in one place. Users can select specific files from their Box.net account, request printing and shipping through the FedEx Office interface, and track their orders using FedEx's shipping services.

related_apis.title: FedEx API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: FedEx web services allow businesses to integrate FedEx shipping functionality into their existing warehouse management systems without hosting on-site.Developers can access the FedEx API via SOAP or HTTP POST transactions. The following functionality is available: Rate Services, Service Availability, Tracking and Visibility, FedEx Locator. Further services are available but require the completion of a certification process.

related_apis.title: Box API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Box is a modern content management platform that transforms how organizations work and collaborate to achieve results faster.Box Platform provides content APIs to build secure content experiences in custom apps. With Box Platform, organizations can bring content management and collaboration services to their own custom apps or build custom integrations with Box.

title: Mashup: Notwifications
description: Notwilfications is a Google Chrome Extension that integrates telephony services to display incoming call notifications directly within the browser. Users can manage calls by ignoring them or sending them to voicemail, all without physically interacting with their phone. This mashup enhances call management by allowing users to stay informed about incoming calls and take actions remotely, providing a more convenient and efficient communication experience.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: Anyvite
description: Anyvite is a comprehensive online event invitation platform that seamlessly integrates APIs from various services such as Google Maps for location data, Flickr for photo sharing, Plaxo for contact management, Twitter for social media updates, and YouTube for video content. Users can create, send, and manage event invitations with ease, leveraging these integrated services to enhance the invitation experience with real-time updates, location-based details, multimedia content, and social sharing capabilities.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.
