related_apis.title: Google Static Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Static Maps API lets you embed a Google Maps image on your webpage without requiring JavaScript or any dynamic page loading. The Google Static Map service creates your map based on URL parameters sent through a standard HTTP request and returns the map as an image you can display on your web page.

related_apis.title: Google Visualization API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Visualization JavaScript API lets you access structured data and visualize that data using JavaScript in your web pages. The Google Visualization API also enables the creation of gadgets.

related_apis.title: Google Earth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Earth Engine API allows developers to run algorithms on georeferenced imagery and vectors stored on Google's infrastructure. The Google Earth Engine API provides a library of functions which may be applied to imagery for display and analysis. Earth Engine's public data catalog contains a large amount of publicly available imagery.

title: Mashup: SoundCloud Player for Facebook
description: A Facebook application that leverages the SoundCloud API to provide users with the ability to play and share music tracks directly from their Facebook profiles. This app enhances the social music experience by integrating SoundCloud's extensive library into the Facebook platform, allowing users to discover and enjoy music in a more interactive and social setting. The application is built using PHP and its source code is publicly available for developers who wish to integrate similar functionality into their own projects.

related_apis.title: SoundCloud API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: SoundCloud is the leading audio platform that enables anyone to upload, record, promote and share their sounds across the web. The SoundCloud API makes most of the features from SoundCloud.com available to app developers. With the help of its SDKs it's easy to integrate functionality like audio sharing and recording directly into iOS, Android and web apps.

title: Mashup: WeoGeo
description: A comprehensive marketplace for geospatial professionals to store, search, and exchange high-resolution mapping products. The WeoGeo platform integrates various mapping data sources, enabling users to access and share detailed geographical information efficiently. It serves as a centralized hub for the mapping community to collaborate and enhance their mapping capabilities.

related_apis.title: GeoNames API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Geonames is a geographical database with web services that let users extract useful information about different places, such as weather, timezone and post codes. The GeoNames geographical database covers all countries and contains over eight million placenames that are available for download free of charge. Users can edit, correct and add new names using a wiki interface.Geonames provides a suite of Webservices including the following categories:Fulltext searchPlace HierarchyWikipediaPostal CodesReverse GeocodingThe APIs use RESTful protocol and responses vary in format between XML, JSON, CSV, and TXTWhile the GeoNames data is free, the data is available without costs, there is a Service Level Agreement available for premium web services.

related_apis.title: OpenLayers API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The OpenLayers API allows developers to include dynamic maps in their web pages. These maps can include map tiles, vector data, and markers loaded from any source. Mobile support is included. OpenLayers is provided for free and is open source under the 2-clause BSD License. This API can be accessed via its JavaScript SDK.

related_apis.title: Amazon EC2 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) API is a web service that enables you to launch and manage Linux/UNIX and Windows server instances in Amazon's data centers. Giving users the ability to "compute" in the cloud, it provides users with complete control of their computing resources and lets them run on Amazon's computing environment. Amazon EC2 changes the economics of computing by allowing users to pay only for capacity that is actually used.
This is a REST-based API. The SOAP interface was deprecated on 1 December 2015.
The WSDL for each supported API version is available from the following URI:
http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc//AmazonEC2.wsdl

related_apis.title: MapQuest Geocoding API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Geocoding API allows you to find the coordinates (latitude/longitude) of a location based on the address provided. Additional features include reverse geocoding, batch geocoding, viewport biasing, thumbnail images, and more. Requests can be submitted as key-value pairs, JSON, and XML.

title: Mashup: New York Canal System Map
description: A comprehensive educational tool designed to provide an interactive map of the New York state's contemporary canal system. This mashup includes detailed directions and is tailored specifically for the WCNY audience, enhancing the learning experience with real-time mapping capabilities and accessible navigation features.

title: Mashup: Sales Executive Dashboard
description: An interactive dashboard designed for sales executives to monitor and analyze performance across the organization in real-time. The dashboard provides an initial summary view that highlights underperforming regions through visual alerts, enabling executives to drill down into detailed regional performance data. Sales data is further segmented to offer insights into performance metrics for sales teams and individual representatives, allowing managers to identify and address potential issues promptly. This tool integrates multiple data sources and provides a comprehensive, location-aware view of sales performance, with the ability to segment data by region, team, and individual representative. It leverages sales data from various sources, including CRM systems, sales databases, and performance metrics, to provide a holistic view of sales performance. The dashboard supports real-time data analysis and historical trend visualization, enabling effective decision-making and performance optimization.

title: Mashup: Gay City Map of Madrid
description: An interactive map featuring gay-friendly venues, accommodations, and amenities in Madrid and its Chueca neighborhood. The mashup combines mapping technology with curated listings to provide a comprehensive guide for travelers seeking a welcoming environment for LGBTQ+ communities. It includes detailed information on bars, clubs, hotels, shops, and other points of interest specific to the LGBTQ+ experience in Madrid.

title: Mashup: Postworthy MyBlogLog Community Widget
description: A social interaction and visualization widget that leverages the MyBlogLog API to display a Community Graph. This graph provides real-time visual representation of the social network visiting your blog, showing which other blogs each visitor enjoys. It enhances user engagement by revealing the interconnectedness of bloggers and their interests, fostering a community feel.

title: Mashup: Keyword Bee
description: A comprehensive keyword research tool that aggregates keyword data from multiple sources, providing users with in-depth insights into keyword performance, search volume, and competitiveness. Users can search for and filter related keywords based on specific criteria, enabling them to identify high-value keywords for SEO and marketing strategies.

related_apis.title: WebKnox Keywords API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Begun as a research project from the Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology and the University of Technology Dresden, WebKnox is an ontology-driven fact extraction engine built to provide direct, fast, and complete answers to questions on any topic a user can think of. To answer a question WebKnox uses external services that might have previously provided an answer or computes an answer using its knowledge base. If those options fail, WebKnox tries to find an answer on the fly.
WebKnox hosts a suite of REST APIs delivering a range of web services. The WebKnox Keywords API provides developer access to keyword data such as how often they are searched and how many competing pages are on Google. The API can also return a list of related keywords.

title: Mashup: YouGlobe
description: A collaborative mapping platform that allows users to share and discover geolocated points of interest (POIs) using Google Earth's visualization technology. Users can contribute to a global database of placemarks, which can then be accessed and shared by others, facilitating the exploration and sharing of favorite locations worldwide. The platform integrates Google Earth's 3D mapping capabilities with user-generated content to provide an immersive experience in discovering and sharing locations.

title: Mashup: Enterprisingly
description: A one-stop platform for entrepreneurs that combines essential services with a robust online community. Enterprisingly streamlines the entrepreneurial process by providing access to a variety of key services, such as legal, financial, marketing, and operational support, all in one place. This eliminates the need for entrepreneurs to spend time searching for and selecting individual service providers. Additionally, Enterprisingly fosters a strong online community where entrepreneurs can connect, share knowledge, and collaborate, further accelerating the startup development process.

Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: Twitter Based CRM, Lead Generation & Analytics Dashboard
description: A comprehensive social media management tool leveraging Twitter data to provide businesses with a robust platform for customer relationship management (CRM), lead generation, and analytics. Helpaway.com integrates Twitter's API to enable businesses to identify new leads, engage with potential and existing customers, track customer interactions, and analyze social media performance. It offers features such as lead scoring, customer segmentation, automated responses, and detailed analytics to help businesses optimize their Twitter strategy and improve customer engagement.

related_apis.title: Forvo API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Forvo API allows users to integrate the functionality of Forvo into their websites or applications. Forvo is the largest pronunciation guide in the world, the place where you will find millions of words pronounced in their original languages. Ask for that word or name, and another user will pronounce it for you. You can also help others by recording your pronunciations in your own language.
Currently the API allows users to read or listen to word pronounciations with future functionality to include search, languages and standard pronounciations. Possible uses include adding pronunciations for your dictionary or creating a better Google Translate with real human pronunciations. This RESTful API returns responses in either XML, JSON or JS-tag format.

title: Mashup: The Vault - Etsy Front Page Archive
description: A comprehensive archive of Etsy's featured collections, providing live copies, a configurable blog widget, and screen shots for users to browse and reference. The Vault serves as a valuable resource for understanding Etsy's trending products and user preferences over time.

related_apis.title: Etsy API MASTER RECORD

It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.

The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

title: Mashup: Newstaggr
description: Newstaggr is a news aggregation service that employs semantic tagging to categorize news articles from major sources such as Reuters, CNN, the New York Times, and BBC. It utilizes a semantic tagging tool called Calais to create a tag cloud for 12 distinct categories, allowing users to browse news through a more structured and categorized approach.

related_apis.title: Daylife API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The DayPI gives you access to the platform we at Daylife to power [[http://www.daylife.com Daylife.com]]. The DayPI lets you ask questions of the news from around the world, and build applications on top of the answers, using whatever web application technology you like.

related_apis.description: The Thomson Reuters Open Calais API (Intelligent Tagging API) provides developers a way to take unstructured text (e.g. News document, Research reports, etc) and extract the aboutness into a machine-readable XML/RDF format. Metadata is disambiguated and resolved/linked to the Thomson Reuters professional financial data ecosystem.

The service integrates with Tourism Auckland's database and utilizes the MenuMania.co.nz API to provide comprehensive listings of restaurants, cafes, and takeaway food outlets. Users can filter and search by cuisine, price, and location to find the perfect dining spot. The mashup also offers additional features such as user reviews, ratings, and directions to each venue.

title: Mashup: StoopSales
description: StoopSales is a location-specific classifieds platform that focuses on Brooklyn, NY. It allows users to discover, list, and track stoop sales events in Brooklyn. The mashup integrates geolocation services with a local event listing system to provide a real-time, location-based platform for finding and organizing stoop sales. It combines classified ads functionality with location-based services to offer a specialized shopping experience for Brooklyn residents.

title: Mashup: DocuSign Ariba Integration
description: An electronic signature service that integrates DocuSign's eSignature capabilities with Ariba's Contract Management platform. It leverages DocuSign's eSignature technology to streamline and accelerate the contract process.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: UMapper
description: A universal map authoring application that enables the creation of interactive mapping mashups. UMapper supports multiple mapping APIs such as Google Maps, Virtual Earth (VE), and OpenStreetMaps, allowing users to integrate various mapping services into a single, interactive map application. It is designed for developers and mapping enthusiasts who want to create custom mapping experiences by combining different mapping technologies.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

related_apis.title: OpenStreetMap API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: OpenStreetMap is the free wiki world map, an open volunteer-driven initiative to collaboratively create a map of the world, and release the map data under a free and open license.There are actually many different APIs in and around the OpenStreetMap ecosystem. Many developers searching for an API, may actually be looking for an JavaScript web mapping library. There are a few of these to choose from including free and open source options such as LeafletJS. These work by fetching map "tiles" from a tile server, and there are several of these to choose from too (the main OpenStreetMap server is not the only option)Some developers may be looking for data downloads. You can download the entire planet's worth of map data from planet.openstreetmap.org, and keep in syc with community map updates, using the "diff" downloads. Or you can download smaller more manageable country-sized, or city-size "extracts" of OpenStreetMap data.We do have a thing called the "OpenStreetMap API". This provides read and write operations on the raw map data of the OpenStreetMap database. It is actually primarily for OpenStreetMap editing software, and although any developers can create a new editor tool, this is not a small undertaking, and should be carried out with careful consultation with the OpenStreetMap community. In other words... this thing called the "OpenStreetMap API" is probably not what you're looking for!You can use the OpenStreetMap API to download small chunks of map data, but for this purpose it's also worth checking out some other options. In particular the OverpassAPI offers some flexible querying by tags etc, which may be useful for your app.Whether you're wrangling raw geo-data or presenting a web-map mashup, the possibilities provided by OpenStreetMap, and by third parties within the OpenStreetMap ecosystem, offer endless potential for geo map hacking fun! If you need help with development, join the osm-dev mailing list, or other OpenStreetMap contact channels

title: Mashup: Spotify Mood Music
description: A unique mashup that leverages the power of Microsoft's Emotion API and Spotify's Public API to provide a personalized musical experience. First, the mashup analyzes an image using the Emotion API to determine the dominant emotion. Then, it utilizes this emotional data to recommend a tailored playlist from Spotify's extensive library, ensuring a harmonious blend of music and mood. This innovative approach caters to users seeking a curated listening experience based on their emotional state.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Cognitive Services Emotion API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Microsoft Cognitive Services Emotion API recognizes emotions expressed by one or more people in an image, and returns a face identification bounding box. It detects the following emotions: happiness, sadness, surprise, anger, fear, contempt, and disgust. For video, it returns emotions of a group of faces over a period of time. 2 paid options are available, and a free plan that limits transactions to 30,000 a month is available as well. The Emotion API uses JSON for data exchange, and API Keys for authentication.

versions.version_title: Microsoft Cognitive Services Emotion REST API

related_apis.title: Spotify Web API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Spotify Web API allows developers to use their application to get data from the Spotify music catalog. The endpoints results in JSON format providing information such as artists, albums, and tracks directly from the Spotify catalog. Depending on user's authorization, the API can also provide developers access to user-related data i.e. playlists and musics saved in user's library.

title: Mashup: Plan My Hotel
description: A comprehensive hotel comparison and booking platform that aggregates data from major hotel reservation websites. Users can search for hotels worldwide, compare room rates across different platforms, and book accommodations directly through the mashup. The mashup utilizes APIs from various hotel booking sites to offer real-time rate comparisons and availability updates. It supports searches by location, date, and specific hotel preferences, making it ideal for travelers planning their trips efficiently.

related_apis.title: Hotelston API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The service provides search and reservation booking for travel accommodations. It offers access to hotel room reservations, but also condos, villas, and apartments for short-term rental, depending on the destination. Services include identifying properties by date and location, booking reservations, and canceling previous bookings.
API methods support submission of a location with check-in and check-out dates. Returned data include available properties, specifications, and rates with additional functionality to reserve accommodations. Methods also support reservation look-up, review, and modification or cancellation.

title: Mashup: Make Me Change My Job
description: An online platform for job seekers who prefer a passive approach to job hunting. Users can create detailed profiles outlining their ideal job, including location, industry, job title, and required compensation. The platform then facilitates connections between these passive job seekers and recruiters who are actively searching for candidates that match the described job specifications. Recruiters gain access to a pool of pre-screened candidates who are actively looking for new opportunities. The service integrates with various job databases and social media profiles to maintain up-to-date candidate information. It offers a real-time matching system that alerts both job seekers and recruiters when a suitable match is found.

related_apis.title: Social Share Count API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Social Share Count API enables users to count inbound and outbpound clicks from the ShareThis platform buttons and links. ShareThis lets you share to all of your profiles, blogs, friends and contacts. If you see something you want to share, simply click the ShareThis button on the webpage or your browser plugin for instant sharing. Use the Social Share Count API to get access to total sharing activity for a URL. Use it to display share counts on your social buttons or anywhere else in your application.

versions.version_title: Social Share Count REST API v2.0

related_apis.title: Bing API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [The Bing API is now the Bing Web Search API. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Bing API provides an experience similar to Bing.com/search by returning search results that Bing determines are relevant to a user's query. The results include Web pages and may also include images, videos, and more. Free trial keys are available here: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/try/cognitive-services/?api=bing-web-search-api.

related_apis.title: Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Bing Maps REST Services is a REST API that allows you to perform tasks like finding an address, retrieving a map with a pushpin and a label, or getting driving directions. It provides a way to create a static map with pushpins, geocoding an address, retrieving imagery metadata, or creating a route etc. Microsoft Bing is a web search engine.

related_apis.title: Bing Maps Locations API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Bing Maps Locations API can be used to get location information associated with map coordinates. The API also provides functionality to get coordinates for a location based on values such as postal code and address and also get coordinates for a location provided in a query string. The API uses both REST and SOAP protocol and responses are formatted in XML and JSON.

versions.version_title: Bing Maps Locations REST API v1.0

related_apis.title: Bing Maps Geocode Dataflow API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Geocode Dataflow API is a component of the Bing Spatial Data Services. The API is used to geocode and reverse-geocode large sets of spatial data. Additional functionality includes creating a job to geocode and reverse-geocode the data, upload data and get the status of a geocode job. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in XML, JSON, TXT and CSV.

versions.version_title: Bing Maps Geocode Dataflow REST API

title: Mashup: HTML5 to Image Generator
description: An online tool that converts HTML5 code and CSS into high-quality images, enabling easy sharing and embedding of web page designs without the need for a live web server. This mashup utilizes HTML parsing and rendering technologies to accurately capture the visual representation of the provided HTML and CSS code snippets, suitable for use in presentations, reports, or static document creation.

related_apis.title: Page2Images API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Page2Images is a website thumbnail creater optimized for mobile devices. Page2Images exposes its service through a REST API. The API allows websites and applications to generate thumbnails of a given URL. The API is able to specify image size, device, screen size, and more.

title: Mashup: YouTubia
description: YouTubia is a video-sharing platform similar to YouTube, with an added feature that allows users to download video sources from the server to their personal computers. This mashup integrates video hosting capabilities with download functionality, enabling users to enjoy content offline or share it on other platforms. It supports various video formats and provides a user-friendly interface for searching, playing, and downloading videos.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: Wectar Gems
description: A recommendation engine that leverages a del.icio.us user's bookmark history to provide personalized website suggestions. The mashup analyzes the user's bookmarked URLs and tags to generate a curated list of new websites that align with the user's interests and browsing behavior.

related_apis.title: del.icio.us API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: del.icio.us is a social bookmarking website -- the primary use of del.icio.us is to store your bookmarks online, which allows you to access the same bookmarks from any computer and add bookmarks from anywhere, too. On del.icio.us, you can use tags to organize and remember your bookmarks, which is a much more flexible system than folders.
The API provides read/write access to Delicious bookmarks and tags via an HTTP-based interface. The RESTful API returns responses in XML.

title: Mashup: Fitcheck
description: Fitcheck is an innovative mobile application designed to help users monitor and analyze their daily physical activity levels. By integrating with the Fitbit API service, Fitcheck provides real-time updates on steps taken, distance traveled, calories burned, and sleep patterns. Users can set personalized activity goals, receive notifications when they achieve milestones, and view comprehensive activity reports to track progress over time. This application is ideal for health-conscious individuals looking to maintain an active lifestyle, with its focus on user engagement and data-driven insights.

related_apis.title: Fitbit API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Fitbit helps people lead healthier, more active lives by empowering them with data, inspiration and guidance to reach their goals. As the leader in the connected health and fitness category, Fitbit designs products and experiences that track everyday health and fitness. The Fitbit Web API enables third-party applications to access and write data on behalf of users.

title: Mashup: Virtual India
description: Virtual India is an advanced mapping and data visualization project by Microsoft Research India, in collaboration with the Government of India Department of Science and Technology. The mashup leverages cutting-edge geospatial data technology to provide an interactive platform for research and analysis of various aspects of Indian society and economy. It integrates a wide range of data sources and APIs to provide users with a comprehensive view of India's geographic, social, and economic landscape. The mashup is designed for researchers, policymakers, and the general public to explore and analyze data in an intuitive and user-friendly way, thereby facilitating evidence-based decision-making and promoting collaboration between academia, government, and industry.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: TweetStats
description: A data visualization mashup that presents Twitter activity metrics in graphical form. Users can view and analyze their tweet frequency over time, including hourly and monthly trends, as well as a detailed timeline of their tweeting activity. This mashup integrates Twitter API data with charting tools to provide a clear, visually appealing representation of tweeting patterns and behaviors.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: US Home Care Finder
description: US Home Care Finder is a comprehensive directory of in-home care and home health agencies across the United States. Users can locate and compare quality providers by searching through a database of over 10,000 agencies, viewing detailed information on each, including services offered, staff credentials, and customer reviews. The mashup integrates mapping services to help users find agencies near their location, ensuring ease of access to care.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Hotelsbase Search Demo
description: A travel-oriented hotel search mashup that leverages the Hotelsbase API to integrate with Google Maps for location-based searches. The mashup provides users with a visual representation of hotels on a map and allows for detailed searches based on various criteria such as location, price, and amenities. It also supports eCommerce functionalities, enabling users to book hotels directly through the mashup.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Extremeprofile Dives
description: A sports-focused mashup that allows users to upload dive profiles from Suunto dive computers or bottom timers, generating detailed reports with depth-time profile charts, vertical speed charts, and other data visualizations. Users can also attach GPX track logs from their GPS devices, along with photos from Flickr and videos from YouTube, providing a comprehensive and interactive experience for extreme sports enthusiasts.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: Compare Prices Discount-Malin.com
description: A dynamic price comparison service that aggregates data from various partner shops to provide users with the best deals. The mashup searches multiple retail sites simultaneously, offering real-time price comparisons and highlighting weekly promotional offers ranging from 20% to 80% off. This service is particularly useful for consumers looking to make informed purchasing decisions and save money.

related_apis.title: Shopzilla API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Shopzilla, Inc. Catalog API provides access to the Shopzilla, Inc. inventory of catalogued products, merchant offers, and merchant ratings & reviews content through a query-based RESTful web service, responses formatted in XML or JSON|P.
Managed through the Shopzilla Publisher Program, a CPC affiliate marketing program, publishers are able to monetize using this API. Users of this API are able to choose between two versions, each providing logic native to its corresponding Shopzilla, Inc. property: Bizrate.com or Beso.com.
Bizrate API: Provides access to the entire Shopzilla, Inc. offer universe, exposing content from 8,000+ merchants. You would use this version to create a full comparison shopping site.
Beso API: Provides the opportunity to create a style-based experience with a curated set of offers focused in soft goods categories. You would use this version to create a fashion-oriented shopping site.
Both APIs provide access to the merchant ratings and reviews collected through the Bizrate Insights platform.
International? APIs also available for the United Kingdom, Germany, and France.

title: Mashup: Popular Baby Names
description: A mapping-based mashup that utilizes global baby name popularity data to assist parents in finding unique yet popular baby names. The service combines international naming trends with geographic location data to provide parents with insights into local name preferences and global trends, helping them choose a name that is both popular and distinctive. It integrates with baby name databases and Google Maps API to offer a visually intuitive way to explore name popularity across different regions.

title: Mashup: Shiftpop
description: A platform offering a live webcast aggregation service, social network, portal, and search engine focused on enhancing live video accessibility. It achieves this by multiplexing online broadcast networks and providing tools to empower individual broadcasters.

title: Mashup: Lincoln Dream Ride
description: A virtual reality experience that combines social media integration with automotive sales functionality. Users can create a personalized ride in the Lincoln MKC using their Facebook accounts and then proceed to customize and price their vehicle directly through a linked 'Build and Price' page.

related_apis.title: ImpossibleFX API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The ImpossibleFX API allows developers to create dynamic movie templates from scratch or to script and extend existing movie templates created with the ImpossibleFX Editor. This API is RESTful and uses the JSON and Protobuf formats. ImpossibleFX is a video personalization platform that offers personalized content, dynamic story flows, adaptive rendering, compositing, and more.

title: Mashup: RunningMap.com
description: A sports and mapping mashup that allows users to plot a custom path on an interactive map and calculate the total distance. Locations across North America are supported, making it a useful tool for runners and walkers to plan their routes and measure distances accurately.

title: Mashup: Get Rhythm
description: A music services platform that integrates with record label databases and fan club telephony systems, enabling record labels to provide exclusive album previews months in advance of official releases to their fan clubs. This integration drives up pre-sales by offering early access to music, leveraging telephony as the primary user interaction channel for album preview notifications and pre-sales.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: SendGrid API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
SendGrid's cloud-based email helps keep emails out of spam folders, provides a cloud service that scales with email demands, and provides email analytics to track opens and clicks.
SendGrid has a Web API that allows customers to retrieve information about their account such as statistics, bounces, spam reports, unsubscribes, and other information. In addition, the Web API allows customers to create sub-accounts and control the settings of these accounts for an OEM setup.
With the SendGrid API, developers can:
* Get real-time web hooks for events such as bounces, clicks, and unsubscribes
* Send multiple emails and customize plugins
* Access parsed incoming emails with attachments
* Write plugins to alter emails or deliver to other mediums
* Manage subscriptions for resellers and subusers

title: Mashup: Read All About It
description: A book discovery mashup that leverages Amazon's vast catalog of books and Windows Live Local's mapping capabilities to enable users to search for books based on geographical locations worldwide. Users can explore book availability and purchase options directly from Amazon, while also visualizing these locations using an interactive map interface.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: NiteFly: The Future of Nightlife
description: An entertainment discovery platform for the New York City nightlife scene, NiteFly allows users to explore Manhattan nightlife hotspots from a bird's eye view. By integrating real-time Twitter feeds and Foursquare tips and check-in data, NiteFly provides users with a comprehensive view of the city's nightlife scene. Users can filter their search by male-to-female ratio, ensuring they find the night that fits their preferences. Additionally, NiteFly offers mapping features to help users navigate to their chosen destination easily.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: Yelp Fusion API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Yelp Fusion APIs are RESTful APIs and users can retrieve business review and rating, information for a particular geographic region or location.display review information for a particular business, determine accurate neighborhood name information for a particular location, track recent reviews for a particular business, display pictures of highly rated local businesses and of the top reviewers for that business, determine a particular business' review and rating information based on the phone number for that business. The default output is JSON. This output format was chosen due to the availability of JSON parsers in many languages. The following Yelp Fusion APIs are available: Search, Phone Number Search, Business Search, Transaction, Reviews, and Autcomplete - each API has a separate ProgrammableWeb entry.

related_apis.title: Foursquare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Foursquare Places API provides location based experiences with diverse information about venues, users, photos, and check-ins. The API supports real time access to places, Snap-to-Place that assigns users to specific locations, and Geo-tag. Additionally, Foursquare allows developers to build audience segments for analysis and measurement. JSON is the preferred response format.

title: Mashup: Gtalkr
description: A web-based, Flash-driven interface for Google Talk that provides real-time chat functionality without the need for a client installation. Gtalkr enhances the traditional chat experience by allowing users to communicate instantly through a browser window. Additionally, Gtalkr offers an API that enables developers to integrate chat capabilities into their own applications, extending the reach and functionality of the Google Talk platform.

related_apis.title: Google Talk API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From the site: As long as you adhere to the requirements of the XMPP specs, you should be able to connect to the Google Talk service. Other clients that can connect include [[http://gaim.sourceforge.net/ GAIM]] and [[http://www.ceruleanstudios.com/learn/ Trillian Pro]].

title: Mashup: PrimoCast
description: PrimoCast is a search-driven mashup that combines YouTube's video database with social sharing capabilities. Utilizing YouTube's API, users can search for and view videos directly within the mashup interface. Once a video is selected, the mashup facilitates seamless playback and allows users to share the video with friends through various social media platforms. This mashup streamlines the process of discovering, viewing, and sharing YouTube videos, enhancing the user experience by integrating search, video playback, and social sharing functionalities into a single interface.

related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

title: Mashup: Website Traffic Estimator
description: A tool designed to provide a rapid estimation of the monthly website traffic, including the number of pages per session and the average bounce rate. This SEO and marketing oriented mashup allows for competitive research by comparing the monthly visitor count of various websites.

related_apis.title: SEMrush Traffic Analytics API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: SEMrush Traffic Analytics API provides data on any company's website traffic. Collected insights can be easily integrated into Business Intelligence (BI) tools, custom dashboards, CRM software, enterprise portals, and SaaS products, as well as exported to spreadsheets. SEMrush Traffic Analytics API includes data on: volume and quality of website traffic; visitor engagement and behavior; traffic sources and destination websites; geos and countries; historical trends; mobile vs desktop traffic distribution; website ranks.SEMrush Traffic Analytics API data will be useful for finding insights about market share, market trends (both global and local), competitor activity, potential business and co-marketing partners, new markets and niches; lead qualification, search of prospects and making of commercial offers for pre-sales meetings; initial market research and prioritization of investment opportunities.

versions.version_title: SEMrush Traffic Analytics REST API v1

title: Mashup: myjamfactory
description: A community-driven website serving as both a private intranet for residents of the former Hartley Jam Factory in London and an outward-facing portal to the local neighborhood. The site aggregates individual resident blogs into a centralized platform, allowing for easy access and interaction. The mashup incorporates mapping services to provide geographical context, photo sharing to showcase community life, and integration with news services to keep residents informed about relevant events and updates.

related_apis.title: BBC API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The BBC Developer Portal is currently available to employees.
The updated service is intended to provide a persistent web presence for all BBC programs, both radio and television, in compliance with principles of linked data. A complete ontology defines relationships among programs and their web properties. Also available is a comprehensive schedule, program listings by genre, and program details, including episode breakdowns.
API methods support retrieval of schedule information for specific dates or as an offset from the current date. Methods also provide program lists grouped by genre and program details, including cast, episode lists, and more.
The former version of the service at http://www0.rdthdo.bbc.co.uk/services/api is being deprecated.

title: Mashup: Office Floor Plan Maps
description: An interactive mashup that overlays office floor plan drawings in various formats (PDF, JPG, GIS, CAD) onto Google Maps, enabling users to search and view detailed floor plans with geographical context. This mashup integrates floor plan data from multiple sources into a single, searchable map, providing a comprehensive overview of office layouts and spaces. It uses Google Maps API for geolocation and spatial representation, combined with custom programming to overlay and display floor plans accurately.

title: Mashup: Linkedin RSS
description: A comprehensive aggregated feed service that combines multiple LinkedIn RSS feeds into a single, unified source. This mashup merges and synchronizes the latest content from various LinkedIn RSS feeds, providing users with a consolidated view of all updates, discussions, and job postings in real-time. The service aggregates and presents content based on user-submitted questions and corresponding answers published on the linkedin.com website, offering an integrated platform for staying informed about the latest news and trends on LinkedIn.

related_apis.title: LinkedIn API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
LinkedIn is the world's largest business social networking hub. Launched in 2003, LinkedIn has millions of users and is implemented in over 200 countries. One purpose of the site is to allow registered users to maintain a list of contact details of people with whom they have some level of relationship, called Connections. Users can invite anyone (whether a site user or not) to become a connection.
The LinkedIn API is a RESTful platform that provides a simple, consistent representation of people, companies, jobs, and the interactions and relationships between them. Our query language lets you read data in XML and JSON at the granularity and aggregation that you choose. Use OAuth 1.0a to authorize users and begin making REST API calls using any programming language.The API’s access is restricted to authorized developers.

title: Mashup: Zoopla Property Service
description: A UK-based property service launched in January 2008, serving approximately 1 million unique visitors per month. The service provides a comprehensive platform for property listings, including detailed property descriptions, high-quality images, and interactive maps, allowing users to search for properties across England with ease.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Speed Phone Dating
description: A speed dating platform designed specifically for telephone interactions, enabling users to participate in 10-minute phone date sessions from the comfort of their own homes. Utilizing Twilio's phone number service, all calls are made using a dedicated Twilio number, ensuring the privacy of participants' personal phone numbers throughout the process.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD

With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: Valentines Day Map
description: A location-based Valentine's Day planning tool that leverages Google Maps API to show users the nearest Victoria's Secret stores, Lovers Lane listings, florists, and movie theaters. It also provides real-time movie showtimes for the selected zip code. This mashup is designed for US locations only and is particularly useful for couples and individuals planning romantic activities or gift purchases.

related_apis.description:
The Yahoo! Local Search APIs give users access to a comprehensive database of information and content in Yahoo! Local ranging from business information to user comments to ratings. Data includes business address and phone, category, rating, distance, URL and traffic alerts. Yahoo! Local makes a great addition to any mashup, bringing in location-based relevancy and the additional context of what real people have experienced in these places.
Version 3 of Yahoo! Local Search adds even more features! Users can now request individual business records by using the Yahoo! Local listing id. Yahoo! supports search categories to help users narrow their queries. Finally, results now return the first few lines of the last user review for each listing. The API uses a RESTful protocol and responses are formatted in either XML, JSON and PHP.

title: Mashup: Like Bible
description: An interactive religious reference tool designed to facilitate deeper understanding of biblical topics. Users can highlight any word or phrase to access a wealth of related resources and additional information, enhancing their study and comprehension. The mashup integrates various religious texts, scholarly articles, and educational materials to provide a comprehensive learning experience.

related_apis.title: Biblia.com API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Biblia.com API provides Web, mobile, and desktop applications with access to Bible text through web services.
Biblia.com is an interdenominational project allowing for online bible study. Specifically, there are services that get information about the available Bibles (Find, Image), download the text of those Bibles (Content), and search those Bibles (Search). Additional services support validating Bible references (Parse), comparing Bible references (Compare), and finding Bible references in text and HTML (Scan, Tag). The service uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in XML, JSON, JSONP, text or HTML.

title: Mashup: Buxfer
description: A personal finance management tool that utilizes Google Gears to store financial data locally, enabling offline access to your bank and credit card transactions. Buxfer automatically syncs with your financial institutions to provide real-time updates on your accounts, transactions, and balances. It offers a secure and efficient way to manage personal finances without relying solely on cloud-based storage.

title: Mashup: Twitter Fountain for Second Life
description: View Twitter updates integrated into the Second Life virtual environment via a dynamic Twitter Fountain. Users can sit by the fountain to observe real-time tweets appearing as bubbles. This mashup enhances Second Life's social experience by bringing real-world Twitter interactions into the virtual world, providing an innovative way to engage with social media within a 3D environment.

related_apis.title: SecondLife API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Second Life is a 3-D virtual world entirely built and owned by its residents. Since opening to the public in 2003, it has grown explosively and today is inhabited by nearly 100,000 people from around the globe. The Second Life Webmap API allows you to embed Second Life Maps onto your web pages. Note: A JavaScript model similar to Google and other map APIs.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD

It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

It helps to download a list of unsubscribes to clean inhouse lists, build client portals, and pull campaign stats from MailChimp. related_apis.title: Dropbox API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Dropbox is a storage service that syncs files online and across your computers via installed software. The API allows read/write access to the same files, piggybacking on Dropbox's file synchronization and storage.

related_apis.description: Integrate your app with the QuickBooks Online API. This unified API gives you access to QuickBooks Online accounting features and payment processing services, too. related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: This We Know
description: An interactive platform that enables users to explore and visualize government data specific to their local communities. Users can input their city or zip code to retrieve a list of relevant facts about their area, which can then be further explored for detailed breakdowns of the data. This mashup was a finalist in the Apps for America 2 contest.

related_apis.title: GeoNames API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Geonames is a geographical database with web services that let users extract useful information about different places, such as weather, timezone and post codes. The GeoNames geographical database covers all countries and contains over eight million placenames that are available for download free of charge. Users can edit, correct and add new names using a wiki interface.Geonames provides a suite of Webservices including the following categories:Fulltext searchPlace HierarchyWikipediaPostal CodesReverse GeocodingThe APIs use RESTful protocol and responses vary in format between XML, JSON, CSV, and TXTWhile the GeoNames data is free, the data is available without costs, there is a Service Level Agreement available for premium web services.

related_apis.title: GovTrack.us API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [Editor's Note: This API is no longer available. For details, click here.]From their site: GovTrack.us tracks the U.S. Congress and is a reference for legislation, votes, Members of Congress, congressional districts, and the congressional record. The database that powers the site is also made freely available, and several APIs are available. APIs are URLs on GovTrack that serve XML rather than HTML. They are intended to be called by applications to retrieve data dynamically.

title: Mashup: LOCPix
description: LOCPix is a digital library mashup that provides access to the extensive archives of the Library of Congress, featuring hundreds of thousands of high-resolution historical photographs and poster artwork. Users can either browse through curated collections or perform targeted searches to discover specific items of interest. The mashup integrates the Library of Congress' extensive digitized photo collections, offering a rich resource for researchers, historians, and the general public interested in exploring America's past through its visual records.

related_apis.title: Library of Congress Prints & Photographs API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The service is part of a re-release by the Library of Congress of its Print & Photographs Online Catalog. It provides access to a rich image collection for incorporation into other applications. Applications can search the catalog by description term, and if desired within particular collections, for specific image types, etc. Results can include just descriptive metadata or the images themselves, presented as a list, grid, slideshow, or gallery.
API methods support specification of a search query, either across the entire collection or restricted to certain elements, along with optional filtering criteria like subject and format. Methods also enable structuring of results and retrieval of related items.

versions.version_title: Library of Congress Prints &amp; Photographs REST API

title: Mashup: Diabetic Alerts
description: A mobile health application that leverages telephony services to provide an automated alert system for individuals with diabetes who may be experiencing hypoglycemia. Users can register to receive urgent phone calls if their blood sugar levels drop below a certain threshold, prompting the app to contact pre-selected emergency contacts until help is reached. The mashup integrates real-time health data monitoring with emergency communication capabilities to ensure timely assistance for diabetic individuals.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: Geotwts
description: A real-time mapping application that visualizes Twitter posts on Google Maps, enabling users to see the geographical distribution of tweets.

related_apis.title: Twitter Streaming API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From Website: The Twitter Streaming API allows high-throughput near-realtime access to various subsets of public and protected Twitter data. The Streaming API contains public statuses from all users, filtered in various ways: By userid, by keyword, by random sampling, by geographic location, etc. User Streams provides Public statuses from all users, filtered in various ways: By userid, by keyword, by random sampling, by geographic location, etc.

title: Mashup: Kukunu
description: Kukunu is a travel planning platform that simplifies the process for travelers by allowing collaborative creation of itineraries. Users can add details such as transportation, accommodations, dining options, activities, and sightseeing locations for multiple cities on a single itinerary. The mashup utilizes travel booking APIs, social collaboration tools, and possibly geolocation services to provide a comprehensive, real-time travel planning experience.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Bit.ly API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: bit.ly allows users to shorten, share, and track links (URLs). Reducing the URL length makes sharing easier. bit.ly can be accessed through their website, bookmarklets and this open API. bit.ly is also integrated into several popular third-party tools such as Tweetdeck and is used extensively on services like Twitter. Unique user-level and aggregate links can be created and let users view complete, real-time traffic and referrer data, as well as location and metadata.

title: Mashup: Bastille Day Map.com
description: A mapping application that displays the locations of Bastille Day events in the United States, providing users with a comprehensive view of the celebrations taking place across the country. This map mashup integrates event data from various sources with geographical information to offer a detailed and interactive experience for users interested in attending Bastille Day events.

description: A creative on-demand print service that enables Flickr users to convert their digital photos into physical content, including the production of Mini Cards. This mashup bridges the gap between virtual and physical content by leveraging photo sharing platforms to offer tangible products.

description: A comprehensive lookup tool that utilizes the MAPLight API to provide detailed campaign contribution information for every US election candidate. This tool empowers users to trace financial support for political candidates, enhancing transparency in elections through real-time data access.

related_apis.title: MapLight API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
MapLight looks at the connection between campaign donations and legislative votes in an effort to reveal money's influence on politics.
MapLight performs research on supporting and opposing interests for legislative bills. MapLight's Bill Positions API provides a tool for discovering the connection between campaign donations and legislative votes. It can also be mashed up with other databases that contain information about bills or politically-active organizations. This RESTful API returns results in JSON or XML.

title: Mashup: Dotso.com
description: A dynamic, Flash-based interface that aggregates news feeds from various sources, providing users with a visually engaging and interactive experience to stay updated on the latest news and information.

title: Mashup: MyLocalTribune
description: MyLocalTribune is a visual mashup that combines Google Maps with Twitter updates to provide users with a localized view of news and discussions from local sources, such as local news outlets, journalists, and community bloggers. This mashup leverages geolocation services to display live tweets and news articles on a map interface, allowing users to easily identify and read content related to their specific geographic location or area of interest. It integrates real-time data streaming from Twitter with static or dynamic map services to offer a comprehensive and up-to-date view of local news and commentary.

The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: Walk Score
description: Walk Score is a location-based mashup that calculates a Walk Score for any property, indicating its walkability. The service maps nearby amenities, public transportation, and points of interest, providing users with a comprehensive view of neighborhood accessibility. By considering factors such as distance to essential services, public transit availability, and environmental impact, Walk Score enables informed decisions about property purchases, promoting health, sustainability, and community engagement.

title: Mashup: MovieDNA
description: A mobile application for iPhone that aggregates comprehensive data on movies, actors, and directors through a diverse set of APIs, offering users a rich, interactive experience. It includes features such as real-time updates on film releases, detailed profiles of actors and directors, and links to video trailers and reviews, all accessible on-the-go via mobile devices.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.
