related_apis.title: Mobypicture API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Moby API allows you to post photos and other content to their website and access that content from anywhere in the world. The API supports both posting and reading of images.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

title: Mashup: Rhapsody Top Feeds
description: A Google Gadget that integrates Rhapsody's RSS feeds to provide users with real-time updates on top songs and albums. This widget delivers news and information about popular artists directly to users, enhancing their music experience by keeping them informed about the latest releases and trends.

related_apis.title: Rhapsody API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Developers can easily integrate with the Napster third-generation friendly API and SDKs used by hundreds of partners and businesses worldwide. The API features OAuth 2.0 support, data services including metadata, search, playback, library, account, commerce, extract, and download, personal recommendations, session management, and more. Interested developers can contact the provider through a form on the business services page.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

title: Mashup: Facebook Funny Jokes
description: A Facebook app that allows users to add random, humorous jokes to their profiles. The app utilizes a Google API to fetch jokes from a variety of sources, ensuring a constant stream of fresh content for users to share with their Facebook friends.

related_apis.title: Google Single SignOn API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) is an XML standard that allows secure web domains to exchange user authentication and authorization data. Using SAML, an online service provider can contact a separate online identity provider to authenticate users who are trying to access secure content. Google Apps offers a SAML-based Single Sign-On (SSO) service that provides partner companies with full control over the authorization and authentication of hosted user accounts that can access web-based applications like Gmail or Google Calendar. Using the SAML model, Google acts as the service provider and provides services such as Gmail and Partner Start Pages (PSP). Google partners act as identity providers and control usernames, passwords and other information used to identify, authenticate and authorize users for web applications that Google hosts.

title: Mashup: fuhshniZZle Music Video Jukebox
description: A music streaming and video jukebox mashup that integrates YouTube's video content to provide an uninterrupted music streaming experience. Users can search for and play their favorite songs and music videos directly from YouTube's vast library, enabling seamless playback without advertisements or other interruptions.

related_apis.title: Google Calendar API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Calendar Data API lets users perform most of the operations a normal Google Calendar user can on the Google Calendar website. Google Calendar allows client applications to view and update calendar events in the form of Google data API, GData, feeds. The Calendar Data API lets users incorporate Calendar functionality into their own application or website. Users can edit calendars, create and delete events, query for events that match particular criteria, send invitations, and more.
There are many possible uses for the Calendar data API. For example, users can create a web front end for a group calendar that uses Google Calendar as a back end. Or a public calendar can be generated for Google Calendar to display, based on a company event database. Or users can search relevant calendars to display a list of upcoming events on those calendars.

title: Mashup: fluxgain like button
description: Integrates a social media 'like' button within internet and intranet web pages, enabling users to directly interact with the content by liking it. This functionality is akin to the Facebook like button, facilitating real-time user engagement and feedback collection. The mashup leverages social media APIs to enable seamless integration and interaction, enhancing user experience and content visibility.

The Chatter API is similar to APIs offered by other companies with feeds, such as Facebook and Twitter. The API allows developers to integrate Chatter into a variety of applications such as mobile applications, intranet sites, and third-party Web applications.

description: An interactive map showcasing New York City's extensive network of greenways, bike paths, and bike lanes, integrated with Google Maps. description: WhatsYourPlace is a social mapping mashup that leverages Google Maps API to provide users with a platform to own and showcase their favorite locations, share their thoughts, and engage in discussions with the community. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: World Cup Soccer by Phone
description: A mobile application that provides real-time updates on soccer matches, including scores, schedules, and news directly to users' phones. This mashup utilizes SMS and data synchronization technologies to deliver comprehensive sports information seamlessly to mobile users, enhancing their ability to stay connected with the latest developments in the world of soccer.

title: Mashup: Stel Order
description: Stel Order is a cloud-based invoicing web application designed for businesses to securely store and manage their data on the cloud. It leverages the Fakturoid API to provide robust invoicing capabilities, enabling streamlined financial processes and data synchronization across multiple devices and locations.

related_apis.title: Fakturoid API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Fakturoid is an online invoicing service designed for entrepreneurs and small businesses. It simplifies the invoicing process and provides users with options for invoice appearances. Fakturoid can also provide statistics and totals for relevant periods of time and handle reverse charge procedures. It is compatible with any approach to VAT. The website and API documentation are provided only in Czech.

title: Mashup: XSSDB
description: A security-focused mashup application that serves as a comprehensive resource for researching and understanding various cross-site scripting (XSS) attack vectors. The application provides an accessible interface for browsing and learning about different types of XSS attacks, making it a valuable tool for developers and security professionals looking to stay informed about the latest threats and mitigation strategies.

title: Mashup: How I Knew You Were the One
description: A digital anthology where individuals share their intimate stories of how they met their significant others, curated in a humorous and engaging manner suitable for social media platforms. This mashup brings together user-generated content, social networking features, and a blog format to create a heartwarming and entertaining experience for users interested in relationship narratives.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: Find Country Game
description: A location-based game that challenges players to accurately identify the geographical location of various countries on a world map. The game utilizes mapping and geolocation technologies to provide an interactive and educational experience, allowing users to test their knowledge of global geography through a fun and engaging interface. It combines cartography with gamification principles to enhance learning and geographical awareness.

description: FindGreatColleges.com is an educational resource that aggregates comprehensive information on over 7000 colleges and universities across the United States. The mashup provides a platform for prospective students to access general information, program offerings, enrollment details, admission requirements, tuition costs, and room and board information. It integrates multiple data sources to offer a centralized repository of college information, enhancing the decision-making process for students and their families. The mashup is designed to support educational planning and research, aiding in the selection of appropriate higher education institutions.

description: FotosCES is a mashup that provides a simple, unified interface for Flickr albums, seamlessly integrating them with Blogger blogs. This service allows users to easily manage their photo collections and share them through their personal blogs, enhancing the user experience by combining photo-sharing and blogging functionalities in one platform.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Blogger API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Blogger Data API allows client applications to view and update Blogger content in the form of Google Data API feeds. Your client application can use the Data API to create new blog posts, edit or delete existing posts, and query for posts that match particular criteria.

title: Mashup: API Scores
description: A comprehensive tool for California parents and home buyers to evaluate and compare the performance of local schools. The mashup displays schools on a map, color-coded by their rank and Academic Performance Index (API) scores, providing a visual representation of school performance across regions. Users can explore school rankings, API scores, and other performance metrics to make informed decisions about school choices and home purchases.

title: Mashup: Local Weather
description: A web application that provides users with real-time, location-based weather forecasts. The mashup utilizes the ipinfo.io API to determine the user's IP address and geolocation, and then fetches detailed weather information from the OpenWeatherMap API. It enables users to access accurate, up-to-the-minute weather updates for their current location, making it ideal for individuals who need quick and reliable weather data for planning or safety purposes.

related_apis.title: ipinfo.io IP geolocation API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
IPinfo is a free IP data API provider specializing in IP geolocation, though also offering endpoints for ASN, IP to company, IP to carrier, IP ranges, and hosted domains. The geolocation API returns a JSON response containing data fields describing the specified IP's region, country, city, postal code, coordinates, and more.
IPinfo APIs handle over 500 million requests per day and have been online since 2013. It’s reliable, scalable, simple, and straightforward to use!

related_apis.title: OpenWeatherMap API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API has been deprecated and replaced by the Current Weather Data, 5 Day Weather Forecast, 16 Day Weather Forecast, Historical Data, History Bulk, Weather Map Layers, Ultraviolet Index, Weather Stations, Weather Alerts, Air Pollution, and Accumulated Weather Data APIs. This profile is maintained for historical and research purposes only.]Open Weather Map provides interactive maps of current and historic weather conditions. The Open Weather Map API allows users to retrieve the current weather at a city or weather station, the historical measurements for a weather station, or a list of cities and/or weather stations in a given rectangle (limited by geographic coordinates). The API uses RESTful calls issued in JSON format.

title: Mashup: World Hang Gliding Sites
description: A comprehensive Google Maps and Google Earth mashup featuring a database of thousands of worldwide hang gliding and paragliding sites. Users can explore and visualize these sites on a global scale, viewing detailed information and imagery through interactive maps and 3D models. This mashup combines geospatial data with aerial photography and satellite imagery to provide an immersive experience for hang gliding enthusiasts and adventurers. It leverages Google Maps API, Google Earth KML feeds, and potentially other mapping and data visualization technologies to deliver a rich user experience.

title: Mashup: UnWired Buyer
description: An auction notification and bidding service that sends real-time SMS alerts to your mobile phone during the last 3 minutes of an eBay auction, allowing you to place bids remotely and potentially win the item. The mashup integrates eBay's auction data with mobile messaging platforms to provide a convenient, time-sensitive bidding experience.

title: Mashup: Plazes Local Search
description: An innovative mashup that integrates Yahoo Local Search with Plazes.com, allowing users to conduct local searches within their immediate vicinity without the need to manually input their current location. The service leverages geolocation technology to automatically determine the user's current neighborhood and provides relevant search results based on proximity.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Local Search API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Yahoo! Local Search APIs give users access to a comprehensive database of information and content in Yahoo! Local ranging from business information to user comments to ratings. Data includes business address and phone, category, rating, distance, URL and traffic alerts. Yahoo! Local makes a great addition to any mashup, bringing in location-based relevancy and the additional context of what real people have experienced in these places.
Version 3 of Yahoo! Local Search adds even more features! Users can now request individual business records by using the Yahoo! Local listing id. Yahoo! supports search categories to help users narrow their queries. Finally, results now return the first few lines of the last user review for each listing. The API uses a RESTful protocol and responses are formatted in either XML, JSON and PHP.

title: Mashup: WikiWalki
description: A comprehensive outdoor trail planning and sharing tool that leverages GPS data and Google maps to facilitate the discovery, creation, and distribution of favorite walks, bike rides, and running trails. Users can search for nearby trails, import and export GPS data, map their routes, and share them with friends via email. The mashup combines geolocation services with mapping APIs to provide users with a detailed visual representation of their routes and the ability to discover new trails and city tours.

title: Mashup: Lofty deals
description: An interactive mashup that aggregates and organizes deals, offers, and coupons from various online sources. Users can upload and schedule deals, write blogs, release news, and upload articles to promote websites and companies. The mashup combines social networking features with deal management tools, providing a platform for users to discover, share, and manage discounts effectively.

related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

related_apis.title: Google Analytics Managment API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Google Analytics Management API to leverage Google's extensive website analytics tools. The API uses GET requests over HTTPS and JSON for requests/returns. Some of the functions available with the API are: List Account, Property and View (Profile) information for a user; manage properties and goals; manage user permissions; and upload cost data to Google Analytics for non-Google paid campaigns. See the extensive documentation for code samples, detailed method descriptions, and more.

related_apis.title: eBay Finding API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
eBay's Finding API provides programmatic access to search capabilities on the eBay platform. It lets users search and browse for items listed on eBay, and provides metadata to refine searches and customize the searching process. Developers can use this API to build search and browse capabilities into bidding and buying applications.
The Finding API exposes a variety of search capabilities, including searching based on keyword, associated items, listing details, categories (domains), item characteristics (aspects), and domain and aspect metadata. The API can also provide keyword recommendations to help refine search results.
This API can be used via SOAP, HTTP, and REST. It can also be integrated with JavaScript and PHP using eBay's API tutorial kits.

related_apis.title: Google Geocoding API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Geocoding API is a webservice for the Google Maps API. The Geocoding API provides a direct way to access a geocoder via an HTTP request, though it must be used in conjunction with Google Maps. Additionally, the service allows you to perform the converse operation (turning coordinates into addresses); this process is known as "reverse geocoding." Also, you can choose to limit your search to certain bounded areas (Viewport Biasing) or regions (Region Biasing).

related_apis.title: Google Affiliate Network API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Affiliate Network is an affiliate marketing network. Advertisers use the network to increase online conversions and monetize their site traffic through the use of affiliate ads. With the API publishers have the ability to look up advertisers as well as access order and lead transactions. Advertisers have the ability to publisher data. Developers can access the data from the network and integrate it into their own systems. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON.

related_apis.title: Google Street View Image API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Google's Street View Image API lets users retrieve Street View panorama or thumbnail images with parameterized HTTP requests. This web service allows these images to be embedded into a web page, without the use of JavaScript.
The viewport size, direction, location, pitch, and field of view (fov) can all be manipulated by parameters included in the HTTP request. Since the size of the image and the fov can be specified, users can effectively control the zoom level of the image. Finally, there is a parameter that can specify the request is coming from a device with location sensor information, enabling the service to be integrated with, for example, GPS enabled mobile phones.

versions.version_title: Google Street View Image REST API

title: Mashup: What are You Doing in Japan
description: A social location-sharing platform that allows users to share their current activities in Japan. The mashup integrates a map-based interface where users can add new comments about their activities and respond to others' comments. It utilizes social networking features and geolocation services to provide a real-time, interactive experience for Japanese travelers and residents.

title: Mashup: Scholr
description: Scholr is an educational book discovery mashup that leverages the Amazon API to find and recommend books related to each other. It's designed for students, academics, and book enthusiasts looking to explore and discover new books through related titles. The mashup primarily focuses on books and uses an eCommerce API to provide a seamless shopping experience for users.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

title: Mashup: Labloop
description: Labloop is a professional tool designed for presenting and sharing images in photo-communities. It leverages the imageLoop API to enable users to showcase their photographs in a dynamic and engaging manner. This mashup facilitates the creation of interactive photo galleries, enhances social sharing capabilities, and integrates widgets for seamless integration into various platforms. It is tailored for photographers and enthusiasts looking to share and engage with their images in a community setting.

title: Mashup: New York Art Beat - Bubble Machine
description: A dynamic visualization tool that aggregates and displays the most popular art and design events occurring in New York City. Utilizing the Art Beat API, this mashup presents a visually engaging bubble chart, where each bubble represents an event, providing users with a quick overview of the city's vibrant art scene. The integration of the Art Beat API ensures real-time updates, allowing users to view the most current event listings. This mashup is ideal for art enthusiasts, event planners, and anyone interested in the latest art and design happenings in New York City.

related_apis.title: ArtBeat API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the ArtBeat API to get art and design event information for different areas of NYC or Tokyo. Get events by longitude and latitude, area, media, popularity...

title: Mashup: Cleepr
description: Cleepr is a music video search engine that aggregates content from various music video sources to provide a comprehensive grid of videos from a user's favorite artists. The interface displays each video as a thumbnail, along with key information such as user ratings, view counts, and video titles. This mashup leverages music video APIs to deliver a curated experience tailored to individual user preferences.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: DBpedia API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: DBpedia.org is a community effort to extract structured information from Wikipedia and to make this information available on the Web. DBpedia allows you to ask
sophisticated queries against Wikipedia and to link other datasets on the Web
to Wikipedia data.

related_apis.title: Vimeo API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Let Vimeo take care of all your video needs. Their API handles uploading, transcoding, hosting and playback of any video type. Embed the videos in your own website, or share them with the large community of filmmakers that call Vimeo home. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON

related_apis.title: MySpace API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The MySpace Developer Platform (MDP) allows developers to create applications that interact with MySpace members and their social data. With MDP you will be able to create compelling new products that integrate directly into MySpace pages and get exposure to millions of people around the world.

related_apis.title: Wikipedia API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The unofficial Wikipedia API. Because Wikipedia is built using MediaWiki, which in turn supports an API, Wikipedia does as well. This provides developers code-level access to the entire Wikipedia reference. The goal of this API is to provide direct, high-level access to the data contained in the MediaWiki databases. Client programs can use the API to login, get data, and post changes. The API supports thin web-based JavaScript clients, such as Navigation popups or LiveRC, end-user applications (such as vandal fighter), and can be accessed by another web site (tool server's utilities).
The API uses RESTful calls and supports a wide variety of formats including XML, JSON, PHP, YAML and others.

title: Mashup: New York Times Campaign Finance Chart
description: An interactive dashboard application that combines the New York Times Campaign Finance API with the Google Chart API to visualize campaign finance data for a specific U.S. ZIP code. Users can explore detailed financial contributions, expenditures, and fundraising activities of political campaigns within their local area or anywhere in the United States. The application leverages real-time data from the New York Times API and presents it in an intuitive, graphical format using Google Charts, providing insights into campaign finance at the local level.

title: Mashup: RDTN
description: A real-time disaster tracking dashboard that serves as a platform for aggregating, verifying, and visualizing data on the ongoing nuclear crisis in Japan. It combines data from individual contributors, volunteers, experts, and official sources to provide a comprehensive, unbiased view of the situation. The mashup uses social media APIs, mapping services, and news feeds to collect and present data on radiation levels, evacuation routes, and emergency announcements, enabling users to make informed decisions based on reliable information.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

title: Mashup: camelcamelcamel
description: A price tracking service that leverages the Amazon Product Advertising API to monitor pricing trends across nearly 3 million Amazon products. The mashup offers users the ability to set up price drop notifications through email and Twitter, providing real-time updates on price fluctuations. It integrates with Amazon's API for accessing product data and utilizes the Twitter API for notification delivery, catering to users interested in saving money on Amazon purchases.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: Amazon Marketplace Web Service API MASTER RECORD

title: Mashup: Shack Prices
description: A real estate and mapping mashup that enables users to appraise their Seattle-area homes by visualizing the prices of recently sold homes on a Google Map. The mashup integrates real estate sales data with Google Maps to provide users with a clear, location-based view of home prices, helping them make informed decisions about their property's value.

title: Mashup: YouTube Instant
description: A real-time YouTube search engine that displays search results as videos play automatically, providing an immersive experience for users. The mashup significantly enhances the YouTube search experience by dynamically playing videos as they are searched for, offering an innovative way to explore and discover content on the platform. This mashup was so effective that it led to a job offer for its creator from YouTube co-founder Chad Hurley over Twitter.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: TitleZ
description: TitleZ is a data analytics mashup designed for publishers to track and analyze book sales trends using Amazon's API. It retrieves current and historical sales rank data for Amazon book titles, providing visual and numerical insights to support informed decision-making in the publishing industry. The mashup integrates real-time sales data with historical trends, offering publishers a powerful tool to understand market performance and make strategic choices based on sales analytics.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

It leverages APIs to fetch real-time information and user interaction features to personalize content based on user preferences and viewing history.

title: Mashup: Snoopf
description: Snoopf is a comprehensive restaurant discovery platform that enables users to search and find a wide range of food-related coupons and gift cards for various dining establishments across the United States. related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

related_apis.title: Yelp Fusion API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Yelp Fusion APIs are RESTful APIs and users can retrieve business review and rating, information for a particular geographic region or location.display review information for a particular business, determine accurate neighborhood name information for a particular location, track recent reviews for a particular business, display pictures of highly rated local businesses and of the top reviewers for that business, determine a particular business' review and rating information based on the phone number for that business. The default output is JSON. This output format was chosen due to the availability of JSON parsers in many languages. The following Yelp Fusion APIs are available: Search, Phone Number Search, Business Search, Transaction, Reviews, and Autcomplete - each API has a separate ProgrammableWeb entry.

title: Mashup: Best Quality of Living Cities
description: A geospatial mashup that visualizes the locations of cities ranked based on their quality of living. The mashup integrates data from various sources to create a map that helps users identify cities with the highest quality of living, based on factors such as safety, healthcare, economy, and cultural aspects. Users can explore the map to discover the top-ranked cities and their respective locations, making it a valuable tool for those considering relocation or seeking information about global cities.

title: Mashup: MapProvision
description:
MapProvision is an intuitive, cloud-based online tool designed to facilitate the seamless incorporation and visualization of geospatial data on websites, blogs, and intranet pages. This tool empowers users to quickly enhance their digital content by enabling customized spatial analyses through the use of thematic overlays, animations, and interactive charts. With no downloads, coding, or additional software required, MapProvision streamlines the process of integrating complex spatial data into user-friendly web interfaces.

Key Features:
- Multi-geometry layer support for points, lines, polygons, and more.
- Interpolation and raster grid capabilities for detailed spatial representation.
- Customized image sets for tailored visual presentations.
- Animation and charting tools to visualize trends and patterns.
- Ease of use with a 100% cloud-based architecture, ensuring accessibility and scalability.
- Free to use, making it an accessible solution for a wide range of applications.

Target Users:
- Web developers looking to integrate spatial data into their projects.
- Businesses and organizations requiring spatial data analysis and visualization.
- Educational institutions for teaching spatial concepts and data representation.

Geographical and Technical Limitations:
- No specific geographical limitations as it operates on a cloud-based platform.
- Limited by the quality and availability of the input spatial data.
- Users may need to ensure their web hosting environment supports the integration of external scripts and APIs used by MapProvision.

related_apis.title: Google Single SignOn API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) is an XML standard that allows secure web domains to exchange user authentication and authorization data. Using SAML, an online service provider can contact a separate online identity provider to authenticate users who are trying to access secure content. Google Apps offers a SAML-based Single Sign-On (SSO) service that provides partner companies with full control over the authorization and authentication of hosted user accounts that can access web-based applications like Gmail or Google Calendar. Using the SAML model, Google acts as the service provider and provides services such as Gmail and Partner Start Pages (PSP). Google partners act as identity providers and control usernames, passwords and other information used to identify, authenticate and authorize users for web applications that Google hosts.

related_apis.title: Google Visualization API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Visualization JavaScript API lets you access structured data and visualize that data using JavaScript in your web pages. The Google Visualization API also enables the creation of gadgets.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

related_apis.title: Google Fusion Tables API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Google Fusion Tables is a free service for sharing and visualizing data online. It lets you upload data, share and mark up your data with collaborators, merge data from multiple tables, and create visualizations such as charts and maps. The API lets you update and query your dataset in Fusion Tables programmatically. The API lets you import data from other data sources, whether a text file or a full database.

related_apis.title: Google Gmail OAuth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Google Gmail now supports the standard IMAP and SMTP protocols for accessing and sending e-mail messages. The Gmail IMAP and SMTP servers have been extended to support authorization via the industry-standard OAuth protocol. This allows third party applications to access a user's email account with their permission.

title: Mashup: Call-Safely
description: A secure communication service that enables users to make calls and send texts without exposing their actual phone numbers. It uses a real, functional phone number as the caller ID, which can be used for incoming calls and SMS messages, providing an additional layer of privacy and security.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: Windows Vista Slideshow Gadget
description: A gadget designed for Microsoft Windows Vista that allows users to create personalized photo slideshows and display them on their desktop sidebar. The mashup integrates an online photo service, Imageloop, where users can upload photos and generate a permalink, which is then used to fetch the images and display them in the slideshow on their Vista desktop.

title: Mashup: Near Here Map (Bing Maps)
description: Near Here is a powerful location-based sales tool that enables users to easily find, research, and contact potential leads. This mashup extends the capabilities of the Hoover's Near Here mobile application to desktop environments through the integration with the D&B Direct API. The mashup provides a seamless experience for finding and contacting leads, making it a valuable addition to any sales representative's toolkit.

related_apis.title: Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Bing Maps REST Services is a REST API that allows you to perform tasks like finding an address, retrieving a map with a pushpin and a label, or getting driving directions. It provides a way to create a static map with pushpins, geocoding an address, retrieving imagery metadata, or creating a route etc. Microsoft Bing is a web search engine.

related_apis.title: D&B Direct API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: D&B Direct provides subscription based access to D&B's database of over 200M companies worldwide. D&B Direct is on-demand cloud access to high quality business data that enables users to: seamlessly integrate D&B data into corporate applications, enhance the quality and completeness of data within business databases, provide on-demand business data to the entire enterprise, search teh D&B database. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in XML.

title: Mashup: Celebrity Twin2Me
description: A mobile application designed for iPhone and iPod touch users, Celebrity Twin2Me allows you to upload an image from your camera, the Image Library, or your Facebook photo albums, and identifies celebrities whose facial features resemble yours. This app exclusively analyzes your facial features, excluding skin color and hair color. Users can share their results, morph their face with their twin's, learn about the celebrities, purchase celebrity-related merchandise, and connect with others who have similar appearances to their celebrity twin. The app leverages facial recognition technology and social media integration to provide an entertaining and interactive user experience.

related_apis.title: BioID Web Services API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
BioID Web Services (BWS) is a webcam based biometrics service for cloud, web, and mobile application developers. The service enables applications such as
- Biometric authentication (face and voice, iris to follow) including liveness detection
- Identification to check people against blacklists, for criminal background checks, etc.
- Ticketless check-in for trade shows and other events, airline boarding, ships
- Fraud prevention with liveness detection to verify the presence of a live user or to detect multiple registrations from the same person
- Face or voice similarity search for celebrity matching, online dating, modeling or casting agencies
- Photo quality checks to ensure good-quality (biometric) ID photos or mugshots
Functionality exposed by the API includes verification (one-to-one) and identification (one-to-many) of face and voice, liveness detection, photo quality checking to international standards, finding, cropping and returning high-quality face images and more. The API uses REST and SOAP protocols and responses are formatted in XML.

title: Mashup: Singapore Traffic Cameras
description: A real-time snapshot of Singapore's traffic conditions, capturing a 30-minute period across 40 strategically placed cameras throughout the island. This mashup offers a comprehensive view of traffic flow, with particular attention to the Causeway and 2nd Link cameras, which highlight areas of heavier traffic flow. The mashup integrates live data from traffic cameras to provide users with an up-to-date visual representation of traffic congestion and flow.

related_apis.title: Amazon S3 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Since 2006 Amazon Web Services has been offering web services commonly known as cloud computing. AWS Provides a reliable, low cost infrastructure platform that powers hundreds of thousands of businesses.
Amazon S3 API, the Simple Storage Service provides a simple web services interface used to store objects using the Amazon online storage infrastructure. Users can then download the data or use the data with other AWS services, such as Amazon Elastic Cloud Computer (EC2). Using this web service, developers can build applications that make use of Internet storage.
The API uses Buckets, Objects, Keys and Operations. An object has four parts: value, key, metadata, and an access control policy. Objects are stored in buckets. The API is REST based. Responses are formatted in JSON.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Amazon EC2 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) API is a web service that enables you to launch and manage Linux/UNIX and Windows server instances in Amazon's data centers. Giving users the ability to "compute" in the cloud, it provides users with complete control of their computing resources and lets them run on Amazon's computing environment. Amazon EC2 changes the economics of computing by allowing users to pay only for capacity that is actually used.
This is a REST-based API. The SOAP interface was deprecated on 1 December 2015.
The WSDL for each supported API version is available from the following URI:
http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc//AmazonEC2.wsdl

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: MailChimp API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Mailchimp API syncs campaign stats and subscribers information between MailChimp and a database. It helps to download a list of unsubscribes to clean inhouse lists, build client portals, and pull campaign stats from MailChimp. Available in REST architecture with JSON and XML formats, in addition to Serialized PHP and XML-RPC.

related_apis.title: Scalr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Scalr is a cloud hosting system that allows developers to scale their applications quickly in times of traffic surges. The Scalr API provides access to much of the functionality in the Scalr platform. Use the API to programmatically update DNS zone files, create Apache virtual hosts, provide details about server farms and launch/terminate farms.
Additionally, you can control individual servers (launch, reboot, terminate and copy from an image), execute scripts and access various logs and analytics.

title: Mashup: Analytics Edge Connector for Google Analytics
description: A data extraction tool that automates the process of fetching website traffic data from Google Analytics and seamlessly integrating it into Excel spreadsheets for comprehensive analysis and reporting. It streamlines the workflow by eliminating manual data transfer and enabling real-time data visualization and advanced analytics directly within the Excel environment.

related_apis.title: Google Analytics Managment API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Google Analytics Management API to leverage Google's extensive website analytics tools. The API uses GET requests over HTTPS and JSON for requests/returns. Some of the functions available with the API are: List Account, Property and View (Profile) information for a user; manage properties and goals; manage user permissions; and upload cost data to Google Analytics for non-Google paid campaigns. See the extensive documentation for code samples, detailed method descriptions, and more.

title: Mashup: 2009 Formula One Map
description: This mashup presents a comprehensive overview of the 2009 Formula One Grand Prix Circuits, overlaying satellite imagery with detailed race results and circuit information. Users can explore each circuit, view historical race data, and get insights into the locations and features of these prestigious racing venues.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Last on AM/FM
description: A mashup that provides a real-time visualization of the music currently playing on AM/FM radio stations, mapping the artists to their places of residence or origin. In addition, users can integrate their last.fm recently played tracks to see a personalized visualization of their music preferences alongside the radio station's playlist. This mashup combines music streaming data with mapping and visualization technologies to offer an interactive and engaging way to explore the music landscape.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

related_apis.title: Wikipedia API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The unofficial Wikipedia API. Because Wikipedia is built using MediaWiki, which in turn supports an API, Wikipedia does as well. This provides developers code-level access to the entire Wikipedia reference. The goal of this API is to provide direct, high-level access to the data contained in the MediaWiki databases. Client programs can use the API to login, get data, and post changes. The API supports thin web-based JavaScript clients, such as Navigation popups or LiveRC, end-user applications (such as vandal fighter), and can be accessed by another web site (tool server's utilities).
The API uses RESTful calls and supports a wide variety of formats including XML, JSON, PHP, YAML and others.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

related_apis.title: Google Analytics Managment API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Google Analytics Management API to leverage Google's extensive website analytics tools. The API uses GET requests over HTTPS and JSON for requests/returns. Some of the functions available with the API are: List Account, Property and View (Profile) information for a user; manage properties and goals; manage user permissions; and upload cost data to Google Analytics for non-Google paid campaigns. See the extensive documentation for code samples, detailed method descriptions, and more.

title: Mashup: CheckinSpy
description: CheckinSpy is a social mapping mashup that allows users to visualize the locations where they and their friends have checked in, using Google Street View. The platform enables users to view recent check-in activities either for themselves or for a specific friend, as well as to perform targeted searches based on social connections. It integrates social media check-in data with Google's Street View API to provide a visual representation of user activities in real-world locations, enhancing social interaction and location-based sharing.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. title: Mashup: News from The Netherlands
description: A comprehensive Dutch-language news service aggregating daily news from various sources in The Netherlands, including newspapers, radio, and television. The mashup utilizes a custom-built news aggregation engine to curate and deliver a diverse range of news content, ensuring users stay informed about the latest developments across multiple domains. The service is specifically designed for Dutch-speaking audiences, providing a single point of access to a broad spectrum of news sources, enhancing the user experience by simplifying the process of staying up-to-date with national and international news.

related_apis.description:

It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

title: Mashup: Padvark.nl
description: Padvark.nl is a comprehensive web application designed to facilitate the discovery and planning of various outdoor sports events, particularly focused on running, cycling, and cross-country biking in the Netherlands. This mashup leverages geolocation services, event databases, and mapping technologies to enable users to easily find and access detailed information about upcoming events in their chosen location. Users can search for events based on their preferred sport and location, view event details, including dates, times, routes, and distances, and even see real-time updates on event status and registration options.

related_apis.title: Strava API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Strava is a social fitness service that allows users to share, compare and compete with other users' personal fitness data via mobile and online apps. Focusing on cyclists and runners, Strava lets users track their rides and runs via mobile apps or GPS device to analyze their performance. The Strava API provides several methods through which users can send and receive Strava data from a mobile device. These methods lets users access data on other athletes, efforts, rides and uploads. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Dubtune
description: Dubtune is a music mashup that combines YouTube, Soundcloud, and Last.fm to create a dedicated Dubstep listening platform for fans of the genre. The mashup utilizes YouTube and Soundcloud as the primary streaming platforms for media, while Last.fm is used to provide meta data and user-generated content. Dubtune offers an immersive Dubstep listening experience that makes it easy for fans to discover and enjoy new tracks, playlists, and artists in real-time. The mashup is designed to promote social interaction and engagement among Dubstep enthusiasts, with features that allow users to share their favorite tracks, create playlists, and engage in discussions.

related_apis.title: SoundCloud API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: SoundCloud is the leading audio platform that enables anyone to upload, record, promote and share their sounds across the web. The SoundCloud API makes most of the features from SoundCloud.com available to app developers. With the help of its SDKs it's easy to integrate functionality like audio sharing and recording directly into iOS, Android and web apps.

title: Mashup: Local Area Info from Zillow Widget
description: A widget that integrates data from Zillow.com to provide comprehensive local area information for major US cities. Users can view demographic details such as age distribution, real estate data like price per square foot, and other relevant statistics. This mashup leverages Zillow's API to display real-time and accurate data, making it a useful tool for those interested in local market trends and neighborhood characteristics.

related_apis.title: Zillow API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Zillow API Network turns member sites into mini real estate portals by offering fresh and provocative real estate and mortgage content to keep people coming back. There are four categories of APIs. 1) Home Valuation API: Search results list, Zestimate™ home valuations, home valuation charts, comparable houses, and market trend charts. 2) Property Details API: Property-level data, including historical sales price and year, taxes, beds/baths, etc. 3) City and neighborhood market statistics and demographic data4) Mortgage rates and monthly payment estimates

title: Mashup: Quarkshop
description: Quarkshop is an e-commerce mashup that leverages the QuarkRank API to provide advanced product search capabilities. Unlike traditional search engines that rely solely on product specifications, Quarkshop integrates the QuarkRank API to analyze and rank products based on a variety of factors, including user requirements, preferences, and market trends. This approach enables users to find products that not only match their specific needs but also align with market demands, providing a more personalized and accurate search experience. Quarkshop is designed for consumers looking for tailored recommendations in the e-commerce space.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

related_apis.title: Shopping.com API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API has been acquired by eBay and now exists as eBay Commerce Network. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]With the Shopping.com API you can integrate relevant product content with the deepest product catalog available online. Add millions of unique products and merchant offers to your site. Shopping.com, an eBay company, is the world's online comparison shopping service leader. Its global websites (Shopping.com, DealTime, and DoorOne) carry one of the world's largest product catalogs and offers from more than 6000 merchants.
The Shopping.com XML API uses a RESTful interface and can be used to feature dynamic Shopping.com content on your web pages. It offers capabilities such as keyword search, refining and sorting search results, finding product reviews, reading product specs, comparing products and prices from different merchants and controlling the number of results and navigating between pages.

related_apis.title: CNET API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: this service will make a wealth of data available to the mash-up community in the creation of rich consumer sites. The initial dataset will include the full CNET catalog of technology products and software titles. This is the same dataset that drives the highly trafficked sites of CNET Reviews, Shopper.com and Download.com. Over time, the API will add news articles, community content, blog posts and full product reviews. The API is designed for easy data discovery and integration. The interface is REST-based, supporting both XML and JSON response formats. It has undergone extensive performance optimization, in order to ensure rapid response times. To simplify query creation, a tool called the Dashboard is available that allows the user to interactively select data sets to include in the response stream.

related_apis.title: QuarkRank API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: QuarkRank provides the information for making decisions at the point of purchase. QuarkRank has the capability to automatically summarize the opinions of millions of consumer reviews on the internet. It provides summarized opinions via API and Widget.

title: Mashup: Tools For Etsy
description: Tools For Etsy is a comprehensive, free service designed to streamline and enrich the Etsy community's experience. It offers a suite of tools including Tag Wars for competitive analysis, Consolidated Feedback for unified customer reviews, and free advertising options to boost visibility. This mashup integrates various data sources and user feedback mechanisms to provide a holistic solution for both buyers and sellers on the Etsy platform.

related_apis.title: Etsy API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Etsy is an online marketplace for buying and selling handmade things. The Etsy API lets you develop applications built on this fast growing e-commerce platform.

title: Mashup: me.com
description: Me.com is a customizable social networking platform designed for community builders to create and manage social networks tailored to specific interests and target audiences. It leverages the Google AdSense API to facilitate revenue sharing opportunities with users, enabling creators to monetize their networks through advertising. The platform offers features such as customization options, community management tools, and integration with an advertising network to support sustainable growth.

related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

title: Mashup: Craigslist Alerts
description: The Craigslist Alerts mashup is a bookmarklet tool that enables users to set up personalized alerts on any browser without the need for account creation. This service allows users to stay updated on specific items or listings by subscribing to and unsubscribing from alerts via email while they are browsing Craigslist.

related_apis.title: Mailgun API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Mailgun email management API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON. The API authenticates with an API Key over HTTP Basic Auth. Use Mailgun to do things like: send email, automate email services, and receive real-time notifications in app. Mailgun also offers email tracking and analytics. Note that the default version of this API is now v3. V3 is backward compatible with v2, but some endpoint behaviors have been modified. See the documentation for full details on the latest Mailgun API version.

related_apis.title: LaunchBit API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
LaunchBit is an email advertising service. Users can create email ad campaigns to send to target audiences.
The LaunchBit API allows developers to access and integrate the functionality of LaunchBit with other applications. Some example API methods include accessing ad information, retrieving adzones, and retrieving codes and status.

title: Mashup: TwitDone - Twitter GTD
description: A personalized Twitter-based platform designed to streamline tasks and improve productivity through the Getting Things Done (GTD) methodology. Users can create, organize, and manage to-do lists directly on Twitter, enabling them to stay organized and focused in real-time. This mashup leverages Twitter's API for real-time updates and notifications, allowing users to keep track of their tasks and progress efficiently. It caters to individuals seeking a seamless integration of social networking and task management for enhanced personal productivity.

title: Mashup: Toronto Buddhism
description: A comprehensive resource for Buddhism in Toronto, providing a map of local Buddhist locations, an image gallery showcasing Buddhist art and architecture, a news feed presenting current events and updates related to Buddhism in Toronto, and a video section featuring teachings and events. The mashup integrates geolocation data with religious content, offering a visual and informational journey through Toronto's Buddhist community.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: geocoder API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Geocoder.us is a public service providing free geocoding of addresses and intersections in the United States. Using the service you can find the latitude & longitude of any US address and much more. Geocoder.us offers four different ways to access our web services: an XML-RPC interface, a SOAP interface, a REST interface that returns an RDF/XML document, and a REST interface that returns a plain text comma separated values result. The methods and return values are equivalent across all three interfaces.

title: Mashup: TaskAmigo
description: TaskAmigo is a task management and bidding platform that allows users to post tasks and receive proposals from task runners. It streamlines the process of delegating tasks, enabling users to focus on their primary tasks while runners handle the rest. The mashup integrates search functionalities for task posting and mapping for runner location tracking, ensuring efficient task assignment and completion.

related_apis.title: Hoiio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Hoiio is a global communication service seeking to allow people around the world to communicate via telephone or SMS by routing through Hoiio service.
The Hoiio SMS API allows developers to easily integrate SMS into their applications.
Through various partnerships, Hoiio is able to offer a flat price to send SMS globally, and at a low cost to developers.

title: Mashup: PriceWorx
description: A comprehensive price comparison platform that aggregates product data from various auction and e-commerce sites, enabling users to compare prices, read consumer reviews, and access current coupons, deals, and rebates from major retailers. This mashup streamlines the shopping process by providing real-time updates on pricing, user feedback, and promotional offers to help consumers make informed purchasing decisions.

related_apis.title: Amazon EC2 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) API is a web service that enables you to launch and manage Linux/UNIX and Windows server instances in Amazon's data centers. Giving users the ability to "compute" in the cloud, it provides users with complete control of their computing resources and lets them run on Amazon's computing environment. Amazon EC2 changes the economics of computing by allowing users to pay only for capacity that is actually used.
This is a REST-based API. The SOAP interface was deprecated on 1 December 2015.
