http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc//AmazonEC2.wsdl

title: Mashup: Localley
description: Localley is a social and location-based service that extends the capabilities of Facebook Places by allowing users to schedule check-ins at various locations for a future date and time. This mashup combines social networking with location services, enabling users to plan their visits to places and share their plans with friends. It integrates with Facebook's user data and location APIs, providing a seamless experience for scheduling and sharing visits. The tool can be used for planning social events, tracking personal or professional travel plans, and sharing future activities with friends or followers on Facebook.

It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: GIF Spinner
description: A mashup that combines the functionality of SoundCloud, a music streaming platform, with animated GIFs. The mashup allows users to add music to their GIFs, creating a unique animated experience. Users can search for music on SoundCloud and select a track, then match it to an animated GIF. The mashup then plays the selected music in sync with the animated GIF, creating a visually engaging and musically enhanced experience. The mashup is ideal for users who enjoy creating and sharing animated GIFs with music, and can be used for various purposes such as social media posts, blog posts, and entertainment. The mashup requires access to SoundCloud and a compatible browser, and can be used by users with basic knowledge of music streaming and GIF creation.

related_apis.title: SoundCloud API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: SoundCloud is the leading audio platform that enables anyone to upload, record, promote and share their sounds across the web. The SoundCloud API makes most of the features from SoundCloud.com available to app developers. With the help of its SDKs it's easy to integrate functionality like audio sharing and recording directly into iOS, Android and web apps.

title: Mashup: Bartagora
description: Bartagora.com is a social marketing site that combines affiliate marketing with deals and coupons for a wide range of products from both niche and global retailers. The platform provides an easy-to-use shopping experience, allowing deal-savvy members to discover, share, and discuss deals and coupons. Approved deals by the community and selected by deal editors are highlighted on the front page.

related_apis.title: Commission Junction API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Commission Detail Service is a REST-based API that enables advertisers and publishers to access real-time commission and item-detail data. Advertisers and publishers that wish to receive commission reporting updates in near real-time or to request new commission data on a regular basis can use this API to create in-house tools that access real-time commission data from the CJ network. Developers may search by any number of criteria including price, currency, country, serviceable area and UPC. A SOAP API is also available but will eventually be deprecated.

related_apis.title: ShareASale Affiliate API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The ShareASale API allows merchants a more advanced method of interacting with real-time transactions as well as reports. ShareASale is an affiliate network providing pay-per-sale, pay-per-lead, and pay-per-click programs for webmasters. ShareASale services two customer sets in affiliate marketing: the affiliate, and the merchant. Using the API, the following reports can be generated; Activity Details, Timespan Reports, Today’s Stats, Void Trails, Merchant Status, along with several others. Full documentation is not publicly available.

title: Mashup: JobDepot.us
description: JobDepot.us is a comprehensive job search platform that integrates APIs from prominent job listing sites such as Indeed.com, SimplyHired.com, and CareerBuilder.com. Users can search for job openings across multiple sources, streamlining the job search process. The mashup aggregates job listings, allowing for easier comparison of job opportunities and application procedures. It provides a centralized platform for job seekers to access a wide range of job opportunities from various industries and locations, leveraging the strengths of each integrated API to offer a more diverse and comprehensive job search experience.

related_apis.title: indeed API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Indeed is a search engine for jobs - with a radically different approach to job search. In one simple search, Indeed gives job seekers free access to millions of employment opportunities from thousands of websites. Indeed.com includes all the job listings from major job boards, newspapers, associations and company career pages - and we continue to add new sites every day. The Indeed API allows developers to integrate Indeed’s employer interface or job seeker interface in apps. The API returns responses in JSON or XML format.

related_apis.title: GeoNames API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Geonames is a geographical database with web services that let users extract useful information about different places, such as weather, timezone and post codes. The GeoNames geographical database covers all countries and contains over eight million placenames that are available for download free of charge. Users can edit, correct and add new names using a wiki interface.Geonames provides a suite of Webservices including the following categories:Fulltext searchPlace HierarchyWikipediaPostal CodesReverse GeocodingThe APIs use RESTful protocol and responses vary in format between XML, JSON, CSV, and TXTWhile the GeoNames data is free, the data is available without costs, there is a Service Level Agreement available for premium web services.

related_apis.title: Simply Hired Jobs API MASTER RECORD
CareerBuilder API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Currently a private API, the CareerBuilder API allows you to integrate their database of over 1.5 million jobs with your software or website. The API provides methods for basic job searching, retrieving data for a specific job, and applying to a job.

title: Mashup: itDuzzit
description: itDuzzit is a mashup platform that allows both developers and non-developers to create Twilio-powered voice and SMS applications without requiring any coding knowledge. It simplifies the process of integrating telephony features into applications, making low-code or no-code development possible. It leverages Twilio's voice and messaging APIs to provide easy-to-use tools for building communication-centric applications. The platform supports a variety of use cases, including customer service, appointment scheduling, and automated messaging, catering to a broad audience including small businesses, educational institutions, and individual developers.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: CityRanks US Populations
description: An interactive mapping mashup that leverages 2000 US Census data and Google Maps API to visualize population density across various US zip codes. The mashup employs a color-coding system to indicate population density, enabling users to quickly identify densely populated areas. The map becomes particularly striking when multiple cities are added, resembling election results. Additionally, the mashup includes a search function, allowing users to compare their hometown's population density with other cities.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: video mash 112
description: A site that integrates video markers with mapping services, allowing users to click markers to view videos. It includes a feature for uploading videos. 112 serves as the EU's emergency number equivalent to 911.

title: Mashup: TodoToday Pro for Cohuman
description: A mobile task management application that integrates with the online task management platform Cohuman.com to display current due and overdue tasks. The mashup provides a convenient way for users to manage and track their tasks on-the-go, leveraging the functionality of both TodoToday Pro and Cohuman.com.

related_apis.title: Cohuman API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Cohuman is a task-centric, team productivity tool that helps users coordinate and plan their daily tasks to effectively complete projects on time. The Cohuman API allows anyone to develop applications for the web, mobile devices and the desktop. With the API users can make a new task, assign the task to a person or to a team of people, and add content to the task by starting a conversation thread, attaching a file, or scheduling a due date. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are formatted in XML and JSON.

title: Mashup: iCommunity.TV
description: A collaborative video news network that integrates user-generated content, mapping, and social media to facilitate local news reporting and sharing. The mashup allows users to create and share local news stories, leveraging geolocation services for content organization and viewer engagement. It also includes a mapping component to display the location of news events and a social media integration for community engagement and feedback.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: eSignature Gateway
description: The eSignature Gateway is a comprehensive solution that integrates Amazon S3, Clockwork SMS, DocuSign, Google Storage, and Twilio APIs to provide users with document signing capabilities regardless of the email client being used. This mashup offers electronic storage, data analytics, and workflow capabilities, enhancing the efficiency and security of document signing processes. It supports multiple platforms and channels, ensuring seamless integration and optimal user experience.

related_apis.title: Amazon S3 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Since 2006 Amazon Web Services has been offering web services commonly known as cloud computing. AWS Provides a reliable, low cost infrastructure platform that powers hundreds of thousands of businesses.
Amazon S3 API, the Simple Storage Service provides a simple web services interface used to store objects using the Amazon online storage infrastructure. Users can then download the data or use the data with other AWS services, such as Amazon Elastic Cloud Computer (EC2). Using this web service, developers can build applications that make use of Internet storage.
The API uses Buckets, Objects, Keys and Operations. An object has four parts: value, key, metadata, and an access control policy. Objects are stored in buckets. The API is REST based. Responses are formatted in JSON.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

related_apis.title: Google Storage API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Google Storage for Developers is a RESTful web service API for storing and accessing your data on Google's infrastructure. The service combines the performance and scalability of Google's cloud with advanced security and sharing capabilities. With this API: all data is replicated to multiple U.S. data centers, offers read-your-writes data consistency, and allows objects of hundreds of gigabytes in size per request with range-get support.

related_apis.title: Clockwork SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Clockwork SMS API access to an SMS gateway allowing users to send messages through an application. Clockwork is a service that allows for the sending of bulk SMS. The API uses RESTful, SOAP and SMPP protocol. Responses are formatted in XML.

title: Mashup: After Hours Doctors Office
description: An innovative mashup designed to streamline communication between doctors and patients after office hours. This service transcribes voice messages left by patients on the office voicemail into text format using speech-to-text technology. The transcribed messages are then sent as SMS text messages to the doctor's mobile device, ensuring timely communication even outside of regular working hours. The service provides source code for transparency and potential further development.

related_apis.title: Amazon Mechanical Turk API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Amazon Mechanical Turk provides a web services API for computers to integrate Artificial Artificial Intelligence directly into their processing by making requests of humans. Developers use the Amazon Mechanical Turk web services API to submit tasks to the Amazon Mechanical Turk web site, approve completed tasks, and incorporate the answers into their software applications. To the application, the transaction looks very much like any remote procedure call - the application sends the request, and the service returns the results. In reality, a network of humans fuels this Artificial Artificial Intelligence by coming to the web site, searching for and completing tasks, and receiving payment for their work.

related_apis.title: StrikeIron SMS Mobile Marketing API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Communicate and engage with customers anytime and anywhere. Instantly send text messages to virtually any cell phone in the world via a simple web API. StrikeIronâ€™s Bulk SMS Software supports over 600 carriers in 200 countries.
It takes 90 minutes for the average person to respond to an email. It takes 90 seconds for the average person to respond to a text message. Increasingly, people prefer texting over other methods of communication.
Unleash the full potential of text messaging with StrikeIronâ€™s Bulk SMS Software. See how it can improve your mobile marketing campaigns and customer relationship management (CRM).

versions.version_title: StrikeIron SMS Mobile Marketing REST API
StrikeIron SMS Mobile Marketing RPC API

title: Mashup: byownerport.com
description: A real estate listing and rental platform that combines Craigslist's classified ads with Google Maps' geospatial capabilities. Users can explore neighborhoods, view properties, and sell or rent homes by flying virtually over the area they are interested in. This mashup simplifies the process of finding and selling real estate by integrating property listings with interactive mapping technologies, allowing users to focus on specific areas of interest from an aerial perspective.

title: Mashup: Locate me
description: A real-time location tracking service that uses GPS or other geolocation technologies to pinpoint the user's current position and dynamically updates a Google Map with this information. The mashup is designed for users who need to know their exact location at any given moment, with the location data being presented in a visual format for easy interpretation and sharing.

related_apis.title: hostip.info API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Hostip.info is a community-based project to geolocate IP addresses, making the database freely available but it needs you to put in your city to make it work. Available as a Firefox plug-in, or embeddable in your website.

title: Mashup: NPRbackstory
description: This mashup mines the National Public Radio (NPR) news archives, leveraging keyword and topic analysis algorithms to identify and extract relevant content related to trending topics on Google. The extracted stories are then formatted and published to a dedicated Twitter feed, providing users with a unique and compelling way to stay informed about current events and hot trends in the news. The mashup relies on APIs from both NPR for access to their archives and Google Trends for identifying trending topics, and employs data processing and social media publishing technologies to deliver content to Twitter.

related_apis.title: NPR One Station Finder API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The NPR API provides an open and extensive way for users to share and mash-up the radio station's content. The Station Finder API can be used to identify local NPR member stations based on zip code, city/state, unique ID, call letters or longitude/latitude. This is the same data that powers the Station Finder. This tool only returns NPR member stations or stations that carry NPR programming.

versions.version_title: NPR One Station Finder REST API v3

title: Mashup: WorldFactorium
description: An engaging and educational mashup that combines mapping technologies with reference data and visual content to provide users with a comprehensive and interactive experience of the world's countries. The mashup offers a fun and informative way to explore fascinating facts about each country, including geographic locations, cultural insights, and historical data, all presented through a combination of maps, images, and multimedia content.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: Impact Dialing
description: A predictive dialing system that enables users to make bulk calls to a list of phone numbers. Users dial into Impact Dialing, which then initiates outbound calls to the provided numbers. The system monitors call pickups and adjusts the dialing rate to ensure near-continuous contact with potential voters. It also tracks conversation durations to optimize call timing. Users can upload phone number lists via a web interface, and political campaigns can use the service with minimal computer involvement, relying solely on phones.

related_apis.title: Amazon EC2 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) API is a web service that enables you to launch and manage Linux/UNIX and Windows server instances in Amazon's data centers. Giving users the ability to "compute" in the cloud, it provides users with complete control of their computing resources and lets them run on Amazon's computing environment. Amazon EC2 changes the economics of computing by allowing users to pay only for capacity that is actually used.
This is a REST-based API. The SOAP interface was deprecated on 1 December 2015.
The WSDL for each supported API version is available from the following URI:
http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc//AmazonEC2.wsdl

title: Mashup: 1click2destiny
description: An interactive website that aggregates and ranks hundreds of top-rated links based on user suggestions and votes. Utilizing the Digg API, 1click2destiny.com offers a platform for discovering trending content, promoting user engagement, and fostering a community-driven approach to online navigation. This mashup combines elements of news services, bookmarking, social interaction, and humor, providing a dynamic and collaborative browsing experience.

title: Mashup: eDottedLine-DocuSign Edition
description: The eDottedLine-DocuSign Edition is a mashup that seamlessly integrates the DocuSign electronic signature process directly into the Microsoft Outlook email client. This integration creates an intuitive end-to-end experience, allowing users to send, sign, and manage electronic documents directly from their email inbox without leaving Outlook. It streamlines the electronic signature workflow, making it more convenient and efficient for businesses and individuals who regularly use Outlook for their correspondence.

title: Mashup: Gruvr
description: A music-focused mashup that integrates Google Maps and MySpace to create interactive band tour maps. Users can search for specific bands or regions to view upcoming concert locations on an interactive map, facilitating planning and attendance at live music events.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: MySpace API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The MySpace Developer Platform (MDP) allows developers to create applications that interact with MySpace members and their social data. With MDP you will be able to create compelling new products that integrate directly into MySpace pages and get exposure to millions of people around the world.

related_apis.title: Ticketfly Affiliate API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Ticketfly Affiliate API allows developers to add Ticketfly event listings, artists and venue details, ticketing information, images, social media links, and purchase links to their websites. This API is available to approved sites for both commercial and non-commercial use. All API methods are RESTful and return either JSON or XML.

title: Mashup: VOVO:WIKI
description: A dynamic mashup that combines the power of social media with real-time polling capabilities, allowing users to engage in interactive, multi-click polls that are updated in real-time. This mashup caters to both avid fans and skeptical users, providing a platform for real-time engagement and opinion sharing.

title: Mashup: Bear Of The Day for iGoogle
description: A financial widget specifically designed for iGoogle that dynamically showcases the price, quote, and fundamental details of the most recent losing stock in the market. This mashup provides users with real-time, valuable insights into underperforming stocks, allowing them to make informed decisions based on the latest market trends. By leveraging financial APIs and stock data sources, it offers a user-friendly interface for tracking stock performance and identifying potential investment opportunities.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

title: Mashup: EmailAmbush
description: EmailAmbush is an innovative security tool that utilizes Twilio's SMS API to provide real-time alerts to users when unauthorized access is detected in their email accounts. Upon receiving a notification, users can immediately log in to their account, change their password, and secure their inbox from potential hackers. This mashup serves as a proactive measure to protect user data and enhance overall email security.

The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: fishingnotes.com
description: A comprehensive fishing enthusiast platform that integrates customizable maps, detailed fishing catch tracking, local and global fishing reports, and daily weather updates. This mashup allows anglers to plan their trips, track their catches, and stay informed about the best fishing conditions at any given location. It combines mapping services with weather data to provide users with an interactive and data-driven tool to enhance their fishing experience.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: NOAA National Weather Service (NWS) NDFD SOAP API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The NOAA National Weather Service (NWS) NDFD SOAP API provides programmatic access to forecasts, weather watches/warnings, current observations, tropical cyclone advisories, and storm prediction center forecast products. This information comes from the National Digital Forecast Database (NDFD) and is intended for use by government agencies, commercial enterprises, and the general public. The API returns responses in an XML language called Digital Weather Markup Language (DWML).

versions.version_title: NOAA National Weather Service (NWS) NDFD SOAP RPC API v1.0

title: Mashup: Silverlight Books
description: A curated list of books focused on Microsoft Silverlight and related .NET technologies, including reviews, ratings, and availability information from major publishers such as MsPress, Manning, Wrox, Apress, and O'Reilly. The mashup provides users with access to new releases, best-selling titles, and future publications, allowing them to browse, purchase, and gain insights into the latest content related to Silverlight and .NET.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

related_apis.title: Google Book Search Book Viewability API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Book Search Book Viewability API enables developers to: Link to Books in Google Book Search using ISBNs, LCCNs, and OCLC numbers; Know whether Google Book Search has a specific title and what the viewability of that title is; Generate links to a thumbnail of the cover of a book; Generate links to an informational page about a book; Generate links to a preview of a book.

versions.version_title: Google Book Search Book Viewability REST API

title: Mashup: MapHistory.org
description: An interactive Google Map that overlays historical points of interest on modern maps, initially focusing on Philadelphia and Washington D.C. Users can explore the history of these cities by viewing historical locations and their corresponding stories and images. The mashup integrates historical data with modern mapping technologies to provide an educational and navigational tool for users interested in history and local culture.

description: A location-based search service that enables users to access Yelp.com reviews and recommendations via SMS, WAP, and Email from their mobile devices. MobiYelp facilitates local business discovery and user-generated content consumption by allowing users to quickly send search queries and receive real-time results, including user ratings and reviews.

title: Mashup: CandidateVerification
description: CandidateVerification is an online platform that offers free background checks for US political candidates. It serves as a comprehensive database, providing verified information to candidates for self-promotion and to the public for better understanding of their potential representatives. The service integrates multiple data sources to ensure accuracy and reliability in its background checks.

related_apis.title: NationBuilder API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: NationBuilder is an open platform for users to create online communities centered around issues relevant to them. Users can create community organization websites, access a people database, and use communication tools such as email, text messaging and social media.The NationBuilder API helps developers to create community organizing-driven applications by integrating various service endpoints within third-party applications. These endpoints can be information on people, campaign data, donation data, calendar information, event data, and other calls. The API uses REST calls and returns JSON.

title: Mashup: SpellBoy
description: SpellBoy is an advanced online spell-checking tool designed to enhance user productivity and accuracy during web searches. Initially developed as an iGoogle Gadget, it has evolved into a comprehensive web application that leverages Google's extensive web search infrastructure to process and correct spelling errors in real-time. With over 100,000 daily visitors, SpellBoy offers an integrated solution for improving the spelling of words entered into Google's search engine, thereby enhancing the overall user experience and search results quality.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Query Language GraphQL API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Yahoo Query Language, YQL, is a GraphQL endpoint that enables mutable queries by using the selected parameters. The API accepts diagnostics, format, cross product, and statement as parameters. YQL exposes a SQL-like SELECT syntax that is both familiar to developers and expressive enough for getting the right data. Data is offered in JSON or XML.

versions.version_title: Yahoo Query Language GraphQL GraphQL API v1

related_apis.title: After the Deadline API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: After the Deadline checks spelling, misused words, style, and grammar with advanced AI and NLP techniques.

title: Mashup: Enterprise Networking Solutions & DocuSign
description: This mashup combines Enterprise Networking Solutions with DocuSign's eSignature and transaction management capabilities, providing a comprehensive solution for California's state and local government agencies. By leveraging DocuSign's cloud-based document signing, tracking, and storage system, the mashup accelerates document processing, reduces operating costs, and ensures secure and accurate transactions. It also incorporates ENS-Inc's leading technologies to protect mission-critical data and applications, allowing clients to focus on their bottom line objectives.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: Baby Name Meanings
description: An extensive resource for parents seeking baby names, this database mashup provides a searchable collection of baby names along with their origins, variants, and meanings. Explore a vast array of names, and discover how each name has evolved over time and across different cultures. The mashup offers a comprehensive reference for parents looking to choose a meaningful name for their child.

related_apis.title: Baby Names API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: An API for baby name statistics. Find the right baby boy and baby girl name. Gets data on popular baby names in countries in the world. Program for baby names by date and by gender.

title: Mashup: MattFind.com
description: An advanced niche-specific search engine that combines web search capabilities with video content and e-commerce functionalities. The mashup provides users with a seamless experience to find and purchase products or services related to a specific niche, while also offering video tutorials or reviews to aid in their purchasing decisions.

title: Mashup: RinkAtlas
description: A mapping and search service tailored for ice sports enthusiasts, RinkAtlas offers comprehensive door-to-door navigation to ice rinks across North America. With a current database encompassing over 1,800 ice hockey and figure skating facilities in all 50 U.S. states and Puerto Rico, RinkAtlas aims to provide seamless access to recreational and competitive ice rinks. Future updates will expand coverage to include Canadian facilities.

title: Mashup: Happy Hour Share
description: A location-based social media mashup that aggregates and shares happy hour deals and promotions in New York City (NYC) through SMS and Twitter. Users can access exclusive deals by texting their location to a specific number or by following a dedicated Twitter account. The service uses SMS and Twitter APIs to gather and distribute the information, enabling real-time updates and user interaction.

related_apis.title: TelAPI API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
TelAPI is a platform for telephony applications. TelAPI allows users to add voice and SMS and other telephony features to applications. Some features include sending and receiving SMS messages, phone calls, adding voice features to applications, and buying phone numbers.
The TelAPI allows developers to access and integrate the functionality of TelAPI with other applications and to create new applications. Some example API methods include listing calls, making calls, managing recordings, and adding audio effects.

related_apis.title: Zapier API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Zapier is an application that integrates applications together. Users can choose triggers that automatically push data and content from one application to another.
With Zapier, developers and users can integrate applications with API keys. Some example API methods include managing account information, performing various actions, and automating processes.

title: Mashup: Tatvic Excel Plug-in for Google Adwords
description: A plugin developed by Tatvic that integrates with Google AdWords, providing advanced analytics and reporting capabilities. This plugin enables marketers to gain deeper insights into their AdWords campaigns by offering enhanced data visualization and export options directly from Excel. It streamlines the process of analyzing AdWords data, making it easier to identify trends and optimize campaigns based on detailed performance metrics.

related_apis.title: Google AdWords API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google AdWords API allows apps to interact directly with the Google Ads platform, vastly increasing the efficiency of managing large or complex Google Ads accounts and campaigns. Some typical use cases include:Automated account managementCustom reportingAd management based on inventoryBid management based on business dataWith the AdWords API you can build software that manages accounts from the customer level down to the keyword level. The API can do almost everything the Google Ads UI does, but programmatically.The types of companies that have benefited from the AdWords API include:Ad agenciesSearch Engine Marketing (SEM) companiesBig brands managing a large number of accounts, with needs beyond what's possible within the Google Ads UI.The API relies on SOAP and WSDL technologies to offer its services. You set up API access by obtaining a few required authentication credentials, creating some test accounts, and adding the authentication and account details to a configuration file for your client library. Authentication is via OAuth2.To help you get started, they offer client libraries in Java, .NET, Python, PHP, Perl, and Ruby.

title: Mashup: DocuSign Integration with DOCCentral
description: An electronic signature solution for the real estate industry, integrating DocuSign's web-based electronic signature platform into DOCCentral's ecosystem. This partnership enables real estate businesses to streamline their operations by securely sending, signing, tracking, and storing real estate documents electronically, thereby facilitating faster business closures while maintaining data integrity and security.

title: Mashup: Geograph Photos
description: A mapping mashup that integrates the Ordnance Survey OpenSpace API with Geograph photo collections to display images of locations throughout England on a geographical map. Users can explore the country's landscape and landmarks through interactive viewing, providing a unique visual experience of the nation's geography.

related_apis.title: Ordnance Survey Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Maps API allows visualization of different maps of Great Britain, and be displayed in approved third-party applications. From their site: OS OpenSpace is a free Ordnance Survey service that allows you to embed Ordnance Survey maps covering England, Scotland and Wales in your web apps. Place any kind of information that has a geographic reference on top of Ordnance Survey maps. Ordnance Survey is Great Britain's national mapping agency. The OS OpenSpace API is a piece of software code you can embed in your web application that provides all the necessary functionality to interact with a map, like panning, zooming in and out, and adding markers and polygons.

versions.version_title: Ordnance Survey Maps REST API v1

related_apis.title: Geograph API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Geograph England and Ireland project was established to create geographically representative images and data of every square kilometer of the two countries. The Geograph API makes it easier for third-party developers to deploy the Geograph data in the applications. Its deployment requires API key authentication.

title: Mashup: Shopping.com API 3 Demo for All Markets
description: A demonstration website showcasing the capabilities of the Shopping.com API version 3 across various global markets. It provides an interactive platform to explore the API's functionalities such as product listings, pricing details, and market-specific features for the United States, United Kingdom, Germany, France, and Australia.

related_apis.title: Shopping.com API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API has been acquired by eBay and now exists as eBay Commerce Network. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]With the Shopping.com API you can integrate relevant product content with the deepest product catalog available online. Add millions of unique products and merchant offers to your site. Shopping.com, an eBay company, is the world's online comparison shopping service leader. Its global websites (Shopping.com, DealTime, and DoorOne) carry one of the world's largest product catalogs and offers from more than 6000 merchants.
The Shopping.com XML API uses a RESTful interface and can be used to feature dynamic Shopping.com content on your web pages. It offers capabilities such as keyword search, refining and sorting search results, finding product reviews, reading product specs, comparing products and prices from different merchants and controlling the number of results and navigating between pages.

title: Mashup: Zeiss European Storefinder
description: A mapping service designed specifically for Zeiss in Germany, offering a European store finder that helps customers locate Zeiss retail locations across Europe. The mashup integrates European mapping APIs with Zeiss's e-commerce platform to provide users with a comprehensive list of Zeiss stores, including their addresses and contact details. Users can easily navigate the map to find the nearest Zeiss store or search for specific locations. This service enhances the shopping experience by providing real-time store information and improving accessibility to Zeiss products across Europe.

related_apis.title: Multimap API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: One-stop service for global AJAX mapping, routing, geocoding, searching and POI from Europeï¿½s #1 provider of mapping and location services to consumers and businesses.

title: Mashup: Name Popularity
description: The Name Popularity mashup is a user-friendly tool that helps users understand the cultural significance and popularity trends of their names. It integrates social media data with name databases to provide insights into name meanings and historical usage. Users can input their own names or explore the names of others to learn about the social implications and humor associated with different names.

related_apis.title: Forvo API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Forvo API allows users to integrate the functionality of Forvo into their websites or applications. Forvo is the largest pronunciation guide in the world, the place where you will find millions of words pronounced in their original languages. Ask for that word or name, and another user will pronounce it for you. You can also help others by recording your pronunciations in your own language.
Currently the API allows users to read or listen to word pronounciations with future functionality to include search, languages and standard pronounciations. Possible uses include adding pronunciations for your dictionary or creating a better Google Translate with real human pronunciations. This RESTful API returns responses in either XML, JSON or JS-tag format.

title: Mashup: Kredittkort-Siden.no
description: A Norwegian credit card comparison platform that aggregates and provides real-time data from the official government service, Finansportalen. The mashup enables users to compare all available credit cards in Norway, filter based on specific benefits, and compare cards against each other. The goal is to assist users in making informed decisions by providing comprehensive and up-to-date information on credit card offerings based on their individual requirements.

related_apis.title: Finansportalen API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Finansportalen is a site provided by the Norwegian Consumer Protection Agency to provide consumers the ability to make good choices in the market for financial services. The portal is a tool that helps consumers to compare financial industry products The Finansportalen API exposes data feeds on financial products for the Norwegian market. An account is required to view the URLs for data feeds.

title: Mashup: Dublin Attractions Map
description: An interactive map showcasing popular attractions in Dublin, Ireland, utilizing Google Maps API for precise location and direction integration. The mashup provides travelers with a comprehensive guide to Dublin's tourist hotspots, including historical landmarks, cultural sites, and scenic points of interest. Users can explore the map to plan their itinerary, view photos and descriptions of each attraction, and receive real-time information on opening hours and ticket prices. This mashup is ideal for both tourists and locals looking to discover the best of Dublin's offerings.

Users can use this tool to stay updated on eBay's API changes, prepare for new features or deprecations, and plan their development accordingly. It serves as a vital resource for developers and businesses that rely on eBay's API for their operations.

related_apis.title: Google Calendar API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Calendar Data API lets users perform most of the operations a normal Google Calendar user can on the Google Calendar website. Google Calendar allows client applications to view and update calendar events in the form of Google data API, GData, feeds. The Calendar Data API lets users incorporate Calendar functionality into their own application or website. Users can edit calendars, create and delete events, query for events that match particular criteria, send invitations, and more.
There are many possible uses for the Calendar data API. For example, users can create a web front end for a group calendar that uses Google Calendar as a back end. Or a public calendar can be generated for Google Calendar to display, based on a company event database. Or users can search relevant calendars to display a list of upcoming events on those calendars.

title: Mashup: dfwdines - DFW Restaurant Week Guide
description: A dynamic and interactive guide for the Dallas-Fort Worth (DFW) Restaurant Week(s), taking place from 8/12 - 9/2/2013. This mashup enhances the usual static lists of participating restaurants by mapping them, enabling users to find directions, explore nearby attractions, view ratings, and much more. Additional features planned for future iterations include integration with more APIs and a focus on optimizing the user experience across various devices. It is designed to work seamlessly on mobile devices, catering to the convenience of users on-the-go.

Methods are available for place search, details, photos, and autocomplete queries. The Places API returns mapping data in JSON and XML formats, after making URI requests, and authenticating with API Key.

title: Mashup: Free Around
description: A location-based application that leverages the Foursquare API to search for and display special deals and free offers near the user's current location. The mashup provides a quick and easy way to browse the area surrounding the user, offering a convenient method to discover discounts and complimentary services. It integrates social sharing features, making it easy for users to share their finds with friends and followers. This mashup is ideal for anyone looking to save money or explore new experiences in their local area, and it caters to a wide range of interests, from dining and shopping to entertainment and leisure activities. title: Mashup: @trafficRobot
description:
A comprehensive email management system that leverages bot technology and API integration to create disposable email addresses for users. These generated email addresses are used for various online services, allowing users to control and manage their email subscriptions effectively. Upon receiving an email, the system automatically routes it to the user's Telegram messenger, ensuring seamless email delivery. 

@trafficRobot acts as a bridge between email services, web forms, and API endpoints, facilitating a smooth transition of data from these sources to Telegram. The mashup is available as both a Chrome browser extension and a Telegram bot, providing users with convenient access and integration options. It offers a secure and efficient way to manage online communications while maintaining privacy and control over email subscriptions.

related_apis.title: Telegram Bot API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Telegram, the cloud-based service that offers messaging services to share text, photos, and videos, now offers the Telegram Bot API. This service allows to integrate bots with AI applications in mind. What Telegram means by AI includes teaching, broadcasting, and connecting features into software components. The API was created in HTTP interface to authorize with token. See more at https://core.telegram.org/bots/api

title: Mashup: UK Camping Map
description: A comprehensive mapping platform that displays all UK campsites on a Google map, with interactive features to filter by facilities offered, region, and proximity to tourist destinations. This mashup integrates data from various camping and tourism sources to provide users with a detailed view of camping options in the UK, facilitating informed decisions for travel and outdoor recreation.

description: MyGlobalLounge is a social mapping community that connects users with loungers in their vicinity and worldwide. The platform integrates geolocation services with live-webcams and user profiles to facilitate real-time interaction and communication. Users can explore various live-webcams and loungers' profiles on a map to meet new people and expand their social network.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Ilmaprognoos
description: A weather forecasting mashup specifically designed for users in Estonia and Scandinavia, providing accurate and localized forecasts. The service supports Finnish, catering to users in Finland and other Finnish-speaking regions. Users can access detailed weather information, including temperature, precipitation, and wind forecasts, tailored to their specific locations. The mashup integrates real-time weather data with geolocation services to ensure that users receive relevant and up-to-date weather information for their region.

related_apis.title: Met.no Weather API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Met.no is a Norwegian Meteorological Institute that provides the public with meteorological services for both civil and military puposes. The Met.no Weather API lets developers to integrate the institute's weather information and services with their applications, enabling direct access for users of the applications. The API is REST based, and uses HTTP Basic Authentication.

title: Mashup: TweeSpeed
description: TweeSpeed is a real-time Twitter analytics tool that provides users with the number of tweets sent in the last minute, based on the public timeline. The service analyzes the data from the past five minutes and calculates an average speed per minute. This mashup offers a quick and accurate way to measure Twitter activity and can be useful for social media analysts, marketers, and anyone interested in monitoring the pulse of Twitter conversations in real-time.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: Google Visualization API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Visualization JavaScript API lets you access structured data and visualize that data using JavaScript in your web pages. The Google Visualization API also enables the creation of gadgets.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

title: Mashup: QuizGeo
description: QuizGeo is an interactive mashup that utilizes Google Maps to create and play engaging geography quizzes. Users can design their own quizzes, incorporate geolocation features, and compete with others in real-time. The mashup combines the fun of trivia with the educational value of geography, making it a versatile tool for both entertainment and learning. It targets individuals interested in geography, trivia enthusiasts, and educators looking for innovative ways to teach geography. The mashup's functionality includes user-friendly quiz creation tools, real-time map integration, and a scoring system that enhances the gaming experience.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Wii Earth
description: An innovative application that integrates Nintendo Wii technology with 3D Virtual Earth mapping to provide an immersive, interactive map exploration experience. Designed as a WinForms application, it leverages the Nintendo Wii Remote for intuitive control of 3D Virtual Earth maps, taking the control interface out of the browser and into a more engaging, physical environment. This mashup showcases the potential of combining gaming technology with geographic information systems for enhanced user interaction and spatial understanding.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: SeaRates
description: A real-time tracking service for ocean container shipments, providing visual representation through interactive maps. This mashup assists freight forwarders and logistics companies in monitoring global shipping operations, enabling them to track international container shipments in real-time and plan logistics accordingly.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Schmap Customizable Widgets
description: A customizable widget mashup that integrates mapping services with points of interest data, including restaurants, hotels, attractions, and shops, for over 200 destinations worldwide. The mashup uses mapping APIs to display these POIs on interactive maps, allowing users to customize their widgets based on their travel preferences and destination selections. It supports real-time updates for dynamic content and provides a user-friendly interface for travelers looking to plan their trips.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.
