For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: Posty
description: A multi-platform social microblogging application that integrates with various social media platforms including Twitter, Jaiku, Pownce, Tumblr, FriendFeed, and Identica. Posty offers users the ability to browse and interact with notes from these platforms, reply to friends' posts, and view embedded media elements such as videos from YouTube and Vimeo, photos from Flickr, Zooomr, and Smugmug. This mashup streamlines the social networking experience by consolidating multiple social media interactions into one platform.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: Tumblr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Tumblr API allows users to read and write Tumblr blog and post data, retrieve posts by tags, get user information, follow blogs and like posts. Data is formatted in JSON and support for JSONP is included.

related_apis.title: FriendFeed API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The FriendFeed API enables developers to interact with the FriendFeed web site programmatically via simple HTTP requests. FriendFeed is a service that makes it easy to share with friends online. It offers a fun and interactive way to discover and discuss information among friends.
The API uses RESTful calls and supports methods such as downloading and reading feeds and more. It's designed to make it possible for anyone to improve FriendFeed or integrate FriendFeed into other applications. Users can develop FriendFeed interface for a mobile phone, build a FriendFeed widget for blogs, or develop an application that makes it easy to post photos to a feed from an iPhone. The API supports both XML and JSON output formats.

title: Mashup: schmedley
description: A comprehensive, multi-functional mashup that integrates various Internet search capabilities, including weather forecasts, movie listings, SMS messaging, RSS feeds, airfare searches, image searches, Meebo chat integration, Amazon product searches, and real-time stock data. It serves as a one-stop platform for users to access diverse online services through a single interface.

title: Mashup: Use That Gift Card
description: An application designed to assist users in finding products from BestBuy and Walmart that are within the value of the gift cards they possess. By leveraging the Walmart Open and Best Buy Products APIs, the mashup provides real-time product availability and pricing based on the gift card balance, enabling users to efficiently use their gift cards.

related_apis.title: Walmart Open API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Walmart Open APIs provide developers with access to Walmart.com's product catalogue information and enable affiliates to earn money through customer referrals. The Data Feed and Special Feeds APIs allow developers to get lists or feeds of products by category. The taxonomy used to categorize items can be exposed via the Taxonomy API. Developers can use the Search API to perform a text search for items on Walmart.com or use the Product Lookup API to get a specific item's price and availability. The Walmart Open APIs are currently in Beta.

related_apis.title: Best Buy Products API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Best Buy's Products API provides full product information for over 1M current and historical products, including pricing, availability, specifications, descriptions, and images.

title: Mashup: Twitter Voice
description: A mashup that integrates Twitter and voice messaging services, allowing users to connect their Twitter account to a unique telephone number. By calling this number, users can record a voice message, which is then automatically tweeted to their followers. The service currently operates exclusively within India, leveraging local telephony infrastructure and social media integration capabilities.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: KooKoo API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: KooKoo acts as an interface between your applications and telephony applications, allowing users to setup an extra delivery channel for their web applications. It can perform telephony applications like placing a call, receiving calls, send sms,gathering user input etc. It acts as another web page in an application which is accessible from the phone rather than the browser. With KooKoo users can build telecom applications, IVRs (Interactive Voice Response), office PBX and outbound campaigns. The API lets users take advantage of their existing web development skills to build telephony apps. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are formatted in XML.

title: Mashup: Facebook Widget Slideshow
description: A feature that enables users to create an image loop slideshow on Facebook by integrating a third-party widget. This mashup allows for enhanced visual presentation of images in a user's profile, providing an engaging experience for friends and followers.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

title: Mashup: Flymore
description: Flymore is an online travel booking service that integrates various travel platforms to provide customers with access to a wide range of travel-related offers and deals. The mashup enables users to book flights, hotel reservations, and car rentals from multiple providers simultaneously. It also features user-friendly interfaces for searching and comparing travel options, making it easy for users to find the best deals and plan their trips efficiently. The service is accessible worldwide and supports multiple payment methods.

related_apis.title: i2space API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: I2space technologies is a travel portal platform that provides the i2space API which allows users to facilitate Bus Booking. The site offers online reservation software for Bus ticket booking with payment gateway integration, also through API inventory can be shared to other online seller. The site also offers ticketing software for Indian, one of the biggest travel booking provider. The API returns XML, and an account is required with service.

title: Mashup: SoundYouNeed
description: SoundYouNeed is a comprehensive music discovery and sharing platform that aggregates and searches for your favorite music across multiple platforms including Soundcloud, YouTube, and Spotify. The mashup aims to enhance the music finding experience by providing a unified interface for users to explore, discover, and share their favorite songs and artists from various sources. It integrates search functionalities from these platforms to offer a seamless and efficient music discovery process.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: SoundCloud API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: SoundCloud is the leading audio platform that enables anyone to upload, record, promote and share their sounds across the web. The SoundCloud API makes most of the features from SoundCloud.com available to app developers. With the help of its SDKs it's easy to integrate functionality like audio sharing and recording directly into iOS, Android and web apps.

title: Mashup: UBI Voice Assistant
description: A comprehensive platform that enables voice interaction with Internet of Things (IoT) products, integrating the Alexa Voice Service (AVS) for seamless voice command execution. This platform also includes a robust voice interaction testing framework and quality of service monitoring tools to ensure optimal performance. Utilizing the Maluuba Natural Language API, UBI Voice Assistant incorporates advanced natural language processing and machine learning capabilities to enhance the user experience with intuitive voice recognition and automated learning from user interactions. Developed by UCIC (Unified Computer Intelligence Corporation), a leading IT firm based in Toronto, Canada, this platform is designed to cater to both individual and enterprise IoT needs, offering customization and integration options to meet specific user requirements.

related_apis.title: Maluuba Natural Language API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Maluuba is a phone assistant app that uses natural voice recognition technology to turn users commands into actions. It can work with features such as calendar, reminders, weather, search, voice calls, email and more. The Maluuba API works across two main functionalities; interpreting the meaning of phrases and finding normalized values for dates and times. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON.

title: Mashup: Celebrity CryoSites
description: A celebrity-focused mashup that aggregates images, videos, and news content from top sources such as Yahoo, YouTube, and Technorati. Users can browse and search for the latest updates, photos, and videos about their favorite celebrities, providing a comprehensive view of celebrity news and activities.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: AirSpeed
description: AirSpeed is a browser extension designed to streamline data transfer between Google applications (Gmail, Google Calendar, Google Contacts) and Salesforce CRM. It utilizes APIs from both platforms to facilitate the quick and efficient copying of Emails, Contacts, and Appointments, enhancing the integration capabilities for users who work across these two systems.

related_apis.title: Google Calendar API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Calendar Data API lets users perform most of the operations a normal Google Calendar user can on the Google Calendar website. Google Calendar allows client applications to view and update calendar events in the form of Google data API, GData, feeds. The Calendar Data API lets users incorporate Calendar functionality into their own application or website. Users can edit calendars, create and delete events, query for events that match particular criteria, send invitations, and more.
There are many possible uses for the Calendar data API. For example, users can create a web front end for a group calendar that uses Google Calendar as a back end. Or a public calendar can be generated for Google Calendar to display, based on a company event database. Or users can search relevant calendars to display a list of upcoming events on those calendars.

related_apis.title: Google Contacts API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Contacts Data API allows client applications to view and update Contacts content in the form of Google Data API feeds. Your client application can request a list of a user's contacts, edit or delete content in an existing contact, and query the content in an existing contact.

related_apis.title: Google Gmail OAuth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Google Gmail now supports the standard IMAP and SMTP protocols for accessing and sending e-mail messages. The Gmail IMAP and SMTP servers have been extended to support authorization via the industry-standard OAuth protocol. This allows third party applications to access a user's email account with their permission.

title: Mashup: Stickymap.com
description: An interactive, user-generated mapping platform that superimposes community-contributed points of interest onto a base map, enabling users to create, edit, and share geographically tagged annotations and content.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Local Search API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Yahoo! Local Search APIs give users access to a comprehensive database of information and content in Yahoo! Local ranging from business information to user comments to ratings. Data includes business address and phone, category, rating, distance, URL and traffic alerts. Yahoo! Local makes a great addition to any mashup, bringing in location-based relevancy and the additional context of what real people have experienced in these places.
Version 3 of Yahoo! Local Search adds even more features! Users can now request individual business records by using the Yahoo! Local listing id. Yahoo! supports search categories to help users narrow their queries. Finally, results now return the first few lines of the last user review for each listing. The API uses a RESTful protocol and responses are formatted in either XML, JSON and PHP.

title: Mashup: Daily Domain Hotlist
description: A domain name discovery and purchase facilitator that automates the process of identifying expiring domain names with high search value. By cross-referencing expiring domain names against a comprehensive keyword database, the mashup generates a daily list of potentially valuable domain names up for registration. This tool is designed for domain investors and web entrepreneurs who seek to acquire premium domain names before they become available to the general public.

related_apis.title: Google AdWords API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google AdWords API allows apps to interact directly with the Google Ads platform, vastly increasing the efficiency of managing large or complex Google Ads accounts and campaigns. Some typical use cases include:Automated account managementCustom reportingAd management based on inventoryBid management based on business dataWith the AdWords API you can build software that manages accounts from the customer level down to the keyword level. The API can do almost everything the Google Ads UI does, but programmatically.The types of companies that have benefited from the AdWords API include:Ad agenciesSearch Engine Marketing (SEM) companiesBig brands managing a large number of accounts, with needs beyond what's possible within the Google Ads UI.The API relies on SOAP and WSDL technologies to offer its services. You set up API access by obtaining a few required authentication credentials, creating some test accounts, and adding the authentication and account details to a configuration file for your client library. Authentication is via OAuth2.To help you get started, they offer client libraries in Java, .NET, Python, PHP, Perl, and Ruby.

related_apis.title: Shopping.com API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API has been acquired by eBay and now exists as eBay Commerce Network. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]With the Shopping.com API you can integrate relevant product content with the deepest product catalog available online. Add millions of unique products and merchant offers to your site. Shopping.com, an eBay company, is the world's online comparison shopping service leader. Its global websites (Shopping.com, DealTime, and DoorOne) carry one of the world's largest product catalogs and offers from more than 6000 merchants.
The Shopping.com XML API uses a RESTful interface and can be used to feature dynamic Shopping.com content on your web pages. It offers capabilities such as keyword search, refining and sorting search results, finding product reviews, reading product specs, comparing products and prices from different merchants and controlling the number of results and navigating between pages.

title: Mashup: iBeeKing
description: iBeeKing is an integrated beacon detection and management system designed to enable businesses to engage and target customers with personalized promotions and offers based on their physical proximity to specific beacons. The system utilizes both iBeacon technology and standard Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) devices to detect the presence of customers within a range of up to 150 feet. Real-time distance updates are provided to the user, allowing them to track their proximity to registered beacons. The system leverages The Beacon Registry API to facilitate the creation and maintenance of registration records for unique identifiers (UUIDs), major numbers, and minor numbers associated with BLE devices, ensuring accurate and up-to-date information for beacon location management and engagement strategies.

related_apis.title: The Beacon Registry API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Beacon Registry allows providers to create and maintain a registration record for the UUID/major/minor combination of any Bluetooth Low Energy device, including iBeacons. The API uses HTTP PUSH and accepts/returns data in XML or JSON. Use the API to program specific information that will be pushed to a user when in proximity of your Bluetooth Beacon.

title: Mashup: ASK KEN™ - Visual Knowledge Browser
description: ASK KEN is a graph-based visualization tool that leverages the Freebase knowledge graph to create an interactive, node-link diagram. Users can explore interconnected topics, browse through related concepts, and gain insights into the relationships between them. By utilizing the HTML5 canvas element, ASK KEN delivers a dynamic and responsive visual experience, enabling users to interact with the content in real-time.

title: Mashup: FlickrStorm
description: A more intelligent search engine for Flickr, FlickrStorm uses semantic search technology to find related concepts beyond literal search terms. It can identify terms like 'music' and find related terms such as 'concert', 'band', and 'iPod', providing a more comprehensive search experience.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: Link TV News
description: A news broadcasting service that focuses on delivering a comprehensive view of global events by integrating various international news sources and diverse cultural perspectives. This mashup provides in-depth coverage of international news, current events, and cultural insights, often not prominently featured in mainstream US media, through a combination of live broadcasts and pre-recorded programs.

related_apis.title: FreebieSMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The FreebieSMS API gives users access to the SMS gateway. FreebieSMS offers bulk SMS provision to businesses who need to send SMS messages automatically. The service is available in 22 countries. The API allows users to look up their remaining credits, send SMS and make a phone call. The API uses SOAP protocol and responses are formatted in XML.

title: Mashup: Quickoffice Connect and Box.net
description: A cloud-based document editing solution that leverages Quickoffice Connect's mobile editing capabilities with Box.net's secure cloud storage. The mashup allows users to seamlessly load, edit, and save documents directly from their Box accounts to Quickoffice Connect, ensuring real-time collaboration and data synchronization. It combines mobile editing with enterprise-grade cloud storage, providing a robust platform for document creation and sharing.

related_apis.title: Box API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Box is a modern content management platform that transforms how organizations work and collaborate to achieve results faster.Box Platform provides content APIs to build secure content experiences in custom apps. With Box Platform, organizations can bring content management and collaboration services to their own custom apps or build custom integrations with Box.

title: Mashup: Random Poem Generator
description: A mashup that generates poems or haikus based on content scraped from any provided website. Users can input a URL and select a rhyme scheme, after which the system extracts text from the webpage, processes it to fit the chosen rhyme scheme, and then reads the generated poem aloud to the user. This tool combines web scraping technology with natural language processing to create humorous and creative content.

related_apis.title: Google Cloud Translation API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: This version is currently in beta. The Google Cloud Translation API is a part of Google's larger Cloud Machine Learning API family. This API translates text between thousands of language pairs, with new features for this latest version that includes; Glossaries and Batch requests. It enables you with the ability to create a custom dictionary to correctly and consistently translate terms that are customer-specific and to make an asynchronous request to translate large amounts of text. The Cloud Translation API lets developers programmatically integrate the service with third party sites and applications.

versions.version_title: Google Cloud Translation REST API v3.0

related_apis.title: Google Fonts API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Fonts API in REST architecture returns JSON data to add web fonts to any web page. Available open source fonts, browser compatibility, and shared stylesheet link to HTML documents in a CSS style. Requires JavaScript knowledge.

related_apis.title: RhymeBrain API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: RhymeBrain displays the best rhyming and most commonly used words for a search query. The API allows users to include RhymeBrain.com rhyming results on their web site. It uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON.

title: Mashup: SvD weather
description: A comprehensive weather forecasting mashup that aggregates and provides real-time weather data for the entire world. The service is tailored for Swedish users, providing localized weather information and forecasts in Swedish. It combines global weather data with geolocation services to deliver accurate, location-specific weather updates, making it an indispensable tool for Swedish travelers and residents alike.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: GeoNames API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Geonames is a geographical database with web services that let users extract useful information about different places, such as weather, timezone and post codes. The GeoNames geographical database covers all countries and contains over eight million placenames that are available for download free of charge. Users can edit, correct and add new names using a wiki interface.Geonames provides a suite of Webservices including the following categories:Fulltext searchPlace HierarchyWikipediaPostal CodesReverse GeocodingThe APIs use RESTful protocol and responses vary in format between XML, JSON, CSV, and TXTWhile the GeoNames data is free, the data is available without costs, there is a Service Level Agreement available for premium web services.

related_apis.title: Norway Weather API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: met.no is the joint online weather service from the Norwegian Meteorological Institute (met.no) and the Norwegian Broadcasting Corporation (NRK). met.no offers weather forecasts in English for more than 700,000 places in Norway and 6.3 one million places worldwide.

title: Mashup: Shared Count
description: A social media analytics utility that retrieves and aggregates social media engagement metrics for a specified URL, providing insights into the number of shares, likes, and other forms of engagement across various social media platforms.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: LinkedIn API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
LinkedIn is the world's largest business social networking hub. Launched in 2003, LinkedIn has millions of users and is implemented in over 200 countries. One purpose of the site is to allow registered users to maintain a list of contact details of people with whom they have some level of relationship, called Connections. Users can invite anyone (whether a site user or not) to become a connection.
The LinkedIn API is a RESTful platform that provides a simple, consistent representation of people, companies, jobs, and the interactions and relationships between them. Our query language lets you read data in XML and JSON at the granularity and aggregation that you choose. Use OAuth 1.0a to authorize users and begin making REST API calls using any programming language.The API’s access is restricted to authorized developers.

related_apis.title: Pinterest Domain API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Pinterest calls itself a "virtual pinboard," allowing users to select photos from web pages to share with their friends. This process, called pinning, helps users collect ideas, recipes, inspiration or anything that can be found in a photo on a web page.
The Pinterest API provides developers access to an authenticated user's pinboards and pins. The API provides detailed user data, as well as the home feed for a user, pins, likes, following, followers and the ability to unfollow. Developers can also access information about specific boards and pins, including creating boards, adding pins, categories and adding/removing likes.
The API allows businesses to integrate with Pinterest's social media platform in an effort engage with customers. With the APIs, developers can access a site's top repins, most recent pins, related pins, most clicked through pins and pins resulting from specific search terms.
The API makes its data available via JSON only, with requests also wrapped as JSON. Though the official documentation has been removed, we've included a cache of the page, as the API still appears to be supported.

title: Mashup: yolink-Outside.in Mashup
description: This mashup integrates yolink's search capabilities with Outside.in's local news feeds to provide expanded and highlighted search results. Users can see relevant keywords emphasized directly in the results, enabling them to save or share the content using yolink-enabled tools.

related_apis.title: Yolink API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Yolink quickly scans search results, e-books, online documents, and web sites using key words, quotes, and word relationships to find what users are looking for. The API provides access to the cloud version of yolink to add real-time search capabilities to any application, and a set of configurable widgets which can be dropped into a page to provide dynamic search over top of existing content. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in XML, JSON and JSONP.

title: Mashup: Combyo
description: A comprehensive real-time shopping deal aggregator that combines data from leading coupon and deal sites such as Fatwallet, Slickdeals, and Shopzilla. Combyo.com not only presents aggregated shopping deals and coupons but also provides a price comparison feature that allows users to see real-time pricing side by side. Users have the added benefit of setting price alerts to stay informed about the best deals on their desired items.

related_apis.title: Shopzilla API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Shopzilla, Inc. Catalog API provides access to the Shopzilla, Inc. inventory of catalogued products, merchant offers, and merchant ratings & reviews content through a query-based RESTful web service, responses formatted in XML or JSON|P.
Managed through the Shopzilla Publisher Program, a CPC affiliate marketing program, publishers are able to monetize using this API. Users of this API are able to choose between two versions, each providing logic native to its corresponding Shopzilla, Inc. property: Bizrate.com or Beso.com.
Bizrate API: Provides access to the entire Shopzilla, Inc. offer universe, exposing content from 8,000+ merchants. You would use this version to create a full comparison shopping site.
Beso API: Provides the opportunity to create a style-based experience with a curated set of offers focused in soft goods categories. You would use this version to create a fashion-oriented shopping site.
Both APIs provide access to the merchant ratings and reviews collected through the Bizrate Insights platform.
International? APIs also available for the United Kingdom, Germany, and France.

title: Mashup: WhtvrMe
description: WhtvrMe is a cross-platform mobile application designed for iOS and Android devices that facilitates event planning and recommendation for couples. The app begins by allowing one user to initiate a plan with another via a direct message. The recipient receives an SMS notification with a link to download the app. Once both parties have installed the app, they can engage in real-time communication to coordinate and plan an activity together. WhtvrMe leverages geolocation services to provide tailored suggestions for activities based on the users' current location, ensuring that the recommendations are timely and relevant to their immediate surroundings. The app integrates personalized recommendation algorithms to enhance the user experience, making it an ideal tool for those looking to plan and enjoy activities together.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: iPrimr
description: iPrimr is a tool designed for Amazon Prime members that simplifies the process of finding items eligible for free shipping. Given the vast array of items on Amazon that are sold by third-party sellers, this mashup filters out all non-Prime-eligible items, making it easier for users to identify and purchase products that will not incur shipping charges. By integrating with Amazon's API, iPrimr enables users to quickly browse through a refined list of eligible items, streamlining their shopping experience.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

title: Mashup: Motorcycle Parking in San Francisco
description: A location-based motorcycle parking search and navigation tool for San Francisco, leveraging Google Maps API to display the optimal motorcycle parking spots and their availability. The mashup provides enhanced parking search functionality by integrating real-time parking data and user preferences, enabling riders to find suitable parking options efficiently.

title: Mashup: Track Flight Status
description: A real-time flight tracking mashup that overlays the current status of US flights on a Google Map. Users can manually input flight details or use the 'Track Random Flight' feature to explore live flight data dynamically. The mashup provides a visual representation of flight paths and statuses, making it a useful tool for passengers, travel agents, and aviation enthusiasts to monitor and analyze flight activity across the United States.

title: Mashup: Molotron
description: A visual mashup that aggregates and displays a collection of compelling Flickr photos, enabling users to explore a diverse range of photo content in a visually engaging manner. The mashup leverages the Flickr API to source and display a variety of images, allowing users to discover and appreciate a broad spectrum of photographic creativity.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: Social Contact
description: A contact management solution that facilitates the creation and import of virtual business cards (vCards) for individuals met in social or professional settings. The system operates through a phone number (203-403-6263), where users can text a Twitter handle to generate a vCard. This vCard pulls data from various social platforms and other sources, including full name, company and title, email (where available), phone number (where available), home page URL, home location (generally city-level), description, summary, Klout score, photo, Facebook profile link, and other social profile pages. The mashup aims to streamline the process of networking and contact management by integrating multiple data sources into a single, actionable format.

title: Mashup: EDU Libs
description: An educational resource mashup that aggregates and provides access to a wide range of university papers, ebooks, and other educational documents. This platform allows users to search and browse through a comprehensive collection of scholarly and academic materials, supporting both online and offline learning experiences.

related_apis.title: Yahoo GeoPlanet API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Manage all geo-permanent named places on Earth. The API provides the vocabulary and grammar to describe the world's geography in an unequivocal, permanent, and language-neutral manner.

related_apis.title: UC Berkeley Registration Status Check API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The University of California - Berkeley has opened up some of its institutional data. The University of California - Berkeley API allows developers to access and integrate the data of Berkeley with other applications and to create new applications. Some example API methods include retrieving department information and searching departments.

versions.version_title: UC Berkeley Registration Status Check REST API

related_apis.title: University of British Columbia Labs API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The University of British Columbia (UBC) science department provides the Labs API, which allows users to retrieve information about the UBC's laboratories. The information available through this service includes each lab's ID, title, category, building, address, room, description, capacity, and appointment length. The Labs API is accessible via SOAP calls issued in XML format.

versions.version_title: University of British Columbia Labs RPC API

title: Mashup: MURALI BASA BLOG
description: A professional blog mashup dedicated to showcasing the lighting design works of Murali Basha. This platform integrates various data sources and multimedia elements to provide an immersive experience of the author's creative process, design inspirations, and finished projects. The mashup features a combination of visual content, such as images and videos, with detailed descriptions and technical insights, allowing users to explore the artistic and technical aspects of the lighting designs. It aims to serve as an educational and inspirational resource for lighting designers, architects, interior designers, and anyone interested in lighting aesthetics and functional design.

related_apis.title: Blogger API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Blogger Data API allows client applications to view and update Blogger content in the form of Google Data API feeds. Your client application can use the Data API to create new blog posts, edit or delete existing posts, and query for posts that match particular criteria.

related_apis.title: Are You Watching This API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Get free alerts when televised games get good. Doing Laundry. Raking the leaves. Went to sleep early. Are any of these worthwhile reasons for missing the next instant classic? No, we did not think so either. Sign up for our free alerts and RUWTbot will hit you up by email or text message with the score, time left, and channel you need to turn to to catch the game.

versions.version_title: Are You Watching This REST API

related_apis.title: ArtistData API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
ArtistData provides secure XML feeds to partners interested in getting information from the artists who use the ArtistData dashboard. The current information available through secure XML feeds is shows, news and blogs.
ArtistData is building solutions to automate the updating of artist websites, social network profiles, concert databases, Twitter, official news feeds, iCal, local press, fan newsletters, and even tour books. When an artist updates our site, we update all their sites.

related_apis.title: 7digital API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Open platform providing access to extensive music catalogue of tens of millions of tracks fully licensed by all major labels and indies. 7digital API enables partners to create standalone consumer offerings or compliment an existing business with music downloads, radio or on-demand streaming or even experiment with brand new type of music services. The API returns information about catalogues, artists, charts, releases, playlists, user management, subscriptions, purchasing, payments, and more.

related_apis.title: Bing Traffic API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Bing Traffic API provides information about traffic incidents and issues, such as construction sites and traffic congestion. Traffic incident information is currently available for the United States and Canada. Users can also get information about traffic issues that met the criteria specified in the URL request, such as map area, incident type and severity. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in XML and JSON.

title: Mashup: xLancer
description: An app that aggregates and filters freelance job listings from Elance to showcase the most relevant opportunities for users based on their skills. Users can also utilize the app to find and connect with offshore teams or individual freelancers for outsourcing their work. The app integrates with Elance's job listing API and user profile system to provide personalized job search and outsourcing capabilities.

related_apis.title: Elance API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Elance Developer API exposes the Elance system through a Web-based interface that can be called from any application platform. Elance provides an online platform for freelancers and employers to connect. Using the Elance API, users can obtain profile data for providers, search our database of available jobs, and obtain listings of groups and their members. All that is required is an account and an API key. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON.

title: Mashup: IFC
description: The Independent Film Channel (IFC) is a television platform dedicated to showcasing independent films without commercial interruptions, providing viewers with uninterrupted access to unedited films around the clock. IFC has enhanced its social platform by integrating Userplane APIs, which facilitate community engagement, messaging, and social interaction among viewers and filmmakers.

title: Mashup: Effected
description: Effected is an innovative mashup that combines the power of image manipulation tools from Aviary with the social networking capabilities of Facebook. Users can upload their images, crop them, re-size them, and apply a diverse range of filters directly within the platform. These edited images can then be seamlessly integrated into Facebook photo albums, allowing users to share their enhanced visual content with their social network in a simple and efficient manner.

related_apis.title: Aviary Effects API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Separate from its flagship Aviary API, an embedded photo editor, this API provides filters and effects. Developers can automatically fix red-eye and color adjust photos. Create watermarks so that all your uploaded photos are automatically copy-protected. In all there are currently over 20 filters, effects and other operations.

title: Mashup: National VIP
description: National VIP is a comprehensive social aggregation platform that aggregates and presents nightlife information from various cities including Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, San Francisco, and Seattle. The mashup utilizes social APIs such as FourSquare and Twitter to provide users with real-time updates on night clubs, events, and social activities in these cities. It serves as a one-stop hub for socializing, exploring, and discovering the best nightlife experiences in major urban centers across the United States.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD

related_apis.title: Foursquare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Foursquare Places API provides location based experiences with diverse information about venues, users, photos, and check-ins. The API supports real time access to places, Snap-to-Place that assigns users to specific locations, and Geo-tag. Additionally, Foursquare allows developers to build audience segments for analysis and measurement. JSON is the preferred response format.

related_apis.title: Heroku API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Heroku API is used for manually manipulating Heroku apps. Heroku is a cloud application platform for Ruby giving developers a new way of building and deploying web apps. The service lets app developers spend 100% of their time on their application code, not managing servers, deployment, ongoing operations, or scaling.
The RESTful API lets users manage and deploy Rails apps to the Heroku platform. Responses are formatted in XML.

title: Mashup: StreetEasy NYC Real Estate
description: A comprehensive real estate search site for New York City, integrating data from various sources to provide a detailed view of the local real estate market. The mashup includes information on public schools, detailed market data with statistics and trends, and extensive details about neighborhoods and building specifics. Users can access a collection of photos showcasing buildings and neighborhoods, providing a visual representation of the real estate landscape in NYC.

title: Mashup: Earthquakes this Week
description: A real-time, interactive map displaying earthquake activity globally over the past seven days. The mashup integrates data from international seismological organizations to provide a comprehensive view of recent seismic events, pinpointing their locations and magnitude on an interactive Google Map interface.

title: Mashup: Digg Stalker
description: A social media analysis tool that leverages data from Digg to identify users with similar interests and monitor the influence of one's network on the platform. Users can track the performance of their shared content, analyze the engagement of their network, and discover new communities within Digg based on shared interests and content.

title: Mashup: Embed Facebook
description: A WordPress plugin that enables seamless integration of Facebook content into blog posts and pages. Users can embed a wide variety of Facebook objects, including albums, events, notes, videos, groups, pages, and individual images, directly from the URL. This mashup simplifies the process of sharing diverse Facebook content with WordPress users, enhancing social engagement and content diversity on blogs.

title: Mashup: Find the Bacon
description: A playful and interactive application that leverages Freebase's extensive movie statistics database to engage users in a trivia game. Users can test their knowledge of movie facts, challenge friends to friendly competitions, or simply explore fascinating connections between films and actors. The mashup offers a lighthearted way to engage with movie data, making it accessible and entertaining for individuals interested in cinema.

title: Mashup: ChumpDump ChumpDar
description: ChumpDump is a social media game designed to improve the quality of your Twitter feed by rewarding players for eliminating unwanted interactions. The data from this game is presented on ChumpDar, where users can see who was 'dumped' on Twitter and the reasons behind those actions. This mashup provides an engaging way to manage social interactions through a gamified approach, currently available on both Android and iPhone platforms.

The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: Unthirsty.com
description: A location-based happy hour finder that leverages Google Maps and social media feeds to provide real-time information on drink specials, food specials, availability of Wi-Fi, and patios. Users can sort happy hours by various criteria and discover current events happening in their area, enhancing their experience of dining out and enjoying nightlife.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: IP geolocation search
description: An IP geolocation search mashup that provides users with the ability to swiftly identify the physical location of an IP address or domain name. The mashup integrates geolocation data from MaxMind and whois information from multiple databases, presenting the results on a Google Map. This mashup is useful for network administrators, security professionals, and anyone needing to verify the physical origin of an IP address or domain name. The mashup enhances the user's understanding by providing comprehensive geographical and registration details, facilitating the identification of potential security threats and network management tasks.

related_apis.title: hostip.info API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Hostip.info is a community-based project to geolocate IP addresses, making the database freely available but it needs you to put in your city to make it work. Available as a Firefox plug-in, or embeddable in your website.

title: Mashup: VidScan
description: A video customization mashup that allows users to scan and create personalized timelines of their favorite YouTube videos. The service integrates with YouTube's API to access and analyze video content, enabling users to create customized visualizations and share them with others. It focuses on user-generated content and provides a platform for creative expression and storytelling using video materials.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

title: Mashup: Madoff Victim Map
description: An interactive geographical mapping interface designed to visualize the locations of reported victims of the Madoff pyramid scheme. This mashup integrates various data sources including financial databases and public records to create a comprehensive map that highlights the geographical distribution of affected individuals. It serves as a tool for understanding the widespread impact of financial crimes and can be used by researchers, journalists, and regulatory bodies to gain insights into the scope of such financial frauds.

title: Mashup: Aumio
description: Aumio is a communication tool that schedules and sends personalized alerts and notifications to friends and colleagues through multiple channels, including email, text messages, and phone calls. It leverages various communication APIs to provide a unified platform for users to manage and distribute their messages efficiently across different platforms.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: TO mapster
description: A transportation-focused mashup providing transit directions for the Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) subway lines and GO Transit system. The app integrates with real-time transit data to provide accurate journey planning and directions, making it a useful tool for both residents and visitors of Toronto.

The mashup supports both online and offline vehicle searches, catering to a wide range of users who are looking to purchase or sell vehicles.

title: Mashup: SuperVegan
description: A location-based mashup that provides a comprehensive directory of vegan restaurants in New York City. Users can easily navigate through the map, filter by vegan-friendliness levels, and get detailed information about each restaurant, including menus and reviews.

title: Mashup: MyMetar.com
description: A personalized aviation weather service that combines METAR (Meteorological Aerodrome Report) and TAF (Terminal Aerodrome Forecast) data with interactive radar images. Users can configure the service to display their preferred METARs, TAFs, and radar images for airports of interest, providing a comprehensive view of current and forecasted weather conditions relevant to aviation.

title: Mashup: Notifire
description: A simple integration solution for incorporating live chat support into any website, utilizing public chat protocols through the Tropo API and connecting to a Campfire chat room. This mashup provides a straightforward method for businesses to enhance customer support and communication by facilitating real-time interaction with website visitors.

related_apis.title: Tropo Scripting API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Tropo makes it simple to build phone, SMS and Instant messaging applications. You use the web technologies you already know and Tropo's powerful cloud API to bring real-time communications to your apps.
If you can create a web site, you can make and receive phone calls, use voice recognition, interact over SMS, IM, or Twitter. You can even create conference calls and transcribe calls. There's no need to learn new languages, wrestle with VoIP software, or learn about telephony. Host your code with us, or use your existing web server in the language of your choice.
Coverage:
usa, canada, australia, austria, belgium, brazil, bulgaria, croatia, Cyprus, CzechRepublic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, HongKong, Hungary, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Mexico, Netherlands, NewZealand, Norway, Panama, Peru, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, and the uk.

related_apis.title: Campfire API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From 37Signals. Campfire is a realtime chat collaboration tool. Share files and links, create rooms for specific discussions.

title: Mashup: CityClash
description: CityClash is a social mashup that provides users with the ability to rate and rank cities based on various factors, including social experiences, travel amenities, real estate values, and geographical attributes. Utilizing user-generated content and social data, the mashup aggregates and visualizes city rankings in a map-based interface, allowing users to explore and compare cities based on their preferences and priorities.

related_apis.title: Google Cloud Translation API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: This version is currently in beta. The Google Cloud Translation API is a part of Google's larger Cloud Machine Learning API family. This API translates text between thousands of language pairs, with new features for this latest version that includes; Glossaries and Batch requests. It enables you with the ability to create a custom dictionary to correctly and consistently translate terms that are customer-specific and to make an asynchronous request to translate large amounts of text. The Cloud Translation API lets developers programmatically integrate the service with third party sites and applications.

versions.version_title: Google Cloud Translation REST API v3.0

title: Mashup: Mood Music
description: A localized musical experience that leverages user geolocation to fetch weather data from Yahoo! Weather API and dynamically selects and plays music that corresponds to the current weather conditions in the user's area.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

related_apis.title: GeoNames API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Geonames is a geographical database with web services that let users extract useful information about different places, such as weather, timezone and post codes. The GeoNames geographical database covers all countries and contains over eight million placenames that are available for download free of charge. Users can edit, correct and add new names using a wiki interface.Geonames provides a suite of Webservices including the following categories:Fulltext searchPlace HierarchyWikipediaPostal CodesReverse GeocodingThe APIs use RESTful protocol and responses vary in format between XML, JSON, CSV, and TXTWhile the GeoNames data is free, the data is available without costs, there is a Service Level Agreement available for premium web services.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Weather API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Yahoo Weather API allows developers to integrate weather information for any location into third-party applications. Available information includes the 5-day forecast, wind, atmospheric conditions, precipitation, sunset time, astronomy conditions, and more. Developers can look up weather by WOEID (Where On Earth IDentifier), city name, or lat/long coordinates.

title: Mashup: epiCurious Dish of the day
description: A recipe gadget with a global focus, offering a wide range of international cuisines, with a particular emphasis on dishes from India, including both North and South Indian cuisine. This mashup simplifies the process of finding and preparing diverse recipes, making it easier for users to explore and cook culinary delights from around the world.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

title: Mashup: TaggedBack
description: TaggedBack is a free, location-based service designed to help users catalog and track their belongings. By registering and tagging their items, users can easily keep track of their possessions. If an item is lost, the finder can scan the tag, which redirects them to the TaggedBack website. Upon entering the tag number, the finder can notify the owner immediately via email and SMS, provided the owner has verified their phone number. The service ensures the owner's privacy, as their email address is not shared unless they choose to reply to the finder.

related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: FoodieToGo
description: FoodieToGo is a mobile app that leverages the extensive database of restaurants in the US, powered by Ordr.in, to facilitate quick and easy food ordering for delivery. Users can search and order food from thousands of restaurants, utilizing features such as assisted search with Yelp! ratings and reviews, easy menu selection, and secure online payment. The app is designed to continuously expand its restaurant network, offering users a wide variety of dining options.

related_apis.title: Yelp Fusion API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Yelp Fusion APIs are RESTful APIs and users can retrieve business review and rating, information for a particular geographic region or location.display review information for a particular business, determine accurate neighborhood name information for a particular location, track recent reviews for a particular business, display pictures of highly rated local businesses and of the top reviewers for that business, determine a particular business' review and rating information based on the phone number for that business. The default output is JSON. This output format was chosen due to the availability of JSON parsers in many languages. The following Yelp Fusion APIs are available: Search, Phone Number Search, Business Search, Transaction, Reviews, and Autcomplete - each API has a separate ProgrammableWeb entry.

title: Mashup: Ojor.com
description: Improved description with technical details and clarity

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Travel API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: Yahoo! Travel is also launching API access to trip planner data through a REST-like interface. With the Yahoo! Travel Trip Plan APIs you can search for trip plans by Yahoo! ID or by search query, or retrieve a specific trip plan by ID.
The Yahoo! Travel Trip Plan APIs have been designed to operate just like the Yahoo! Search APIs, so if you've already written code for Yahoo! Search you can start using Travel almost immediately with only minor modifications. And just like Yahoo! Search, the Yahoo! Travel APIs support both XML and JSON output.

title: Mashup: DocuSign and Box.net
description: An integrated solution that combines DocuSign's online electronic signature service with Box.net's cloud storage platform. This mashup enables users to initiate electronic signature workflows directly from within the Box.net environment, streamlining the process of sending files for e-signature. The integration ensures seamless document management by allowing users to send files for signing without leaving the Box.net interface. This mashup is particularly useful for business users who need to securely share and sign documents electronically while maintaining their existing document storage workflows.

related_apis.title: Box API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Box is a modern content management platform that transforms how organizations work and collaborate to achieve results faster.Box Platform provides content APIs to build secure content experiences in custom apps. With Box Platform, organizations can bring content management and collaboration services to their own custom apps or build custom integrations with Box.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: FlexiJourney Travel
description: A comprehensive travel information platform that combines interactive mapping, extensive photo galleries, high-quality travel videos, and a customizable search engine. Users can create personalized virtual journeys, exploring destinations around the world through detailed maps, stunning visuals, and curated content. The mashup empowers travelers to plan and experience their trips virtually, leveraging geospatial data, multimedia content, and tailored search capabilities.

related_apis.title: Panoramio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
(Deprecated in November, 2016) Using Panoramio API users can display the photos from Panoramio on their own web site. Geolocated photos from Panoramio can enrich maps or illustrate information where location is a important factor (real estate sites, hotels and vacation sites, routes & trails).
Panoramio is a website that enables digital photographers to geolocate, store and organize their photographsï¿½and to view those photographs in Google Earth and Google Maps. Panoramio is a community-powered site for exploring places through photography: cities, natural wonders, or anywhere you might go. Panoramio is different from other photo sharing sites because the photos illustrate places. As you browse Panoramio, notice that there aren't many photos of friends and family posing in front of places, or photos of interesting surfaces--Panoramio's all about seeing the world.
The Panoramio API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in JSON.

related_apis.title: Google Custom Search API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Custom Search Engine API is a RESTful API that allows developer to get web or image search results data in JSON or Atom format. With the API, developers can add web search and/or site search capabilities to their website, blog or collection of websites.

versions.version_title: Google Custom Search REST API v1

title: Mashup: Buy Sell Classified Mobile App
description: A comprehensive mobile application designed to facilitate the buying and selling of products through classified ads. The app features an advanced filter system for listings, allowing users to narrow down their search based on various criteria. It includes a user review and rating system, enabling buyers to assess sellers' reliability and past experiences. The app supports multi-lingual compatibility, making it accessible to a global audience. Users can create accounts, which can be verified for increased trust and security. The app uses an infinite page scroll and pagination feature for seamless browsing. It also enables user location tracking, allowing users to find nearby sellers or buyers. The app offers automated emailing capabilities for notifications and updates. On the seller side, additional features are included, such as one year of free cloud hosting upon launch, providing sellers with a scalable and cost-effective platform to grow their business.

title: Mashup: alasuka.com
description: A unified search platform that consolidates search results from multiple sources such as Yahoo, Flickr, YouTube, and Amazon, providing a comprehensive search experience for the Japanese market.

related_apis.title: Amazon EC2 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) API is a web service that enables you to launch and manage Linux/UNIX and Windows server instances in Amazon's data centers. Giving users the ability to "compute" in the cloud, it provides users with complete control of their computing resources and lets them run on Amazon's computing environment. Amazon EC2 changes the economics of computing by allowing users to pay only for capacity that is actually used.
This is a REST-based API. The SOAP interface was deprecated on 1 December 2015.
The WSDL for each supported API version is available from the following URI:
http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc//AmazonEC2.wsdl

title: Mashup: SakMap
description: SakMap is a comprehensive mapping platform that combines multiple data sources and functionalities to provide users with a rich, context-aware experience. Utilizing the ArcGIS geocoding service, SakMap can identify and provide detailed information for any location in the United States. This includes real-time weather updates, extensive photo galleries, video content, satellite imagery, local news articles, and access to Wikipedia entries. The mashup also features an advanced local services search engine, enabling users to discover nearby amenities and businesses with ease. SakMap offers a unique blend of mapping, search, multimedia content, and reference information, making it an indispensable tool for travelers, researchers, and anyone interested in exploring the world around them.
