related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: ArcWeb API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: ArcWeb Services is a no-cost Web services mapping API that is available to Web developers wishing to access ArcWeb Services. Commercial Services functionality for personal, noncommercial, and nongovernmental development projects. Public Services is offered through a one-year subscription that provides almost all of the same API functionality of Commercial Services however, it only makes available a subset of the mapping data. Public Services provides personal interest Web developers with SOAP, REST, OpenLS, and mobile mapping APIs for integrating mapping and GIS functionality into Web-based applications.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Internet Location Platform API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: a resource for managing all geo-permanent named places on Earth. Our purpose in creating the Internet Location Platform is to provide the Yahoo! Geographic Developer Community with the vocabulary and grammar to describe the world's geography in an unequivocal, permanent, and language-neutral manner. The Internet Location Platform is designed to facilitate spatial interoperability and geographic discovery; users can traverse the spatial hierarchy, identify the geography relevant to their users and their business, and in turn, unambiguously geotag, geotarget, and geolocate data across the Web.

versions.version_title: Yahoo Internet Location Platform REST API

title: Mashup: Suburb View
description: A location-based real estate search engine tailored for the Australian market. This mashup leverages Google Earth and Google Maps to visualize search results, providing users with detailed property listings and interactive maps for enhanced exploration and navigation.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Rendezvous Video Map
description: A captivating mashup that combines high-speed video footage of driving through Paris with real-time mapping of the course. Filmed in 1978 by Claude Lelouch, this unique video experiences feature a gyro-stabilized camera mounted on a Ferrari 275 GTB driven by a professional Formula 1 racer at incredibly fast speeds. The mashup provides a thrilling window into the action while simultaneously offering a dynamic, real-time visualization of the course on a map.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: MyShopSEO
description: An Etsy-specific SEO optimization tool that combines shop data analysis with competitor benchmarking to provide actionable insights for improving search engine visibility and competitiveness. The mashup performs comprehensive keyword research and suggests specific modifications to shop listings, titles, and descriptions to enhance SEO performance and attract more targeted traffic.

related_apis.title: Etsy API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Etsy is an online marketplace for buying and selling handmade things. The Etsy API lets you develop applications built on this fast growing e-commerce platform.

title: Mashup: eYouIn Notifications
description: A mobile application that integrates social and messaging platforms to send out real-time notifications to registered eYouIn users about event invitations, reminders, and cancellations. This platform enhances user engagement by ensuring users stay updated about upcoming events through notifications pushed directly to their mobile devices, leveraging social integration for dynamic and personalized updates.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: Flitter
description: A multi-faceted mashup that integrates data from Amazon for detailed album and book information, Audioscrobbler for discovering related artists, Flickr for browsing tagged photos, del.icio.us for exploring tagged links, Blogdigger for accessing media files from weblogs, and Feedster for finding related weblog posts. This mashup serves as a comprehensive resource for music enthusiasts, photographers, and bloggers, providing a rich and diverse set of data points for exploration and discovery.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

related_apis.title: del.icio.us API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: del.icio.us is a social bookmarking website -- the primary use of del.icio.us is to store your bookmarks online, which allows you to access the same bookmarks from any computer and add bookmarks from anywhere, too. On del.icio.us, you can use tags to organize and remember your bookmarks, which is a much more flexible system than folders.
The API provides read/write access to Delicious bookmarks and tags via an HTTP-based interface. The RESTful API returns responses in XML.

title: Mashup: Sindicacion en mapas
description: A project developed by a university that aims to provide comprehensive information about places worldwide by integrating data from Wikipedia, Wikimedia Commons, YouTube, Google, news services, and classified ads. The mashup offers a map-based platform that aggregates multimedia content, making it a rich source of educational and informational material for users interested in exploring global locations through a variety of media formats.

title: Mashup: Zabra
description: Zabra is a safety-focused messaging mashup that leverages the AT&T In-App Messaging API to provide parents with real-time monitoring and guidance on their children's activities and communications across various social media platforms and SMS. The service offers proactive support and educational resources to help parents navigate and discuss difficult issues with their children in a safe and secure manner.

related_apis.title: AT&T In-App Messaging API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The service provides ability to incorporate SMS and MMS text and media messaging functions to handle messaging traffic to AT&T subscribers and those of other U.S. providers. It exposes subscriber mobile phone numbers and allows specification of message body and sender. Applications can dispatch messages for delivery to individuals or lists of up to 10 recipients.
API methods support submission of recipient mobile number and message text up to 160 characters with ISO-8859-1 formatting. Methods also support sending MMS media messages either larger than the SMS limit or including media attachments in a variety of formats. The API can also handle replies, either to the specific sender or to all recipients.

title: Mashup: Real Estate Daily Widget
description: A Google Gadget that provides daily, informative content about the real estate industry. Users can access a variety of real estate-related information, including facts, terminology, notable people, key websites, historical data, and significant events, all tailored to a specific day of the year. This gadget serves as an educational and reference tool for industry professionals, real estate enthusiasts, and anyone interested in learning more about the housing market and related topics.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

title: Mashup: ClisMap
description: A comprehensive platform designed to assist in the discovery and mapping of clinical trials. The mashup leverages a variety of data sources and geocoding technologies to provide users with detailed information on clinical trials, including their locations where available. While the system may encounter limitations due to incomplete or ungeocodable location data, ClisMap aims to offer a valuable resource for researchers and participants seeking information on clinical trials worldwide.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

title: Mashup: SeriesOfTubes
description: A video aggregation service that combines YouTube, Google Video, and other video sharing platforms into a unified, customizable TV channel. Users can create personal channels, browse pre-defined channels, or explore the most popular content from aggregated sources. The mashup includes advanced video search capabilities for precise content discovery across multiple platforms.

title: Mashup: listatlas
description: A comprehensive directory of Twitter lists, listatlas provides users with a platform to explore, search, and discover popular, fast-growing, and newly created Twitter lists. The mashup offers an advanced search feature allowing users to find Twitter lists by keyword, making it an essential tool for social media enthusiasts and analysts looking to stay informed about trending topics and community engagement on Twitter.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: Phanoto
description: Phanoto is an event-driven social networking platform tailored specifically for sports enthusiasts. Through integration with the FanFeedr API, Phanoto provides real-time sports news, live scores, and updates for its members, fostering a community around the shared experience of following and discussing sports events.

title: Mashup: PlaceWidget
description: Integrates a Foursquare-powered widget into websites, enabling users to interact with Foursquare's location-based social network. The widget facilitates the sharing of user-generated content, including check-ins, tips, and photos, directly from the website onto the Foursquare platform. It includes real-time updates and personalized recommendations based on user interactions.

related_apis.title: Foursquare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Foursquare Places API provides location based experiences with diverse information about venues, users, photos, and check-ins. The API supports real time access to places, Snap-to-Place that assigns users to specific locations, and Geo-tag. Additionally, Foursquare allows developers to build audience segments for analysis and measurement. JSON is the preferred response format.

title: Mashup: SaveMyInbox
description: SaveMyInbox is an automated tool that seamlessly integrates Gmail with Dropbox to automatically save and organize email attachments. This mashup provides users with a convenient way to archive their Gmail attachments, making them easily accessible both online and offline. It supports real-time attachment saving, allowing for efficient organization and access to important documents without manual intervention.

related_apis.title: Google Gmail OAuth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Google Gmail now supports the standard IMAP and SMTP protocols for accessing and sending e-mail messages. The Gmail IMAP and SMTP servers have been extended to support authorization via the industry-standard OAuth protocol. This allows third party applications to access a user's email account with their permission.

related_apis.title: Dropbox API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Dropbox is a storage service that syncs files online and across your computers via installed software. The API allows read/write access to the same files, piggybacking on Dropbox's file synchronization and storage.

title: Mashup: Cazoodle Bay Area Apartment Search
description: A location-based apartment search mashup that integrates Google Maps with real estate listings to provide a comprehensive view of available apartments in the Bay Area. Users can search for apartments based on specific criteria and view detailed information, including location and availability, directly on an interactive map. This mashup enhances the rental search experience by combining geolocation services with real estate data to offer a more intuitive and visually informative search tool.

title: Mashup: Moscow Routes
description: An interactive mapping solution for transit navigation in Moscow, leveraging Google Maps to trace and visualize routes of local public transport. Users can input their start and end points to receive detailed transit instructions, which are displayed on a map and in a specialized view.

description: An interactive map service that visualizes the recent Japan Earthquake, including the seismic activity that occurred prior to the main event. This mashup integrates real-time earthquake data with geographical mapping services to provide users with a comprehensive understanding of the event's location, magnitude, and impact.

related_apis.title: MapLarge API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: MapLarge offers an API to embed interactive maps on a website, blog or news story. MapLarge is the creator of some of the largest Google Maps implementations on the Internet. MapLarge uses patent pending methods to create simple map visualizations from complex data. With the API users can geocode upto 2,000 records daily for free. Datasets mapped with the geocoder can be mapped on top of Google Maps, Bing, ESRI or Open Street Maps. The API uses RESTful protocol.

title: Mashup: Tweaker the Tweet Speaker
description: An innovative mashup that transforms incoming tweets from the global Twitter stream into audible messages. This tool enables users to listen to tweets in one of six predefined categories, featuring content from and about some of the most prominent users and trending topics on Twitter. By leveraging natural language processing and speech synthesis technologies, Tweaker the Tweet Speaker allows users to transition from reading tweets to an auditory experience, making it convenient for on-the-go consumption or for individuals who prefer listening over reading.

related_apis.description: The Microsoft Translator services can be used in web or client applications to perform language translation operations. The API can be used with either REST, SOAP or JavaScript protocol and responses are formatted in XML or JSON.

title: Mashup: Google Maps Meets Stuffopolis
description: A location-based mashup that uses Google Maps API to display the real-time location of friends' possessions, integrating data from Amazon and Stuffopolis. Users can view interactive markers on a map that represent friends, and upon clicking a marker, they can access a list of the items those friends currently own.

title: Mashup: Visualizing the BP Oil Disaster
description: The BP Oil Disaster mashup utilizes mapping and geographical data to visualize the extent of an oil spill based on the BP-operated Deepwater Horizon explosion on April 20, 2010. Users can input any location and the mashup will show how much of that area would be affected if the spill were to occur there. This interactive visualization tool is designed for emergency response planning, environmental impact assessment, and public education on disaster management.

title: Mashup: Price Comparison Shopping
description: A comprehensive price comparison service that aggregates and compares prices from multiple online retailers in real-time. Users can input desired products or categories, and the mashup presents the best deals and lowest prices available across various e-commerce platforms. It offers a convenient, one-stop solution for finding the most cost-effective shopping options.

related_apis.title: Shopzilla API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Shopzilla, Inc. Catalog API provides access to the Shopzilla, Inc. inventory of catalogued products, merchant offers, and merchant ratings & reviews content through a query-based RESTful web service, responses formatted in XML or JSON|P.
Managed through the Shopzilla Publisher Program, a CPC affiliate marketing program, publishers are able to monetize using this API. Users of this API are able to choose between two versions, each providing logic native to its corresponding Shopzilla, Inc. property: Bizrate.com or Beso.com.
Bizrate API: Provides access to the entire Shopzilla, Inc. offer universe, exposing content from 8,000+ merchants. You would use this version to create a full comparison shopping site.
Beso API: Provides the opportunity to create a style-based experience with a curated set of offers focused in soft goods categories. You would use this version to create a fashion-oriented shopping site.
Both APIs provide access to the merchant ratings and reviews collected through the Bizrate Insights platform.
International? APIs also available for the United Kingdom, Germany, and France.

title: Mashup: Louisville Metro Mapper
description: An interactive mapping service for Louisville Metro, Kentucky, providing a comprehensive view of various community aspects. The mashup offers detailed information on crime incidents, registered sex offenders, historic landmarks, real-time traffic cameras, restaurant health ratings, and properties for sale. Users can explore these layers on a single, integrated map, facilitating informed decision-making and community awareness.

title: Mashup: Rivers of the World
description: An interactive mashup that combines geographical data with photographic and informational resources to provide an extensive catalog of rivers worldwide. Users can explore rivers categorized by both continent and country, with each river's coordinates mapped using Google Maps. Additionally, the mashup incorporates photos sourced from Flickr, offering visual representations of these rivers. By clicking on the map or list entry, users can access detailed information about the river through Wikipedia, enhancing their understanding and appreciation of global river systems.

description: A flight simulation game that leverages Microsoft Virtual Earth's detailed maps to create an authentic environment for players to experience and practice flying. The game allows users to navigate through realistic 3D landscapes, replicate real-world aircraft, and simulate various flight scenarios, providing an immersive and educational gaming experience. By integrating Virtual Earth's mapping capabilities, the flight simulator provides a high level of detail and accuracy in its representation of the globe, enhancing the realism of the gameplay.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: Europe Photo Helix
description: A visually immersive helix made from Flickr photos exclusively of European destinations, designed to provide an aesthetic journey through the diverse landscapes and cultures of Europe. The mashup leverages the Flickr API to dynamically curate a collection of high-quality images representing various European cities, historical sites, and natural wonders. It offers a unique, interactive way to explore Europe's rich heritage and beauty through a creative blend of photography and digital design.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: MusicPortl
description: MusicPortl is an online platform that aggregates and presents detailed information about music artists, sourced from various websites including Wikipedia and social media platforms. Users can explore comprehensive biographies, recent blog posts, and other relevant content related to their favorite artists. This mashup leverages web scraping techniques to collect and display up-to-date information, providing a centralized hub for music enthusiasts to stay informed about their favorite artists and the music industry.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

related_apis.title: MusicBrainz API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The MusicBrainz database contains a huge amount of music metadata, which is maintained by the MusicBrainz community. Find information about artists, albums, tracks and labels. Mash the data with your web app, media player, CD ripper, tagger or other applications requiring music metadata. The service's architecture follows the REST design principles. Interaction with the web service is done using HTTP and all content is served in a simple but flexible XML format.

title: Mashup: SublimeMeal
description: SublimeMeal is a meal planning service that generates personalized recipes based on user preferences and dietary requirements. Users can input their desired ingredients, dietary restrictions, and taste preferences, and the mashup will suggest a variety of dishes that cater to their needs. The service can integrate with various food databases and recipe APIs to provide a diverse range of meal options. SublimeMeal also includes features such as nutritional analysis and shopping list generation to help users plan and prepare their meals efficiently.

related_apis.title: Food API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Food and Recipe API is spoonacular's Food, Recipe, Menu, Restaurant and Nutrition API which allows users to access over 360,000 recipes and 80,000 food products. The API has a food ontology that makes it possible to search for recipes using natural language (such as "gluten free brownies without sugar"). Users can visualize recipe nutrition and ingredient lists, analyze recipe costs, find recipes by nutritional requirements, favorite ingredients, or what's in the fridge, classify recipes, convert ingredient amounts, and even compute an entire meal plan.
spoonacular strives to be the first food management system that combines eating in or out with finding and organizing the restaurants, products, and recipes that fit your diet and help you reach your nutritional goals.

title: Mashup: MyLifeInWine.com
description: MyLifeInWine is a social wine cataloging platform that enables users to document their wine preferences and connect with other wine enthusiasts. It offers a quick review feature for users to easily keep track of their wines, along with the ability to provide detailed, expert-level opinions on each wine they encounter. The platform integrates social features, search capabilities, and e-commerce functionalities to enhance the wine discovery and purchasing experience.

related_apis.title: Rotten Tomatoes API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Rotten Tomatoes is a website containing information about movies: information, news, reviews and ratings, pictures, etx. Developers can use the API to access the Rotten Tomatoes' database of movie data by using the Lists, Movies, or DVDs sections of the API.

title: Mashup: SpotLib
description: SpotLib is a Spotify Mobile plugin that integrates with your personal Last.fm music library, allowing you to stream your music collection through Spotify. It leverages Last.fm's API to access your library and then streams the music through Spotify's platform. This mashup provides users with the ability to access their music collection on the go through Spotify, making it a convenient solution for mobile music listeners who want to combine the extensive library of Spotify with their personal music preferences.

title: Mashup: Cronote
description: Cronote is a time-based messaging service that leverages the Twilio and Twilio SMS APIs to allow users to schedule and send both email and SMS messages to be delivered at a future date and time. The service provides a platform for users to create custom notifications, reminders, and automated communications, enabling them to manage their communications more effectively and efficiently. The mashup integrates mobile messaging capabilities with email functionality, allowing for personalized and targeted communications across multiple channels, making it a versatile tool for personal and business use.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: Last.fm Podcast Finder
description: A music podcast recommendation service that leverages Last.fm user profiles to suggest podcasts based on listening habits. The mashup integrates Last.fm's user data with podcast metadata to provide personalized recommendations tailored to individual user interests. It utilizes social media data to offer a more personalized and relevant podcast discovery experience.

This integration streamlines the process of recording time spent on tasks and invoicing, ensuring that all time-related financial data is accurately reflected in QuickBooks for financial reporting and billing purposes.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Torrents
description: A BitTorrent search engine that utilizes the TRYNT and Yahoo APIs to provide users with a comprehensive and efficient way to search for and download torrents from various sources. The mashup leverages the capabilities of both TRYNT and Yahoo to offer a seamless experience for torrent enthusiasts, enabling them to find and access a wide range of content quickly and easily.

title: Mashup: Detective
description: Detective is a chat-based game that matches players with either another human player or an automated chatbot controlled through the BOT Libre API. The gameplay involves solving mysteries or engaging in investigative scenarios via text conversations, offering an interactive and immersive experience for players. The mashup integrates real-time chat functionality with a game logic API to provide a dynamic and engaging chat game environment.

related_apis.title: BOT libre! API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
BOT libre allows you to create your own artificial intelligent chat bot, train them, and share them with others.
The BOT libre API allow you to chat with your bots over REST.
You are free to use this API for personal, commercial, or recreation usages.

title: Mashup: Online PDF Generator
description: An online document conversion tool that leverages diverse document formats to generate high-quality PDF files. The mashup supports a wide range of input document types, including but not limited to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and image files, converting them into portable, standardized PDF formats for easy sharing and distribution across enterprise and office settings. It utilizes advanced file conversion APIs to ensure compatibility and preserve the original document's layout and content in the PDF output.

related_apis.title: anything2pdf API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The anything2pdf API lets you convert your data to a PDF document online with this free online PDF generator. You can convert most types of data to PDF using this tool, including Microsoft Word documents, RTF documents, HTML and photos and images.
You do need a key to use this service. To get your key, please visit http://www.danielprocter.com/contact.htm

title: Mashup: SmartTickr
description: SmartTickr.com is an innovative real-time data aggregator and display platform that integrates multiple social media platforms, photo sharing sites, and music streaming services. It utilizes Ajax technology to provide users with instant updates from RSS feeds, Twitter, Flickr, MySpace, Facebook, del.icio.us, LinkedIn, eBay, YouTube, Jaiku, and Last.fm. The mashup focuses on delivering seamless, real-time content updates across various digital domains, enhancing user engagement and information accessibility in the social media landscape.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: del.icio.us API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: del.icio.us is a social bookmarking website -- the primary use of del.icio.us is to store your bookmarks online, which allows you to access the same bookmarks from any computer and add bookmarks from anywhere, too. On del.icio.us, you can use tags to organize and remember your bookmarks, which is a much more flexible system than folders.
The API provides read/write access to Delicious bookmarks and tags via an HTTP-based interface. The RESTful API returns responses in XML.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: LinkedIn API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
LinkedIn is the world's largest business social networking hub. Launched in 2003, LinkedIn has millions of users and is implemented in over 200 countries. One purpose of the site is to allow registered users to maintain a list of contact details of people with whom they have some level of relationship, called Connections. Users can invite anyone (whether a site user or not) to become a connection.
The LinkedIn API is a RESTful platform that provides a simple, consistent representation of people, companies, jobs, and the interactions and relationships between them. Our query language lets you read data in XML and JSON at the granularity and aggregation that you choose. Use OAuth 1.0a to authorize users and begin making REST API calls using any programming language.The API’s access is restricted to authorized developers.

related_apis.title: MySpace API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The MySpace Developer Platform (MDP) allows developers to create applications that interact with MySpace members and their social data. With MDP you will be able to create compelling new products that integrate directly into MySpace pages and get exposure to millions of people around the world.

related_apis.title: Photobucket API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Photobucket is the most popular site on the internet for uploading, sharing, linking and finding photos, videos and graphics. Now you can add Photobucket features to your application by using our new Web Service API.

title: Mashup: Congress Meets Second Life
description: A 3D virtual information center on the Second Life Capitol Hill that provides detailed information on members of the U.S. Congress using the SunlightLabs APIs. The mashup showcases comprehensive data on congressional representatives, and includes a video demonstration of its features.

related_apis.title: SecondLife API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Second Life is a 3-D virtual world entirely built and owned by its residents. Since opening to the public in 2003, it has grown explosively and today is inhabited by nearly 100,000 people from around the globe. The Second Life Webmap API allows you to embed Second Life Maps onto your web pages. Note: A JavaScript model similar to Google and other map APIs.

title: Mashup: Spotkick
description: A music event mashup that generates Spotify links for upcoming concerts listed on Songkick. The mashup simplifies the process of discovering and listening to pre-concert playlists curated from the live performance lineup. By integrating Songkick's concert listings data with Spotify's music catalog, users can easily access and share Spotify links for their favorite artists' upcoming shows, enhancing the event experience with relevant music recommendations.

related_apis.title: Songkick API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Songkick api gives users access to the biggest live music database in the world: over 6 million upcoming and past concerts.The API features data about upcoming and past events, and a user's tracked events. Responses are JSON or XML

title: Mashup: London Restaurants Map
description: A comprehensive map-based mashup that visually displays a curated list of restaurants in London, England. The mashup integrates multiple data sources including user reviews, menu items, and pricing information to provide a detailed overview of each restaurant. Users can filter by cuisine type, ratings, price range, and accessibility features. The map also includes real-time updates on restaurant availability, including wait times and special events, enhancing the user's dining experience in the city.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Fotolia Mobilized
description: A mobile application that enables users to search for images on Fotolia using a WAP-based interface. Users can initiate searches by texting the keyword 'fotolia' followed by their desired search term, allowing for quick and convenient image retrieval on mobile devices.

related_apis.title: Fotolia API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Fotolia has created an open Application Programming Interface (API). This API has made it possible for creative people to earn more money through affiliation (Partner API), to integrate Fotolia to your products or services (Business API) or to build applications (software, plugins, widgets) to simply improve the Fotolia experience (Developer API).

title: Mashup: GarbageScout
description: GarbageScout is a location-based urban treasure hunting platform that leverages mapping technologies to connect users with valuable items discarded on New York City's streets. Users can capture images of these items and upload them to the platform, where other users can browse and find the items' locations on a map. This mashup utilizes mapping APIs to provide precise location data for users to easily navigate to the items.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. title: Mashup: Infosniper Locate IP on Map
description: A mapping mashup that incorporates Google Maps with geolocation data of IP addresses, allowing users to locate the physical location associated with a given IP address on a map. This mashup utilizes both mapping APIs and geolocation services to provide a visual representation of the geographical location linked to an IP address, making it a tool for understanding geolocation data in the context of internet traffic.

title: Mashup: Desert Safari Dubai
description: A comprehensive travel and tourism API focused on Dubai, offering a wide range of tour services including Desert Safari Tours, Dhow Cruise Dinners, and City Tours such as Dubai City Tour, Abu Dhabi City Tour, and Sharjah Tour. This API is provided by a Dubai-based company specializing in tour services, making it a one-stop resource for planning and booking a variety of local and regional tours.

related_apis.title: Travel Portal API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Travel Portal API provides programmatic access to functions that allow customers to book hotels, flights, cars, and tours from the developer's websites. Travel Portal allows users to make bookings through Expedia, Cartrawler, Dohop, and Viator using its own interface. The script works in 27 languages and 21 currencies, and it is maintenance-free after setup.

title: Mashup: Explore the Census
description: An interactive data explorer that utilizes Looker and Google BigQuery to provide insights into demographic trends in the United States from 2004 to 2014, focusing on teacher statistics and housing data from 1994 to 2014. This tool allows users to analyze and visualize comprehensive census data, making it easier to understand population changes, educational landscapes, and housing market dynamics over a decade. The mashup is particularly useful for researchers, policymakers, and individuals interested in the socio-economic developments in the USA.

related_apis.title: Looker API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Looker RESTful API integrates data analytics for business services via reports and dashboards. It is available with HTTP requests and JSON responses, API Key to authenticate, and SDK to interact with various parameters.

related_apis.title: Google BigQuery API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google BigQuery service allows users to run SQL-like queries against very large datasets, with potentially billions of rows. BigQuery works best for interactive analyses, typically using a small number of very large, append-only tables. Users can access BigQuery using the BigQuery browser, the bq command-line tool, the REST API, or Google Apps Script.

title: Mashup: World Cup Roster Maps
description: A sports mashup that provides an interactive map visualization of the club teams for players on each of the national teams participating in the upcoming summer tournament. The mashup leverages geospatial data and sports APIs to display detailed team information, team locations, and player rosters for a comprehensive sports fan experience.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Ultimate One-Liners for Android
description: This mashup integrates the I Heart Quotes API to provide a mobile application for Android devices, delivering humorous one-liners directly to the user’s phone. The application is designed to enhance user engagement by providing quick access to a range of witty and entertaining quotes, potentially increasing user interaction and satisfaction with the device.

title: Mashup: Simpatigo Points of Interest
description: A travel-oriented mashup designed for independent travelers seeking unique experiences. It combines mapping services with a comprehensive database of off-the-beaten-path points of interest, providing users with detailed directions and location-specific recommendations. This mashup utilizes geolocation technology to offer personalized travel suggestions and real-time navigation tools, making it ideal for those looking to discover hidden gems during their travels.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. title: Mashup: DealMine.com
description: A comprehensive rewards and discounts aggregator that integrates data from a multitude of loyalty programs, travel rewards, and financial incentives including AAA, AARP, Upromise, Ebates, Amex, Visa, Delta SkyMiles, American AAdvantage, and many others. It offers users a centralized platform to compare shopping deals, travel rewards, and financial benefits across various programs, enhancing the overall shopping and travel experience through personalized price comparisons and rewards aggregation.

related_apis.title: Shopping.com API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API has been acquired by eBay and now exists as eBay Commerce Network. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]With the Shopping.com API you can integrate relevant product content with the deepest product catalog available online. Add millions of unique products and merchant offers to your site. Shopping.com, an eBay company, is the world's online comparison shopping service leader. Its global websites (Shopping.com, DealTime, and DoorOne) carry one of the world's largest product catalogs and offers from more than 6000 merchants.
The Shopping.com XML API uses a RESTful interface and can be used to feature dynamic Shopping.com content on your web pages. It offers capabilities such as keyword search, refining and sorting search results, finding product reviews, reading product specs, comparing products and prices from different merchants and controlling the number of results and navigating between pages.

title: Mashup: WeddingWire
description: A wedding planning resource that leverages Google Maps to provide a comprehensive directory of wedding vendors across the United States. Users can search for and view the locations of various wedding-related businesses, including florists, photographers, DJs, and more, all integrated into a single, easily navigable map-based interface. This mashup simplifies the process of finding and contacting local wedding vendors, making it an invaluable tool for brides and grooms.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Jiffy Lyrics
description: A music lyrics search engine that offers instant lyrics search via a Google-like interface, utilizing musiXmatch's API for lyrics data and integrating with YouTube for direct song playback. The mashup allows users to find and instantly listen to the lyrics of any song by simply entering the song title or artist name.

related_apis.title: iTunes and iTunes Connect API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: A simple REST web service to access the iTunes App Store and iTunes Connect data. Get information about apps, reviews, ratings, ranking, iTunes Connect sales data and more.

versions.version_title: iTunes and iTunes Connect REST API

related_apis.title: MusixMatch API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The musiXmatch LyriX API is 100% legal, because it pays licensing fees. Search for songs by artist, title or lyrics. Receive the lyrics in return. MusiXmatchï¿½s LyriX API also lets you surround lyrics text with detailed metadata about the artists who performed it, the genre, influences, related artists and more.

title: Mashup: Bitcoin ATM
description: A web-based application that simulates a Bitcoin ATM using AngularJS and the Coinkite API. This mashup enables users to interact with a virtual terminal for purchasing and selling Bitcoins, Litecoins, and Blackcoins. It provides a user-friendly interface for real-time cryptocurrency transactions, leveraging the Coinkite API for secure and efficient handling of digital currency exchanges.

related_apis.title: Coinkite API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Coinkite is a bitcoin service that provides an exchange and bank for bitcoin and other crypto-currency use. Coinkite also both online banking and a debit card with which to transact in bitcoins offline. The Coinkite API allows users to utilize the exchange to deposit funds into Coinkite accounts. The Coinkite API uses REST calls, and an account is required with service.

title: Mashup: Mapanno
description: A photo integration service that combines images from Flickr and 23 other photo services into a web page. The service offers users the ability to overlay these images onto interactive maps, either Google Maps or Second Life Maps, providing a visually rich and geographical context for their photos. Users can customize their maps to include their favorite images, creating a personalized and interactive visual experience.

The Second Life Webmap API allows you to embed Second Life Maps onto your web pages. Note: A JavaScript model similar to Google and other map APIs.

related_apis.title: 23 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: We believe that APIs should be open and non-vendor specific to create a common field for interoperability and competition. It does not make a lot of sense for us to create a 23 API that can only be used with one service. Therefore we are actively working with a wide variety of people in the sharing space to create open standards. In the meantime we have added support for the Flickr API giving any developer who is already has spent time implementing the Flikr API a chance to support 23 in 2-3 minutes. [[http://www.23hq.com/doc/api/switch See differences]].

title: Mashup: GameHound
description: GameHound is a user-friendly application designed for avid gamers who seek comprehensive information about their favorite video games. This mashup allows users to easily search for game titles and browse through various genres by selecting their preferred gaming platform. The application aggregates data from multiple sources, providing detailed game descriptions, reviews, and user ratings, making it an essential tool for both casual and hardcore gamers looking to discover new games or explore existing ones.

title: Mashup: oSkope
description: A visual search assistant that utilizes a rich Flash interface to facilitate product searches on Amazon and eBay. It also integrates with Flickr to display related photos and YouTube to showcase relevant videos. This mashup provides an innovative way to discover and explore products through a combination of visual content and e-commerce platforms.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

title: Mashup: MapGameDay Travels
description: This mashup presents interactive maps that detail the travel distances covered by each NCAA Division 1 football team since 1998. Users can explore this data by selecting specific teams or conferences, providing insights into the extensive traveling required by these teams over the years. The mashup utilizes geospatial data and potentially NCAA-provided statistics to generate and display this information in a user-friendly map format.

title: Mashup: Beanatomics Traffic
description: A real-time traffic information mashup that integrates traffic data from the Yahoo Traffic site with Virtual Earth mapping services. The mashup allows users to visualize traffic conditions on a map, enabling them to plan and adjust their routes based on current traffic information.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Traffic API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Traffic Web Services from Yahoo! enable you to get traffic alert information from a given location. Use the Traffic REST API to customize your request with many parameters including indicating locations based on city state, zip code, or a combination of any of these things, latitude-longitude, whether to include a map image, or a search radius in miles. Traffic Web Services are also available through a [[http://developer.yahoo.net/traffic/rss/V1/index.html dynamic RSS feed]].

title: Mashup: 1dollarthings.com
description: A price-based shopping aggregation service that aggregates APIs from various online stores to present items priced at or below a certain threshold. The mashup allows users to browse and compare products from multiple retailers in a single platform, focusing on bargains and discounts. It utilizes product search APIs and price filtering capabilities to provide curated, value-oriented shopping experiences.

This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

related_apis.title: Walmart Open API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Walmart Open APIs provide developers with access to Walmart.com's product catalogue information and enable affiliates to earn money through customer referrals. The Data Feed and Special Feeds APIs allow developers to get lists or feeds of products by category. The taxonomy used to categorize items can be exposed via the Taxonomy API. Developers can use the Search API to perform a text search for items on Walmart.com or use the Product Lookup API to get a specific item's price and availability. The Walmart Open APIs are currently in Beta.

related_apis.title: Best Buy Products API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Best Buy's Products API provides full product information for over 1M current and historical products, including pricing, availability, specifications, descriptions, and images.

related_apis.title: Impact Radius API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: (Note Impact Radius is now known as "Impact") Impact provides performance-advertising services for web marketing expansion. The company's API is available to advertising clients and media partners. It provides advertisers with functionality for uploading transactional histories from back-office systems, crediting media partners, and linking ecommerce systems to submit returns. For media partners it provides functionality for keeping approved campaigns up to date, build new promotional links, and receive live performance and earnings data. The API is RESTful and access requires an account with Impact.

related_apis.title: Etsy API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Etsy is an online marketplace for buying and selling handmade things. The Etsy API lets you develop applications built on this fast growing e-commerce platform.

title: Mashup: CaddyMap
description: CaddyMap is a specialized Google Maps mashup designed for golf enthusiasts. It combines the power of Google Maps with detailed information about US golf courses, including searchable locations, real-time weather data, and comprehensive golf course details. Users can find and explore golf courses based on their preferences and current weather conditions, enhancing the planning and enjoyment of their golfing experiences.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Free e commerce cart for facebook
description: A fully-integrated e-commerce platform designed for Facebook, enabling users to launch a storefront directly from their profile or page. Muncom's Facebook app offers a comprehensive suite of tools for managing products, inventory, and sales, providing a seamless shopping experience for Facebook users.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

title: Mashup: PhotoMunchrs
description: A photo-based educational game mashup that combines elements of number-munching games with social photo tagging. Players 'munch' photos from the Flickr database that are tagged with a particular keyword, contributing to a visual ranking system by selecting photos that best represent the keyword. The game integrates Flickr's photo tagging API with a custom ranking algorithm to provide an engaging, educational, and visually ranked experience.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

title: Mashup: Earn/Learn Web
description: A comprehensive, user-friendly platform that integrates search functionalities with financial insights. Earn/Learn Web enables users to discover and evaluate the most suitable websites for both earning and learning based on a wide range of criteria. Users can explore top PayPerTask sites, compare SellYourArt platforms, and take advantage of various educational resources. The mashup combines search engines with financial analysis tools to provide a holistic view of the market, helping users make informed decisions about where to invest their time and resources.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing API enables developers to embed a flexible and powerful search engine as a custom search component in their sites and applications. Bing API offers open, flexible options for building or enhancing your site or applications. With the API users can search for web content, images, stories and more. Users can also monetize their applications with advertisements. It uses a RESTful protocol with results formatted either in XML or JSON and also provides support for SOAP protocol.

related_apis.title: Alexa Web Information Service API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Alexa Web Information Service makes Alexa's repository of information about the traffic and structure of the web available to developers.

title: Mashup: WebServicesPros Customized Integration Solution for Americommerce
description: WebServicesPros offers a customized integration solution designed to automate the interaction between the Americommerce shopping cart and various Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems. This is achieved through the utilization of the AC API Web Services, which facilitates the connection between multiple shopping carts and diverse ERP and accounting software solutions. The WebServicesPros Desktop application acts as a versatile intermediary, not only linking the two systems but also enhancing their functionalities where necessary. These configurable and tailored solutions enable seamless integration among various shopping carts and cart providers, thereby streamlining the accounting and fulfillment processes from the back office perspective, ensuring efficiency and smooth operation.

related_apis.title: AmeriCommerce API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: AmeriCommerce is a hosted shopping cart software. It lets users manage multiple storefronts from a single admin console. Users can manage track what is happening across multiple sites or just a single site. It also lets users integrate their cart into larger ERP and accounting systems. AmeriCommerce exposes their entire platform via a modern RESTful API. With it users can update inventory remotely or from suppliers, automate the adding of products, customers and orders and more.

title: Mashup: Tweet Street View
description: An interactive map mashup that combines Google Street View with Twitter-based location data. Users can view Street View imagery of various locations and simultaneously see tweets posted in the vicinity. Additionally, users have the ability to contribute by submitting their own area for displaying Street View images. The mashup utilizes latitude (lat) and longitude (lng) parameters for pinpointing locations.

title: Mashup: Wordgeist
description: Social bookmarking platform that allows users to submit, curate, and share their favorite web links. It leverages social networking principles to create a user-generated catalog of interesting web resources, facilitating discovery and sharing.

related_apis.description:
From their site: del.icio.us is a social bookmarking website -- the primary use of del.icio.us is to store your bookmarks online, which allows you to access the same bookmarks from any computer and add bookmarks from anywhere, too. On del.icio.us, you can use tags to organize and remember your bookmarks, which is a much more flexible system than folders.
The API provides read/write access to Delicious bookmarks and tags via an HTTP-based interface. The RESTful API returns responses in XML.

description: A running route discovery, tracking, and sharing platform that integrates mapping technologies with routing algorithms. It combines mapping APIs with route planning tools to offer personalized, location-based running experiences and community engagement.

It offers real-time updates on local events and visual representations of towns and villages, enhancing the user's understanding of UK locations and their associated activities.

Common API tasks include event and venue search. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in either XML, JSON or YAML.

title: Mashup: InstaPopular
description: InstaPopular is a social media visualization mashup that aggregates and displays currently 'popular' photos from Instagram. The mashup leverages Instagram's API to fetch real-time data, allowing users to view the most trending images. It integrates social media analytics to determine popularity, providing a dynamic and interactive visual representation of popular content. InstaPopular is designed to cater to users interested in staying updated with trending photo content across various social media platforms. It serves as an efficient tool for both casual users looking to browse popular photos and businesses aiming to understand current trends in visual content.

related_apis.title: Instagram Graph API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Instagram is a photo sharing iPhone app and service. Users take photos and can share them with Instagram contacts, as well as friends on other social networks like Twitter and Facebook. The Instagram API provides access to user authentication, friend connections, photos and all the other elements of the iPhone app--including uploading new media.

title: Mashup: Long Island Wineries Map
description: A location-based travel and wine discovery platform that integrates the Google Maps API to facilitate multi-point driving directions for wine tours. related_apis.description: The Mailchimp API syncs campaign stats and subscribers information between MailChimp and a database. The service aims to enhance personal safety through real-time communication and collaboration with authorities and trusted contacts.
