related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: Mologogo
description: A real-time geolocation sharing platform that leverages GPS-enabled cell phones to track and display the locations of users on a map. Mologogo provides an interactive web interface and a mobile application, allowing users to share their location with friends and colleagues, facilitating social interactions, and enabling users to connect socially based on proximity. The system integrates with various social networking platforms to enhance user engagement and social connectivity.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Amazon S3 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Since 2006 Amazon Web Services has been offering web services commonly known as cloud computing. AWS Provides a reliable, low cost infrastructure platform that powers hundreds of thousands of businesses.
Amazon S3 API, the Simple Storage Service provides a simple web services interface used to store objects using the Amazon online storage infrastructure. Users can then download the data or use the data with other AWS services, such as Amazon Elastic Cloud Computer (EC2). Using this web service, developers can build applications that make use of Internet storage.
The API uses Buckets, Objects, Keys and Operations. An object has four parts: value, key, metadata, and an access control policy. Objects are stored in buckets. The API is REST based. Responses are formatted in JSON.

related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

related_apis.title: Amazon EC2 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) API is a web service that enables you to launch and manage Linux/UNIX and Windows server instances in Amazon's data centers. Giving users the ability to "compute" in the cloud, it provides users with complete control of their computing resources and lets them run on Amazon's computing environment. Amazon EC2 changes the economics of computing by allowing users to pay only for capacity that is actually used.
This is a REST-based API. The SOAP interface was deprecated on 1 December 2015.
The WSDL for each supported API version is available from the following URI:
http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc//AmazonEC2.wsdl

Your client application can request a list of user albums, photos, comments, or tags, edit or delete content in an existing entry, and query the content in an existing entry.

related_apis.title: MySpace API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The MySpace Developer Platform (MDP) allows developers to create applications that interact with MySpace members and their social data. With MDP you will be able to create compelling new products that integrate directly into MySpace pages and get exposure to millions of people around the world.

related_apis.title: Google Analytics Managment API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Google Analytics Management API to leverage Google's extensive website analytics tools. The API uses GET requests over HTTPS and JSON for requests/returns. Some of the functions available with the API are: List Account, Property and View (Profile) information for a user; manage properties and goals; manage user permissions; and upload cost data to Google Analytics for non-Google paid campaigns. See the extensive documentation for code samples, detailed method descriptions, and more.

title: Mashup: QlikTech Films
description: A data-driven mashup that integrates QlikView business intelligence software with eBay and YouTube to analyze and visualize film and actor data. The mashup utilizes QlikView's data modeling capabilities to identify films and actors, then searches for their related items on eBay and their content on YouTube. It provides a unified view of market trends in film merchandise and online film content distribution.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: 4 in 1 search
description: A comprehensive 4-in-1 search application that aggregates results from multiple sources to display a unified search experience. Users can input a single query to retrieve (1) web search results, (2) images, (3) news articles, and (4) video content from various sources. This mashup utilizes a combination of web search APIs, image search algorithms, news aggregation platforms, and video hosting services to provide a full spectrum of search results in one interface.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing API enables developers to embed a flexible and powerful search engine as a custom search component in their sites and applications. Bing API offers open, flexible options for building or enhancing your site or applications. With the API users can search for web content, images, stories and more. Users can also monetize their applications with advertisements. It uses a RESTful protocol with results formatted either in XML or JSON and also provides support for SOAP protocol.

related_apis.title: Google Cloud Translation API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: This version is currently in beta. The Google Cloud Translation API is a part of Google's larger Cloud Machine Learning API family. This API translates text between thousands of language pairs, with new features for this latest version that includes; Glossaries and Batch requests. It enables you with the ability to create a custom dictionary to correctly and consistently translate terms that are customer-specific and to make an asynchronous request to translate large amounts of text. The Cloud Translation API lets developers programmatically integrate the service with third party sites and applications.

versions.version_title: Google Cloud Translation REST API v3.0

title: Mashup: DailyMotoRide
description: A visually appealing and comprehensive guide to the world's most scenic motorcycle routes, curated from various travel and mapping data sources. The mashup provides detailed road maps, user-submitted photos, and in-depth descriptions of the routes, along with safety tips and recommendations for gear and accommodations. It combines travel data with mapping services to offer a rich, interactive experience for motorcycle enthusiasts.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Amazon S3 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Since 2006 Amazon Web Services has been offering web services commonly known as cloud computing. AWS Provides a reliable, low cost infrastructure platform that powers hundreds of thousands of businesses.
Amazon S3 API, the Simple Storage Service provides a simple web services interface used to store objects using the Amazon online storage infrastructure. Users can then download the data or use the data with other AWS services, such as Amazon Elastic Cloud Computer (EC2). Using this web service, developers can build applications that make use of Internet storage.
The API uses Buckets, Objects, Keys and Operations. An object has four parts: value, key, metadata, and an access control policy. Objects are stored in buckets. The API is REST based. Responses are formatted in JSON.

related_apis.title: Google Visualization API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Visualization JavaScript API lets you access structured data and visualize that data using JavaScript in your web pages. The Google Visualization API also enables the creation of gadgets.

related_apis.title: Google Fusion Tables API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Google Fusion Tables is a free service for sharing and visualizing data online. It lets you upload data, share and mark up your data with collaborators, merge data from multiple tables, and create visualizations such as charts and maps. The API lets you update and query your dataset in Fusion Tables programmatically. The API lets you import data from other data sources, whether a text file or a full database.

related_apis.title: Google Maps Elevation API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google Elevation web service provides you a simple interface to query locations on the earth for elevation data. Additionally, you may request sampled elevation data along paths, allowing you to calculate elevation changes along routes.
The Elevation service provides elevation data for all locations on the surface of the earth, including depth locations on the ocean floor (which return negative values). In those cases where Google does not possess exact elevation measurements at the precise location you request, the service will interpolate and return an averaged value using the four nearest locations.

title: Mashup: QR Maker
description: A versatile QR code generator that allows users to create personalized QR codes from various sources such as URLs, text messages, phone numbers, or plain text. The mashup offers a user-friendly interface for generating QR codes that can be used to display information to the user, open web pages, or compose text messages. The QR Maker is compatible with multiple browsers and can be accessed directly via the URL http://qrmkr.com.

related_apis.title: Zazzle API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Zazzle provides a simple URL linkover-based API that allows any third party to automatically generate a customized product with dynamic images and text. The Zazzle Create-a-Product API can be used to automatically generate over 200 different types of customized products: t-shirts, mugs, cards, postage, and posters. Detailed documentation requires registration.

title: Mashup: SMS-To-Email Gateway
description:
A bi-directional communication platform that integrates the Plivo SMS API and the Mailgun API to enable the seamless exchange of messages between email and SMS. This mashup allows for the following functionalities:
    - Forwarding emails to a specified Plivo SMS number, which then sends an SMS message to the recipient.
    - Enabling the recipient to reply to the SMS, and the response is automatically forwarded as an email to the original sender.
    - This integration provides a convenient way for users to communicate via their preferred method (email or SMS) without the need for both parties to have the same communication preference.
    - The mashup leverages the capabilities of the Plivo and Mailgun APIs to ensure real-time communication and message delivery.
    - Ideal for businesses or individuals who want to facilitate communication between different messaging platforms.
    - Technical requirements include an active Plivo number, Mailgun account, and the necessary API keys for integration.
    - The mashup is suitable for any geographic location where SMS and email services are available.

related_apis.title: Mailgun API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Mailgun email management API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON. The API authenticates with an API Key over HTTP Basic Auth. Use Mailgun to do things like: send email, automate email services, and receive real-time notifications in app. Mailgun also offers email tracking and analytics. Note that the default version of this API is now v3. V3 is backward compatible with v2, but some endpoint behaviors have been modified. See the documentation for full details on the latest Mailgun API version.

related_apis.title: Plivo API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Plivo is a telephony platform for integration with other apps. It is built to be integrative and take desired call making and receiving functions off of developersâ€™ hands. It provides capacity for conferencing, call tracking, recording, and more. This API is HTTP-based with SSL support for exposing all of the services essential functionality. It returns JSON responses. Pricing details are forthcoming from the developers.

title: Mashup: Touropia
description: Touropia is an interactive travel guide mashup that combines mapping, photography, and video content to provide comprehensive overviews of travel destinations worldwide. Users can explore various locations including cities, beaches, national parks, and cultural sites through detailed maps, high-quality images, and engaging videos. This mashup leverages geolocation data integration for precise navigation and visual representation of travel hotspots, enhancing user experience by offering immersive and informative content tailored for travelers seeking diverse experiences.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: Refuge Android App
description: An Android app that offers a comprehensive and up-to-date directory of restrooms that are safe and welcoming for transgender, intersex, gender nonconforming, and handicapped individuals. Utilizing geolocation technology, the app enables users to search for and view the nearest accessible restrooms by displaying them on a map. Each restroom entry includes detailed information about accessibility, gender inclusivity, and other crucial features, providing users with informed choices to help them navigate public spaces more safely and comfortably. This app is designed to promote inclusivity and safety in public restroom facilities.

related_apis.title: REFUGE Restrooms API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Based in San Francisco, REFUGE Restrooms is a resource that provides transgender, intersex, and gender nonconforming individuals with access to a library of restrooms with safe environments. Similar to the now deprecated Safe2Pee, users can search for restrooms by proximity, may add new restrooms to the directory, and can also comment and rate their experiences. The site and service aims to promote restroom advocacy through community building. The project is accessible using a RESTful API. Using GET HTTP requests, developers can query the restroom database by keyword, and can also return a full list of all database entries in a JSON format.

title: Mashup: Platd
description: A mobile voice messaging service that enables users to report incidents involving vehicles by calling a specific number, speaking the license plate number of the vehicle involved, and then recording a message for the driver.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

related_apis.title: Heroku API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Heroku API is used for manually manipulating Heroku apps. Heroku is a cloud application platform for Ruby giving developers a new way of building and deploying web apps. The service lets app developers spend 100% of their time on their application code, not managing servers, deployment, ongoing operations, or scaling.
The RESTful API lets users manage and deploy Rails apps to the Heroku platform. Responses are formatted in XML.

title: Mashup: Outside.in
description: An aggregator for local information that combines multiple data sources to provide comprehensive maps of various local content such as blog posts, art gallery reviews, real estate listings, and police reports. The mashup utilizes APIs from news services, mapping platforms, and blogging networks to collect, filter, and display local information in a geographically visualized manner.

title: Mashup: Early Movie Trailers
description: A movie-centric mashup that aggregates real-time data from Twitter, The Movie Database (TMDB), and Rotten Tomatoes to provide users with the latest trailers, reviews, and information on upcoming and current film releases. The mashup leverages social media, movie databases, and critic reviews to offer comprehensive and up-to-date content tailored to film enthusiasts and industry professionals. It integrates Twitter for real-time updates, TMDB for detailed movie data, and Rotten Tomatoes for critical reviews, creating a dynamic platform for movie discovery and engagement.

related_apis.title: Rotten Tomatoes API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Rotten Tomatoes is a website containing information about movies: information, news, reviews and ratings, pictures, etx. The Rotten Tomatoes API is RESTful web service that was designed to be easy to explore and use. Developers can use the API to access the Rotten Tomatoes' database of movie data by using the Lists, Movies, or DVDs sections of the API.

title: Mashup: Salsa's
description: Salsa's is a web application designed for online ordering of Mexican food in Australia. It leverages the MYOB AccountRight Live API to streamline inventory management and manage customer orders efficiently. This mashup provides a comprehensive platform for customers to browse, order, and track their Mexican food deliveries, all while maintaining an up-to-date inventory system that integrates seamlessly with the MYOB accounting software.

related_apis.title: MYOB AccountRight Live API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
MYOB AccountRight Live is an accounting application for businesses in Australia. MYOB AccountRight Live offers a variety of accounting and bookkeeping features.
The MYOB AccountRight Live API allows developers to access and integrate the functionality and data of MYOB AccountRight Live with other applications. Some example API methods include managing accounting files, retrieving information on accounts, and managing transactions.

title: Mashup: Vista Slideshow by Imagelooop
description: A widget-based slideshow creation tool designed for the Vista Sidebar that allows users to create and run personalized slide shows. The mashup supports undocking from the sidebar, enabling full-screen viewing, and can handle multiple instances, each capable of displaying different slide shows. It retains user settings even after a Windows restart, ensuring continuity and ease of use.

related_apis.title: Windows Sidebar Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: For Windows Vista sidebar.

title: Mashup: DC Shot Spotter
description: DC Shot Spotter is a real-time crime detection system that uses advanced sensors to detect gunfire incidents across the city. Over the past eight years, it has identified 39,000 outdoor gunshot incidents, primarily in high-crime areas. By integrating with MapBox, users can visualize these events on an interactive map, providing valuable insights into crime patterns and public safety. This mashup combines real-time data from ShotSpotter's sensors with mapping technology to enhance police response times and community awareness.

related_apis.title: Mapbox API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Mapbox is a suite of open source mapping tools. This API can be used to create interactive maps using a wide range of file formats and databases. It also allows users to host their maps so that they can be embedded on webpages and shared with a wider audience. All maps created using Mapbox are compatible with Android and iOS devices.

title: Mashup: ReadTracker
description: A personal reading tracker application that utilizes data from various book sources to provide users with detailed insights into their reading habits. The app enables users to record, categorize, and analyze the books they have read, with features such as tracking reading time, identifying favorite genres, and predicting how long it will take to finish a book. It integrates with APIs for book data and reading logs to create a comprehensive reading experience.

related_apis.title: Readmill API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Readmill is an online and mobile platform for readers to share information about what eBooks they are reading, allowing them to highlight and discuss sections of eBooks with other users.
The Readmill API allows developers to access and integrate the data and functionality of Readmill with other applications and to create new applications. Some example API methods include retrieving and managing user information, retrieving information on books, and managing comments from Readmill.

title: Mashup: Whereables - The Airport Map
description: A comprehensive air travel mapping and review platform that displays global airport locations, routes, and operating airlines. Users can view detailed maps of airports, track flight routes, and explore airline information. Additionally, it offers a feature for users to read and contribute reviews for each airport and airline, enhancing traveler experiences and decision-making.

description: A real-time weather information tool that leverages the OpenWeatherMap API to deliver precise current weather conditions and a 10-day forecast for specified cities. The mashup enables users to access accurate weather updates, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and precipitation, for planning and decision-making purposes.

related_apis.title: OpenWeatherMap API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API has been deprecated and replaced by the Current Weather Data, 5 Day Weather Forecast, 16 Day Weather Forecast, Historical Data, History Bulk, Weather Map Layers, Ultraviolet Index, Weather Stations, Weather Alerts, Air Pollution, and Accumulated Weather Data APIs. This profile is maintained for historical and research purposes only.]Open Weather Map provides interactive maps of current and historic weather conditions. The API uses RESTful calls issued in JSON format.

title: Mashup: Calgary Mapped
description: A resourceful mashup that offers a detailed directory of locations in Calgary, categorized for ease of navigation. Users can obtain driving directions, contact information, and other pertinent details. Additionally, the platform enables users to share Map Views via email, facilitating the dissemination of spatial information.

title: Mashup: Infopia
description: A comprehensive auction and e-commerce platform that integrates with various third-party services such as eBay and Salesforce.com, offering advanced features for inventory management, multi-channel marketing, order fulfillment, and CRM. The mashup provides real-time analytics on performance metrics, enabling businesses to optimize their auction and e-commerce operations across different channels.

title: Mashup: The Lewis and Clark Trail Road Trip Planner
description: A comprehensive road trip planning tool that utilizes historical geospatial data and tourism APIs to identify and list hundreds of points of interest along the route taken by the Lewis and Clark Expedition. Users can discover a variety of attractions including historic sites, national parks, state parks, campgrounds, and other recreational areas. The mashup provides a detailed itinerary, maps, and travel information, making it an ideal resource for families and adventure enthusiasts planning a memorable vacation along this historic trail.

description: A location-based running log and community service that integrates Google Maps for route planning, tracking, and sharing. The mashup utilizes Google Maps API for location services, route mapping, and community sharing features, providing a collaborative platform for runners to track, compare, and share their running experiences.

description: An anonymous phone calling service using web browsers and Twilio Client, allowing users to make calls to any US number without login/sign-up, receiving a recording of the call via email.

description: A content management system (CMS) mashup that seamlessly integrates the functionalities of Joomla!, Amazon, and Internet Video Archive. related_apis.title: Amazon Fulfillment Web Service API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Amazon Fulfillment Web Service (Amazon FWS) allows merchants to access Amazon.com's world-class fulfillment capabilities through a simple web services interface. related_apis.title: IVA Video API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Internet Video Archive's Entertainment Express API connects you to our movie, TV, and Video Game metadata services as well as our large collection of promotional video assets and images.
Our video assets include: movie trailers, TV series, season and episode trailers, video game trailers, music videos and much, much more! Our data collection is expanding daily and our API is designed to easily allow you to aggregate our data to your application or web site.

title: Mashup: jobjolly
description: A job search platform that aggregates job listings from various sources in the United States, utilizing the CareerBuilder API for data integration. Users can search for jobs based on location, industry, and other criteria, and receive real-time job listings. The platform is designed for job seekers looking for employment opportunities across the country.

related_apis.title: CareerBuilder API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Currently a private API, the CareerBuilder API allows you to integrate their database of over 1.5 million jobs with your software or website. The API provides methods for basic job searching, retrieving data for a specific job, and applying to a job.

title: Mashup: Trulia Real Estate Mobilized
description: A mobile-friendly mashup that aggregates real estate listings for on-the-go property searches. Users can access comprehensive housing information by sending an SMS or using WAP technology, providing a zip code to retrieve a detailed listing of available properties. This service utilizes SMS and WAP capabilities to deliver real-time real estate data directly to users' mobile devices, enhancing the efficiency and convenience of property search and viewing processes.

title: Mashup: Fly Time Notify
description: Fly Time Notify is a travel planning application that provides real-time notifications to users when airlines open up flight bookings for a chosen travel date. Users can select their preferred airlines, and once the selected airlines make those flights available for booking, users receive immediate notifications via email and SMS. This enables travelers to secure the best flights and prices, or use their frequent flyer rewards before the general public has access to these flights. The mashup integrates real-time flight availability APIs with user notification systems to deliver timely information.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: GreetGenie
description: GreetGenie is a two-way phone greeting service that allows individuals to send personalized greetings, both in text and audio formats, using a credit-based system. The service is built on top of the Twilio API, enabling users to create and send personalized messages that can be delivered to recipients' phones. The mashup leverages the Twilio API for voice and messaging capabilities, providing a user-friendly interface for composing and sending greetings. It supports text-to-speech for audio messages and offers a variety of pre-made templates to choose from, enhancing the user experience with a touch of humor and personalization.

title: Mashup: Deal Tracker
description: A comprehensive deal-finding service that aggregates and analyzes discounts from various online retailers, providing users with real-time notifications of the best deals. Deal Tracker uses data mining techniques to identify products with significant price reductions, ensuring users can take advantage of savings of over 50% on a wide range of products. The service also includes a feature to track product availability to prevent missing out on limited-time deals.

related_apis.title: I Need a Bargain API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: I Need a Bargain (INAB) aggregates shopping deals from numerous bargain sources. With the INAB API, developers can add deals to their own websites. The API provides methods such as getting bargain offers by keyword search, category ID, promo type ID, store ID and more. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are formatted in JSON.

versions.version_title: I Need a Bargain REST API

related_apis.title: Woot API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Woot is a daily deals site, offering curated collections of themed deals called Woot Plus Events, and a daily deal called Todayâ€™s Woot. The Woot API provides developers with automated access to daily deals, events, videos, and more. Results are JSON formatted.

title: Mashup: TomatoFlix
description: A mashup that integrates Rotten Tomatoes ratings into movie platforms such as Netflix, IMDB, Redbox, Fandango, and Movies.com. This mashup enhances the movie discovery process by providing expert ratings directly on these platforms, allowing users to make more informed decisions about the movies they watch. It operates through API integrations, offering a real-time experience for movie enthusiasts and casual viewers alike.

related_apis.title: Kynetx API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Kynetx is an event-driven application platform that helps you build context-aware apps in the cloud. Kynetx apps look for events and user context (like geo-location, session behavior, weather and more) and fire actions based on conditions across any URL.

related_apis.title: Rotten Tomatoes API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Rotten Tomatoes is a website containing information about movies: information, news, reviews and ratings, pictures, etx. The Rotten Tomatoes API is RESTful web service that was designed to be easy to explore and use. Developers can use the API to access the Rotten Tomatoes' database of movie data by using the Lists, Movies, or DVDs sections of the API.

title: Mashup: JoyRack Games iGoogle Gadget
description: A gaming widget for iGoogle that displays the latest games from JoyRack.com. Users can directly play games, embed them into their websites, or add them to their Google homepages. This mashup integrates game development APIs with web page integration technologies, allowing for seamless in-browser gaming experiences.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

title: Mashup: Twitter 411 service
description: A custom information system built using Twitter as its primary transport. Users can create their own information queries or send predefined information requests, which are then propagated via Twitter's message delivery system. This mashup leverages Twitter's API for real-time information dissemination and retrieval. It is designed for users who prefer a decentralized, user-driven approach to information management.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: Furlango - Local events and activities discovery service
description: Furlango is a comprehensive local events and activities discovery service that leverages mapping and localization technologies to provide users with an intuitive and user-friendly interface for finding nearby events and activities. The service extends its reach by integrating with movie databases, allowing users to discover not only a wide range of local events but also the latest movie screenings in their vicinity. This mashup combines event listings with real-time movie data to offer a one-stop solution for entertainment seekers. It features an easy-to-use interface that helps users quickly find and plan their outings based on their location, preferred activities, and entertainment interests.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Internet Location Platform API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: a resource for managing all geo-permanent named places on Earth. Our purpose in creating the Internet Location Platform is to provide the Yahoo! Geographic Developer Community with the vocabulary and grammar to describe the world's geography in an unequivocal, permanent, and language-neutral manner. The Internet Location Platform is designed to facilitate spatial interoperability and geographic discovery; users can traverse the spatial hierarchy, identify the geography relevant to their users and their business, and in turn, unambiguously geotag, geotarget, and geolocate data across the Web.

versions.version_title: Yahoo Internet Location Platform REST API

title: Mashup: Guess The Google
description: An interactive guessing game that utilizes Google Image Search. Users are presented with a montage of images sourced from various Google Image Search queries and are challenged to deduce the keywords or search terms that generated the image montage. The mashup combines image search functionality with a game-like interface, creating an engaging way to explore and understand how Google Image Search works.

title: Mashup: Car Crime + Accident Map
description: An interactive, searchable Google map mashup that overlays car and other vehicle crime incidents as well as road traffic accidents within a 1-mile radius of a user's search location. The map allows users to visually explore and compare these incidents, providing a comprehensive view of local safety and road conditions. The mashup integrates data from various sources including crime records and traffic accident reports, enabling users to identify crime hotspots and accident-prone areas in their vicinity.

related_apis.title: Data.gov.uk API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: This is the official data directory from the UK government. It seeks to give a way into the wealth of government data. The resources here are accessible via linked data formats like RDF.

related_apis.title: UK Street Level Crime API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The UK Police and Street Level Crime API returns aggregated crime statistics about areas served by all police forces in England and Wales. All provide accurate, up-to-date data by neighborhood and even block by block.
API methods support retrieval of statistics for the local police force such as identifier, web URL, and contact methods. Methods also return crime statistics by location, neighborhood and street, and by category of crime.

versions.version_title: UK Street Level Crime REST API

title: Mashup: Gecko
description: A comprehensive platform designed for mobile app developers to facilitate Indoor Positioning on smartphones. Gecko offers integrated support for indoor location mapping, precise user positioning, and a built-in friend finder feature, making it an all-in-one solution for enhancing indoor navigation and social interaction.

title: Mashup: Google AdWords Performance Widget
description: A comprehensive dashboard widget for Google AdWords that allows users to track and analyze key performance metrics such as Cost Per Click (CPC), Click Through Rate (CTR), cost per conversion, and more. The widget provides a detailed view of campaign metrics, including clicks, impressions, and conversions, and allows users to drill down to the group level within each campaign. It is also compatible with Multi Client Center (MCC) accounts, enabling users to manage and monitor multiple AdWords accounts from a single interface.

related_apis.title: Google AdWords API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google AdWords API allows apps to interact directly with the Google Ads platform, vastly increasing the efficiency of managing large or complex Google Ads accounts and campaigns. Some typical use cases include:Automated account managementCustom reportingAd management based on inventoryBid management based on business dataWith the AdWords API you can build software that manages accounts from the customer level down to the keyword level. The API can do almost everything the Google Ads UI does, but programmatically.The types of companies that have benefited from the AdWords API include:Ad agenciesSearch Engine Marketing (SEM) companiesBig brands managing a large number of accounts, with needs beyond what's possible within the Google Ads UI.The API relies on SOAP and WSDL technologies to offer its services. You set up API access by obtaining a few required authentication credentials, creating some test accounts, and adding the authentication and account details to a configuration file for your client library. Authentication is via OAuth2.To help you get started, they offer client libraries in Java, .NET, Python, PHP, Perl, and Ruby.

title: Mashup: flickr Tags MashUP
description: A tag-based search engine for public Flickr photos, allowing users to easily find and browse images based on relevant keywords. The mashup integrates Flickr's API to provide real-time access to a vast library of user-generated content, focusing on visual categorization and classification. Users can search, discover, and view photos from various sources, enhancing their ability to visually explore and understand different topics through the power of photography.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: Orange County Property Appraiser
description: An interactive mapping tool that provides real-time access to property appraisals within Orange County. Users can explore detailed parcel and lot information, including property boundaries, appraised values, and any recent changes in property status. This mashup integrates geospatial data with real estate appraisal services to offer a comprehensive, location-specific view of property values for Orange County residents and investors.

title: Mashup: CommonFloor
description: A real estate search engine for India that leverages Google Maps to display property listings and search results. CommonFloor integrates with property databases to provide users with a visual and interactive way to explore properties across the country, making it easier to find and compare real estate options based on location, type, and price.

description: This Google Chrome plugin integrates the trst.me rating system with Twitter profiles, allowing users to view the trustworthiness rating of Twitter accounts directly within their profiles. The plugin enhances user experience by providing instant access to account ratings, potentially impacting user interaction and profile credibility assessments.

related_apis.title: Infochimps IP Intelligence Geolocation API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
InfoChimps is a data marketplace where publishers and owners of datasets can charge for their usage.
Digital Element is the premier supplier for IP geolocation data. Their data is used by a number of large internet companies, including Ask.com, AOL, and CNN.com. Their data has been independently verified to be 99% accurate at country level, and 95% accurate at the city level worldwide.
The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are formatted in JSON or JSONP.

versions.version_title: Infochimps IP Intelligence Geolocation REST API

title: Mashup: vspotz Local Event Search Engine
description: A hyper-local event search engine that focuses on providing detailed and accurate search results for local events, emphasizing small towns and suburban areas. The mashup aggregates event data from various sources to ensure comprehensive coverage of local events, addressing the gap in existing event search engines that primarily cater to major cities.

description: Auctomatic is a tool designed to optimize the sales process for products on eBay. It provides users with features to streamline the auction and selling process, including setting optimal prices, managing listings, and monitoring competitor activity. The mashup integrates with eBay's API to automate key aspects of online selling, making it easier for users to maximize their revenue and minimize effort while selling on the platform.

title: Mashup: Silverlight Election App
description: An advanced U.S. Election 2008 application, utilizing Silverlight 1.0, AJAX, ASP.NET, and Virtual Earth technologies. This application offers detailed biographies, images, links, and real-time feeds for presidential candidates, providing comprehensive information to users.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: Spore
description: Spore is an Electronic Arts game that integrates the YouTube API to allow users to directly upload their in-game videos to YouTube. This mashup enhances the gaming experience by providing a seamless way for players to share their gameplay experiences with others, fostering a community of video creators and viewers around the game.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: Dublin Hotels Map
description: A location-specific hotel search map that integrates hotel databases with real-time geographical data. This mashup provides a visual overview of all hotels in Dublin, allowing users to explore and compare hotel locations, ratings, and amenities. It combines hotel booking APIs with mapping services to offer an intuitive, location-based hotel search experience.

The mashup integrates data from various job listings, salary surveys, and user feedback to provide accurate and up-to-date salary information.

title: Mashup: S3 File Share
description: S3 File Share is a collaborative file sharing platform that leverages Amazon's S3 Web Service for secure and scalable storage. It allows users to share large files, upload pictures, and share content with family, friends, and colleagues. The mashup provides users with bucket access for easy file management, enables website backups, and offers image filtering capabilities. It integrates with S3 APIs for real-time data synchronization and secure data transfer, making it a robust solution for both personal and professional file sharing needs.

related_apis.title: Amazon S3 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Since 2006 Amazon Web Services has been offering web services commonly known as cloud computing. AWS Provides a reliable, low cost infrastructure platform that powers hundreds of thousands of businesses.
Amazon S3 API, the Simple Storage Service provides a simple web services interface used to store objects using the Amazon online storage infrastructure. Users can then download the data or use the data with other AWS services, such as Amazon Elastic Cloud Computer (EC2). Using this web service, developers can build applications that make use of Internet storage.
The API uses Buckets, Objects, Keys and Operations. An object has four parts: value, key, metadata, and an access control policy. Objects are stored in buckets. The API is REST based. Responses are formatted in JSON.

title: Mashup: D.C. taxi fare calculator
description: A user-friendly calculator designed to estimate taxi fares in Washington, D.C. Utilizing mapping APIs and predefined routes, this tool allows users to select a sample route or manually input a starting and destination address. Users can also interactively adjust the route by dragging map markers. It provides a quick and convenient way to plan taxi fares, although it's important to note that these estimates are not guaranteed and may vary based on actual conditions.

description: A visually enhanced music search tool that leverages mapping technologies to help users discover albums similar to those they already enjoy or are familiar with. By integrating music databases with mapping services, musicmap provides a unique browsing experience where users can visually explore and compare album genres, artists, and styles based on their geographical preferences or interests.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

title: Mashup: Solar Boston
description: An interactive mapping application that visualizes the Solar Boston program, a two-year, $550,000 initiative aimed at increasing solar energy production in the city from 0.5 megawatts to 25 megawatts by 2015. The mashup employs a Flash-based map to provide real-time tracking of solar projects, enabling users to see the progress and distribution of solar installations across the city. It integrates solar energy data with geographic information system (GIS) technologies to offer a comprehensive view of the city's solar energy landscape.

title: Mashup: Intel Video Experience
description: An integrated solution that combines the Intel CPU / Power / Connection Indicator Widget with a video player to provide a seamless viewing experience for users. The mashup monitors system performance, power, and connectivity to adjust the video playback quality in real-time, ensuring uninterrupted and smooth video playback. It leverages system resource monitoring APIs and video encoding technologies to optimize the video streaming based on the user's device capabilities and network conditions.

title: Mashup: emotorpool
description: emotorpool is a free, self-serve carpool or rideshare commuter matching service that utilizes a map-centric interface for user-friendly navigation. The service focuses on facilitating connections between commuters, providing a platform for efficient and cost-effective transportation options. It integrates mapping technologies to help users find and connect with potential rideshare partners based on their commuting routes and schedules.

This mashup combines the news content of CNN with the interactive widget from Sunlight Labs, providing users with an enhanced, data-driven political analysis experience.

title: Mashup: Another Tweet On The Wall
description: Another Tweet On The Wall is a mashup application that provides a free Twitter wall service, enabling users to display tweets in a visually appealing manner. This service filters tweets based on specified keywords and integrates the Twitter API to fetch real-time data. The mashup combines visual design with social media content to create a unique and engaging wall display, suitable for events, promotions, or any setting where real-time social media engagement is desired.
