description: Swyft is a mobile application that provides real-time transit information and enhances the commuting experience through a community of riders collaborating in real-time. It leverages the GTFS Data Exchange API to provide users with up-to-date transit schedules, route planning, and personalized commuting suggestions. The app focuses on improving the efficiency and enjoyment of daily commutes by fostering a collaborative environment among riders.

related_apis.title: GTFS Data Exchange API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The General Transit Feed Specification (GTFS) defines a common format for public transportation schedules, enabling transit agencies and developers to deliver and consume data in a standard structure. The GTFS Data Exchange was built to enable efficient sharing and retrieval of GTFS data. The GTFS Data Exchange API provides developer access to participating agencies and their GTFS feed sources.

title: Mashup: Sumavisos Clasificados
description: Sumavisos Clasificados is a comprehensive classified ads search engine focusing on Latin America and Brazil, offering a wide range of categories including cars, jobs, and properties. The mashup enhances user experience by providing additional value through features such as price comparisons, linking with Wikipedia pages, and relating companies to their LinkedIn profiles. It aggregates and republishes classified ads from various sources, making it a valuable tool for both consumers and businesses in these regions.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: GeoNames API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Geonames is a geographical database with web services that let users extract useful information about different places, such as weather, timezone and post codes. The GeoNames geographical database covers all countries and contains over eight million placenames that are available for download free of charge. Users can edit, correct and add new names using a wiki interface.Geonames provides a suite of Webservices including the following categories:Fulltext searchPlace HierarchyWikipediaPostal CodesReverse GeocodingThe APIs use RESTful protocol and responses vary in format between XML, JSON, CSV, and TXTWhile the GeoNames data is free, the data is available without costs, there is a Service Level Agreement available for premium web services.

related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

related_apis.title: DBpedia API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: DBpedia.org is a community effort to extract structured information from Wikipedia and to make this information available on the Web. DBpedia allows you to ask
sophisticated queries against Wikipedia and to link other datasets on the Web
to Wikipedia data.

related_apis.title: LinkedIn API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
LinkedIn is the world's largest business social networking hub. Launched in 2003, LinkedIn has millions of users and is implemented in over 200 countries. One purpose of the site is to allow registered users to maintain a list of contact details of people with whom they have some level of relationship, called Connections. Users can invite anyone (whether a site user or not) to become a connection.
The LinkedIn API is a RESTful platform that provides a simple, consistent representation of people, companies, jobs, and the interactions and relationships between them. Our query language lets you read data in XML and JSON at the granularity and aggregation that you choose. Use OAuth 1.0a to authorize users and begin making REST API calls using any programming language.The API’s access is restricted to authorized developers.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

related_apis.title: Google Analytics Managment API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Google Analytics Management API to leverage Google's extensive website analytics tools. The API uses GET requests over HTTPS and JSON for requests/returns. Some of the functions available with the API are: List Account, Property and View (Profile) information for a user; manage properties and goals; manage user permissions; and upload cost data to Google Analytics for non-Google paid campaigns. See the extensive documentation for code samples, detailed method descriptions, and more.

title: Mashup: Spific Search
description: A search engine that utilizes the Google Search API to provide instant date refinements and categorical type searches across various content types such as blogs, forums, videos, and stores. It also offers a "quick print" feature for easy document printing.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Google Custom Search API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Custom Search Engine API is a RESTful API that allows developer to get web or image search results data in JSON or Atom format. With the API, developers can add web search and/or site search capabilities to their website, blog or collection of websites.

versions.version_title: Google Custom Search REST API v1

title: Mashup: dishtip
description: dishtip is an innovative semantic mashup that leverages advanced data analysis techniques to provide personalized dish recommendations based on user preferences and location. It integrates data from millions of online reviews, photos, and content to discern the most popular and highly-rated dishes within a user's vicinity. The mashup employs a detailed classification system to analyze user sentiments, dish ingredients, and cuisines, offering tailored suggestions for dining experiences.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Google Single SignOn API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) is an XML standard that allows secure web domains to exchange user authentication and authorization data. Using SAML, an online service provider can contact a separate online identity provider to authenticate users who are trying to access secure content. Google Apps offers a SAML-based Single Sign-On (SSO) service that provides partner companies with full control over the authorization and authentication of hosted user accounts that can access web-based applications like Gmail or Google Calendar. Using the SAML model, Google acts as the service provider and provides services such as Gmail and Partner Start Pages (PSP). Google partners act as identity providers and control usernames, passwords and other information used to identify, authenticate and authorize users for web applications that Google hosts.

related_apis.title: Google Static Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Static Maps API lets you embed a Google Maps image on your webpage without requiring JavaScript or any dynamic page loading. The Google Static Map service creates your map based on URL parameters sent through a standard HTTP request and returns the map as an image you can display on your web page.

related_apis.title: Google Analytics Managment API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Google Analytics Management API to leverage Google's extensive website analytics tools. The API uses GET requests over HTTPS and JSON for requests/returns. Some of the functions available with the API are: List Account, Property and View (Profile) information for a user; manage properties and goals; manage user permissions; and upload cost data to Google Analytics for non-Google paid campaigns. See the extensive documentation for code samples, detailed method descriptions, and more.

related_apis.title: Google OpenID API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google OpenID API lets third-party web sites and applications let visitors sign in using their Google user accounts. The OpenID standard allows users to nor have to set up separate login accounts for different web sites, and conversely, frees web site developers from the task of managing login information and security measures. OpenID achieves this goal by providing a framework in which users can establish an account with an OpenID provider, such as Google, and use that account to sign into any web site that accepts OpenIDs. This page describes how to enable a web site or application to accept a Google user account for federated login.

related_apis.title: Google Geocoding API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Geocoding API is a webservice for the Google Maps API. The Geocoding API provides a direct way to access a geocoder via an HTTP request, though it must be used in conjunction with Google Maps. Additionally, the service allows you to perform the converse operation (turning coordinates into addresses); this process is known as "reverse geocoding." Also, you can choose to limit your search to certain bounded areas (Viewport Biasing) or regions (Region Biasing).

title: Mashup: Cloudient Conference Call Facilitator
description: A cloud-based service that automates the process of scheduling and executing conference calls. Users can input participant phone numbers and a scheduled start time. The application initiates calls to all participants at the specified time, connecting them into a unified conference call session. Post-call, comprehensive reports are generated detailing the attendance and duration of participation for each caller.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: Music Videos Wizard
description: An interactive music video discovery platform that integrates Last.fm listening data with music video streaming services. The Music Videos Wizard allows users to watch music videos of songs they have listened to on Last.fm and also view what their Last.fm friends are currently listening to and watching. The core feature of this mashup is its interactive music wizard, which provides a personalized and engaging music video viewing experience tailored to the user's listening history and social network.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

title: Mashup: Cheap Bulgarian House
description: An interactive map-based service that allows users to search for affordable houses in Bulgaria. The mashup integrates real estate listings with mapping services to provide users with a visual representation of available properties. Users can filter properties by price, location, and other criteria to find the cheapest houses that meet their preferences. The service combines real estate data with mapping technologies to offer a comprehensive and location-aware property search experience.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: openaidNL
description: The openaidNL mashup serves as a transparency portal for the Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs, providing an easy-to-use web interface to access raw IATI data published by the ministry. The platform presents development cooperation activities supported by the Dutch government since 2010, allowing users to search for activities based on country or region, sector, or recipient organization. It emphasizes transparency by not altering or interpreting the data.

related_apis.title: OIPA: Openaid IATI API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: OIPA extracts all published IATI XML files from the IATI Registry and stores them in a PostgreSQL database, that you can access using a RESTful API.

title: Mashup: International Real Estate
description: An online platform that aggregates real estate listings from various international sources, providing a comprehensive view of rental and home sale properties worldwide. The mashup displays properties from different countries, cities, and regions, enabling users to compare prices, locations, and features across a global market. It offers a user-friendly interface for searching, filtering, and viewing detailed property information, including photos, descriptions, and contact details.

related_apis.title: Alexa Web Information Service API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Alexa Web Information Service makes Alexa's repository of information about the traffic and structure of the web available to developers.

versions.version_title: Alexa Web Information Service RPC API

title: Mashup: Coast Rack
description: A music discovery mashup that searches for artist tracks and videos across Last.fm, MusicBrainz, and YouTube. Users can find comprehensive content by artists, integrating multiple data sources for a unified search experience. This mashup leverages APIs from these platforms to provide a broad spectrum of music and video content, focusing on artist-based searches and detailed metadata.

related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

related_apis.title: MusicBrainz API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The MusicBrainz database contains a huge amount of music metadata, which is maintained by the MusicBrainz community. Find information about artists, albums, tracks and labels. Mash the data with your web app, media player, CD ripper, tagger or other applications requiring music metadata. The service's architecture follows the REST design principles. Interaction with the web service is done using HTTP and all content is served in a simple but flexible XML format.

title: Mashup: FindOut
description: FindOut is an innovative iPhone app designed to provide instant access to a wide range of information directly on your phone, making it incredibly convenient for users to find what they need whenever and wherever they are. By leveraging the power of Omgili's advanced search algorithms and SnappyFingers' rapid data extraction capabilities, FindOut delivers accurate and up-to-date information within seconds of a user's query. The app is particularly useful for individuals seeking quick answers to queries across various domains, from general knowledge to specific technical information, making it an indispensable tool for both personal and professional use.

related_apis.title: SnappyFingers API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: SnappyFingers lets you use its Question and Answer based search Engine through this API. The underlying service searches through FAQ files across the Internet.

title: Mashup: Taglets Feeder
description: A WordPress plugin that integrates with Taglets.org to automatically push updates to the Taglets platform whenever a new blog post is published. This plugin streamlines the process of sharing blog content across multiple platforms, enabling real-time synchronization of blog posts with the Taglets social sharing network.

related_apis.title: Taglets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: An open platform for creating and commenting on taggable items. The taglets.org service allows users and developers to create what we call tags, and to follow comments made on those tags as you or other users post such comments. By following a tag, you put yourself in the stream of information flowing from it.

title: Mashup: CrimeinDC.org
description: A crime reporting and mapping application that visualizes criminal incidents in Washington, DC using Google Maps. This mashup combines real-time crime data from various sources with Google's mapping technology to provide residents and law enforcement with an interactive map displaying the location, type, and date of reported crimes across the city. Users can filter by crime type and area to focus on specific concerns and trends. The application aims to enhance public safety awareness and community engagement by providing transparent, location-specific crime information.

title: Mashup: SurfDWorld
description: SurfDWorld is a versatile search and mapping mashup that combines Google Maps, Weather.com, and MSN to provide users with a comprehensive and intuitive tool for exploring the world. It seamlessly integrates mapping services with real-time weather data and search capabilities from MSN, allowing users to search for locations, view detailed maps, and access current weather conditions for any place on the globe. This mashup is particularly useful for travelers, researchers, and anyone looking for a quick and easy way to explore the world through a combination of visual and textual information.

related_apis.title: Weather Channel API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: (This API is now part of IBM Cloud's The Weather Company APIs) From their site: Since 1982, The Weather Channel has brought timely weather information to the world. Now you can include weather from The Weather Channel in your own application by signing up for access to our XML data feed. We'll enable you to search for a location and to integrate current conditions and the forecast for today and tomorrow in your application for free.

title: Mashup: RepeaterStore Automated Tracking
description: An automated order tracking system designed for customers of RepeaterStore.com. This mashup utilizes real-time data feeds from the RepeaterStore.com backend to provide customers with up-to-date information on the status of their orders. By integrating with the RepeaterStore.com API, users can track their packages from the moment they are shipped until they are delivered, ensuring transparency and peace of mind throughout the delivery process.

title: Mashup: FlightCHECK - Anywhere Flight Information
description: A mobile-based flight information service that enables users to check national and international flights in real-time. Users can send a flight's tail number (e.g., NZ1) to the YouTXTs 8808 shortcode and receive instant updates on the flight's status, including arrival, departure, and delay information. This service integrates with flight tracking APIs and leverages SMS messaging to provide timely, location-independent flight updates.

related_apis.title: YouTXT API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The YouTXT API lets you create and manage distinct codes and messages on the YouTXT system (New Zealand based). Imagine a gig guide, an order tracking system or updates via SMS. The user just sends a code to 8808 for information.
Coverage: New Zealand, but international service is available upon request.

title: Mashup: bugaword
description: A platform that demonstrates the quality of automated translations by allowing users to input sentences and select target languages. The system then translates the input sentence into the chosen language and subsequently retranslates it back to the original language for comparison.

related_apis.title: Google Cloud Translation API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: This version is currently in beta. The Google Cloud Translation API is a part of Google's larger Cloud Machine Learning API family. This API translates text between thousands of language pairs, with new features for this latest version that includes; Glossaries and Batch requests. It enables you with the ability to create a custom dictionary to correctly and consistently translate terms that are customer-specific and to make an asynchronous request to translate large amounts of text. The Cloud Translation API lets developers programmatically integrate the service with third party sites and applications.

versions.version_title: Google Cloud Translation REST API v3.0

title: Mashup: Motion Chart Gadget
description: An official Google Gadget utilizing the Visualization API to create an interactive and dynamic flash-based chart. This gadget allows users to explore multiple indicators over time, providing a visual representation of data trends. It requires the input of specific data columns: bubble name, time, and two columns of numeric values.

related_apis.title: Google Visualization API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Visualization JavaScript API lets you access structured data and visualize that data using JavaScript in your web pages. The Google Visualization API also enables the creation of gadgets.

title: Mashup: YPlaces
description: YPlaces is a mashup that provides access to over six million places through the Yahoo! GeoPlanet API. It presents this vast dataset in a structured format resembling a family tree, allowing users to explore hierarchical relationships between places such as siblings, children, and parents. This service is ideal for anyone needing comprehensive geospatial data and the ability to visualize complex place relationships.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Internet Location Platform API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: a resource for managing all geo-permanent named places on Earth. Our purpose in creating the Internet Location Platform is to provide the Yahoo! Geographic Developer Community with the vocabulary and grammar to describe the world's geography in an unequivocal, permanent, and language-neutral manner. The Internet Location Platform is designed to facilitate spatial interoperability and geographic discovery; users can traverse the spatial hierarchy, identify the geography relevant to their users and their business, and in turn, unambiguously geotag, geotarget, and geolocate data across the Web.

versions.version_title: Yahoo Internet Location Platform REST API

title: Mashup: Hashtag Suggestions
description: A social media tool that provides users with a list of relevant hashtags for a given topic based on their popularity. Users can input a topic into the search box, and the tool will return a list of hashtags associated with that topic, with the size of each hashtag indicating its popularity.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: Tunisian Prison Map
description: A comprehensive mapping application that integrates a database of Tunisian prisons with Google Maps, YouTube videos, Flash animations, and Yahoo Q Beta search to provide users with detailed information about the location, conditions, and human rights abuses within these prisons. This mashup serves as a powerful tool for those interested in understanding the context and situation of prisons in Tunisia, offering a multi-dimensional view that includes visual, auditory, and text-based information.

title: Mashup: Map Channels
description: A customizable Google Map embedding service that integrates various data sources such as KML and GeoRSS feeds. It allows developers to embed these maps on their websites with options to include an index sidebar, map filters, and search channels. This mashup provides a flexible platform for displaying and interacting with geospatial data on the web.

title: Mashup: JoomFlix JF Crowd
description: An extension for Joomla that integrates Amazon Mechanical Turk's crowdsourcing capabilities, enabling site owners to create and manage Human Intelligence Tasks (HITs) for site evaluations. This mashup allows for the review and processing of user-generated content through crowdsourced labor, enhancing site assessment and user feedback collection.

related_apis.title: PayPal API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: PayPal offers online payment solutions and has more than 153 million customers worldwide. The PayPal API makes powerful functionality available to developers by exposing various features of the PayPal platform. Functionality includes but is not limited to invoice management, transaction processing and account management.

related_apis.title: Amazon Mechanical Turk API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Amazon Mechanical Turk provides a web services API for computers to integrate Artificial Artificial Intelligence directly into their processing by making requests of humans. Developers use the Amazon Mechanical Turk web services API to submit tasks to the Amazon Mechanical Turk web site, approve completed tasks, and incorporate the answers into their software applications. To the application, the transaction looks very much like any remote procedure call - the application sends the request, and the service returns the results. In reality, a network of humans fuels this Artificial Artificial Intelligence by coming to the web site, searching for and completing tasks, and receiving payment for their work.

title: Mashup: Twitter Sentiment
description: A visual data analysis tool that leverages Twitter's vast dataset to provide real-time sentiment analysis. This mashup utilizes the Google Chart API to visually represent positive and negative sentiments expressed on Twitter, enabling users to understand the public's mood and opinions on various topics. By integrating Twitter's public API with the Google Chart API, the mashup provides an interactive and dynamic way to monitor social media sentiment, making it a valuable tool for social media monitoring, public relations, and sentiment analysis in general.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: Vakantieglobe.nl
description: An interactive mapping mashup designed for users seeking vacation homes and tourist attractions across Europe. The platform provides a user-friendly interface for exploration, allowing users to search for and discover properties, plan travel routes, and access information about various tourist destinations. It integrates geographical data with real-time property listings and tourist information, offering a comprehensive view of European vacation options. The mashup is suitable for travelers planning vacations in Europe, providing them with the ability to visualize and plan their journeys.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: Location based Instagram Photos
description: A geolocation-based mashup that combines Google Maps' location services with Instagram's photo-sharing platform to display user-submitted photos based on their GPS coordinates. The mashup defaults to the user's current location and presents the photos in a flip-board style gallery, providing a visually engaging way to explore local Instagram content.

related_apis.title: Instagram Graph API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Instagram is a photo sharing iPhone app and service. Users take photos and can share them with Instagram contacts, as well as friends on other social networks like Twitter and Facebook. The Instagram API provides access to user authentication, friend connections, photos and all the other elements of the iPhone app--including uploading new media.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: jQuery Lifestream
description: A customizable jQuery plugin that aggregates and displays a real-time stream of a user's online activity, including updates from social media platforms, blog posts, and other online interactions. The mashup provides a dynamic, interactive dashboard that can be tailored to display specific types of activity, making it a versatile tool for personal or professional use.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: del.icio.us API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: del.icio.us is a social bookmarking website -- the primary use of del.icio.us is to store your bookmarks online, which allows you to access the same bookmarks from any computer and add bookmarks from anywhere, too. On del.icio.us, you can use tags to organize and remember your bookmarks, which is a much more flexible system than folders.
The API provides read/write access to Delicious bookmarks and tags via an HTTP-based interface. The RESTful API returns responses in XML.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

related_apis.title: SlideShare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: SlideShare is the world's largest community for sharing presentations on the web. The current API is based upon the REST model and allows you to perform the following actions: Uploading Presentation(s), Retrieving EmbedCode for Slideshow(s), Retrieving Slideshows for User(s), Retrieving Slideshows for Tag(s), Retrieving Slideshows for Group(s)

related_apis.title: Vimeo API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Let Vimeo take care of all your video needs. Their API handles uploading, transcoding, hosting and playback of any video type. Embed the videos in your own website, or share them with the large community of filmmakers that call Vimeo home. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON

related_apis.title: Tumblr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Tumblr API allows users to read and write Tumblr blog and post data, retrieve posts by tags, get user information, follow blogs and like posts. Data is formatted in JSON and support for JSONP is included.

related_apis.title: Reddit API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Reddit API allows you to access the user submitted and rated stories on reddit.com. It also provides advanced functionality, including user account information and sub-reddit moderation.

related_apis.title: GitHub API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: GitHub is a repository of public open source and private business code. Is is a fast, efficient, distributed version control system ideal for the collaborative development of software. Use it to fork projects, send pull requests, monitor development.

related_apis.title: Foursquare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Foursquare Places API provides location based experiences with diverse information about venues, users, photos, and check-ins. The API supports real time access to places, Snap-to-Place that assigns users to specific locations, and Geo-tag. Additionally, Foursquare allows developers to build audience segments for analysis and measurement. JSON is the preferred response format.

related_apis.title: Google Reader Subscriber Statistics API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Returns a publicly available XML, JSON or JSONP response for any RSS feed and shows Google Reader stats about that feed. Uses REST protocol.

versions.version_title: Google Reader Subscriber Statistics REST API

related_apis.title: Dribbble API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Dribbble API provides access to the webdesign showcases on dribbble.com. You can access individual shots, players, comments, and more details.
Note: As of Dec. 2010, no API key is required, but according to the site, this will likely change (as well as the API call limit).

related_apis.title: Pinboard API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Pinboard is a social bookmarking tool with an API patterned off of Yahoo's popular Delicious service. Create, tag and search bookmarks. Write applications based off aggregated knowledge of public bookmarks, or a particular user's public bookmarks. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are formatted in XML and JSON.

related_apis.title: PicPlz API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Photo sharing mobile application picplz has a new API that has entered beta. The service provides read/write access to the picplz platform for sharing and editing photos. Developers can upload photos and use filter effects including "Instant Film," "Russian Toy Camera," "the 70s" and "High Contrast Monochrome." The API also provides read access to others' photos. Like its mobile apps, the API likely lets you add a caption and tag your location.

related_apis.title: Forrst API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Forrst is a community for designers and developers to connect and share their work. Users of Forrst can share links, screenshots of their current projects and code to help their fellow developers. The Forrst API provides access to all these types of posts, as well as user information. Applications can authenticate users to retrieve additional information.
This API is in beta, with write methods planned soon.

title: Mashup: twitree
description: A visual representation of your Twitter followers in a hierarchical tree structure, providing a clear and interactive view of your social network. This mashup integrates Twitter's API to fetch follower data and presents it in a tree format, allowing users to explore their network visually and understand the relationships between their followers. It is optimized for users who want to gain insights into their social connections and network structures on Twitter.

description: A social networking tool designed for Twitter users that identifies and visualizes the relationships between the user's followers. The mashup uses Twitter's API to retrieve and analyze the network of followers, displaying a graphical representation of the connections between them. This allows users to discover mutual friends and explore the social graph within their Twitter community. The mashup is particularly useful for individuals who want to better understand their social connections and for those interested in the social dynamics of online communities.

title: Mashup: Documents To Go
description: Documents To Go is a mobile productivity application that integrates with Box.net, allowing users to seamlessly access, edit, and save documents stored in their Box.net account from within the Documents To Go app. This service provides a convenient way for users to work on files on the go, combining cloud storage capabilities with mobile office tools.

related_apis.title: Box API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Box is a modern content management platform that transforms how organizations work and collaborate to achieve results faster.Box Platform provides content APIs to build secure content experiences in custom apps. With Box Platform, organizations can bring content management and collaboration services to their own custom apps or build custom integrations with Box.

title: Mashup: Flightradar24
description: A real-time air traffic monitoring system that allows users to track live aircraft movements globally. The mashup uses data from various sources, including ADS-B (Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast), Mode S, and MLAT (Multilateration) systems, to provide up-to-date information on flights in progress. It is particularly useful for aviation enthusiasts, pilots, and air traffic controllers who need to monitor flight activities continuously.

title: Mashup: Polldaddy
description: Polldaddy is an online survey software designed to help users create surveys and polls tailored to their brand, budget, and vision. It provides a platform for collecting feedback through various channels including web, email, iPad, and social networks. Users can easily generate and share comprehensive reports based on the collected data. The mashup integrates data collection and analysis tools, making it a versatile solution for market research and audience engagement.

related_apis.title: Automattic Wordpress Widgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Wordpress developers could find Automattic API useful, since this application offers widgets' documentation. The main value of this API could be the wide variety of widgets that a developer can create. This API provides theme functions that help to make a theme function. It also provides widget registration functions that can be used to make previous functions invalid for an improved user experience. As developers visit Automattic API, they will have access to a support forum and contact form. Also, they will get familiar with the corporate culture, to facilitate the creation of multiple web applications.

title: Mashup: Call Mom
description: A mobile platform facilitating brand-customer interactions during the shopping process. CallMom enables brands to engage directly with customers, capture immediate feedback, and enhance the shopping experience through real-time interactions, leveraging customer relationship management techniques and mobile commerce technologies.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: Synesica
description: Synesica is a fragrance recommendation service that uses the ScentSee API to compile a comprehensive index of perfumes based on expert opinions and customer reviews. The Mashup offers recommendations based on various scent attributes such as aquatic, spicy, and citric, allowing users to customize their experience. Additionally, Synesica provides a lifestyle test to generate personalized fragrance recommendations, enhancing the user's shopping experience by integrating fragrance preferences with e-commerce functionalities.

related_apis.title: Scalarium API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Scalarium is a cloud hosting service that aims to help fulfill their clients' hosting needs through server management and associated services. Scalarium's servers are hosting using Amazon's EC2 cloud platform. Scalarium offers auto-scaling, server monitoring, logging and reporting, and technical support. A range of pricing options are available, as users pay per server per hour based on server type.
The Scalarium API is a RESTful web service that exposes the functionality for managing and interacting with their servers. Users can list and create clouds, create and run instances, list and deploy applications, and gather status and logs at a per instance level.

title: Mashup: Twitter Power Search
description: An advanced real-time Twitter feed and search tool offering iGoogle-style drag and drop functionality, enhanced with Twitter Power Search capabilities. Users can search for current daily and weekly trends, as well as specific content types like TwitPics and audio, providing a comprehensive view of social media activity.

related_apis.title: Blip.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Blip.fm API to access Blip.fm users and their data. Get a Blip by user ID, or for multiple user IDs. Get the most recent Blips for a user, sequentially listed by most recent. Create your customized music station with Blip.fm. Be your own DJ and then share your station with your friends, or have your friends program your station for you. Share your musical interests with millions.

related_apis.title: TwitPic API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The TwitPic API lets you upload and post images to your Twitter account. You can upload an image for later posting or upload an image to TwitPic and automatically send it as a status update to Twitter.

title: Mashup: JukeboxTube
description: A user-friendly platform that aggregates YouTube music videos into a personalized, interactive playlist, allowing users to enjoy a wide range of songs without the need to upload or manage their own music files. By leveraging the vast library of YouTube, JukeboxTube offers a seamless, on-demand music experience, making it ideal for individuals who prefer to stream their favorite tunes directly from the internet. It combines video streaming, music playlist creation, and user-friendly navigation to provide an engaging and hassle-free music listening environment.

related_apis.title: Tixik API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Tixik.com API lets users retrieve information about famous places around the world. Tixik.com is the information website about interesting places all over the world. The information is supplied with on-line maps, pictures, and useful information and experience described by the travellers. Users can find a listing of famous places by providing the latitude and longitude of their current location. Search simply by GPS position. The result is GPS, place name, description, image, and backlink to Tixik.com (for more information). The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are formatted in XML.

related_apis.title: Wolfram Alpha API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Wolfram|Alpha is a "computational knowledge engine" whose long-term goal is "to make all systematic knowledge immediately computable and accessible to everyone. We aim to collect and curate all objective data; implement every known model, method, and algorithm; and make it possible to compute whatever can be computed about anything." It contains 10+ trillion of pieces of data, 50,000+ types of algorithms and models, and linguistic capabilities for 1000+ domains.
The API provides two general classes of queries. At the highest level, you can submit free-form queries like users might enter at the Wolfram|Alpha site itself, and get back full Wolfram|Alpha output in a variety of formats. The second type of query is a lower-level request for a single well-defined result, or range of results, from their entity/property-based data API, such as a caloric value for a food item, or a tide table for a requested location

related_apis.title: Foursquare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Foursquare Places API provides location based experiences with diverse information about venues, users, photos, and check-ins. The API supports real time access to places, Snap-to-Place that assigns users to specific locations, and Geo-tag. Additionally, Foursquare allows developers to build audience segments for analysis and measurement. JSON is the preferred response format.

related_apis.title: Google Maps Places API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google Maps Places API is a service that returns information about a "place": an establishment, a geographic location, or prominent point of interest using an HTTP request. Place requests specify locations as latitude/longitude coordinates.
Methods are available for place search, details, photos, and autocomplete queries. The Places API returns mapping data in JSON and XML formats, after making URI requests, and authenticating with API Key.

related_apis.title: Google Latitude API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google Latitude API allows for websites and developers to integrate with Google Latitude, which lets users update and read their current location, their location history, and other geo-related information.
In Latitude, a location is a record of where a user was at a given time. A location always contains a latitude, a longitude and a timestamp. It might also contain more details about the position of the user at that time, such as altitude, or metadata about how the position itself was captured, such as accuracy.
A user typically has a current location, which represents the most recent known position of the user. In some cases, however, a user might decide to temporarily hide, making their position invisible to Latitude friends. A hidden user has no current location.
A user can opt to have their locations stored as a time series by Google. This collection of positions is called the user's location history.

title: Mashup: GeoCam
description: GeoCam is a location-based video streaming service that combines Google Latitude and Google Maps to provide users with real-time access to live camera feeds from around the world. The mashup integrates GPS data from Google Latitude with Google Maps to display the locations of these cameras as markers on the map. By clicking on these markers, users can view the live camera streams directly on the map, offering a unique and immersive way to explore different locations in real time.

description: A humorous and social mashup that aggregates tweets containing the phrase "Keep Calm And" and presents them in a light-hearted manner, encouraging users to stay positive and share uplifting messages with their networks. The mashup utilizes the Twitter API to collect real-time tweets and filters them based on the specified keyword. It then displays the tweets in a visually appealing format, often incorporating elements of surprise and whimsy to engage users. This mashup is ideal for users seeking a break from routine and a dose of good humor, and can be particularly effective during times of stress or uncertainty. It operates within the constraints of Twitter's API and does not store or manipulate user data beyond what is necessary for the display of tweets.

title: Mashup: Reesio + DocuSign
description: Reesio + DocuSign is an integrated solution for the real estate industry that streamlines the transaction process through electronic signatures, document management, and property showings. Agents, clients, and third parties can electronically sign documents, manage property showings, offers, and messages, and store documents in one centralized platform. This mashup is designed to enhance the efficiency and security of real estate transactions by providing a user-friendly interface and seamless integration of these services.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: Call The News
description: Call The News is a voice-based news reporting platform that allows users to make phone calls to record their local news reports. These recordings are instantly processed and published on the platform for global sharing. The mashup leverages voice recording technologies and web publishing tools to facilitate real-time news dissemination across international borders.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: SingRing
description: SingRing is an integrated music and lyrics platform that provides access to over 2,000,000 fully licensed song lyrics and over 2,000 high-quality karaoke tracks. Through its exclusive partnerships with major music publishers, SingRing offers a unique service that can be seamlessly embedded across various platforms including web, mobile, television, and live events. This mashup combines music content with interactive features, making it an ideal solution for anyone looking to enhance their digital experiences with professional-level music content.

related_apis.title: Google Custom Search API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Custom Search Engine API is a RESTful API that allows developer to get web or image search results data in JSON or Atom format. With the API, developers can add web search and/or site search capabilities to their website, blog or collection of websites.

versions.version_title: Google Custom Search REST API v1

title: Mashup: Deki Wiki Digg Extension
description: A plugin for the Deki Wiki platform that integrates Digg's social news service, enabling users to access and display Digg stories within their wiki environment. The extension provides a seamless way to embed Digg content, allowing for real-time updates and community-driven news aggregation directly on Deki Wiki pages. It leverages API services to fetch and display Digg stories, enriching the wiki experience with dynamic, up-to-date news content.

related_apis.title: MindTouch Deki Wiki API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: REST-based API with 99 methods that expose MindTouch Deki Wiki's complete functionality. Deki Wiki is also a mashup platform. Download the source code or VMware certified package.

title: Mashup: NZ Herald Restaurant Guide
description: An online restaurant directory and review platform that aggregates restaurant information from various sources, including user reviews and ratings. It primarily focuses on restaurants in New Zealand but also includes international options. The mashup provides users with a comprehensive view of restaurant menus, prices, photos, and user experiences, allowing them to make informed decisions about dining out.

title: Mashup: Finda Park
description: An urban park locator application that uses open data from Seattle's official data portal (data.seattle.gov) to provide users with a simple and intuitive way to find parks within the Seattle area based on their zip code. The app leverages mapping APIs to display park locations on an interactive map, allowing users to quickly identify and navigate to their nearest park. It incorporates telephony capabilities to enable users to call park information hotlines directly from the app, enhancing the user's ability to access park details and services.

related_apis.title: Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Bing Maps REST Services is a REST API that allows you to perform tasks like finding an address, retrieving a map with a pushpin and a label, or getting driving directions. It provides a way to create a static map with pushpins, geocoding an address, retrieving imagery metadata, or creating a route etc. Microsoft Bing is a web search engine.

title: Mashup: Enchanting destinations
description: A comprehensive travel search and booking platform that aggregates data from the Cleartrip API to provide users with a seamless experience for both domestic and international travel planning. The mashup combines advanced search capabilities with real-time booking features, allowing users to easily find and book flights, hotels, and other travel services, while also providing detailed information about destinations and attractions.

related_apis.title: Cleartrip API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Cleartrip API to integrate Cleartrip.com searching and booking results into your web app, desktop app, or mobile app. Cleartrip tries to make travel simple: "We are geeks and we use really cool technology to make some amazing travel related apps."

title: Mashup: Postea.me
description: Postea.me is a service that allows users to update their Twitter account by making a phone call and having their voice recording automatically sent out as a tweet. This innovative platform is the first of its kind to offer this functionality in Spanish, providing a convenient and accessible way for individuals to share their thoughts and updates with their followers without needing an internet connection or smartphone.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: Square Grader
description: A free tool that utilizes the Foursquare API to measure and display the activity and engagement levels (mojo) of a user's Foursquare profile, offering insights into their social connectivity and influence.

related_apis.title: Foursquare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Foursquare Places API provides location based experiences with diverse information about venues, users, photos, and check-ins. The API supports real time access to places, Snap-to-Place that assigns users to specific locations, and Geo-tag. Additionally, Foursquare allows developers to build audience segments for analysis and measurement. JSON is the preferred response format.

title: Mashup: Oakland Software
description: Oakland Software is an enterprise solution that provides an Eclipse-based EDI mapping and translation product called ODT. Its standout feature is the integration of an Enterprise Service Bus (ESB) for runtime translation, enabling real-time data processing and synchronization. Complementing ODT, EDInow is a comprehensive network management system that manages EDI maps, performs live translations, handles ESB data sources at runtime, and offers advanced network management capabilities for EDI transactions.

related_apis.title: ECGridOS EDI API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: ECGridOS is the only API-based (over 110 functions) network platform granting complete operational authority to developers. Generic EDI communications are primitive (FTP/VAN mailboxes), but ECGridOS offers true node-level attachment and routing at your command. There are benefits to having such an authoritative IAAS network model, including retaining control over network accounts, user sessions, and infrastructure configuration. B2B Software OEMs and B2B Cloud operators know that control of the network is crucial when you operate multi-tenant systems that require a rational, hierarchical user account model.

title: Mashup: SwingVine
description: A social discovery platform that allows users to explore music, movies, books, fashion, and wines based on social recommendations. Users can sign up and engage with the community to find personalized content suggestions, leveraging social media data and user preferences to enhance the discovery process.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Windows Live Contacts API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Windows Live Contacts API is an HTTP-based service that enables developers to programmatically submit queries to and retrieve results from the Windows Live Contacts Address Book database.

related_apis.title: Google Contacts API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Contacts Data API allows client applications to view and update Contacts content in the form of Google Data API feeds. Your client application can request a list of a user's contacts, edit or delete content in an existing contact, and query the content in an existing contact.

title: Mashup: Mitsubishi Locator UK
description: A specialized automotive dealer locator mashup tailored for the UK, focusing on Mitsubishi dealers. This mashup combines automotive industry databases with precise geographical mapping to provide users with accurate and real-time information about Mitsubishi dealerships in the UK. The mashup is designed to enhance the user experience by offering a seamless way to find and connect with local Mitsubishi dealers, whether for service, parts, or new vehicle purchases. It integrates data from various automotive industry sources with geolocation services to ensure that users can easily locate the nearest Mitsubishi dealership based on their current or specified location.

related_apis.title: Multimap API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: One-stop service for global AJAX mapping, routing, geocoding, searching and POI from Europeï¿½s #1 provider of mapping and location services to consumers and businesses.

title: Mashup: Fast Nosh
description: A comprehensive platform that leverages user-generated content to facilitate search, rating, and review functionalities for local restaurants. The mashup enables users to discover new dining establishments, compare and contrast diverse food options, and leave feedback based on their personal experiences. It integrates restaurant data with mapping services and user reviews to provide an immersive local food discovery experience.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Suggest Me Movie
description: A personalized film recommendation service that allows users to select their preferred mood to receive tailored movie suggestions. The mashup provides instant access to trailers, detailed information about directors and casts, and incorporates user reviews to enhance the recommendation process. It integrates social media features, video streaming services, and film databases to offer a comprehensive and interactive movie discovery experience.

title: Mashup: inFobiliaria.es Real Estate Spain
description: An integrated mapping solution that combines Google Earth and Google Maps to provide real estate agents in Spain with an advanced platform for showcasing and managing real estate listings. This mashup leverages the power of geospatial technology to enhance the visibility and accessibility of real estate properties, making it easier for agents to connect with potential buyers and investors. The platform supports multilingual content, particularly in Spanish, and offers robust search and navigation capabilities for both agents and users, facilitating a seamless real estate transaction experience.

related_apis.title: EarthTools API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: EarthTools is a collection of webservices for finding out geographical-related information. There are currently three services available for finding the time zone or local time, the sunrise and sunset times, and the elevation/height above sea level at a given latitude and longitude.

title: Mashup: ZoomGet
description: A comprehensive e-commerce search tool that leverages the Amazon API to filter through millions of products based on user reviews. The mashup focuses on identifying and recommending top-rated items across various categories such as books, movies, electronics, computers, home items, and more. By analyzing review data, ZoomGet helps users make informed purchasing decisions by highlighting products that have received high satisfaction ratings from actual consumers.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

title: Mashup: Taxi fare calculator for Greece
description: A comprehensive, location-based taxi fare calculator application tailored for Greece. The mashup utilizes the Google Maps API to provide real-time traffic information and Mapquest's Open Directions service to calculate optimal routes. It employs a predictive traffic forecasting model to estimate travel time and calculates fares based on the actual distance traveled and local taxi fare rates. The application is designed to help users efficiently plan their journeys and budget their taxi expenses, providing a valuable tool for travelers and locals alike.

related_apis.title: MapQuest Open Directions API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: This API is the open version of MapQuest's Directions API. It is based on OpenStreetMap data and can also provide results internationally. The service provides routing between two or more latitude/longitude points and includes driving, walking, biking and transit directions.

related_apis.title: Google Geocoding API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Geocoding API is a webservice for the Google Maps API. The Geocoding API provides a direct way to access a geocoder via an HTTP request, though it must be used in conjunction with Google Maps. Additionally, the service allows you to perform the converse operation (turning coordinates into addresses); this process is known as "reverse geocoding." Also, you can choose to limit your search to certain bounded areas (Viewport Biasing) or regions (Region Biasing).

title: Mashup: Tyke SMS - Web SMS gateway and more
description: Tyke SMS is a web-based software solution that enables users to send and receive SMS messages through a web interface or email, regardless of their mobile service provider's capabilities. The service leverages SMS gateway technology to bridge the gap between email, web, and SMS communications. This mashup integrates with various SMS gateway APIs to facilitate seamless messaging across different platforms.

This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: WhereAndWifi.com
description: A socially-driven wifi locator mashup that utilizes social networking and mapping technologies to help users find and connect to wifi hotspots near their location. Users can view essential details about nearby hotspots, such as signal strength, network type, and available bandwidth. The mashup encourages collaboration by allowing users to rate wifi speeds, share their favorite wifi locations, and contribute to a community-driven database of wifi hotspots. Real-time updates and user-generated content ensure that the information remains accurate and up-to-date.
