title: Mashup: Renewable and Nuclear Energy Widget
description: An interactive widget that displays up-to-date data graphs for the top countries leading in energy production from renewable, hydro, nuclear, and fossil energy sources. It leverages data provided by carma.org to offer users a dynamic view of energy production trends, allowing for a deeper understanding of global energy dynamics and sustainability efforts.

related_apis.title: Carma API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Carbon Monitoring for Action (CARMA) is a massive database containing carbon emissions data of over 50,000 power plants and 4,000 power companies worldwide. CARMA is the first global inventory of a major, emissions-producing sector of the economy.

title: Mashup: PrestaShop module using Fotolia
description: A PrestaShop module designed for e-commerce websites that integrates the Fotolia image library. This module allows users to browse, search, and filter through a vast collection of high-quality images from Fotolia, enhancing the visual appeal and content of the e-commerce site. The module facilitates seamless integration of Fotolia's images into the website's product listings and other sections, providing a rich and dynamic user experience.

related_apis.title: Fotolia API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Fotolia has created an open Application Programming Interface (API). This API has made it possible for creative people to earn more money through affiliation (Partner API), to integrate Fotolia to your products or services (Business API) or to build applications (software, plugins, widgets) to simply improve the Fotolia experience (Developer API).

title: Mashup: Geographical Media
description: A global mashup that aggregates and analyzes news, statistics, and social media data to provide comprehensive insights into people, companies, and other entities worldwide. Users can access real-time news and statistics, track trends in social media discussions, and gain a deeper understanding of demographic and business landscapes. This mashup utilizes geolocation data to provide region-specific insights and leverages semantic analysis to extract meaningful information from textual content.

related_apis.title: Thomson Reuters Open Calais API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Thomson Reuters Open Calais API (Intelligent Tagging API) provides developers a way to take unstructured text (e.g. News document, Research reports, etc) and extract the aboutness into a machine-readable XML/RDF format. Metadata is disambiguated and resolved/linked to the Thomson Reuters professional financial data ecosystem.

versions.version_title: Thomson Reuters Open Calais REST API

title: Mashup: PISCO Ecological Data Products Map
description: A comprehensive ecological data visualization tool that integrates PISCO's diverse datasets to provide users with detailed insights into the distribution and abundance of various organisms. The mashup enables users to select specific species and view their ecological profiles, including distribution maps, abundance data, and survey site metadata. By leveraging PISCO's extensive data sources, this tool supports advanced environmental research and educational efforts, facilitating a deeper understanding of coastal ecosystems and the impact of human activities on marine life.

related_apis.title: Amazon S3 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Since 2006 Amazon Web Services has been offering web services commonly known as cloud computing. AWS Provides a reliable, low cost infrastructure platform that powers hundreds of thousands of businesses.
Amazon S3 API, the Simple Storage Service provides a simple web services interface used to store objects using the Amazon online storage infrastructure. Users can then download the data or use the data with other AWS services, such as Amazon Elastic Cloud Computer (EC2). Using this web service, developers can build applications that make use of Internet storage.
The API uses Buckets, Objects, Keys and Operations. An object has four parts: value, key, metadata, and an access control policy. Objects are stored in buckets. The API is REST based. Responses are formatted in JSON.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

title: Mashup: Fresh Logic Atlas
description: Fresh Logic Atlas is a versatile mashup application that integrates various data sources to provide comprehensive local information on a Virtual Earth map. Users can find up-to-date information on gas prices, movie showtimes, restaurant menus, traffic conditions, local events, WiFi hotspots, and driving directions. The mashup leverages geolocation capabilities to display relevant information based on the user's location or specified destination. It combines multiple APIs for data retrieval, ensuring that users have access to the latest and most accurate information for planning their day-to-day activities.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: ezShare Pro and Box.net
description: A file management application for iOS that integrates with Box.net, providing users with the ability to view and control their Box files directly through the app. The mashup leverages the Box API to enable seamless file management on mobile devices, enhancing user convenience for file handling and synchronization.

related_apis.title: Box API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Box is a modern content management platform that transforms how organizations work and collaborate to achieve results faster.Box Platform provides content APIs to build secure content experiences in custom apps. With Box Platform, organizations can bring content management and collaboration services to their own custom apps or build custom integrations with Box.

title: Mashup: where? what? when?
description: A location-based photo exploration tool that utilizes Flickr's geotagged photos to provide insights into the distribution of photos across various locations. The tool enables users to visualize and analyze where their Flickr photos are geographically distributed, as well as to explore and discover which places have the highest concentration of photos, such as the example given for Paris. It combines mapping technology with social media photo data to offer an interactive and informative experience for users interested in both their own photo collection and public photo trends.

The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: MyMapChat
description: A location-based messaging and chat service that allows users to send text messages and images to specific groups or individuals on an interactive map interface. MyMapChat leverages the Google Maps API to enable users to create and share their own customized mashups, even without prior knowledge of the API. It facilitates real-time communication and content sharing through a user-friendly, map-based interface.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Powerpoint Slideshow
description: A versatile tool that allows users to seamlessly integrate PowerPoint presentations into an interactive widget format, enabling dynamic slide shows with enhanced features such as real-time updates, responsive design, and customizable playback controls. This mashup optimizes the presentation experience by leveraging advanced widget technology and presentation APIs to create engaging and accessible content.

title: Mashup: Blue Home Finder
description: Blue Home Finder is a real estate search platform that aggregates information on all single-family homes, condos, townhouses, and commercial properties for sale and rent in Florida. The mashup offers a seamless search experience by integrating property data from multiple sources, providing detailed information, and featuring high-quality photos for each listing. It combines real estate listings with mapping services to offer location-based search capabilities and visual aids for potential buyers and renters.

title: Mashup: Real Estate Tools
description:
A comprehensive suite of real estate tools designed for users across the spectrum of property transactions, including buyers, sellers, and real estate professionals. The mashup leverages integrated mapping technologies to provide detailed insights into property locations, surrounding areas, and market conditions. Key features include:
- School proximity mapping to assess the quality of education near properties.
- Detailed city information overlays to help understand the urban environment and its impact on property value.
- Street view integration for a more immersive and accurate property visualization.
- Interactive tools for analyzing property details, market trends, and comparing properties based on various criteria.
- Geolocation-based services to ensure that all data is relevant to the user's location, enhancing the relevance and utility of the tools.
- Real-time updates and integration with multiple data sources to provide up-to-date information on real estate markets and trends.
These tools are designed to streamline the real estate process, providing a seamless experience from initial research to final decision-making.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. related_apis.title: Panoramio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
(Deprecated in November, 2016) Using Panoramio API users can display the photos from Panoramio on their own web site. Geolocated photos from Panoramio can enrich maps or illustrate information where location is a important factor (real estate sites, hotels and vacation sites, routes & trails).
Panoramio is a website that enables digital photographers to geolocate, store and organize their photographsï¿½and to view those photographs in Google Earth and Google Maps. Panoramio is a community-powered site for exploring places through photography: cities, natural wonders, or anywhere you might go. Panoramio is different from other photo sharing sites because the photos illustrate places. As you browse Panoramio, notice that there aren't many photos of friends and family posing in front of places, or photos of interesting surfaces--Panoramio's all about seeing the world.
The Panoramio API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in JSON.

title: Mashup: Mygeoland
description: A location-based search mashup that utilizes Virtual Earth's mapping platform to provide geolocation services specifically tailored for Australia, enabling users to search and locate places across the country with enhanced accuracy and detail.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: Canvas prints
description: A service that allows users to order custom portrait paintings on canvas, tailored for personal gifts such as for parents or other family members. The mashup integrates with various printing and artwork services to provide a personalized and professional printing process, from design to delivery.

related_apis.title: 18amail API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: An API to remotely connect to the 18amail.co.uk email marketing service. Quick and simple to hook up to an existing membership based website and populate your 18amail mailing lists. Then send out and track email newsletters.

related_apis.title: 140 Proof API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The 140 Proof API gives users programmatic access to the 140 Proof service. 140 Proof delivers 140 character brand messages postioned directly above the Twitter stream to targeted users based on their interests, using public Twitter data. The API uses RESTful calls and responses can be formatted in either XML, JSON and HTML.

related_apis.title: 123ContactForm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: 123ContactForm is a cloud-based form builder that allows users to build and administrate web and mobile contact forms, online registrations, surveys, e-commerce forms and any other custom form. The 123ContactForm API enables users to retrieve data about their forms, form fields, submissions and submissions count, then use them with external applications and databases.

related_apis.title: 1Map API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: 1Map aims to provide basic GIS services to users throughout South Africa. At this stage, users can employ an address search in which multiple layers, including street addresses and stand numbers, can be displayed. Users may also download diagrams obtained from the Surveyor General's office. All 1Map services are currently provided for free and can be accessed programmatically via REST API.

title: Mashup: Shahi
description: A visual dictionary mashup that combines Wiktionary's extensive word definitions with a variety of images sourced from Flickr and other platforms. The mashup provides a rich, multimedia experience for learning and understanding words through both text and visual representation, enhancing the traditional dictionary's functionality with engaging imagery.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Wikipedia API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The unofficial Wikipedia API. Because Wikipedia is built using MediaWiki, which in turn supports an API, Wikipedia does as well. This provides developers code-level access to the entire Wikipedia reference. The goal of this API is to provide direct, high-level access to the data contained in the MediaWiki databases. Client programs can use the API to login, get data, and post changes. The API supports thin web-based JavaScript clients, such as Navigation popups or LiveRC, end-user applications (such as vandal fighter), and can be accessed by another web site (tool server's utilities).
The API uses RESTful calls and supports a wide variety of formats including XML, JSON, PHP, YAML and others.

title: Mashup: Periodic Table of Heavy Metal
description: This is an interactive and humorous mashup of a periodic table, but instead of elements, it features top Heavy Metal bands categorized by genre. The mashup utilizes the Echonest and Last.fm APIs to provide detailed information about each band, including images, links to watch music videos, and listen to songs. It also offers users easy navigation to discover more about these bands, enhancing the user experience in the realm of Heavy Metal music.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

title: Mashup: Tag Fight!
description: An interactive, full-screen photo display platform that leverages SMS messaging to facilitate a playful competition between users, determining which images are shown based on text votes. The mashup integrates social media with messaging and mobile functionalities to create a dynamic, engaging experience centered around photo sharing and community engagement.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: Funny Vines - Thebestvines.tv
description: A video search and aggregation tool that compiles Vine videos from a global network, enabling users to discover new humorous content through an intuitive search interface. The mashup leverages Vine's API and external video hosting platforms to compile a comprehensive collection of viral Vine videos, focusing on fun and entertaining content that users may have not seen before.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: HiDef DVD and Blue Ray Shop
description: An e-commerce platform focused on high-definition media products, specifically Blue Ray and DVD movies. HiDef provides a vast selection of over 150,000 titles, including hard-to-find items, and integrates FilmCrave movie reviews, trailers, ratings, and additional information to improve the shopping experience and product knowledge for the user.

related_apis.title: Film Crave API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Update: Data plan now available that includes movie database, release schedule and more. Starting as low as $99.
The FilmCrave API will allow you to reach into our enormous collection of movie reviews, movie ratings, trailers, actors, directors, release dates, and other movie resources. Put our content onto your site. Can be used for small to medium sized websites which lack initial data, in need of movie reviews, or want to be apart of an up and coming social network. If you have a special request for additional data types, let us know. We can customize an API for you.
Update: The free API will not be allowed for Mobile Applications

title: Mashup: Export Reports
description: Export Basecamp projects to a comprehensive PDF report, enabling archiving, sharing, and offline reading capabilities. This mashup now supports the inclusion of images, enhancing the visual representation of project data.

related_apis.title: Basecamp API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From 37signals. Basecamp is a unique project collaboration tool. Projects don't fail from a lack of charts, graphs, or reports, they fail from a lack of communication and collaboration. Basecamp makes it simple to communicate and collaborate on projects. The Basecamp API is implemented as vanilla XML over HTTP.

title: Mashup: Desktop Reporting for Google Analytics - Polaris
description: A cross-platform desktop application for Google Analytics reporting, built with Adobe AIR. Polaris provides 8 standard reports that are instantly available, enabling users to keep their data up-to-date and always accessible from a desktop environment.

related_apis.title: Google Analytics Managment API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Google Analytics Management API to leverage Google's extensive website analytics tools. The API uses GET requests over HTTPS and JSON for requests/returns. Some of the functions available with the API are: List Account, Property and View (Profile) information for a user; manage properties and goals; manage user permissions; and upload cost data to Google Analytics for non-Google paid campaigns. See the extensive documentation for code samples, detailed method descriptions, and more.

title: Mashup: World Airport and Airspace Database
description: A comprehensive, global database of over 11,000 airfields and airports, providing detailed information on both major international airports such as New York, Paris, and London, as well as lesser-known airstrips located in remote areas like Antarctica. This database serves as a valuable resource for aviation enthusiasts, pilots, travelers, and researchers, offering precise data on airport locations, facilities, and operational details.

description: A collaborative mapping platform designed for finding and rating popular pick-up spots based on user contributions. The mashup utilizes geolocation services and social networking features to enable users to discover, share, and rate locations popular for social gatherings and meetups. It combines mapping APIs with social media integration to provide a community-driven guide to the best spots for connecting and socializing.

title: Mashup: CivicVis
description: CivicVis is a prototype mashup designed to leverage the City Council Connect API provided by eGovPDX for the creation of visualization widgets. The primary objective is to develop a comprehensive set of tools that can display and analyze vote counts for city council decisions, tailored for both desktop and blog platforms. This mashup integrates government data with visualization techniques to provide an interactive and informative experience for users interested in local politics and governance.

related_apis.title: PDXCouncilConnect API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
PDXCouncilConnect is a service of the Portland, Oregon, eGovPDX group. The city technology department makes the API available to access city council agenda and voting information. The PDXCouncilConnect API provides developers access to agenda, session, and item information. The data includes the location and time, as well as bureaus affected. When a vote occurs, the API also will return voting information.
This government API has a RESTful interface and provides data as JSON.

title: Mashup: Rendezview
description: A location-based meeting planner that facilitates finding the perfect place for friends to meet up. By inputting both users' locations, travel preferences, and the desired category of venue, Rendezview utilizes geolocation services and a comprehensive database of local businesses to suggest meeting locations that fit the criteria. It streamlines the process of coordinating meetups by leveraging mapping and search functionalities along with social and reference data.

Using the database of over 1.5 million business listings and associated rich content, users can provide dynamic local business data to customers without the need for their own directory.

title: Mashup: Gulf Oil Spill - Latest YouTube Videos
description: This dynamic map-based mashup provides real-time tracking and visualization of the BP gulf oil spill through the latest YouTube videos. It combines geospatial data with video content to offer an interactive and up-to-date view of the incident's progression. Users can monitor the spill's development, access multimedia information, and stay informed about the environmental impact and response efforts.

title: Mashup: FastCashier Wallet
description: FastCashier Wallet is a cross-platform payment system that facilitates electronic transactions, replacing traditional paper methods like checks and money orders. It provides a secure, real-time platform for users to make payments and receive receipts, accessible both on mobile devices and PCs. The system integrates messaging functionalities to streamline communication between users and service providers, enhancing transaction efficiency and security.

related_apis.title: Payment Vision Pay API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Payment Vision service has a payment plug-in that works with receivables software, shopping carts, billing websites, and many other payment applications. Payment Vision also has a suite of built in payment capture applications. PayAPI is a SOAP-based XML web service, designed for software publishers to add payment processing functionality to their software applications in compliance with PCI-DSS. PayAPI can process one-time and recurring credit card, debit card and ACH payments. PaymentVision is an online payment gateway that connects to the ACH (Automated Clearing House) and all major debit and credit card networks.

related_apis.title: Payments Gateway API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Payments Gateway is a service from ACH Direct, Inc., one of the largest and fastest growing privately held payment processing companies in the United States.
The API provides a platform for customizable integration options to meet the payment processing needs of a variety of merchants. Often the API is used to build white label integrations.

related_apis.title: Paymentwall API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Paymentwall provides a solution for globally monetizing digital goods and services, assisting game publishers, dating sites, rewards sites, and many others in monetizing their digital content. The Paymentwall API allows customers to install customized Paymentwall widgets into their applications.

title: Mashup: Targeted Engagement
description: A self-service, programmatic advertising platform specifically designed for political campaigns. This platform provides a customizable, all-in-one solution for organizations to plan, launch, and manage their campaigns across various screen types, offering flexibility to tailor the level of engagement as per their specific needs.

related_apis.title: NationBuilder API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: NationBuilder is an open platform for users to create online communities centered around issues relevant to them. Users can create community organization websites, access a people database, and use communication tools such as email, text messaging and social media.The NationBuilder API helps developers to create community organizing-driven applications by integrating various service endpoints within third-party applications. These endpoints can be information on people, campaign data, donation data, calendar information, event data, and other calls. The API uses REST calls and returns JSON.

title: Mashup: Musiic.net
description: A comprehensive multimedia search tool designed for music enthusiasts. This mashup integrates various data sources including MP3 files, YouTube videos, Flickr images, news articles, song lists, event listings, blog posts, podcasts, and website content. The mashup provides a unified search interface that aggregates results from multiple platforms, allowing users to explore different types of media related to their favorite artists or music genres. It supports real-time updates and offers a rich, diverse set of multimedia content for immersive music discovery and engagement.

description: A location-based mashup that combines the comprehensive business listings and user reviews from Citysearch with the geographical mapping capabilities of Google Maps. This integration allows users to navigate and discover top-rated restaurants, hotels, nightlife spots, shopping destinations, and various services across major US cities, all based on the collective ratings and recommendations from Citysearch users.

description: A comprehensive platform for playing free online flash games across various genres, including sports, physics, dress up, puzzle, action, arcade, multiplayer, shooting, girl, and strategy games. Gametator.com not only provides a wide range of games from multiple sources but also develops and hosts its own exclusive games, offering users a diverse and entertaining gaming experience.

related_apis.title: Mochi Media Flash Games API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Mochi Media Flash Games API is a feed of free Flash games that can be used integrated into any website. The feed parameters can be changed to pull more or less games, to pull games from certain categories or rating levels, or to pull games in certain languages (eg, excluding Chinese language games). The game feed is updated once a day at 12am PST.

versions.version_title: Mochi Media Flash Games REST API

title: Mashup: EyeEm City Explorer
description: A photo search and discovery tool that enables users to sort and filter images by city, category, and various other criteria. It combines a vast library of user-uploaded images with location tags to provide a visually rich exploration experience. Users can search for photos from specific cities, filter by categories such as landscapes, architecture, or people, and explore images in a highly interactive and immersive way. It leverages social media platforms for image uploads and integrates with location-based services to enhance the search experience.

title: Mashup: Give 1 Get 2: Moneybookers Exchange
description: Give 1 Get 2 is an innovative online trading platform that operates on a win-win-win strategy, facilitating secure online payments and money transfers. It leverages the Moneybookers API, a Payment Service Provider (PSP) regulated by the Financial Services Authority (FSA) of the UK, to ensure the highest standards of financial security and compliance. Users can easily make online payments and simultaneously receive funds, creating a seamless and trusted transaction experience for both parties involved.

related_apis.title: Moneybookers API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Moneybookers Automated Payments Interface API to send money, make pay-on-demand transactions, check transaction statuses, and download account histories. Users of the main site send money via Moneybookers by logging into their account and using the Send Money option. You can automate this same process using the API.

title: Mashup: 2008 Basketball Tourneys
description: A sports-centric mashup that aggregates location data, seeding information, and dynamically updating tournament brackets for all Division I college basketball conference tournaments. The mashup combines basketball tournament data with geolocation services to provide users with real-time updates on tournament progress, including the ability to search for and view the brackets of specific conferences and view the location of the games.

description: A real-time news service that aggregates and displays breaking news updates as they are posted on Twitter. The mashup combines Twitter's real-time social media platform with news aggregation algorithms to deliver fresh, up-to-the-minute news directly to users. It is particularly useful for individuals seeking immediate, unfiltered news coverage and engagement with current events.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: Twitter Streaming API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From Website: The Twitter Streaming API allows high-throughput near-realtime access to various subsets of public and protected Twitter data. The Streaming API contains public statuses from all users, filtered in various ways: By userid, by keyword, by random sampling, by geographic location, etc. User Streams provides Public statuses from all users, filtered in various ways: By userid, by keyword, by random sampling, by geographic location, etc.

title: Mashup: Real Estate Home Valuation
description: An interactive, full-screen Google Maps-based real estate portal that integrates property listings, agent recommendations, and home valuation services. The mashup allows users to view properties for sale, connect with real estate professionals, and receive personalized home valuations based on local market data and agent expertise. It leverages geospatial data and real estate APIs to provide a comprehensive real estate experience, including property search, agent recommendations, and home valuation tools.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Traffic API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Traffic Web Services from Yahoo! enable you to get traffic alert information from a given location. Use the Traffic REST API to customize your request with many parameters including indicating locations based on city state, zip code, or a combination of any of these things, latitude-longitude, whether to include a map image, or a search radius in miles. Traffic Web Services are also available through a [[http://developer.yahoo.net/traffic/rss/V1/index.html dynamic RSS feed]].

related_apis.title: GeoNames API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Geonames is a geographical database with web services that let users extract useful information about different places, such as weather, timezone and post codes. The GeoNames geographical database covers all countries and contains over eight million placenames that are available for download free of charge. Users can edit, correct and add new names using a wiki interface.Geonames provides a suite of Webservices including the following categories:Fulltext searchPlace HierarchyWikipediaPostal CodesReverse GeocodingThe APIs use RESTful protocol and responses vary in format between XML, JSON, CSV, and TXTWhile the GeoNames data is free, the data is available without costs, there is a Service Level Agreement available for premium web services.

related_apis.title: Zillow API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Zillow API Network turns member sites into mini real estate portals by offering fresh and provocative real estate and mortgage content to keep people coming back. There are four categories of APIs. 1) Home Valuation API: Search results list, Zestimate™ home valuations, home valuation charts, comparable houses, and market trend charts. 2) Property Details API: Property-level data, including historical sales price and year, taxes, beds/baths, etc. 3) City and neighborhood market statistics and demographic data4) Mortgage rates and monthly payment estimates

related_apis.title: Yelp Fusion API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Yelp Fusion APIs are RESTful APIs and users can retrieve business review and rating, information for a particular geographic region or location.display review information for a particular business, determine accurate neighborhood name information for a particular location, track recent reviews for a particular business, display pictures of highly rated local businesses and of the top reviewers for that business, determine a particular business' review and rating information based on the phone number for that business. The default output is JSON. This output format was chosen due to the availability of JSON parsers in many languages. The following Yelp Fusion APIs are available: Search, Phone Number Search, Business Search, Transaction, Reviews, and Autcomplete - each API has a separate ProgrammableWeb entry.

title: Mashup: Daily Horoscope by Phone
description: A mobile-based service that delivers personalized daily horoscope summaries via SMS, WAP, or Email. Users can access this service by sending a specific keyword (dailyhoro) to receive an extended overview of daily astrological predictions and insights from Astrology.com. This mashup integrates astrological data and mobile communication technologies to provide a convenient, on-the-go astrological forecasting service.

title: Mashup: eeeHOP
description: An online travel application that specializes in locating holiday rentals, particularly those in France and Italy. The mashup integrates travel and real estate data to provide users with detailed information on available accommodations in popular European destinations. It leverages mapping services to display locations of these properties, facilitating a user-friendly search experience. The application supports multiple languages, including Italian and French, to cater to international travelers.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: KnowledgeTree Live
description: A cloud-based document management software that provides a hosted, on-demand platform to manage, secure, and collaborate on documents. It offers real-time document collaboration, secure document storage, and access management features, making it ideal for remote teams and organizations that require a scalable and secure document management solution.

related_apis.title: Amazon S3 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Since 2006 Amazon Web Services has been offering web services commonly known as cloud computing. AWS Provides a reliable, low cost infrastructure platform that powers hundreds of thousands of businesses.
Amazon S3 API, the Simple Storage Service provides a simple web services interface used to store objects using the Amazon online storage infrastructure. Users can then download the data or use the data with other AWS services, such as Amazon Elastic Cloud Computer (EC2). Using this web service, developers can build applications that make use of Internet storage.
The API uses Buckets, Objects, Keys and Operations. An object has four parts: value, key, metadata, and an access control policy. Objects are stored in buckets. The API is REST based. Responses are formatted in JSON.

related_apis.title: Amazon EC2 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) API is a web service that enables you to launch and manage Linux/UNIX and Windows server instances in Amazon's data centers. Giving users the ability to "compute" in the cloud, it provides users with complete control of their computing resources and lets them run on Amazon's computing environment. Amazon EC2 changes the economics of computing by allowing users to pay only for capacity that is actually used.
This is a REST-based API. The SOAP interface was deprecated on 1 December 2015.
The WSDL for each supported API version is available from the following URI:
http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc//AmazonEC2.wsdl

title: Mashup: A Paris Hilton video site
description: A mashup that aggregates and displays a curated selection of Paris Hilton's most popular and intriguing videos sourced from YouTube. The site provides a platform for fans to discover and enjoy her content, featuring the latest and notable clips from her various online videos. The mashup emphasizes content from social media and entertainment platforms, catering to fans who appreciate celebrity content and social media influencers.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: Tweet Awards
description: A social media aggregator and awards platform specifically for Greek tweets, Tweet Awards curates and showcases the most humorous and engaging content from Greek Twitter users. By integrating with the Twitter API, it collects tweets from Greek users and employs algorithms to identify the most popular, entertaining, and culturally significant ones. Users can browse, vote, and share their favorite tweets, fostering a community-driven appreciation for Greek humor and online culture.

The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. title: Mashup: AllofCraigs
description: A sophisticated, all-inclusive search engine specifically tailored for classified advertising platforms such as Craigslist, Backpage, and Kijiji. The mashup integrates advanced search functionalities allowing users to narrow down their search by region and further refine results through various categories. Additionally, it features a real-time Twitter stream, ensuring users stay updated on trending topics and recent listings. This mashup is designed to enhance the user experience by effectively combining multiple data sources and providing comprehensive, up-to-date information.

related_apis.title: Google Custom Search API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Custom Search Engine API is a RESTful API that allows developer to get web or image search results data in JSON or Atom format. With the API, developers can add web search and/or site search capabilities to their website, blog or collection of websites.

versions.version_title: Google Custom Search REST API v1

title: Mashup: UK Job Search
description: A comprehensive job search platform tailored for job seekers in the UK, offering a dual-view experience. Users can filter job listings by criteria such as salary, contract type (permanent/temporary), and location, presenting the results in a list format or on a Virtual Earth map. Enhanced with geolocation capabilities, clicking on a specific location on the map displays the available job opportunities in that area, providing an intuitive and location-specific job search experience.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: Flashfreeonline
description: A platform that enables flash developers to automate the broadcasting of customized games directly from the FlashGameDistribution server, utilizing the FlashGameDistribution API for seamless integration.

related_apis.title: FlashGameDistribution API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: FlashGameDistribution is an international flash game distributor, connecting game developers and flash gaming site owners. The FlashGameDistribution API provides a RESTful interface for sites to automate customized game-broadcasts from the FlashGameDistribution server.

title: Mashup: Flash Earth
description: Flash Earth is a highly interactive and visually appealing map mashup that seamlessly integrates Google Maps, Microsoft Virtual Earth, and other satellite imagery sources within a Flash-based web application. This zoomable platform allows users to navigate through high-resolution satellite images with ease, providing an immersive experience. Key features include the ability to rotate the compass for a 360-degree view, which enhances spatial understanding and orientation. Additionally, users can build permanent links to specific locations, making it convenient for sharing or bookmarking favorite spots. The Flash application ensures a smooth and responsive interface, optimized for various devices, while the integration of multiple mapping services offers comprehensive geographical data and real-time updates.

related_apis.title: OpenLayers API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The OpenLayers API allows developers to include dynamic maps in their web pages. These maps can include map tiles, vector data, and markers loaded from any source. Mobile support is included. OpenLayers is provided for free and is open source under the 2-clause BSD License. This API can be accessed via its JavaScript SDK.

title: Mashup: 33Revoluciones
description: 33Revoluciones is a comprehensive music information platform that aggregates data about contemporary music bands and artists. It provides detailed profiles, discographies, song lists, and lyrics, offering a rich resource for music enthusiasts and researchers. The platform leverages data from various music databases and APIs to provide accurate and up-to-date information, facilitating music discovery and appreciation for users worldwide.

related_apis.title: MusicBrainz API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The MusicBrainz database contains a huge amount of music metadata, which is maintained by the MusicBrainz community. Find information about artists, albums, tracks and labels. Mash the data with your web app, media player, CD ripper, tagger or other applications requiring music metadata. The service's architecture follows the REST design principles. Interaction with the web service is done using HTTP and all content is served in a simple but flexible XML format.

related_apis.title: Wikipedia API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The unofficial Wikipedia API. Because Wikipedia is built using MediaWiki, which in turn supports an API, Wikipedia does as well. This provides developers code-level access to the entire Wikipedia reference. The goal of this API is to provide direct, high-level access to the data contained in the MediaWiki databases. Client programs can use the API to login, get data, and post changes. The API supports thin web-based JavaScript clients, such as Navigation popups or LiveRC, end-user applications (such as vandal fighter), and can be accessed by another web site (tool server's utilities).
The API uses RESTful calls and supports a wide variety of formats including XML, JSON, PHP, YAML and others.

related_apis.title: ChartLyrics Lyric API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: ChartLyrics is a lyrics database sorted by artists or songs. The Lyric API uses either a SOAP or REST interface to allow users and developers to access the database. The API provides 2 functions. SearchLyric to search the available lyrics and GetLyric to retrieve the lyric.

title: Mashup: Spincloud
description: A social weather mashup that combines real-time weather data with user-generated content for personalized weather tracking and forecasting. Users can tag specific weather events, comment on them, and follow the weather updates of their choice. The mashup supports personalized settings, weather tracking, and is accessible through RSS feeds. Users can register via OpenId or Facebook Connect.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

title: Mashup: InstaMap
description: InstaMap is a mashup that combines geolocation services with Instagram's photo-sharing platform. It displays Instagram photos on an interactive map, enabling users to search for images based on either geographical location or specific tags. This mashup provides a visually rich way to explore and discover content, integrating social media with mapping technologies to offer a unique user experience.

related_apis.title: Instagram Graph API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Instagram is a photo sharing iPhone app and service. Users take photos and can share them with Instagram contacts, as well as friends on other social networks like Twitter and Facebook. The Instagram API provides access to user authentication, friend connections, photos and all the other elements of the iPhone app--including uploading new media.

title: Mashup: Proper Pint
description: A comprehensive location-based database and mapping service that assists users in identifying the best pubs and nightlife spots in Dublin. By leveraging extensive, real-time data and user reviews, the mashup provides a personalized drinking experience tailored to individual preferences, ensuring a memorable time for all visitors and residents alike.

title: Mashup: Tips-Search.com
description: A comprehensive search platform that provides users with a wide range of tips, life hacks, and how-to guides. The mashup covers various topics, including '6 ways to...' and '10 tips' in categories such as lifestyle, personal development, and productivity. Key features include a user-friendly interface that allows users to search for tips and hacks across multiple categories, and a dedicated Japanese version accessible through the website tips-kensaku.com. This mashup is tailored for individuals seeking practical advice and insights to improve their daily lives and work efficiency.

title: Mashup: Intuit and Box.net
description: An integration between Box.net's cloud storage service and Intuit's Workspace software within QuickBooks, enabling seamless access to Box content directly from the QuickBooks application. This mashup enhances financial workflow efficiency by allowing users to manage and share files, documents, and financial records securely and efficiently, leveraging Box's robust content management capabilities with Intuit's accounting platform.

related_apis.title: Box API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Box is a modern content management platform that transforms how organizations work and collaborate to achieve results faster.Box Platform provides content APIs to build secure content experiences in custom apps. With Box Platform, organizations can bring content management and collaboration services to their own custom apps or build custom integrations with Box.

title: Mashup: Zappos Peer Pressure
description: A social and search-driven eCommerce mashup that allows users to browse products on Zappos.com, query product results based on recent sales and geographic location (by state), and view high-resolution product images provided through the Zappos.com API. The mashup combines social shopping dynamics with real-time sales data and geotargeting to enhance the browsing and purchasing experience.

related_apis.title: Zappos API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
We're happy to announce that we've launched our public API! Find out full details at http://developer.zappos.com.
A few of the things you can accomplish with our API:
Search : Leverage Zappos robust product search functionality that includes sorting, filtering, and a deep level of categorization/facets
Products : Pull relevant product details (description, default images, different styles, price)
Images : The full set of images for products (different views, sizes, etc.)
Statistics: Find out what is being bought right now!
Brands: Did you know we carry almost 1000 brands? Get more details on specific brands with this API
Reviews: Zappos has thousands of reviews from our amazing customers. Find out what our customer's are saying about our products
The API will be a REST API. In this initial release, it will only return JSON but upcoming releases will support XML.

title: Mashup: Meteo Malineo
description: A weather forecasting service for France, covering over 10,000 cities. The mashup utilizes the Open Weather Map API to provide real-time weather forecasts, including temperature, precipitation, wind speed, and other meteorological details. It is designed for individuals, businesses, and organizations requiring accurate, localized weather information for planning and decision-making purposes.

related_apis.title: OpenWeatherMap API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API has been deprecated and replaced by the Current Weather Data, 5 Day Weather Forecast, 16 Day Weather Forecast, Historical Data, History Bulk, Weather Map Layers, Ultraviolet Index, Weather Stations, Weather Alerts, Air Pollution, and Accumulated Weather Data APIs. This profile is maintained for historical and research purposes only.]Open Weather Map provides interactive maps of current and historic weather conditions. The Open Weather Map API allows users to retrieve the current weather at a city or weather station, the historical measurements for a weather station, or a list of cities and/or weather stations in a given rectangle (limited by geographic coordinates). The API uses RESTful calls issued in JSON format.

title: Mashup: Weever Apps - DocuSign Integration
description: Weever Apps is a technology platform that facilitates the creation and deployment of HTML5 mobile web apps, allowing a single app to be seamlessly deployed across multiple popular touch phones and tablets. This solution significantly reduces the cost and delivery time associated with traditional native mobile app development. The platform integrates DocuSign electronic signatures with various industries, including Financial Services, Insurance, Medical, and others, enabling users to securely sign documents electronically through these apps.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: Great American Authors of the Nineteenth Century
description: A map-based visual representation of the lives and works of 19th-century American authors. This mashup combines Google My Maps with biographical information sourced from various web platforms, Google Books, and other relevant content to provide a comprehensive and interactive exploration of the authors' lives, works, and historical contexts. The mashup enables users to navigate through a detailed map of the United States, exploring the authors' birthplaces, residences, and significant literary events, while also providing access to their complete works and related bibliographical data.

description: A visualization of state test performance data compared to national test scores in math and reading, highlighting disparities across the United States. description: A ranking of the top 25 American cities with populations over 250,000, ordered by the percentage of residents aged 25 years and older who hold a bachelor's degree. This mashup combines demographic data with educational attainment statistics to provide insight into the intellectual capital of major U.S. cities. It includes interactive maps, reference materials, and video content related to the topic.

title: Mashup: Kindle Shop
description: An e-commerce platform specialized in selling Amazon Kindle electronic book readers. The mashup integrates Amazon's product catalog API with online payment systems to facilitate seamless purchases. It provides a user-friendly interface for browsing Kindle models, specifications, and pricing, ensuring an efficient shopping experience for technology enthusiasts and avid readers.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

title: Mashup: Bed Bug Registry
description: A comprehensive online resource that aggregates and verifies reports of bed bug infestations across North America. The mashup facilitates community-driven contributions by allowing site visitors to report sightings and infestations, which are then moderated to ensure accuracy and reliability. It leverages mapping technology to provide geographically specific data, aiding travelers and health-conscious individuals in identifying areas with known bed bug issues. This tool supports public health initiatives by offering real-time information on potential pest risks.

title: Mashup: Our Louvre
description: Our Louvre is an immersive, interactive digital platform that showcases a significant portion of the Louvre Museum's extensive collection in a highly engaging and dynamic manner. The name 'Our Louvre' reflects its unique approach, as it not only presents the museum's artifacts but also relies heavily on the contributions of internet users, allowing for a collaborative and ever-evolving experience. This mashup leverages advanced digital technologies to create an interactive environment where users can explore, learn, and contribute to the presentation of art and cultural heritage, fostering a sense of shared ownership and community involvement.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Wikipedia API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The unofficial Wikipedia API. Because Wikipedia is built using MediaWiki, which in turn supports an API, Wikipedia does as well. This provides developers code-level access to the entire Wikipedia reference. The goal of this API is to provide direct, high-level access to the data contained in the MediaWiki databases. Client programs can use the API to login, get data, and post changes. The API supports thin web-based JavaScript clients, such as Navigation popups or LiveRC, end-user applications (such as vandal fighter), and can be accessed by another web site (tool server's utilities).
The API uses RESTful calls and supports a wide variety of formats including XML, JSON, PHP, YAML and others.

title: Mashup: Wines and Times
description: A comprehensive wine tourism platform that allows users to create personalized winery tours by combining information from various sources including U.S. wineries, winery events, wine festivals, and wine trails. With over 3,200 entries, this mashup provides detailed winery contacts, event listings, and wine festival schedules, enabling users to plan their trips effectively. Additionally, it offers printable Google Maps directions for each winery, ensuring easy navigation and access to essential contact details.

The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

It integrates geolocation services with social network data to ensure that suggested meeting points cater to the preferences of both users.

description: A comprehensive SMS-based solution designed for non-governmental organizations (NGOs) to enhance social activism and public accountability through efficient communication. related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: Agnostic Platform Aggregator
description: A comprehensive aggregator designed to collect and present localized news, tweets, images, and other content from various sources in a unified and community-focused manner. This platform leverages APIs from multiple news services and social media platforms to gather real-time updates, ensuring users access to a diverse range of content tailored to their interests and geographical location.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: Bit.ly API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: bit.ly allows users to shorten, share, and track links (URLs). Reducing the URL length makes sharing easier. bit.ly can be accessed through their website, bookmarklets and this open API. bit.ly is also integrated into several popular third-party tools such as Tweetdeck and is used extensively on services like Twitter. Unique user-level and aggregate links can be created and let users view complete, real-time traffic and referrer data, as well as location and metadata.

description: Bluemapia is a social networking platform specifically designed for boating enthusiasts. It integrates mapping services with a boating-specific social network to allow users to share and discover information about their boating experiences. Users can upload videos, photos, and comments detailing their adventures to specific locations, facilitating a community-driven exploration of boating destinations. The platform supports both web and mobile access, making it convenient for users to connect and share wherever they are.

It is particularly suited for users who need immediate, context-aware answers to a wide range of questions.

related_apis.title: True Knowledge API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: True Knowledge is a new class of Internet search technology aimed at improving the experience of finding known facts on the Web. The True Knowledge Answer Engine gives consumers instant answers to complex questions. Request information on any topic and get back results in a processable form. Early areas of strength include geographic knowledge, local time, and geolocation. Natural language questions can also be processed. View demos at their website.

description: An interactive mapping mashup that visualizes microfinance loans from Kiva lenders on a global map, providing real-time, granular insights into the global microfinance landscape. Each plotted point offers detailed information about the individual loans and borrowers, including loan amounts, repayment schedules, and borrower profiles. The mashup leverages Kiva's microloan API for data integration and Google Maps API for geographical visualization, enabling users to explore global microfinance trends and impact in a highly interactive and informative manner.

Kiva is a nonprofit organization.

title: Mashup: Weather by Phone
description: A voice-based weather information service that uses Twilio's API to facilitate phone calls and Python scripting to dynamically interact with users. The service prompts callers for their zip code, retrieves the current weather conditions from an RSS feed, and synthesizes this information into a spoken response. The entire application is hosted on Google App Engine, leveraging its cloud infrastructure for scalable and efficient service delivery.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: URL Tara IP Lookup
description: An advanced reverse IP lookup tool designed for network administrators and cybersecurity professionals. It allows users to input a specific IP address and retrieves the associated domain names or websites hosted on that IP address. The tool is particularly useful for identifying shared hosting services, tracking the history of domain names, and conducting network reconnaissance. It supports multilingual search, including Turkish, and is optimized for use on desktop and mobile devices. The tool requires a stable internet connection and minimal technical knowledge to operate effectively.

related_apis.title: Bing API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [The Bing API is now the Bing Web Search API. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Bing API provides an experience similar to Bing.com/search by returning search results that Bing determines are relevant to a user's query. The results include Web pages and may also include images, videos, and more. Free trial keys are available here: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/try/cognitive-services/?api=bing-web-search-api.

title: Mashup: Taffly.com
description: A multi-store product search platform that aggregates data from various retailers through the Shopzilla API, enabling users to compare prices and features of products across different e-commerce sites.

related_apis.title: Shopzilla API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Shopzilla, Inc. Catalog API provides access to the Shopzilla, Inc. inventory of catalogued products, merchant offers, and merchant ratings & reviews content through a query-based RESTful web service, responses formatted in XML or JSON|P.
Managed through the Shopzilla Publisher Program, a CPC affiliate marketing program, publishers are able to monetize using this API. Users of this API are able to choose between two versions, each providing logic native to its corresponding Shopzilla, Inc. property: Bizrate.com or Beso.com.
Bizrate API: Provides access to the entire Shopzilla, Inc. offer universe, exposing content from 8,000+ merchants. You would use this version to create a full comparison shopping site.
Beso API: Provides the opportunity to create a style-based experience with a curated set of offers focused in soft goods categories. You would use this version to create a fashion-oriented shopping site.
Both APIs provide access to the merchant ratings and reviews collected through the Bizrate Insights platform.
International? APIs also available for the United Kingdom, Germany, and France.

title: Mashup: Eventsites
description: Eventsites is a unique event management mashup that leverages Google Maps and Flickr APIs to create dynamic event websites. Users can set up a custom site for their events, which includes detailed descriptions, interactive Google Maps for location visualization, and real-time photo galleries sourced from Flickr. The mashup is exceptional for its exclusive use of AJAX technology, enabling seamless user experiences without page reloads, and its data-agnostic design, which does not store any user-generated information, ensuring privacy and scalability.
