title: Mashup: Bing Education Map
description: An interactive map that displays comprehensive information on schools, including real-time data from DonorsChoose (a platform for funding classroom projects), Mentor Pro (a service for volunteering opportunities), and Great Schools (providing detailed school data). Users can easily navigate the map to find local educational institutions and explore options for supporting students and classrooms through charitable contributions or volunteer work.

related_apis.title: DonorsChoose API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DonorsChoose.org is an online charity that makes it easy for anyone to help students in need.Here's how it works: public school teachers from every corner of America post classroom project requests on DonorsChoose.org. Requests range from pencils for a poetry writing unit, to violins for a school recital, to microscope slides for a biology class.
Then, you can browse project requests and give any amount to the one that inspires you. Once a project reaches its funding goal, we deliver the materials to the school.You'll get photos of your project taking place, a thank-you letter from the teacher, and a cost report showing how each dollar was spent. If you give over $100, you'll also receive hand-written thank-you letters from the students.DonorsChoose.org's simple JSON API allows developers to pull DonorsChoose.org classroom project listings into their website or application using project selection criteria of their choosing.The JSON API has been used by DonorsChoose.org partners like Chevron, SONIC Drive-In, NBC Universal, Bing, PayPal, and others to build high-profile highly customized giving and cause marketing experiences.The API also enables developers to donate to projects or purchase gift cards without routing users to DonorsChoose.org for payment.

related_apis.title: Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Bing Maps REST Services is a REST API that allows you to perform tasks like finding an address, retrieving a map with a pushpin and a label, or getting driving directions. It provides a way to create a static map with pushpins, geocoding an address, retrieving imagery metadata, or creating a route etc. Microsoft Bing is a web search engine.

GreatSchools is a non profit that provides U.S. school information and parenting resources to help an families choose the right school, as well as support learning at home.

title: Mashup: Florida Real Estate
description: A real estate search engine focusing on properties in Florida, including homes, condos, townhouses, and commercial properties. The mashup integrates multiple MLS systems and allows users to search by city or MLS number. It also offers integration with home automation systems and provides sales-related analytics for real estate agents.

title: Mashup: Statsr
description: Statsr is a mashup designed to provide an extended access to Flickr statistics, including data beyond the 28-day limit, as well as detailed statistics about your groups, contacts, visitors, and referrers. This service enables users to monitor their Flickr activity and engagement more comprehensively by integrating various data sources and APIs to offer real-time and historical insights into user interactions and content performance.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: on AIR Bus Tracking Map
description: A real-time mapping mashup that displays the current location of the Adobe on AIR promotional tour bus. This service combines live bus tracking data with geolocation services to provide users with up-to-date information on the bus's whereabouts. It is particularly useful for event attendees and fans who want to keep track of the bus's schedule and location.

related_apis.title: Adobe on AIR Bus Tour API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: You can use these APIs and feeds to keep up with the latest news and content from the [Adobe on AIR] tour, or to build web and AIR based applications and mash-ups. The Adobe Integrated Runtime (AIR), previously referred to by its code-name of "Apollo", is a cross-operating system runtime that allows web developers to leverage their existing web development skills (such as Flash, Flex, HTML and JavaScript) to build and deploy web applications and content to the desktop.

versions.version_title: Adobe on AIR Bus Tour REST API

title: Mashup: Velocipedia
description: A specialized web application designed to assist cyclists in Portugal by providing detailed information on available bicycle paths. Users can search for specific routes, view path details such as distance, elevation, and surface type, and filter results based on their preferences. The application integrates with local mapping services to ensure accurate and up-to-date information on path availability and conditions. Target users include both recreational and competitive cyclists, as well as tourists interested in exploring Portugal by bicycle.

related_apis.title: Mapbox API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Mapbox is a suite of open source mapping tools. This API can be used to create interactive maps using a wide range of file formats and databases. It also allows users to host their maps so that they can be embedded on webpages and shared with a wider audience. All maps created using Mapbox are compatible with Android and iOS devices.

title: Mashup: FishNY
description: FishNY is an online platform that combines fishing data with geographical mapping technology to provide a comprehensive guide to the best sportfishing locations in New York State. The mashup allows users to explore detailed fishing spots, view real-time fishing conditions, and share their own experiences to help other anglers. It leverages fisheries data APIs and mapping services to create an interactive and informative resource for sportfishing enthusiasts in New York.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Bookmaplet
description: A bookmarklet designed for enhancing the user experience on websites by integrating real-time mapping capabilities. When a user highlights a street address on any webpage and clicks the Bookmaplet bookmarklet, it overlays the location of the address in a small, top-right corner window. This functionality leverages web mapping APIs to provide instant geographical context and location-based information, enhancing navigation and user engagement on various platforms.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

title: Mashup: HelperOfTheBride
description: A comprehensive wedding planning tool that aggregates information from various online sources such as wedding communities, review sites, blogs, tweets, and multimedia content. Using Google Search and Twitter, the mashup provides users with an integrated platform to perform keyword searches from any webpage, streamlining the process of finding relevant wedding-related content. This tool is particularly useful for brides-to-be looking to gather inspiration, ideas, and insights from a wide range of online sources.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: scovry
description: Scovry is a web discovery platform that aggregates real-time data from multiple popular social media sources, news services, and stock markets. The mashup presents this data in an intuitive, streaming ticker format, making it easy for users to discover and follow the latest trends, news, and stock market updates across various industries and domains.

related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: del.icio.us API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: del.icio.us is a social bookmarking website -- the primary use of del.icio.us is to store your bookmarks online, which allows you to access the same bookmarks from any computer and add bookmarks from anywhere, too. On del.icio.us, you can use tags to organize and remember your bookmarks, which is a much more flexible system than folders.
The API provides read/write access to Delicious bookmarks and tags via an HTTP-based interface. The RESTful API returns responses in XML.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD

related_apis.title: Reddit API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Reddit API allows you to access the user submitted and rated stories on reddit.com. It also provides advanced functionality, including user account information and sub-reddit moderation.

title: Mashup: FotoFuze
description: FotoFuze is a specialized service that converts ordinary 2D photographs into professional 3D product images and enhances 2D images, all at no cost. The service is designed to elevate the visual quality of products listed on eCommerce platforms such as Etsy, by providing high-quality images that can significantly enhance the user experience and potentially increase sales.

related_apis.title: Etsy API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Etsy is an online marketplace for buying and selling handmade things. The Etsy API lets you develop applications built on this fast growing e-commerce platform.

title: Mashup: RealtyBaron Search
description: A comprehensive real estate search platform that aggregates and displays over 3 million listings across the United States. The mashup integrates with various real estate databases and mapping APIs to provide users with a unified search experience, including detailed property information and location-based search capabilities. It serves as a one-stop solution for finding and comparing real estate properties nationwide.

related_apis.title: Vast API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Vast is a web search service that crawls the entire web and structure the data it finds. Initial verticals include Cars, Jobs, Profiles.

title: Mashup: Listagram
description: Listagram is a social networking and photo sharing platform that allows users to browse the photo archives of their friends on Instagram. It integrates Instagram's API to search for public photos from a given URL, similar to Frickr's photostream feature, providing a continuous stream of images from the user's Instagram profile. The mashup is designed for mobile users, enabling them to easily view and interact with their friends' photos on the go. It combines the functionalities of photo sharing, social networking, and mobile browsing to create an immersive visual experience.

related_apis.title: Instagram Graph API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Instagram is a photo sharing iPhone app and service. Users take photos and can share them with Instagram contacts, as well as friends on other social networks like Twitter and Facebook. The Instagram API provides access to user authentication, friend connections, photos and all the other elements of the iPhone app--including uploading new media.

title: Mashup: ccQuick
description: ccQuick is a specialized tool designed for Constant Contact users to streamline the process of creating and configuring subscribe boxes for their websites. The tool simplifies the integration of these subscribe boxes onto user sites using a single piece of code, significantly enhancing the ease of lead capture for Constant Contact subscribers.

related_apis.title: ConstantContact API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Integrate your software with Email Marketing from Constant Contact. Our API allows you to seamlessly integrate our industry-leading Email Marketing service. Today more than 300,000 small businesses and organizations rely on Constant Contactï¿½s Email Marketing to help them drive their success.
Our API allows you to manage email contacts, contact lists and reporting data. Also you can view email marketing campaign results; including which email contacts were mailed to, who opened the email and who clicked each URL link in the email.

title: Mashup: Contoso University
description: A comprehensive education-focused social platform that integrates social networking, video sharing, application development, and mapping functionalities. This mashup enables students to access educational social content, view a list of their friends, and track their locations on campus using interactive maps. The source code is available for developers interested in building similar applications.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

related_apis.title: Windows Live Contacts API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Windows Live Contacts API is an HTTP-based service that enables developers to programmatically submit queries to and retrieve results from the Windows Live Contacts Address Book database.

related_apis.title: Windows Live Data API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Windows Live Data provides a mechanism by which developers can ask Windows Live users for permission to access the user's Windows Live services and data on the user's behalf. Currently Windows Live Data exposes Windows Live Contacts which is the central address book for all Windows Live services. Access to additional Windows Live services will be added for the upcoming Beta and other future releases.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Silverlight Streaming API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Silverlight Streaming service REST protocol is used to upload Silverlight applications for use on web pages.

title: Mashup: Picasa Map Gadget
description: A mashup that integrates Picasa's public and geotagged album feature with mapping services, allowing users to visualize the location of shared photographs on a map. Users can navigate through albums in chronological order and explore the geolocation metadata of each photo.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

related_apis.title: Google Picasa API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [Editor's Note: Per provider, this API will be deprecated in January 2019. Developers are encouraged to migrate to the Google Photos Library API]From their site: The Picasa Web Albums data API allows client applications to view and update Picasa Web Albums content in the form of Google data API GData feeds. Your client application can request a list of user albums, photos, comments, or tags, edit or delete content in an existing entry, and query the content in an existing entry.

title: Mashup: Canadian Cell Tower Finder
description: A mobile and search-focused mashup that utilizes mapping APIs to display all cell towers and transmitter/receiver stations across Canada, providing a comprehensive view of the mobile infrastructure for all Canadian mobile wireless carriers including Rogers, Bell, Telus, Wind, Videotron, etc. The mashup is designed to be compatible with smartphones and is intended for users seeking detailed information on Canada's mobile network infrastructure and coverage.

related_apis.title: geocoder API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Geocoder.us is a public service providing free geocoding of addresses and intersections in the United States. Using the service you can find the latitude & longitude of any US address and much more. Geocoder.us offers four different ways to access our web services: an XML-RPC interface, a SOAP interface, a REST interface that returns an RDF/XML document, and a REST interface that returns a plain text comma separated values result. The methods and return values are equivalent across all three interfaces.

title: Mashup: mapVine Property Management
description: A mapping tool designed specifically for property managers, enabling them to integrate interactive property maps onto their websites. This tool facilitates the visualization of property locations, listings, and other relevant data for easier management and client communication.

title: Mashup: World Cup Soccer Tweets
description: A real-time mapping mashup that displays the latest tweets related to World Cup Soccer 2010. The service integrates with Twitter's API to gather and display tweets from participants and observers around the world on an interactive map, providing a unique global perspective on the World Cup's impact and reactions.

title: Mashup: CallMe
description: A unified communication tool that enables users to use a single phone number to receive calls on multiple devices, including smartphones, tablets, and traditional landlines. This service offers a cost-effective solution for small businesses and home users, charging a flat rate of $5 per month. By integrating multiple telephony services, CallMe provides a seamless communication experience across various devices, enhancing flexibility and reducing costs associated with maintaining multiple phone lines.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: Phone Events
description: A mobile platform that facilitates the creation, sharing, and receipt of event information via cell phones. Users can post and share free event invites using the Eventful API. The mashup provides localized event data for cell phone access, enabling users to stay informed about events happening near them. It integrates with Eventful's API to ensure real-time and accurate event information delivery.

related_apis.title: Eventful API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Eventful is the world's largest collection of events, taking place in local markets throughout the world, from concerts and sports to singles events and political rallies. Eventful.com is built upon a unique, open platform that enables partners and web applications to leverage Eventful's data, features and functionality via the Eventful API. The Eventful API provides access to the entire site database enabling developers to integrate it and the functionality of the Eventful platform into web applications. Common API tasks include event and venue search. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in either XML, JSON or YAML.

title: Mashup: Jobs Assistant
description: A comprehensive job search tool that leverages Google Maps API to display employer locations, LinkedIn API to identify your social network connections within those companies, and Payscale API for real-time salary analysis by job category. This mashup aims to assist job seekers in finding job listings, understanding the location of potential employers, assessing the work environment through professional connections, and gaining insights into salary trends for various job categories. The tool integrates multiple data sources to provide a holistic view of job opportunities and their associated benefits.

related_apis.title: LinkedIn API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
LinkedIn is the world's largest business social networking hub. Launched in 2003, LinkedIn has millions of users and is implemented in over 200 countries. One purpose of the site is to allow registered users to maintain a list of contact details of people with whom they have some level of relationship, called Connections. Users can invite anyone (whether a site user or not) to become a connection.
The LinkedIn API is a RESTful platform that provides a simple, consistent representation of people, companies, jobs, and the interactions and relationships between them. Our query language lets you read data in XML and JSON at the granularity and aggregation that you choose. Use OAuth 1.0a to authorize users and begin making REST API calls using any programming language.The API’s access is restricted to authorized developers.

title: Mashup: Sound Shelter - An electronic music discovery engine
description: Sound Shelter is an innovative electronic music discovery engine that leverages advanced technology to curate and recommend the latest and greatest in House, Techno, Disco, Dubstep, and Soul Jazz genres. By integrating data from top taste-makers and music enthusiasts worldwide, including renowned DJs, label owners, and record store managers, Sound Shelter delivers a comprehensive and personalized music experience. This mashup utilizes cutting-edge search algorithms and recommendation systems to provide users with real-time access to the best new releases, ensuring that music lovers are always up-to-date with the latest trends in electronic music.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

related_apis.title: Discogs API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Discogs is a user-built database containing information on artists, labels, and their recordings. Discogs is constantly growing as users submit releases to the database.

related_apis.title: Juno Download API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Juno Download is a dance music download site created by Juno Records, the online dance music store. The Juno Download API provides developer access to the Juno Records catalog of over 3.5 million music files. Developers can use the API to add music or Juno buy links to websites and applications, or access cover artwork, preview clips and metadata. Responses are XML formatted.

title: Mashup: Weather Forecasts for 100 Hot Cities
description: A comprehensive weather forecasting tool that aggregates real-time climate data from Weather Underground for 100 of the world's hottest cities as determined by historical temperature records. This mashup combines geographical information with meteorological data to forecast climate conditions in urban areas known for high temperatures, offering travelers and residents alike a detailed understanding of local weather patterns and heat-related risks.

title: Mashup: FriendLynx
description: FriendLynx is a social media integration tool that facilitates the discovery and connection of Facebook friends on Twitter. This mashup allows users to quickly identify their Facebook acquaintances within the Twitter platform and subsequently follow them directly or through curated Twitter lists. Additionally, by installing FriendLynx, users contribute to the mutual recognition process, enabling their Facebook friends to locate them on Twitter, thus fostering enhanced cross-platform social networking capabilities.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Amazon EC2 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) API is a web service that enables you to launch and manage Linux/UNIX and Windows server instances in Amazon's data centers. Giving users the ability to "compute" in the cloud, it provides users with complete control of their computing resources and lets them run on Amazon's computing environment. Amazon EC2 changes the economics of computing by allowing users to pay only for capacity that is actually used.
This is a REST-based API. The SOAP interface was deprecated on 1 December 2015.
The WSDL for each supported API version is available from the following URI:
http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc//AmazonEC2.wsdl

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: MyTube60 Power Hour Videos
description: Detailed and technically accurate description of the mashup

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

title: Mashup: Horsham Town
description: A location-specific mashup that uses Virtual Earth to provide custom high-resolution images of Horsham, UK town centre. The mashup offers an entire urban area with updated Virtual Earth images, and also features Flash technology to play audio and display images that are streamed on demand. The target users are those interested in exploring the town centre of Horsham, UK, and those who appreciate high-resolution images and on-demand media streaming.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: Cape Town Magazine
description: A comprehensive travel magazine covering the vibrant city of Cape Town, South Africa, offering a rich blend of news, insightful articles, and curated lists of activities and unique accommodations. This mashup integrates local travel information with cultural insights, providing visitors and residents alike with essential guides and recommendations for exploring the city and beyond. It leverages mapping technologies to enhance geographic understanding and planning, offering a holistic travel experience that combines practical information with a deep appreciation of the region's culture and history.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: StrikeIron IP Address Lookup API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Quick and easy access to IP addresses. Find the IP address from the name of a web server.

related_apis.title: Google Earth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Earth Engine API allows developers to run algorithms on georeferenced imagery and vectors stored on Google's infrastructure. The Google Earth Engine API provides a library of functions which may be applied to imagery for display and analysis. Earth Engine's public data catalog contains a large amount of publicly available imagery.

title: Mashup: Pentaho BI Maps
description: A data visualization tool that integrates Pentaho's open-source business intelligence tools with Google Maps to provide map-based visualizations of business data. Users can explore and analyze data in a geographic context, allowing for better understanding of patterns and trends. The mashup leverages Pentaho's data analysis capabilities and Google Maps' mapping features to create meaningful visualizations.

description: A dashboard tool that monitors and displays the activity of specified GitHub users, providing real-time updates on their repositories, issues, pull requests, and other updates. related_apis.title: GitHub API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: GitHub is a repository of public open source and private business code. Is is a fast, efficient, distributed version control system ideal for the collaborative development of software. Use it to fork projects, send pull requests, monitor development.

title: Mashup: Location based News
description: A location-based news service that delivers the latest news headlines specific to your current geographical location. Users can access this service via WAP, SMS, and Email by using the keyword 'localnews' and providing their city and state information. The mashup utilizes geolocation technology to deliver real-time, relevant news headlines tailored to the user's neighborhood. It integrates news services with geolocation APIs to provide a personalized news experience based on the user's location.

title: Mashup: Shady Old Lady Guide to London
description: A personalized tour guide mashup that allows users to create bespoke walking tours of London, featuring hidden, infamous, grizzly, or famous historical locations. The mashup integrates user-generated content with a curated database of over 200 locations, providing an immersive, educational experience for visitors to the city.

related_apis.title: Shopify Admin API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use Shopify's robust ecommerce APIs to create apps for our 500,000 merchants. Over 35 endpoints, detailed SDKs, tutorials and access to dedicated API and developer support.

related_apis.title: Actual Reports API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Actual Reports Designer is a web based design tool that allows users to create custom printouts and reports and bound them with data from different sources like Excel, CSV, JSON and Google Drive Spreadsheet. The tool can be used for creating product, packaging and discount labels, invoices, business cards and much more. The API lets developers integrate the platform's functionality into existing systems while allowing them to customize their printouts. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON.

description: A comprehensive travel mashup that combines hotel location, pricing, and availability data with integrated mapping and search capabilities for travel-related services such as restaurants, attractions, and airports. Users can leverage real-time map tools to create personalized trip notes, share their favorite hotel and location views with friends and family, and make informed travel decisions based on detailed location and pricing data.

related_apis.title: Yelp Fusion API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Yelp Fusion APIs are RESTful APIs and users can retrieve business review and rating, information for a particular geographic region or location.display review information for a particular business, determine accurate neighborhood name information for a particular location, track recent reviews for a particular business, display pictures of highly rated local businesses and of the top reviewers for that business, determine a particular business' review and rating information based on the phone number for that business. The default output is JSON. This output format was chosen due to the availability of JSON parsers in many languages. The following Yelp Fusion APIs are available: Search, Phone Number Search, Business Search, Transaction, Reviews, and Autcomplete - each API has a separate ProgrammableWeb entry.

title: Mashup: Particle Reviews
description: Particle Reviews is a movie rating service that integrates the Rotten Tomatoes API with Hulu's unofficial API. The mashup provides users with a comprehensive overview of movie ratings, reviews, and availability from both platforms, offering a seamless experience for movie enthusiasts to discover and evaluate films.

related_apis.title: Rotten Tomatoes API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Rotten Tomatoes is a website containing information about movies: information, news, reviews and ratings, pictures, etx. The Rotten Tomatoes API is RESTful web service that was designed to be easy to explore and use. Developers can use the API to access the Rotten Tomatoes' database of movie data by using the Lists, Movies, or DVDs sections of the API.

title: Mashup: TweetJourney
description: A social mapping mashup that tracks and visualizes the route taken by a user during their travels, whether it be a holiday, bicycle tour, or bar hopping night. The mashup allows users to input their name and generate a detailed map of their journey, which can be shared with friends and family. This tool combines social media sharing with mapping technology to provide an interactive and engaging way to document and share travel experiences.

description: An online and mobile application designed to facilitate the creation, management, and sharing of Christmas gift lists. Key features include the ability to add products from any website through the web application or Chrome extension, search and add items from popular eCommerce sites such as Amazon, eBay, and Walmart, and share wish lists with family and friends for collaborative gift planning and purchasing. This tool streamlines the process of generating and managing Christmas gift ideas, making it easier for users to organize and communicate their gift preferences.

The Google Plus API allows developers to access publicly-available Google Plus content, including user information and publicly shared items. The Google+ API is the programming interface to Google+ that allows you to integrate your app or website with Google+. This enables users to connect with each other for maximum engagement using Google+ features from within your application with resources for People, Activities, and Comments. Google Developers provides APIs, software development tools, and technical resources that allow communication with Google Services and their integration to other services. Google is a technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products that includes online advertising technologies, search, cloud computing, software, and hardware.

related_apis.title: Parsebot API MASTER RECORD

Responses in JSON and authentication with API Key. Guides are available to maximize API calls, embed data, and send & receive responses.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

related_apis.title: Prosperent API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Prosperent provides a platform for affiliate marketers to place dynamic, targeted ads on their websites. The API provides access to the functionality of the platform. Developers can build apps with the API and earn commission on every sale driven through the system, or simply use the API to augment their web site to help monetize their traffic. The documentation includes complete details about all parameters that should be set and describes in detail the extended query syntax and extra functionality of the search endpoint. Documentation is available upon registration.

related_apis.title: Skimlinks Link Monetization API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Link Wrapper lets you use Skimlinks in places you wouldn’t normally be able to; such as in Adobe Flash Applications, mobile apps, iPhone, iPad and Android apps. The Skimlinks API lets developers use Skimlinks in places such as in Adobe Flash Applications, mobile apps, iPhone, iPad and Android apps. Users can build links via the API inside their own application or website. Full documentation is available with registration. Skimlinks is a technology that helps users monetize online content by converting normal product links from thousands of retailers into their equivalent affiliate links.

related_apis.title: eBay Finding API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
eBay's Finding API provides programmatic access to search capabilities on the eBay platform. It lets users search and browse for items listed on eBay, and provides metadata to refine searches and customize the searching process. Developers can use this API to build search and browse capabilities into bidding and buying applications.
The Finding API exposes a variety of search capabilities, including searching based on keyword, associated items, listing details, categories (domains), item characteristics (aspects), and domain and aspect metadata. The API can also provide keyword recommendations to help refine search results.
This API can be used via SOAP, HTTP, and REST. It can also be integrated with JavaScript and PHP using eBay's API tutorial kits.

title: Mashup: My Bucket List
description: A social platform designed to facilitate the creation, management, and sharing of personal goal lists, known as bucket lists. Users can upload multimedia content, such as photos and videos, to illustrate their goals. The platform also includes features that allow users to help each other achieve their aspirations, fostering a supportive community environment. This mashup integrates social media tools with goal-setting and community-building functionalities to enhance user engagement and motivation.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

description: An online platform that enables users to create interactive, non-linear narratives by integrating the YouTube API. Users can search for and embed YouTube videos into their narratives, allowing for dynamic storytelling experiences. This tool is particularly useful for creators, educators, and marketers who want to engage their audiences with immersive content.

description: An interactive geospatial mashup for wine enthusiasts, providing a comprehensive map of Oregon's vineyards. It allows users to explore vineyards based on location, varietal, and vineyard amenities. The mashup integrates mapping services with wine industry data, offering a location-based exploration of the Oregon wine region, enabling search and discovery of vineyards by geographic proximity, wine type, and specific features of the vineyards.

title: Mashup: Compare Sat Nav
description: A UK-focused price comparison service for satellite navigation systems. The mashup integrates multiple data sources, including its own price database and eBay auction listings, to provide users with comprehensive and up-to-date pricing information for sat nav products. It enables users to easily compare prices across different retailers and auction platforms, helping them find the best deals on sat nav systems.

title: Mashup: TrackThis
description: A comprehensive package tracking service that integrates with multiple shipping providers (FedEx, UPS, USPS, DHL, and others) to monitor and notify users of package movements via email, SMS, Facebook, and Twitter. TrackThis provides real-time updates on package location and estimated time of arrival (ETA), ensuring users stay informed about their shipments through their preferred communication channels.

related_apis.title: FedEx API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: FedEx web services allow businesses to integrate FedEx shipping functionality into their existing warehouse management systems without hosting on-site.Developers can access the FedEx API via SOAP or HTTP POST transactions. The following functionality is available: Rate Services, Service Availability, Tracking and Visibility, FedEx Locator. Further services are available but require the completion of a certification process.

related_apis.title: UPS Shipping API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The UPS Shipping API provides UPS shipping functionalities to be integrated into websites and enterprise applications. This API enables the networking of shipping activities at different locations, dealers, and offices. Business customers will be able to utilize the breadth of UPS services and capabilities.
This API is available in XML format which allows the flexibility to integrate into website and application design and layout.

related_apis.title: USPS Track/Confirm Fields API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The USPS Track/Confirm Fields API allows developers to get detail and summary information for a shipment broken down by fields. Developers can include up to 10 tracking IDs in each request.This API is part of the USPS Web Tools API library which provides access to USPS data free of charge.

With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: DHL API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: DHL XML Services provides developers the ability to integrate DHL's service availability, transit times, rates, shipment tracking and more from more than 140 countries. The service allows developers to utilize their existing shipping management systems and integrate with DHL via a standard XML based secured platform.Available services include shipment processing, tracking, rate quote, capability, label generation and pickup booking.

title: Mashup: Enthusem and Box.net
description: A service that enables Box.net users to create physical mailers directly from their Box accounts using stored photos, facilitating the integration of cloud storage with postal services.

related_apis.title: Box API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Box is a modern content management platform that transforms how organizations work and collaborate to achieve results faster.Box Platform provides content APIs to build secure content experiences in custom apps. With Box Platform, organizations can bring content management and collaboration services to their own custom apps or build custom integrations with Box.

related_apis.title: Enthusem API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Enthusem specializes in offline to online marketing. The Enthusem API enables any web application to send personal, one at a time printed mail that drives recipients to an online experience using unique trackable codes.

title: Mashup: Trackle
description: A platform that aggregates and monitors your monitored information across various online sources and categories. It provides a centralized dashboard where users can view and track activities related to popular categories such as crime, photos, videos, and jobs. The mashup combines multiple APIs and data sources to deliver real-time updates and alerts on the user's chosen topics.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Simply Hired Jobs API MASTER RECORD

title: Mashup: Retrospective
description: A real-time collaboration tool that leverages the Pusher API to enable multiple users to simultaneously view, update, and share sticky notes on a digital board. This mashup provides an interactive and immediate way for users to contribute and track changes to notes, facilitating dynamic and collaborative content management.

related_apis.title: Pusher API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Pusher is a simple hosted API for quickly, easily and securely adding realtime bi-directional functionality via WebSockets to web and mobile apps, or any other Internet connected device.
We offer a rich suite of libraries that you can use within your applications, including a JavaScript client library for web and HTML5 apps.
Our event based abstraction makes it simple to bind UI interactions to events that are triggered from any client or server.
We use WebSockets (with 'fallback to Flash' in the JavaScript client library) to future proof your applications and make it easy for you to add bi-directional communication to your apps whilst keeping data usage to a minimum.
As well as a WebSockets API, we have a REST API for publishing your messages. This is ideally suited to web server technologies and we have a set of REST API libraries in many common languages to help you to do this.
We have a simple Publish/Subscribe model based on channels that allows you to filter and control how people receive your messages.
We supply functionality such as authentication mechanisms for private channels, and presence functionality for keeping track of who's online.

title: Mashup: Sales Line Bot
description: An IVR (Interactive Voice Response) system designed for sales teams, utilizing the HipChat and Plivo APIs. This mashup integrates telephone communications with instant messaging services, enabling real-time updates about incoming calls, call recordings, and voicemail notifications directly to the HipChat platform. It enhances sales team efficiency by providing immediate access to call-related information, facilitating faster response times and better customer interaction management.

related_apis.title: HipChat API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: HipChat is an instant messaging service designed for companies and teams. The platform allows internal communication with chat rooms and file sharing. HipChat is private and secure with a self-building buddy list.

related_apis.title: Plivo API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Plivo is a telephony platform for integration with other apps. It is built to be integrative and take desired call making and receiving functions off of developersâ€™ hands. It provides capacity for conferencing, call tracking, recording, and more. This API is HTTP-based with SSL support for exposing all of the services essential functionality. It returns JSON responses. Pricing details are forthcoming from the developers.

title: Mashup: Blogabond.com
description: A travel-oriented blogging platform that allows users to share their journeys through interactive maps. By combining blogging with mapping functionality, Blogabond.com provides a unique way for travelers to document their experiences, pinpoint their locations, and visualize their routes. Users can create detailed travel diaries, include maps that highlight their travel paths, and share their adventures with a global audience, making it a comprehensive tool for both personal journaling and travel content creation.

title: Mashup: More Than F1
description: A free, web-based fantasy F1 management game that allows users to create their own team by selecting drivers, chassis, engines, and sponsors. The game simulates the development of the chosen team's financial status and performance over time, requiring strategic decision-making to compete in the virtual F1 world. It integrates elements of sports management, fantasy sports, and humor, providing an entertaining and interactive experience for F1 enthusiasts and casual gamers alike.

related_apis.title: Ergast API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Ergast Motor Racing Data API provides a historical record of motor racing data for non-commercial purposes. The API provides data for the Formula 1 and Formula E series, from the start of the World Championships in 1950 and 2014 respectively. New: Now provides Formula One lap times and pit stop data from the 2011 season onwards.

title: Mashup: Amanda Open Source Backup
description: Amanda Enterprise is a fully supported, certified, and tested version of the open source Amanda backup and recovery software, tailored for enterprise use. It facilitates the backup, archiving, and retrieval of large volumes of data via Amazon S3, enabling data access from anywhere on the internet at any time. This solution integrates cloud storage services with enterprise backup needs, offering scalable and reliable data protection and retrieval capabilities.

related_apis.title: Amazon S3 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Since 2006 Amazon Web Services has been offering web services commonly known as cloud computing. AWS Provides a reliable, low cost infrastructure platform that powers hundreds of thousands of businesses.
Amazon S3 API, the Simple Storage Service provides a simple web services interface used to store objects using the Amazon online storage infrastructure. Users can then download the data or use the data with other AWS services, such as Amazon Elastic Cloud Computer (EC2). Using this web service, developers can build applications that make use of Internet storage.
The API uses Buckets, Objects, Keys and Operations. An object has four parts: value, key, metadata, and an access control policy. Objects are stored in buckets. The API is REST based. Responses are formatted in JSON.

title: Mashup: Sales Tracker
description: A mobile messaging solution designed specifically for field sales teams to report their daily sales activities through SMS. This mashup leverages short message service (SMS) technology to enable seamless communication between sales representatives and their headquarters. It facilitates real-time tracking of sales performance, enhances reporting efficiency, and supports remote work environments by ensuring that sales data is accurately captured and transmitted without the need for physical documentation.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: MapDays.com
description: MapDays.com is a location-based event search mashup that enables users to find events near them, filtered by their preferred location and time. The mashup combines mapping technology with event databases to provide users with a refined list of events that match their search criteria. It utilizes geolocation services to determine the user's location and integrates with event APIs to fetch and display relevant event information. The mashup supports both real-time and static data, allowing users to search for events happening now or in the future.

title: Mashup: Your Automated China Investment Advisor
description: WealthyTec's Automated China Investment Advisor is a cutting-edge FinTech solution designed for international investors seeking to capitalize on the Chinese stock market. This robo-advisor leverages advanced China Stock Analytics and screening tools to streamline the process of identifying top-performing stocks listed in Hong Kong, the United States, and Singapore. By integrating real-time data from various financial markets, it provides users with swift and accurate insights into the Chinese stock market, enabling them to make informed investment decisions. The mashup combines geospatial data with financial analytics, ensuring that investors can access and trade top China stocks efficiently. It is particularly tailored for savvy investors looking to navigate the complexities of the Chinese financial landscape with ease.

related_apis.title: Highcharts API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Highcharts is a charting library that lets users add interactive charts to a web site or web application. Highcharts currently supports line, spline, area, areaspline, column, bar, pie, scatter, angular gauges, arearange, areasplinerange, columnrange, bubble, box plot, error bars, funnel, waterfall and polar chart types. An account with service is required.

related_apis.title: Highcharts Highstock API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Highcharts is a charting library that gives users access to interactive charts that can be added to a web site or web application. Highcharts currently supports line, spline, area, areaspline, column, bar, pie, scatter, angular gauges, arearange, areasplinerange, columnrange, bubble, box plot, error bars, funnel, waterfall and polar chart types. Highstock lets users use JavaScript to create stock or general timeline charts, including navigation options like a small navigator series, preset date ranges, date picker, scrolling and panning. An account with service is required.

title: Mashup: Tagfrisk
description: A geotagging service that allows users to bookmark and share their favorite videos, sightseeing spots, and photos directly on a world map. related_apis.title: Factual v3 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Factual is an open data platform for application developers that leverages large-scale data aggregation and community exchange. We take on the dirty work of data management and data curation, letting developers focus on higher value and more productive tasks. We provide clean, structured data with complete source transparency to developers via both download and API access on liberal terms.

The mashup accepts limited input from users and employs the API's floating response level to return accurate geographical results. It leverages the power of AJAX to enhance interactivity and provide real-time feedback to users, making the process of finding locations easy and efficient. The source code for this mashup is available for further exploration and customization.

title: Mashup: YouTube Slideshow on Google Maps
description: A humor-based mashup that integrates YouTube videos with Google Maps, allowing users to browse a slideshow of YouTube thumbnails as if they were map tiles. Clicking and dragging allows for scrolling through the images. To play a video, users simply click on the thumbnail and press the play button. The mashup combines video content from YouTube with the interactive mapping capabilities of Google Maps, providing a novel and entertaining way to explore video content spatially.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: HereKid
description: HereKid is an educational platform that leverages the DonorsChoose API to collect, analyze, and present classroom project and donation data for the largest cities in the United States. It offers real-time insights into the funding needs and priorities of public schools, helping educators, donors, and policymakers make informed decisions. By integrating with the DonorsChoose API, HereKid provides a centralized, interactive interface for users to explore educational projects, track donation trends, and identify areas of need within the educational system.

related_apis.title: DonorsChoose API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DonorsChoose.org is an online charity that makes it easy for anyone to help students in need.Here's how it works: public school teachers from every corner of America post classroom project requests on DonorsChoose.org. Requests range from pencils for a poetry writing unit, to violins for a school recital, to microscope slides for a biology class.
Then, you can browse project requests and give any amount to the one that inspires you. Once a project reaches its funding goal, we deliver the materials to the school.You'll get photos of your project taking place, a thank-you letter from the teacher, and a cost report showing how each dollar was spent. If you give over $100, you'll also receive hand-written thank-you letters from the students.DonorsChoose.org's simple JSON API allows developers to pull DonorsChoose.org classroom project listings into their website or application using project selection criteria of their choosing.The JSON API has been used by DonorsChoose.org partners like Chevron, SONIC Drive-In, NBC Universal, Bing, PayPal, and others to build high-profile highly customized giving and cause marketing experiences.The API also enables developers to donate to projects or purchase gift cards without routing users to DonorsChoose.org for payment.

title: Mashup: Ivy FM - Discover new music every day
description: Ivy FM is a music discovery platform that provides a continuous stream of great songs in various genres from top artists worldwide. Users can select their preferred channel, listen to high-quality music, share their favorite tracks, and engage with the community.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

title: Mashup: Maponics Neighborhood Boundaries: Recovery by Neighborhood
description: A geographic data visualization tool that combines geo-spatial data with economic recovery metrics. Users can select specific US cities and view detailed maps showcasing recovery spending and job creation data at the neighborhood level. The mashup leverages Maponics Neighborhood Boundaries for accurate geographic representation and integrates economic recovery data to provide insights into local economic conditions.

related_apis.title: Maponics API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: A professional-grade GIS data provider offering neighborhood boundaries dataset via an API. Also an API for neighborhood boundaries, ZIP Code boundaries and postal carrier route boundaries.

title: Mashup: Singapore Mash Websites
description: A dynamic, mobile-friendly mashup platform that aggregates diverse information from various websites in Singapore, providing an all-in-one solution for locals and tourists. This comprehensive tool offers seamless access to travel, mapping, food, and entertainment data, ensuring users have a convenient and efficient way to navigate and explore Singapore's offerings.

title: Mashup: Fashionaholics
description: A comprehensive online shopping guide that leverages the ShopStyle API to provide users with a curated selection of fashion products. The mashup offers a seamless shopping experience by integrating real-time inventory data, user reviews, and high-quality images to help users make informed purchasing decisions. It supports multiple fashion categories and provides personalized recommendations based on user preferences and browsing history.

related_apis.title: ShopStyle API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The ShopStyle API allows client applications to retrieve the underlying data for all the basic elements of the ShopStyle website, including products, brands, retailers, and categories.
For ease of development, the API is a REST-style web service, composed of simple HTTP GET requests. Data is returned to the client in either XML or JSON formats. The API is client-language independent and easy to use from PHP, Java, JavaScript, or any other modern development context.

title: Mashup: Ghidul Turistic al Municipiului Bălţi
description: A comprehensive, bilingual tourist guide for the municipality of Bălți, featuring a rich collection of articles, photos, and videos. The guide provides detailed information about local attractions, events, and services, catering to both residents and visitors. It integrates content from various local blogs and websites to offer a holistic view of the region's cultural and natural heritage. The guide also includes a map of Bălți, highlighting key points of interest and providing navigation assistance for tourists.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Cheap-Flights.To
description: A travel search site that leverages major airlines and online travel providers to find the best airfare deals between cities. Utilizes Kayak and a proprietary, private travel API called Bookingwiz. The mashup aims to provide users with competitive pricing and a seamless booking experience through an integrated platform.

title: Mashup: Alaska Travel Guide
description: A comprehensive travel planning platform for Alaska, integrating extensive travel listings with location-based services. This mashup provides users with the ability to search for and book a wide range of travel accommodations, tours, cruises, and transportation across various Alaskan cities, including Fairbanks, Denali Park, Anchorage, Seward, Kenai, Kodiak, Skagway, Ketchikan, and Juneau. It leverages travel databases and mapping services to offer detailed itineraries and real-time availability checks, enhancing the planning experience for tourists and adventurers alike.
