title: Mashup: termCloud Search
description: termCloud Search transforms the search process into an interactive learning experience by generating a dynamic term cloud based on user queries. This term cloud provides an immediate overview of key terms and concepts related to the query, facilitating a deeper understanding of the subject area. Users can use the term cloud to navigate the result set, explore related topics, and enhance their learning journey. It supports both general and specific queries, making it a versatile tool for educational, research, and professional contexts.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Site Explorer API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Yahoo! Site Explorer APIs provide access to information about your site from the Yahoo! Site Explorer service. These APIs help you better understand your traffic and usage -- querying for the pages in the Yahoo! index and the sites linking into a site. They will be useful to anyone looking for a good grasp of who is linking to you and to create an effective alternative to easily-spammed trackback.

title: Mashup: getHired Mobile App
description: getHired is a comprehensive mobile job search application designed for Windows Phone 7 users. This app aggregates job listings from multiple sources, including leading job search engines such as SimplyHired, Indeed, CareerJet, JuJu, LinkUp, and CareerBuilder. It offers a wide range of job opportunities across 60 countries, providing users with an extensive and up-to-date job database. The app's functionality includes real-time job updates, user-friendly interface, and easy navigation to help job seekers find suitable employment opportunities.

related_apis.title: indeed API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Indeed is a search engine for jobs - with a radically different approach to job search. In one simple search, Indeed gives job seekers free access to millions of employment opportunities from thousands of websites. Indeed.com includes all the job listings from major job boards, newspapers, associations and company career pages - and we continue to add new sites every day. The Indeed API allows developers to integrate Indeed’s employer interface or job seeker interface in apps. The API returns responses in JSON or XML format.

related_apis.title: Microsoft adCenter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Microsoft adCenter application programming interface (API) enables you to create applications that: Create and manage adCenter campaigns, orders, keywords, and ads. Obtain the status on orders, keywords and ads. Pause and resume orders. Generate keyword estimates. Generate reports about campaign performance. Perform order targeting.

related_apis.title: Simply Hired Jobs API MASTER RECORD
CareerBuilder API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Currently a private API, the CareerBuilder API allows you to integrate their database of over 1.5 million jobs with your software or website. The API provides methods for basic job searching, retrieving data for a specific job, and applying to a job.

related_apis.title: LinkUp Job Search Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: With the LinkUp Job Search API, access over 3.5 million active jobs listed directly from 30,000 company websites. Because LinkUp indexes direct from the source - the company website - your jobseekers will get a first-class experience and access to the best jobs. Sign-up today and backfill your site with the highest-quality job listing content available.

versions.version_title: LinkUp Job Search Engine REST API

related_apis.title: Careerjet API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Careerjet is a job search engine that pulls job postings from company and organization websites in a variety of industries and locations. Users searching for employment may also post their resume on Careerjet, as well as create job alerts.
The Careerjet API allows developers to embed Careerjet search results into other websites. Search results can be returned by keywords, locations, companies, industries, and other criteria. The HTTP API is not documented, but client libraries are available for Java, Perl, PHP, .Net 2.0, and Ruby.

related_apis.title: Bing Maps Locations API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Bing Maps Locations API can be used to get location information associated with map coordinates. The API also provides functionality to get coordinates for a location based on values such as postal code and address and also get coordinates for a location provided in a query string. The API uses both REST and SOAP protocol and responses are formatted in XML and JSON.

versions.version_title: Bing Maps Locations REST API v1.0

related_apis.title: Juju Publisher API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Juju is a job search engine. The search results link to jobs found on employer career portals, recruiter websites, job boards, and other employment sites all over the Internet, as opposed to locally hosted job postings. The Juju Publisher API allows partners to post job serach results across multiple channels on their sites. It uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in XML.

title: Mashup: Rock Climbing in Mexico
description: An online community and mapping platform dedicated to showcasing and sharing information about rock climbing locations in Mexico. The mashup combines social networking features with detailed mapping and photo galleries, allowing climbers to discover new climbing spots, share their experiences, and connect with other climbers in real-time. It integrates user-generated content with geographical location data, providing a comprehensive resource for the rock climbing community.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. related_apis.title: Google Earth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Earth Engine API allows developers to run algorithms on georeferenced imagery and vectors stored on Google's infrastructure. The Google Earth Engine API provides a library of functions which may be applied to imagery for display and analysis. Earth Engine's public data catalog contains a large amount of publicly available imagery.

title: Mashup: Is This Game Worth Watching?
description: A real-time sports event analysis tool that leverages FanFeedr's event data service to provide fans with an informed decision on whether to watch a global soccer match without revealing the final score. The mashup employs a proprietary scoring formula to assess the match's potential excitement, combining live match data with user engagement metrics to offer a dynamic, spoiler-free viewing recommendation.

title: Mashup: Lose It!
description: Lose It! is a comprehensive weight loss and health management application available both on web and mobile platforms. It offers a customizable weight loss plan tailored to individual lifestyles, incorporating features such as fitness tracking, medical advice, dietary guidance, nutritional insights, and body measurement tools. The free version provides basic functionalities, but for enhanced features including access to all available tools, users can opt for an annual subscription.

related_apis.title: Fitbit API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Fitbit helps people lead healthier, more active lives by empowering them with data, inspiration and guidance to reach their goals. As the leader in the connected health and fitness category, Fitbit designs products and experiences that track everyday health and fitness. The Fitbit Web API enables third-party applications to access and write data on behalf of users.

title: Mashup: Mapping the Green Economy: California
description: A comprehensive Google Map visualization that highlights the geographical distribution of environmentally sustainable businesses in California. This mashup enables users to identify and locate companies engaged in key sectors such as energy efficiency retrofits, renewable energy component manufacturing, electric vehicle production, and advanced fuel processing. By leveraging geospatial data and interactive search functionalities, users can explore the green economy's impact and opportunities across California's diverse industries and urban-rural settings.

The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Vacationic
description: An interactive travel guide mashup that combines global destination data with interactive mapping technologies to provide users with a comprehensive overview of travel highlights around the world. The mashup features destinations such as cities, beaches, national parks, and cultural sites, allowing users to explore and plan their trips through an immersive, map-based experience. It integrates various travel-related APIs and data sources to offer detailed information on each location, including photos, videos, and other relevant travel content.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

related_apis.title: Google Ad Manager API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Ad Manager API allows developers to build applications that use Google Ad Manager, a comprehensive ad-serving platform that streamlines ad management. API methods are available for managing inventory, creating orders, pulling reports, and more. This API uses SOAP, and client libraries are available in a number of popular programming languages.

versions.version_title: Google Ad Manager RPC API v202002

title: Mashup: Raspberry Pi and Plivo â€” Call Mom Button
description: A Raspberry Pi-based hardware and software integration that uses Plivo's voice API to enable users to make phone calls to their mothers. This project demonstrates the use of Raspberry Pi for hardware control and Plivo's API for voice communication, providing an educational tool for teaching students about embedded systems and API integration. The mashup includes hardware setup, software programming, and API configuration to achieve the functionality of making phone calls from a Raspberry Pi device.

related_apis.title: Plivo API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Plivo is a telephony platform for integration with other apps. It is built to be integrative and take desired call making and receiving functions off of developersâ€™ hands. It provides capacity for conferencing, call tracking, recording, and more. This API is HTTP-based with SSL support for exposing all of the services essential functionality. It returns JSON responses. Pricing details are forthcoming from the developers.

title: Mashup: loc.alize.us is Flickr Mapped
description: A highly interactive world map mashup that combines geolocation services with Flickr's photo database, allowing users to explore a massive amount of photos from various locations globally. Users can also explore photos based on selected topics or people they know, providing a unique and visual way to discover and engage with content from different geographical regions and communities.

related_apis.title: GeoNames API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Geonames is a geographical database with web services that let users extract useful information about different places, such as weather, timezone and post codes. The GeoNames geographical database covers all countries and contains over eight million placenames that are available for download free of charge. Users can edit, correct and add new names using a wiki interface.Geonames provides a suite of Webservices including the following categories:Fulltext searchPlace HierarchyWikipediaPostal CodesReverse GeocodingThe APIs use RESTful protocol and responses vary in format between XML, JSON, CSV, and TXTWhile the GeoNames data is free, the data is available without costs, there is a Service Level Agreement available for premium web services.

title: Mashup: TeamLeaks
description: A comprehensive sports news aggregator that collects and displays the latest articles, blogs, and tweets from a wide range of sources. Users can search for specific sports news, submit their own stories, and vote on the relevance of submitted articles. This mashup focuses on team-specific news, ensuring that users get the most up-to-date information about their favorite sports teams.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: ESPN API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
ESPN.com is an online platform for multiple sports news, statistics, team information, and player information. ESPN.com offers sports scores, standings, and other statistics for a variety of sports.
The ESPN.com API allows developers to access and integrate the data of ESPN.com with other applications and to create new applications. Some example API methods include retrieving sports information, team information, and league information. Interested developers should sign up here for an API key: http://developer.espn.com/member/register.

title: Mashup: BroadSoft Chumby Widget
description: An interactive Telephony and Hardware mashup enabling users to monitor and manage their call history and settings on a Chumby device. This Xtended Chumby Widget integrates with the Xtended Services Interface to provide real-time call status updates, a simple interface for returning missed calls, and the ability to set Do Not Disturb mode directly from the device.

related_apis.title: Broadsoft Xtended API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Broadsoft Xtended provides developers access to the leading VoIP hosted platform. The BroadSoft Xtended Developers Program supports third party development to extend the value of the BroadWorks platform. BroadWorks application offerings include Hosted PBX, IP Centrex, Business Trunking, Mobile PBX, and Residential Broadband.

title: Mashup: Currency Conversion by Mobile Phone
description: A mobile service that provides real-time exchange rates between two currencies via multiple channels. Users can access this service through WAP, SMS, or Email interfaces, allowing for cross-border financial transactions to be verified and executed on the go. The mashup combines mobile network capabilities with financial data feeds to deliver accurate and timely currency conversions directly to users' devices.

title: Mashup: Legistalker
description: Legistalker is a comprehensive online platform that tracks and displays the latest activities of US Congress Members. It integrates various data sources, including news mentions, Twitter feeds, and YouTube channels, to provide a holistic view of legislators' online presence. The mashup not only aggregates these diverse data streams but also contextualizes them to offer insights into the legislative process and public engagement. Legistalker utilizes APIs from news services, social media platforms, and video sharing sites to create a dynamic, real-time dashboard for users interested in government affairs and legislative actions. This service won second place in the 2009 Apps for America contest, highlighting its innovative approach to government transparency and public engagement through technology.

related_apis.title: Capitol Words API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The service extracts language daily from the Congressional Record, which reports the full text of deliberations in the U.S. House of Representatives and Senate. Applications can query those search terms to receive mentions, by title and speaker, from 1996 forward.
Methods support retrieval of statements in Congress by date, phrase, or free-text match. Retrieval can also specify which chamber of Congress, the speaker's state and/or party affiliation, or the name of a speaker to select for biographical data.

title: Mashup: Auto4Sq
description: A mobile application that automates frequent Foursquare check-ins based on user schedules. Users can set up regular check-ins, and the app will automatically perform these actions daily, integrating with the Foursquare API to manage user profiles and check-in data. This mashup primarily targets users who frequently visit the same locations and wish to streamline their check-in process, enhancing social presence and location-based activity on Foursquare.

related_apis.title: Foursquare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Foursquare Places API provides location based experiences with diverse information about venues, users, photos, and check-ins. The API supports real time access to places, Snap-to-Place that assigns users to specific locations, and Geo-tag. Additionally, Foursquare allows developers to build audience segments for analysis and measurement. JSON is the preferred response format.

title: Mashup: Whatsmypower
description: A real-time electricity price tracking tool that displays the current electricity price in your home. This mashup provides users with the latest pricing information, enabling them to monitor and adjust their energy consumption based on real-time data. It integrates with the whatsmypower.com API to fetch and display the current electricity price.

related_apis.title: Genability API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Genability provides tools to gain insight into electricity usage. The Genability API is a RESTful interface to detailed, accurate and up-to-date tariff and energy pricing data. Search by zipcode and other criteria.
The API provides a fully functional tariff calculator that uses actual reading data to compute a tariff bill. Reading data can be stored within the APIs for quicker calculations.
Also, the API offers a way to find out current and look ahead pricing for a zipcode so you can intelligently determine when the cost of electricity will go up or down.
Although the API is not free, it offers low entry level rates. Rates are primarily based on the number of unique tariffs accessed per month.
The API can respond with JSON or JSONP formats.
There are helpful PHP, Rails and Java libraries on Github https://github.com/Genability
Genability is a software company providing energy suppliers and distributors with technology to market, sell and increase value to customers. We help solar, energy procurement, connected home, efficiency and other businesses understand their customers' energy costs, determine what their products are saving, and turn insight into opportunity. We have the industry's only accurate and comprehensive cloud-based retail tariff database and rate engine. The Company is a recipient of the Department of Energy SunShot Initiative and based in San Francisco.

title: Mashup: Via-ferrata.de
description: Via-ferrata.de is an online magazine that specializes in curating a variety of exhilarating Klettersteige (rock climbing routes) and vie ferrate (iron ladders and cables) in the Alps. The mashup utilizes Google Maps to offer a unique interactive experience, allowing users to explore and select regions and routes of interest. It provides detailed information on each vie ferrate, making it an essential resource for adventure seekers and hikers looking to discover the best climbing routes in the Alps.

The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: UsersThink
description: UsersThink is an advanced feedback and design assessment platform designed to help developers and designers enhance the effectiveness of their landing pages by obtaining valuable insights directly from real users. This service streamlines the process by handling all aspects of setup, configuration, and user recruitment, ensuring that users receive focused and actionable feedback that can be used to optimize conversion rates.

related_apis.title: Stripe API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Stripe API allows developers to access the functionality of Stripe. Some example API methods include sending invoices, accepting payments, managing subscription billing, and editing and managing account information.Stripe is a service that allows users to accept payments online, specifically developers. With the Stripe application, users can keep track of payments, search past payments, create recurring charges, and keep track of customers.

related_apis.title: Gmail API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Google's Gmail API gives developer access to Gmail mailboxes and the ability to send email.
The API allows users to perform CRUD operations on email messages, attachments, drafts, threads and labels. Supported functionality includes the ability to manage thread labels, use advanced search operators to find and filter specific messages and threads, and sync with Gmail without tracking changes internally.
The Gmail API is RESTful with responses in JSON and uses OAuth 2.0 authorization.

related_apis.title: Gimmie API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Gimmie is a brand and product loyalty platform. Gimmie allows businesses to engage and reward their customers for using their services and products and accessing their content.
The Gimmie API allows developers to access and integrate the functionality of Gimmie with other applications. Public documentation is not available; interested developers should email contact@gimmieworld.com for more information.

related_apis.title: Unbounce API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Unbounce is a self-serve hosted service that provides marketers doing paid search, banner ads, email or social media marketing, a way to create, publish & test promotion specific landing pages without the need for IT or developers.The Unbounce API allows users to query for accounts, sub-accounts, domains, pages, page groups, and leads. The service uses REST calls, and returns JSON. An account is required with service and an API key and SSL are used for user authentication.

related_apis.title: LaunchRock API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: LaunchRock helps startups design attractive coming-soon webpages and social media campaigns. They also provide user management services and UX analytics for startups' launch sites. Through their API, developers can access data culled from those sites, such as, user activity, traffic, and sharing. Their API servers are RESTful and respond in JSON.

title: Mashup: funda.nl
description: A real estate listing platform for the Netherlands that aggregates property listings from various sources and integrates mapping services to provide geographical context for each listing. Users can search for properties by location, price, number of rooms, and other criteria, and view detailed maps showing the property's location relative to other features such as schools, public transportation, and shops.

related_apis.title: IVA Video API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Internet Video Archive's Entertainment Express API connects you to our movie, TV, and Video Game metadata services as well as our large collection of promotional video assets and images.
Our video assets include: movie trailers, TV series, season and episode trailers, video game trailers, music videos and much, much more! Our data collection is expanding daily and our API is designed to easily allow you to aggregate our data to your application or web site.

title: Mashup: SweetSearch
description: SweetSearch is a curated search engine specifically designed for students, integrating a handpicked database of 35,000 vetted websites with the Yolink relevance algorithm to provide students with accurate and age-appropriate search results. The mashup combines educational content from findingDulcinea with advanced search technology to ensure that students have access to reliable, high-quality information in an educational context.

related_apis.title: Yolink API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Yolink quickly scans search results, e-books, online documents, and web sites using key words, quotes, and word relationships to find what users are looking for. The API provides access to the cloud version of yolink to add real-time search capabilities to any application, and a set of configurable widgets which can be dropped into a page to provide dynamic search over top of existing content. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in XML, JSON and JSONP.

title: Mashup: Ask AMEE
description: A natural language query tool that leverages the Ask AMEE database to provide immediate answers to environmental questions. Users can input queries such as â€œ10kg of coalâ€œ, and the system retrieves relevant data from AMEE's extensive database, offering quick answers and additional resources for further exploration. The mashup integrates environmental data with user-friendly query functionality to facilitate easy access to environmental information.

related_apis.title: AMEE API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: AMEE is a platform for greenhouse gas calculation, with access to emissions factors, calculation algorithms, and storage for data history. Our science team take the published methodologies from the science community and put them into a simple unified API, so you don't have to trawl through PDFs and spreadsheets to work it all our yourself. With over 8 million possible calculations, the platform covers everything from simple electricity calculations through to insanely complex industrial processes. If you need to work out the environmental impact of an activity, AMEE has the environmental intelligence you need.

title: Mashup: Localetrends
description: Localetrends is a comprehensive mashup that integrates real estate data, public school test scores, demographic information, and employment statistics to generate detailed heat maps. This tool provides users with a visual representation of the correlation between property values, educational quality, population characteristics, and job market trends. By merging these datasets, Localetrends offers valuable insights for real estate investors, educators, and urban planners, enabling them to make informed decisions based on a holistic view of community health and growth potential.

The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

Users can easily share links to their maps or embed them directly into web pages. The service also offers an RSS feed for newly published maps, allowing users to keep up with the latest creations in the community. MapTrot's primary functionality is to facilitate the creation of personalized maps for social sharing and integration into other web content.

This mashup leverages Twitter APIs and data analytics tools to provide a comprehensive view of global and local Twitter trends, facilitating research, marketing, and social media strategy development.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: What The Trend? API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Find out what's trending on Twitter and why. For each trend, What The Trend provides a quick explanation of why it's trending (these blurbs are edited by users, wiki-style). You can also see the latest tweets, Flickr photos and news stories.

title: Mashup: Currency Convertor Ajax Application
description: An Ajax-based currency converter application that utilizes the Exchange Rate API to provide real-time currency conversion rates. This mashup can be easily integrated into any website, serving as a useful widget for displaying exchange rates and enabling users to convert currencies on the fly. Ideal for websites dealing with international transactions or currencies, it enhances user experience by offering quick and accurate currency information.

related_apis.title: Exchange Rate API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Exchange Rate API provides accurate exchange rates served from the European Central Reserve Bank as they are released. It only involves getting the contents returned by a URL. This API is free to use for both personal and commercial use.

title: Mashup: OpenJC Police Call Records
description: A demo application developed by the Code for America Jersey City brigade (OpenJC) that showcases the capabilities of SlashDB. It provides access to police call records data in various formats such as HTML, XML, XSD, JSON, and CSV. This mashup serves as an example of how open data can be leveraged to enhance civic engagement and transparency.

related_apis.title: SlashDB API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
SlashDB automatically turns databases into online resource so their content becomes accessible to authorized web, mobile and enterprise applications for reading and writing under standard data formats.
Technically speaking, it makes REST APIs out of relational databases.
Here are some generic use cases where SlashDB is a good choice:
* Data publishing and data exchanges with partners/clients
* Instant developer API for an existing database-driven website
* Database search and data discovery for data scientists
* Enterprise database gateway for web/mobile applications
* Enterprise data management and federation (ROA, data virtualization)
What will be your use case?
SlashDB is currently available for both on-premise and cloud installations. We provide ready-to-use virtual machines (AMI, VMware, VirtualBox etc.), which makes it a snap to get started. Once a VM is launched a user-friendly, web based admin GUI allows to add, remove and reconfigure database services.
Pricing is tailored to your business and we have special offers for qualifying startups, non-profits and institutions of higher education.

title: Mashup: API status
description: A real-time monitoring and performance tracking service for popular public APIs. This mashup provides comprehensive visibility into the availability and performance of heavily trafficked Web services such as Google Search, Google Maps, Bing, Facebook, Twitter, SalesForce, YouTube, Amazon, eBay, and others. Users can access real-time data on API uptime, latency, and error rates, enabling proactive monitoring and timely response to potential issues.

related_apis.title: Amazon S3 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Since 2006 Amazon Web Services has been offering web services commonly known as cloud computing. AWS Provides a reliable, low cost infrastructure platform that powers hundreds of thousands of businesses.
Amazon S3 API, the Simple Storage Service provides a simple web services interface used to store objects using the Amazon online storage infrastructure. Users can then download the data or use the data with other AWS services, such as Amazon Elastic Cloud Computer (EC2). Using this web service, developers can build applications that make use of Internet storage.
The API uses Buckets, Objects, Keys and Operations. An object has four parts: value, key, metadata, and an access control policy. Objects are stored in buckets. The API is REST based. Responses are formatted in JSON.

related_apis.title: Amazon EC2 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) API is a web service that enables you to launch and manage Linux/UNIX and Windows server instances in Amazon's data centers. Giving users the ability to "compute" in the cloud, it provides users with complete control of their computing resources and lets them run on Amazon's computing environment. Amazon EC2 changes the economics of computing by allowing users to pay only for capacity that is actually used.
This is a REST-based API. The SOAP interface was deprecated on 1 December 2015.
The WSDL for each supported API version is available from the following URI:
http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc//AmazonEC2.wsdl

related_apis.title: WatchMouse API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The WatchMouse service checks the behavior and availability of websites. WatchMouse allows site owners to optimize the internet experience of their customers.
A worldwide network checks websites from 40 different locations in 25 countries around the globe.
The API provides access to data collected via the service, access to monitoring settings, and direct commands to check a site.

title: Mashup: GetParking
description: GetParking is a comprehensive parking location database mashup that aims to provide users with seamless access to parking information globally. The mashup integrates mapping technologies with transportation data to offer an intuitive interface for finding parking locations around the world. Users can search for parking spots, view real-time availability, and navigate directly to their destination with ease. GetParking leverages mapping APIs, transportation data sources, and real-time updates to ensure accurate and up-to-date parking information.

related_apis.title: Google Latitude API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google Latitude API allows for websites and developers to integrate with Google Latitude, which lets users update and read their current location, their location history, and other geo-related information.
In Latitude, a location is a record of where a user was at a given time. A location always contains a latitude, a longitude and a timestamp. It might also contain more details about the position of the user at that time, such as altitude, or metadata about how the position itself was captured, such as accuracy.
A user typically has a current location, which represents the most recent known position of the user. In some cases, however, a user might decide to temporarily hide, making their position invisible to Latitude friends. A hidden user has no current location.
A user can opt to have their locations stored as a time series by Google. This collection of positions is called the user's location history.

related_apis.title: Google Street View Image API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Google's Street View Image API lets users retrieve Street View panorama or thumbnail images with parameterized HTTP requests. This web service allows these images to be embedded into a web page, without the use of JavaScript.
The viewport size, direction, location, pitch, and field of view (fov) can all be manipulated by parameters included in the HTTP request. Since the size of the image and the fov can be specified, users can effectively control the zoom level of the image. Finally, there is a parameter that can specify the request is coming from a device with location sensor information, enabling the service to be integrated with, for example, GPS enabled mobile phones.

versions.version_title: Google Street View Image REST API

Panoramio is a website that enables digital photographers to geolocate, store and organize their photographsï¿½and to view those photographs in Google Earth and Google Maps. Panoramio is a community-powered site for exploring places through photography: cities, natural wonders, or anywhere you might go. Panoramio is different from other photo sharing sites because the photos illustrate places. As you browse Panoramio, notice that there aren't many photos of friends and family posing in front of places, or photos of interesting surfaces--Panoramio's all about seeing the world.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Geoslideshow
description: A travel photojournalism mashup that combines Google Maps and Flickr photos to create interactive mapping experiences. Users can generate static maps with still images, dynamic maps with slideshow capabilities, and Google Maps KML files for sharing. This mashup is designed for travel enthusiasts and photographers who want to share their journeys visually and geographically.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. related_apis.title: Google Picasa API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [Editor's Note: Per provider, this API will be deprecated in January 2019. Developers are encouraged to migrate to the Google Photos Library API]From their site: The Picasa Web Albums data API allows client applications to view and update Picasa Web Albums content in the form of Google data API GData feeds. Your client application can request a list of user albums, photos, comments, or tags, edit or delete content in an existing entry, and query the content in an existing entry.

related_apis.title: Google Earth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Earth Engine API allows developers to run algorithms on georeferenced imagery and vectors stored on Google's infrastructure. The Google Earth Engine API provides a library of functions which may be applied to imagery for display and analysis. Earth Engine's public data catalog contains a large amount of publicly available imagery.

title: Mashup: FlickrEdit
description: FlickrEdit is a Java-based desktop application designed for viewing, editing, and managing photos. It offers a range of editing tools and functionalities, and seamlessly integrates with Flickr, allowing users to easily download photos to their local machine or upload edited photos back to Flickr.

The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: ZILPY
description: A comprehensive online platform offering free rental market insights, data analysis, and decision support tools for both renters and real estate investors. By integrating multiple data sources and employing advanced analytics, ZILPY provides detailed market statistics, rental trends, and investment forecasts, enabling users to compare property values, predict rental demand, and optimize investment strategies based on real-time market conditions.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. title: Mashup: Learn English online with songs
description: An interactive learning platform that combines hundreds of popular English language songs with corresponding exercises. The mashup offers a unique approach to language learning by integrating music and lyrics with educational content, making it an engaging and effective tool for individuals looking to improve their English skills in a fun and dynamic way. Users can access a wide range of songs from various genres, along with grammar and vocabulary exercises tailored to each song. The platform supports both self-paced learning and structured lesson plans, providing a comprehensive learning experience that leverages the power of music to enhance language acquisition.

title: Mashup: Marea Tide Charts
description: A web-based application providing precise tide predictions for any location worldwide throughout the entire year. Users can generate detailed tide charts either for their current location or by searching for specific places. The application allows for high-resolution zooming down to the minute level within the year-long tide chart, enabling users to explore water level heights and extreme conditions with great accuracy.

related_apis.title: API Hood Global Tides API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The API Hood Global Tides provides Oceans tidal heights and extremes predictions. Tide predictions calculate low and high tides based on time and location. Developers can use JSON format to make calls via RapidAPI.
Note: Predictions are based on historical tidal gauge data and satellite altimetry and do not take current weather and seismic events into consideration.

versions.version_title: API Hood Global Tides REST API v1.0

title: Mashup: LifeTweaker
description: A personal habit tracking and analysis tool that allows users to monitor, graph, and adjust their daily habits. It uses user input to identify trends and patterns over time, providing insights into behavior changes. The mashup also facilitates the sharing of these findings and trends on social media platforms like Facebook and Twitter, fostering a community around habit improvement and personal growth.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: Cartoonize My Pet
description: A pet-themed mashup that leverages user-submitted photos of pets to generate customized cartoon versions. These cartoonized pets can be seamlessly integrated with various apparel and gift items via the Zazzle API, offering users a unique way to personalise everyday products with their beloved pets. The mashup focuses on creativity, personalisation, and humour, providing an engaging platform for pet lovers to showcase their pets in a fun and creative way.

related_apis.title: Zazzle API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Zazzle provides a simple URL linkover-based API that allows any third party to automatically generate a customized product with dynamic images and text. The Zazzle Create-a-Product API can be used to automatically generate over 200 different types of customized products: t-shirts, mugs, cards, postage, and posters. Detailed documentation requires registration.

title: Mashup: Skatemap.de
description: A comprehensive online map platform dedicated to skateboarding and biking enthusiasts across Europe. This mashup integrates user-contributed content to provide detailed maps and descriptions of skateparks, ensuring a rich, community-driven experience for users seeking skateboarding and biking locations. By leveraging user-generated data, Skatemap.de bridges the gap between digital navigation tools and the vibrant skateboarding community in Europe, fostering a dynamic and inclusive environment for enthusiasts.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: FOAFster
description: FOAFster is a prototype visualizer designed to display Friend Of A Friend (FOAF) relationship objects. It combines FOAF objects from MyBlogLog with user preferences and activities from multiple social media platforms including del.icio.us, Digg, Last.fm, LinkedIn, StumbleUpon, Upcoming, Tumblr, Twitter, and YouTube, thereby providing a comprehensive view of social connections and online activity.

related_apis.title: del.icio.us API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: del.icio.us is a social bookmarking website -- the primary use of del.icio.us is to store your bookmarks online, which allows you to access the same bookmarks from any computer and add bookmarks from anywhere, too. On del.icio.us, you can use tags to organize and remember your bookmarks, which is a much more flexible system than folders.
The API provides read/write access to Delicious bookmarks and tags via an HTTP-based interface. The RESTful API returns responses in XML.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

related_apis.title: Zillow API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Zillow API Network turns member sites into mini real estate portals by offering fresh and provocative real estate and mortgage content to keep people coming back. There are four categories of APIs. 1) Home Valuation API: Search results list, Zestimate™ home valuations, home valuation charts, comparable houses, and market trend charts. 2) Property Details API: Property-level data, including historical sales price and year, taxes, beds/baths, etc. 3) City and neighborhood market statistics and demographic data4) Mortgage rates and monthly payment estimates

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: LinkedIn API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
LinkedIn is the world's largest business social networking hub. Launched in 2003, LinkedIn has millions of users and is implemented in over 200 countries. One purpose of the site is to allow registered users to maintain a list of contact details of people with whom they have some level of relationship, called Connections. Users can invite anyone (whether a site user or not) to become a connection.
The LinkedIn API is a RESTful platform that provides a simple, consistent representation of people, companies, jobs, and the interactions and relationships between them. Our query language lets you read data in XML and JSON at the granularity and aggregation that you choose. Use OAuth 1.0a to authorize users and begin making REST API calls using any programming language.The API’s access is restricted to authorized developers.

related_apis.title: Tumblr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Tumblr API allows users to read and write Tumblr blog and post data, retrieve posts by tags, get user information, follow blogs and like posts. Data is formatted in JSON and support for JSONP is included.

related_apis.title: FriendFeed API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The FriendFeed API enables developers to interact with the FriendFeed web site programmatically via simple HTTP requests. FriendFeed is a service that makes it easy to share with friends online. It offers a fun and interactive way to discover and discuss information among friends.
The API uses RESTful calls and supports methods such as downloading and reading feeds and more. It's designed to make it possible for anyone to improve FriendFeed or integrate FriendFeed into other applications. Users can develop FriendFeed interface for a mobile phone, build a FriendFeed widget for blogs, or develop an application that makes it easy to post photos to a feed from an iPhone. The API supports both XML and JSON output formats.

title: Mashup: Wikidi
description: Improved Description

title: Mashup: Docklands Rail Dublin
description: A transportation-focused mashup that combines mapping capabilities with real-time transportation data to provide users with an interactive map centered around the Docklands Station in Dublin. The map features contour lines that denote the 3-minute walking time bands from the station, allowing users to visualize and plan their routes to and from the station with ease. The mashup integrates live transportation updates, making it a valuable tool for commuters and travelers seeking efficient travel options in the Dublin area.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: Where I Had My First Kiss
description: A community-driven mapping platform where users share their personal stories of their first kiss, creating a global visualization of these significant life moments. The mashup allows users to map the locations of their first kisses on a world map, with the ability to add personal anecdotes and photos, fostering a global community of shared experiences. This mashup integrates user-generated content with mapping technologies to create an interactive and emotional global map of significant personal events.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Shopbib: Shop and Compare Online
description: A comprehensive online shopping comparison platform that aggregates product data from multiple sources, including eBay and Shopping.com. Users can search for thousands of products, view detailed information, and compare prices across various sellers. The mashup also allows users to view similar auction items, providing a one-stop solution for online shopping and comparison. It is designed to help consumers make informed purchasing decisions by offering a consolidated view of product availability, price, and quality across multiple marketplaces.

related_apis.title: Shopping.com API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API has been acquired by eBay and now exists as eBay Commerce Network. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]With the Shopping.com API you can integrate relevant product content with the deepest product catalog available online. Add millions of unique products and merchant offers to your site. Shopping.com, an eBay company, is the world's online comparison shopping service leader. Its global websites (Shopping.com, DealTime, and DoorOne) carry one of the world's largest product catalogs and offers from more than 6000 merchants.
The Shopping.com XML API uses a RESTful interface and can be used to feature dynamic Shopping.com content on your web pages. It offers capabilities such as keyword search, refining and sorting search results, finding product reviews, reading product specs, comparing products and prices from different merchants and controlling the number of results and navigating between pages.

title: Mashup: rePownce
description: A social media integration mashup that enables users to seamlessly share their Pownce notes on Facebook. rePownce allows users to publish their Pownce notes to their Facebook profile, feeds, and status updates. Additionally, users can create and post notes directly from rePownce, making it a comprehensive platform for social networking and messaging.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

title: Mashup: My Apartment Map
description: A location-based apartment rental search mashup that integrates data from various rental sources using Google Maps and additional APIs to provide interactive features such as property listings, location markers, and detailed property information overlays. The mashup leverages Google Maps' API for mapping and navigation, while additional APIs enhance user experience with features like property-specific details and interactive search filters.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Local Search API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Yahoo! Local Search APIs give users access to a comprehensive database of information and content in Yahoo! Local ranging from business information to user comments to ratings. Data includes business address and phone, category, rating, distance, URL and traffic alerts. Yahoo! Local makes a great addition to any mashup, bringing in location-based relevancy and the additional context of what real people have experienced in these places.
Version 3 of Yahoo! Local Search adds even more features! Users can now request individual business records by using the Yahoo! Local listing id. Yahoo! supports search categories to help users narrow their queries. Finally, results now return the first few lines of the last user review for each listing. The API uses a RESTful protocol and responses are formatted in either XML, JSON and PHP.

related_apis.title: Yelp Fusion API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Yelp Fusion APIs are RESTful APIs and users can retrieve business review and rating, information for a particular geographic region or location.display review information for a particular business, determine accurate neighborhood name information for a particular location, track recent reviews for a particular business, display pictures of highly rated local businesses and of the top reviewers for that business, determine a particular business' review and rating information based on the phone number for that business. The default output is JSON. This output format was chosen due to the availability of JSON parsers in many languages. The following Yelp Fusion APIs are available: Search, Phone Number Search, Business Search, Transaction, Reviews, and Autcomplete - each API has a separate ProgrammableWeb entry.

related_apis.title: Oodle API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Oodle makes it easy to use online classifieds. We bring together loads of listings from hundreds of local and national sources and help you find exactly what you\'re looking for

title: Mashup: San Diego School Pal
description: San Diego School Pal is an intuitive and interactive mashup that combines a detailed map of San Diego's school districts with comprehensive crime data from 2011 and Megan's Law statistics. This unique tool allows users to easily visualize and compare the levels of crime within each school district, providing valuable insights for parents, educators, and policymakers. By overlaying the school district boundaries on a map of San Diego, users can effortlessly identify the specific school district they belong to by entering their address or browsing the list of districts. The mashup not only provides statistical data but also includes a built-in commenting system, enabling users to share their experiences, opinions, and concerns about different school districts, fostering a community-driven approach to education and safety. Overall, San Diego School Pal serves as an essential resource for anyone seeking to make informed decisions about education in the San Diego area, emphasizing transparency, community engagement, and safety considerations.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. related_apis.title: Disqus API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Disqus provides an API for users to interact with the Disqus backend. Disqus is the webwide discussion community where you carry your conversations with you. For Bloggers - Plug in and experience the best comment system, backed by your own forum. For Everyone - Claim and track your comments across blogs!

related_apis.title: Dropbox API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Dropbox is a storage service that syncs files online and across your computers via installed software. The API allows read/write access to the same files, piggybacking on Dropbox's file synchronization and storage.

related_apis.title: MongoLab API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
MongoLab is a fully-managed cloud database service featuring highly-available MongoDB databases, automated backups, web-based tools, 24/7 monitoring, and expert support. By hosting MongoDB on MongoLabâ€™s Database-as-a-Service (DBaaS) platform, developers and IT professionals are free to focus their attention on product development instead of operations.
MongoLab runs on all the major cloud platforms, including Amazon, Joyent, Rackspace and Windows Azure, and has partnered with all of the major Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) providers to enable seamless integration with the application tier.
Headquartered in San Francisco, MongoLab is backed by premier venture and angel investors including Foundry Group, Baseline Ventures, GRP Partners, Freestyle Capital, and David Cohen of TechStars. Learn more at https://mongolab.com/.

title: Mashup: Sumo Radio
description: Sumo Radio is a music discovery platform that integrates real-time radio playlists with online shopping capabilities. The mashup allows users to listen to live radio streams and, upon hearing a song, can instantly find it on Amazon.com for purchase. Sumo Radio updates its radio station playlists every 5 minutes, providing users with the latest music trends. Users can also save tracks they like by adding them to their personal mix for future reference.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

title: Mashup: Musipedia
description: An online music encyclopedia that integrates Amazon Alexa voice search technology, allowing users to search for music by singing, humming, or playing a melody. The mashup converts the input into musical notation and searches across various music databases to return matches and similar compositions. It provides an interactive and innovative way to discover music based on melodic input rather than text-based search.

title: Mashup: co5TARS
description: co5TARS is a comprehensive visualization tool designed for movie enthusiasts to explore the careers and activities of filmmakers over a century of film history. By using co5TARS, users can gain insights into the relationships between filmmakers, the films they produced, and the collaborations they engaged in. This mashup provides a unique perspective on the movie industry, offering detailed visualizations of filmmaker careers and activities that are not typically available on platforms like IMDb. It is an invaluable resource for serious movie buffs looking to deepen their understanding of the people behind the movies.

title: Mashup: ptoogle
description: A real-time Twitter-driven search engine designed for price research. It leverages live tweets to search for and compare product prices across different brands and retailers, offering users a crowdsourced approach to finding the best deals on items of interest.

The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: TumblRSS
description: TumblRSS is a content aggregation service that allows users to import articles, blog posts, and other content from RSS feeds directly into their Tumblr blogs. It simplifies the process of curating and sharing content by eliminating the need for manual copy-pasting. This mashup is particularly useful for bloggers who want to quickly and efficiently populate their Tumblr pages with fresh, relevant content from various sources. Users can specify which RSS feeds they want to follow, and TumblRSS will automatically post new entries from these sources to the user's Tumblr blog. It supports a wide range of content types, including text, images, and videos, ensuring a seamless integration experience. This mashup enhances the content management capabilities of Tumblr, making it easier for users to maintain an up-to-date and engaging blog.

related_apis.title: Tumblr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Tumblr API allows users to read and write Tumblr blog and post data, retrieve posts by tags, get user information, follow blogs and like posts. Data is formatted in JSON and support for JSONP is included.

title: Mashup: Instagr.in
description: Instagr.in is a comprehensive web-based platform that mirrors the core features of Instagram, providing users with the ability to browse user feeds, tag users and locations, like and unlike photos, conduct searches using keywords or usernames, comment on photos, download images, and share them on other platforms. A distinctive feature of Instagr.in is its "blend" tab, which aggregates photos that are tagged with the same users, hashtags, or locations into a unified feed, enhancing the browsing experience by presenting uniform content in one place.

related_apis.title: Instagram Graph API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Instagram is a photo sharing iPhone app and service. Users take photos and can share them with Instagram contacts, as well as friends on other social networks like Twitter and Facebook. The Instagram API provides access to user authentication, friend connections, photos and all the other elements of the iPhone app--including uploading new media.

title: Mashup: BadgePlz
description: A social media photo integration platform that enables users to display their follower count, number of photos, and photo galleries from multiple social photo sites such as PicPlz, Burstn, and Snapr on their websites or blogs. The mashup combines various social photo APIs to create customizable photo badges that reflect a user's social photo activity across different platforms.

related_apis.title: Instagram Graph API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Instagram is a photo sharing iPhone app and service. Users take photos and can share them with Instagram contacts, as well as friends on other social networks like Twitter and Facebook. The Instagram API provides access to user authentication, friend connections, photos and all the other elements of the iPhone app--including uploading new media.

related_apis.title: PicPlz API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Photo sharing mobile application picplz has a new API that has entered beta. The service provides read/write access to the picplz platform for sharing and editing photos. Developers can upload photos and use filter effects including "Instant Film," "Russian Toy Camera," "the 70s" and "High Contrast Monochrome." The API also provides read access to others' photos. Like its mobile apps, the API likely lets you add a caption and tag your location.

title: Mashup: Interactive Urinal Map
description: A location-based service that provides interactive maps of public restroom facilities, featuring a comprehensive archive of high-quality photos from around the world. Utilizing geospatial data and user-generated content, this mashup allows users to search for and identify suitable restroom locations within the United States and internationally. The service enhances privacy and convenience by offering discreet and detailed information about restroom facilities, including those with urinals, catering to diverse user needs.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: YouTube Top Video Data
description: A data mashup that gathers and analyzes statistics and summaries of the top-performing videos on YouTube, categorized by daily, weekly, and monthly trends. This mashup also serves as a tutorial resource on the How I Built It page, providing insights into the development of this data-driven application. It integrates YouTube's API for real-time video data retrieval, enabling detailed analysis and comparison of video performance metrics over different time periods.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: StoreSlider
description: An advanced search and visualization tool for the UK market, leveraging the Ebay API to enable instant searching across the Ebay Marketplace. This mashup provides users with a powerful and efficient way to browse and compare products, offering a streamlined and visually rich shopping experience.

related_apis.title: eBay Finding API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
eBay's Finding API provides programmatic access to search capabilities on the eBay platform. It lets users search and browse for items listed on eBay, and provides metadata to refine searches and customize the searching process. Developers can use this API to build search and browse capabilities into bidding and buying applications.
The Finding API exposes a variety of search capabilities, including searching based on keyword, associated items, listing details, categories (domains), item characteristics (aspects), and domain and aspect metadata. The API can also provide keyword recommendations to help refine search results.
This API can be used via SOAP, HTTP, and REST. It can also be integrated with JavaScript and PHP using eBay's API tutorial kits.

related_apis.title: eBay Shopping API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The eBay Shopping API allows developers can programmatically interact with the eBay website. eBay Shopping Web Services lets developers query eBay for information, and receive data in XML, JSON, or eBay's Name Value format.
The API allows users to re-created an eBay search without ever going on the eBay site, allowing integration with other applications and interfaces.

title: Mashup: Real estate mashup
description: A comprehensive real estate search and analysis tool that allows users to search for properties, receive estimated values, view walkability scores and Yelp listings, and visualize all data on a single Google Map. The mashup integrates real estate databases, walkability APIs, Yelp data, and Google Maps for a seamless, location-based property search and analysis experience.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Zillow API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Zillow API Network turns member sites into mini real estate portals by offering fresh and provocative real estate and mortgage content to keep people coming back. There are four categories of APIs. 1) Home Valuation API: Search results list, Zestimate™ home valuations, home valuation charts, comparable houses, and market trend charts. 2) Property Details API: Property-level data, including historical sales price and year, taxes, beds/baths, etc. 3) City and neighborhood market statistics and demographic data4) Mortgage rates and monthly payment estimates

related_apis.title: Yelp Fusion API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Yelp Fusion APIs are RESTful APIs and users can retrieve business review and rating, information for a particular geographic region or location.display review information for a particular business, determine accurate neighborhood name information for a particular location, track recent reviews for a particular business, display pictures of highly rated local businesses and of the top reviewers for that business, determine a particular business' review and rating information based on the phone number for that business. The default output is JSON. This output format was chosen due to the availability of JSON parsers in many languages. The following Yelp Fusion APIs are available: Search, Phone Number Search, Business Search, Transaction, Reviews, and Autcomplete - each API has a separate ProgrammableWeb entry.

related_apis.title: Walk Score API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Walk Score calculates the walkability of an address based on the distance from a house to nearby amenities. The Walk Score API uses a RESTful interface and returns the Walk Score for any latitude and longitude in the U.S. in XML or JSON format.

title: Mashup: The Community Broadband Map
description: A collaborative mapping initiative that leverages the efforts of a large number of individual Internet users to compile a comprehensive map of areas with high-speed broadband connectivity versus those without. The map is updated over time as users contribute their knowledge and observations, resulting in a dynamic, community-driven resource for tracking broadband availability.
