title: Mashup: moomazon
description: A service that leverages Amazon.com's book data to generate customizable business cards. Users can input details of a book, and the mashup automatically retrieves relevant information from Amazon to create a professional-looking business card. The mashup combines book data APIs with business card design capabilities to provide tailored marketing tools for booksellers, authors, and publishers.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

related_apis.title: MOO API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Welcome to MOO. We're a printing company. Customers create a pack and then the pack is printed to pre-defined products. Create an XML document to determine where the user is placed in the process. For example, if you define a list of images that you want the user to select from to make a pack of cards, then they will be forwarded to the 'chooser' page. If you specify a list of images that you want them to actually use, and the 'crop' data associated with them then the user will be sent to the part of the process where they design the back of the cards.

title: Mashup: CensusMapper app: Mashup Census data with Bing maps
description: CensusMapper is a Windows 8 app that integrates the U.S. Census data via the Census API with Bing Maps API for geographical visualization. Users can access detailed demographic information and view it on a map, enabling location-based analysis. The mashup is developed using XAML and C# for the front-end and backend implementation.

related_apis.title: US Census Bureau API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The US Census Bureau surveys the US population for demographic information and provides this information to the public, as well as using the data for decision making.
The US Census Bureau API allows developers to access and integrate the data from the US Census Bureau, beginning with the 2010 Census, with other applications and to create new applications. Some example API methods include retrieving data by geographic location, retrieving summary files, and retrieving demographic information.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: Cordurl
description: Cordurl is a mashup that combines the functionality of a map, a URL shortener, and a social network. It assigns a unique 7-digit geocode to every location on the globe, allowing users to subscribe to a geocode to connect with neighbors, discover local events, and share information about places they frequent. The mashup uses mapping APIs to represent locations, URL shortening techniques to manage geocodes, and social networking features to facilitate connections and information sharing.

title: Mashup: Randolunch
description: A location-based food discovery mashup that uses geolocation services to select a random restaurant for the user to visit. The mashup provides a personalized restaurant recommendation based on the user's current location and preferences, making it ideal for those who are indecisive about dining choices. It integrates with local restaurant APIs to fetch real-time data on restaurant availability, reviews, and ratings.

title: Mashup: Skype Based RSS Reader
description: A chat-based RSS reader that leverages the Skype API to provide real-time subscription and notification services for users seeking to stay updated with their favorite RSS feeds. The mashup integrates the Skype platform with RSS technology to deliver a unique messaging experience for tracking and receiving updates from various news and content sources. It combines the Skype API for communication with RSS feeds for content delivery, enabling users to receive notifications directly through Skype chat messages.

title: Mashup: Hot Tubbers
description: A comprehensive online directory featuring an interactive map of natural hot and mineral springs throughout the United States. Each listing includes detailed user reviews, GPS coordinates, and other essential information to enhance the user's experience when planning a visit to these therapeutic water sources. The mashup combines mapping, search, and reference functionalities to provide a valuable resource for travelers and wellness enthusiasts alike.

title: Mashup: TrekMark
description: A location-based social mapping application that integrates Google Maps with user-generated content capabilities. Users can add points of interest (POIs), write reviews, and share their favorite locations with others. The mashup utilizes Google Maps API for geolocation services and user-generated content to create a community-driven map of notable locations.

title: Mashup: Bad News Robot
description: A telephony-based automation service that sends predefined audio messages via phone calls to inform recipients of bad news, allowing the sender to avoid the emotional stress of delivering the news personally. The service integrates voice-over-IP (VoIP) technology with automated calling systems and may include features for message customization, call scheduling, and confirmation notifications.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: Voice Broadcast
description: A communication service that allows users to convert text messages into speech and deliver them via phone calls. This mashup integrates text-to-speech technology with telephony systems to provide a voice broadcast service that can reach recipients directly through their phones, enhancing the accessibility and personal touch of text-based messages.

related_apis.title: Hoiio Voice API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Hoiio is a global communication service seeking to allow people around the world to communicate via telephone or SMS by routing through Hoiio service.
The Hoiio Voice API provides powerful APIs to make calls and handle voice responses (IVR). All these services are built on top of Hoiio's cloud infrastructure, so your app automatically scales as needed. Hoiio also provides virtual numbers for receiving inbound calls and free TTS services.
No hardware is needed from the developer. It is a pay-per-use model, with zero setup fee.

title: Mashup: FindPDF.net
description: FindPDF.net is a specialized search engine designed for locating PDF documents using Google's API. It offers advanced features such as direct text search within PDF files, PDF-to-text conversion, and sharing capabilities through PDFbox. Users can discover a wide range of content including ebooks, technical manuals, scholarly articles, and product user guides. The service provides real-time search results and allows users to read and download selected documents. Additionally, it integrates Twitter posts related to the search query to enhance contextual relevance.

title: Mashup: 0boxer
description: 0Boxer is a gamified email management plugin designed for Gmail users. It transforms the process of managing emails into an engaging game that incentivizes users to achieve and maintain inbox zero, rewarding them for email organization and productivity.

related_apis.title: Google Gmail OAuth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Google Gmail now supports the standard IMAP and SMTP protocols for accessing and sending e-mail messages. The Gmail IMAP and SMTP servers have been extended to support authorization via the industry-standard OAuth protocol. This allows third party applications to access a user's email account with their permission.

title: Mashup: Send a fax from PHP
description: Integrates PHP development environments with faxing services by leveraging the InterFAX SendfaxEx method. This mashup enables the seamless sending of binary files, including Microsoft Word and Acrobat PDF documents, to any fax number. It facilitates the automation of document distribution through fax, bridging the gap between digital document creation and physical fax transmission.

related_apis.title: Interfax API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Mutltiple methods give developers control of outbound fax transmission, inbound fax reception, and administrative control (add users, set preferences, etc.). Secure access is accessible via SSL.
The InterFAX REST fax API is a commercial subscription-based service which enables transmission and reception of fax messages without the need to install any hardware or software. The original document to be transmitted may be of various formats, such as PDF, Microsoft Word, HTML, TXT etc. Received faxes are in TIF or PDF format. As an extension to sending capabilities, the Interfax Fax REST API provides facilities for retrieving status information regarding fax messages sent through it. It supports secure communications via HTTPS between the custom-programmed application and the Interfax server.

title: Mashup: US Presidential Birthplaces
description: An educational and historical mashup displaying the birthplaces of all US Presidents and First Ladies from George Washington to George W. Bush. The mashup combines geo-location data with historical records to create an interactive map that users can explore to learn about the origins of US leadership.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Centrify for DocuSign
description: Centrify is a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company that provides comprehensive solutions for unifying identity management across diverse IT environments including cloud, mobile, and data centers. In this mashup, Centrify integrates with DocuSign, enabling customers to seamlessly access and utilize DocuSign's electronic signature services directly within the Centrify platform. This integration enhances user experience by providing a unified interface for identity management and electronic signing tasks.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: On-Demand Movie Reviews
description: An on-demand movie review service that combines the Rotten Tomatoes movie review database with Comcast On-Demand Movies. The mashup provides users with real-time movie reviews and ratings to help them decide what to watch on Comcast On-Demand. It integrates user ratings and reviews with movie content to offer a comprehensive guide to the latest movie offerings.

related_apis.title: Rotten Tomatoes API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Rotten Tomatoes is a website containing information about movies: information, news, reviews and ratings, pictures, etx. The Rotten Tomatoes API is RESTful web service that was designed to be easy to explore and use. Developers can use the API to access the Rotten Tomatoes' database of movie data by using the Lists, Movies, or DVDs sections of the API.

title: Mashup: dinoride
description: A transportation-focused mashup that utilizes Craigslist rideshare ads, Google Maps, and PostgreSQL to facilitate ridesharing by matching users with potential ride partners based on their estimated routes. This mashup enables users to input their travel details and find real-time ride options by leveraging the data from Craigslist, Google Maps' geolocation and routing capabilities, and PostgreSQL database management.

title: Mashup: ESCNostalgia
description:
ESCNostalgia is a comprehensive platform for exploring the rich history of the Eurovision Song Contest (ESC) from its inception in 1957 to the present day. The mashup integrates various data sources and services to provide users with a detailed and interactive experience of the ESC's past events. Users can:
    * Browse and listen to all songs from every ESC through integration with Spotify's music streaming service.
    * Watch video performances of each song on YouTube, providing a visual component to the audio experience.
    * View detailed results and information for each ESC event, including winners, runners-up, and other key statistics.
    * Explore the evolution of the ESC over time, comparing performances, styles, and trends across different decades.
    The platform is designed to cater to ESC enthusiasts, music historians, and anyone interested in the cultural impact of the contest over the years. It offers a seamless user experience by combining music streaming, video playback, and data visualization, all centered around the ESC's rich history.

related_apis.title: Spotify Web API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Spotify Web API allows developers to use their application to get data from the Spotify music catalog. The endpoints results in JSON format providing information such as artists, albums, and tracks directly from the Spotify catalog. Depending on user's authorization, the API can also provide developers access to user-related data i.e. playlists and musics saved in user's library.

title: Mashup: Kayak Mobile
description: An integrated travel search solution for mobile browsers that combines hotel and air travel searches through the public Kayak API. This mashup simplifies travel planning by providing access to a wide range of accommodations and flights, offering users the convenience to compare prices and book directly from their mobile devices. It focuses on enhancing user experience through mobile optimization, real-time search capabilities, and integration with Kayak's extensive travel data.

title: Mashup: DocuSign & zipForms
description: A real estate-focused electronic signature and document management platform that integrates DocuSign's electronic signature capabilities with zipForms, the industry-leading electronic real estate forms software. The mashup provides pre-tagged electronic real estate forms with DocuSign tabs for signatures and initials, streamlining the real estate transaction process for professionals. Users can access the platform through zipForm 6 and deploy DocuSign, allowing for more efficient and secure document signing and management.

title: Mashup: Cost of Living Worldwide
description: A mashup that provides a Google Maps view of the 50 most expensive cities in the world based on Mercer Human Resource Consulting's annual cost of living survey. It displays the cities on a global map with real-time markers indicating their relative cost of living, offering users a visual comparison of the cost of living in different parts of the world. This mashup is particularly useful for individuals and organizations involved in international business, relocation, or travel planning, as it helps in making informed decisions about living and working abroad.

title: Mashup: CartoLogic OpenLayers Demo
description: An OpenLayers-based map mashup service that integrates real-time social media data and location-based services with various online content providers. The mashup allows users to view and interact with a blend of social media posts, reviews, videos, weather forecasts, events, and encyclopedic information, all mapped and displayed on an OpenLayers platform. It combines geolocation data with social media and content provider APIs to offer a rich, real-time exploration of user-generated content and local information.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: OpenLayers API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The OpenLayers API allows developers to include dynamic maps in their web pages. These maps can include map tiles, vector data, and markers loaded from any source. Mobile support is included. OpenLayers is provided for free and is open source under the 2-clause BSD License. This API can be accessed via its JavaScript SDK.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: Yelp Fusion API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Yelp Fusion APIs are RESTful APIs and users can retrieve business review and rating, information for a particular geographic region or location.display review information for a particular business, determine accurate neighborhood name information for a particular location, track recent reviews for a particular business, display pictures of highly rated local businesses and of the top reviewers for that business, determine a particular business' review and rating information based on the phone number for that business. The default output is JSON. This output format was chosen due to the availability of JSON parsers in many languages. The following Yelp Fusion APIs are available: Search, Phone Number Search, Business Search, Transaction, Reviews, and Autcomplete - each API has a separate ProgrammableWeb entry.

related_apis.title: Weather Channel API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: (This API is now part of IBM Cloud's The Weather Company APIs) From their site: Since 1982, The Weather Channel has brought timely weather information to the world. Now you can include weather from The Weather Channel in your own application by signing up for access to our XML data feed. We'll enable you to search for a location and to integrate current conditions and the forecast for today and tomorrow in your application for free.

related_apis.title: Wikipedia API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The unofficial Wikipedia API. Because Wikipedia is built using MediaWiki, which in turn supports an API, Wikipedia does as well. This provides developers code-level access to the entire Wikipedia reference. The goal of this API is to provide direct, high-level access to the data contained in the MediaWiki databases. Client programs can use the API to login, get data, and post changes. The API supports thin web-based JavaScript clients, such as Navigation popups or LiveRC, end-user applications (such as vandal fighter), and can be accessed by another web site (tool server's utilities).
The API uses RESTful calls and supports a wide variety of formats including XML, JSON, PHP, YAML and others.

related_apis.title: Foursquare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Foursquare Places API provides location based experiences with diverse information about venues, users, photos, and check-ins. The API supports real time access to places, Snap-to-Place that assigns users to specific locations, and Geo-tag. Additionally, Foursquare allows developers to build audience segments for analysis and measurement. JSON is the preferred response format.

title: Mashup: Web Builder Daily Quote
description: An interactive Google Gadget designed for web developers and designers. This mashup provides daily quotes, internet and web-related terminology, historical facts, current events, and practical tips for building websites, blogs, and e-commerce platforms. It serves as a valuable resource for professionals looking to enhance their knowledge and skills in web development.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

title: Mashup: Zuora + DocuSign
description: A subscription billing platform that integrates with DocuSign for electronic document signing, enabling efficient and secure customer onboarding and contract management processes. The mashup combines Zuora's subscription billing capabilities with DocuSign's electronic signature solution to streamline the entire subscription lifecycle, from initial contract signing to ongoing billing and invoicing.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: Los Angeles Red Light Cameras
description: A mapping mashup that displays the locations of red light cameras in the Los Angeles area. The service utilizes geolocation data to plot the precise placement of these traffic safety devices on an interactive map. Users can also access maps for other regions, including Northern California, San Diego, and Washington DC, making it a comprehensive resource for traffic safety awareness and enforcement across multiple metropolitan areas.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Boots Optician Store Locator UK
description: An interactive map mashup specifically designed to help users locate Boots Optician stores throughout the United Kingdom. This mashup integrates mapping technology with retail location data to provide users with accurate, real-time store information. Users can interact with the map to search for and view the locations of Boots Optician stores across England, enhancing their ability to find the nearest optician for service or product purchase. The mashup is optimized for the UK market and focuses on providing a seamless, location-based shopping experience.

related_apis.title: Multimap API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: One-stop service for global AJAX mapping, routing, geocoding, searching and POI from Europeï¿½s #1 provider of mapping and location services to consumers and businesses.

title: Mashup: Monumental Adventure
description: This mashup provides an immersive, video-guided tour of London, combining visual exploration with the ability to contribute and share personalized content. Leveraging advanced mapping and video integration technologies, users can navigate through the city, view historical landmarks, and engage with interactive content such as user-generated stories, photographs, and reviews. The mashup is designed to enhance the travel experience for visitors and residents alike, offering a dynamic and interactive way to explore and share the rich history and culture of London.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: Phone Number Search
description: The Phone Number Search widget utilizes a premium WP API to provide a comprehensive phone number search service. This service detects the carrier of the number, the approximate registered address, and the line type. It also includes the capability to trace landlines via whitepages and mobile numbers via premium databases. This mashup offers a powerful tool for users to quickly and accurately search for and verify phone numbers.

title: Mashup: GOOL.LI
description: GOOL.LI is a comprehensive knowledge service that aggregates data across multiple categories to provide users with a unified, categorized, and real-time view of information. Designed with an elastic architecture and enterprise mashup patterns, Gool.li aims to deliver knowledge as a service. It features a responsive UI, social integration, and general search capabilities that regroup links by domain. The service is designed to be service-oriented rather than a traditional search engine, focusing on learning, discovery, and dreaming through its single search result page (SERP). As Gool.li is in its learning stage, user feedback, comments, and support are crucial for enhancing its algorithms. The service is crafted by Mohamed Kahlain and Jawad Jari.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

title: Mashup: LouderTweets
description: A social review platform that allows Twitter users to share 140-character reviews with the LouderVoice reviews site. It enables users to provide feedback on products or services directly from their Twitter accounts, fostering engagement and transparency within the social media community.

description: A personalized financial tool integrated into the iGoogle platform that allows users to assemble and manage their stock portfolios in real-time. This widget provides an intuitive interface for selecting and tracking various stocks, enabling users to monitor portfolio performance, set alerts for price changes, and make informed investment decisions. title: Mashup: Report2base
description: Report2Base is an analytical tool that provides in-depth reporting and insights for users of Basecamp, a leading web-based project collaboration platform. The Basecamp API is implemented as vanilla XML over HTTP.

title: Mashup: Heartomatic - Shop Hearts at Etsy
description: Heartomatic is a specialized Etsy analytics tool designed for Etsy sellers. It provides real-time insights into customer engagement by tracking and displaying heart interactions on listings. The tool includes a comparative feature to analyze heart trends over time, helping sellers understand and improve their popularity. Additionally, Heartomatic offers a search capability to check if your items have been featured in Etsy gift guides or prominently displayed on the Etsy homepage, providing valuable exposure data to enhance marketing strategies.

related_apis.title: Etsy API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Etsy is an online marketplace for buying and selling handmade things. The Etsy API lets you develop applications built on this fast growing e-commerce platform.

title: Mashup: Mumbai Health Tracker
description: A real-time health incident tracking service for the city of Mumbai, leveraging social media and other data sources to collect and analyze health-related incidents. The service aggregates data from various sources, including social media platforms and official health reports, to provide a comprehensive view of health incidents occurring in Mumbai. It offers a centralized platform for users to view and track health-related events, trends, and patterns, contributing to public health awareness and response.

related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

title: Mashup: Map of Bucharest
description: An interactive and comprehensive digital map showcasing various sites in the city of Bucharest, Romania. This mashup integrates multiple data sources to provide users with detailed information about landmarks, points of interest, and navigation routes within the city.

title: Mashup: Relocator
description: A job search platform that integrates Indeed's job search capabilities with social networks like Facebook and LinkedIn. Users can find jobs near their friends and discover connections within their networks who may be working at or know individuals at potential employers. This mashup enhances job search by leveraging social networking data to provide personalized job recommendations and insights into company culture and employee networks.

related_apis.description: Indeed is a search engine for jobs - with a radically different approach to job search. In one simple search, Indeed gives job seekers free access to millions of employment opportunities from thousands of websites. Indeed.com includes all the job listings from major job boards, newspapers, associations and company career pages - and we continue to add new sites every day. The Indeed API allows developers to integrate Indeed’s employer interface or job seeker interface in apps. The API returns responses in JSON or XML format.

related_apis.title: LinkedIn API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
LinkedIn is the world's largest business social networking hub. Launched in 2003, LinkedIn has millions of users and is implemented in over 200 countries. One purpose of the site is to allow registered users to maintain a list of contact details of people with whom they have some level of relationship, called Connections. Users can invite anyone (whether a site user or not) to become a connection.
The LinkedIn API is a RESTful platform that provides a simple, consistent representation of people, companies, jobs, and the interactions and relationships between them. Our query language lets you read data in XML and JSON at the granularity and aggregation that you choose. Use OAuth 1.0a to authorize users and begin making REST API calls using any programming language.The API’s access is restricted to authorized developers.

title: Mashup: PixtaPlace
description: A global image aggregation mashup that enables users to browse and explore recent photographs from popular social media platforms like Instagram and Flickr, integrated with Google Maps API for precise location-based image search. Users can discover and view images from across the world, with real-time updates on the latest photographs from various locations. The mashup provides a unique way to visually explore different parts of the world through the lens of social media.

related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. description: TodoToday is a mobile-friendly todo list application designed to display current due and overdue tasks from the online task management tool, Doit.im. It is particularly useful for individuals who need to manage multiple tasks simultaneously and require a quick and efficient way to access their task list.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: Search Rhapsody by Phone
description: A mobile music search service that allows users to identify songs, albums, and artists by sending text messages with a few words from the track. The mashup enables real-time identification of music using SMS technology, providing immediate results without the need for a PC or internet access. It integrates music databases with SMS messaging services to deliver quick and accurate music information to users.

The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: MySpace API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The MySpace Developer Platform (MDP) allows developers to create applications that interact with MySpace members and their social data. With MDP you will be able to create compelling new products that integrate directly into MySpace pages and get exposure to millions of people around the world.

title: Mashup: Brainsell-Technologies + DocuSign
description: BrainSell Technologies is a company specializing in business solutions, offering comprehensive ERP, CRM, and marketing automation solutions, services, training, implementation, and software development. BrainSell has been a DocuSign partner since 2013, integrating DocuSign electronic signature solutions with Salesforce, SugarCRM, and Microsoft Dynamics, enabling businesses to streamline document workflows, enhance customer engagement, and achieve success.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: flickrmania
description: A photo geotagging service that allows users to capture photos during a trip and then upload those photos to Flickr with precise geographic locations based on GPS track data. The mashup combines GPS tracking technology with Flickr's photo-sharing platform to provide a seamless way to document and share location-specific photos. Users can initiate tracking mode on their GPS device, take photos during their travels, and then upload those photos to Flickr, which will automatically associate each photo with its corresponding GPS coordinates. This results in a rich, location-based photo experience on Flickr, making it easier for users to organize, share, and discover photos based on their geographical context.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

related_apis.title: GeoNames API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Geonames is a geographical database with web services that let users extract useful information about different places, such as weather, timezone and post codes. The GeoNames geographical database covers all countries and contains over eight million placenames that are available for download free of charge. Users can edit, correct and add new names using a wiki interface.Geonames provides a suite of Webservices including the following categories:Fulltext searchPlace HierarchyWikipediaPostal CodesReverse GeocodingThe APIs use RESTful protocol and responses vary in format between XML, JSON, CSV, and TXTWhile the GeoNames data is free, the data is available without costs, there is a Service Level Agreement available for premium web services.

title: Mashup: OnAIR City Tracker
description: The OnAIR City Tracker mashup integrates public transportation data with weather information to provide users with the locations of the nearest OnAIR bus stops and the current weather conditions at those stops. It combines geolocation services with public transportation and weather APIs to offer users a convenient way to plan their travel based on real-time weather updates.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Adobe on AIR Bus Tour API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: You can use these APIs and feeds to keep up with the latest news and content from the [Adobe on AIR] tour, or to build web and AIR based applications and mash-ups. The Adobe Integrated Runtime (AIR), previously referred to by its code-name of "Apollo", is a cross-operating system runtime that allows web developers to leverage their existing web development skills (such as Flash, Flex, HTML and JavaScript) to build and deploy web applications and content to the desktop.

versions.version_title: Adobe on AIR Bus Tour REST API

title: Mashup: Primal for Wordpress
description: The Primal for Wordpress plugin integrates seamlessly with Primal's data service to dynamically generate rich interest graphs for each page, filtering and delivering highly relevant news and information from diverse sources across the Web. By embedding contextual links to matching related content directly within posts, it functions as a personalized recommendation engine that enhances user engagement by promoting similarly themed content to your readers in real-time.

related_apis.title: Primal API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Primal generates Interest Graphs and uses them to find, filter and rank content. Our cloud-based data service creates rich user-specific interest graphs. Primal then aggregates and filters Web content from any online source using your individual interest graphs. Clients can utilize Primal's recommended collections of content sources or define their own custom sources. Calls to the Data API are formatted as a simple URLs that describes a topic. Our JSON or RSS response makes it easy to integrate Primal's interest networks into your new and existing applications. Primal can be used for personalization, aggregating and filtering content, finding and ranking content on semantic relevance, generating interest graphs, and many other use cases related to utilizing interest graphs.

title: Mashup: Gaza Attack Timeline
description: A real-time, interactive Google Map mashup that visualizes the day-by-day events and casualties resulting from the Israeli attack on the Gaza Strip. The mashup overlays data from The Guardian News, providing a comprehensive and dynamic view of the conflict's impact on both Palestinian and Israeli populations. It serves as an informative tool for understanding the timeline and geography of the attacks.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. title: Mashup: e-TXT Solutions
description: An integrated web-based system designed for non-profit and political organizations to monetize their campaigns and causes on a global scale. It combines text-based marketing, mobile payment integration, gift card distribution, and loyalty program management into a unified platform that facilitates fundraising and enhances user engagement through various channels.

related_apis.title: NationBuilder API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: NationBuilder is an open platform for users to create online communities centered around issues relevant to them. Users can create community organization websites, access a people database, and use communication tools such as email, text messaging and social media.The NationBuilder API helps developers to create community organizing-driven applications by integrating various service endpoints within third-party applications. These endpoints can be information on people, campaign data, donation data, calendar information, event data, and other calls. The API uses REST calls and returns JSON.

title: Mashup: Text2Residents
description: A multifamily and senior living management service that facilitates instant communication through text messaging between property managers and their residents, families, and staff members. The platform integrates with mobile phone and device APIs to enable real-time, two-way text messaging for efficient communication and emergency alerts within the community.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: ChannelAdvisor CRM Connector
description: The ChannelAdvisor CRM connector offers integration between ChannelAdvisor's multichannel e-commerce platform and Salesforce CRM, enabling ChannelAdvisor customers to utilize Salesforce's customer relationship management tools in their online customer service and marketing operations. Additionally, through a partnership with Cloud Conversion, online retailers can access eCommSource's multi-channel-specific customer service module, enhancing their customer service capabilities.

related_apis.title: ChannelAdvisor API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Provides access to the ChannelAdvisor platform, which provides cart service, inventory, listings, orders, marketplace ads, shipping, and storage services.

title: Mashup: Etsy Hacks: Shop Value
description: A tool designed to calculate the total monetary value of items listed in your Etsy shop, providing a comprehensive overview of your inventory's worth. Additionally, it offers insights into other key statistics such as average item value, total number of items, and possibly even the average price per item. This tool is particularly useful for Etsy sellers looking to understand the financial aspects of their online marketplace presence, aiding in inventory management and pricing strategies.

related_apis.title: Etsy API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Etsy is an online marketplace for buying and selling handmade things. The Etsy API lets you develop applications built on this fast growing e-commerce platform.

title: Mashup: Mobile Windows Live Shopping
description: A mobile shopping platform that enables users to search for products, sales, and discounts from Windows Live. Users can shop via text messaging (TXT) by providing product details or through WAP interface and email. The mashup also allows for the configuration of alerts, ensuring users receive timely updates on new deals and product information.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing API enables developers to embed a flexible and powerful search engine as a custom search component in their sites and applications. Bing API offers open, flexible options for building or enhancing your site or applications. With the API users can search for web content, images, stories and more. Users can also monetize their applications with advertisements. It uses a RESTful protocol with results formatted either in XML or JSON and also provides support for SOAP protocol.

title: Mashup: Amazon CLI
description: An innovative browser-based command-line interface (CLI) for Amazon.com, enabling users to search, browse, and purchase products directly from the command line. This mashup streamlines the shopping experience by eliminating the need for manual clicks, facilitating a more efficient and direct interaction with the Amazon platform. It is compatible with Firefox browsers only.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

title: Mashup: TextSlide
description: TextSlide is a private, SMS-based communication platform designed for one-on-one conversations among registered users. This mashup utilizes a unique approach to protect user privacy by concealing phone numbers and instead presenting users with each other's names, area codes, and shared interests as a means of initiating conversations. Users can engage in any topic of interest while maintaining anonymity, making it an ideal platform for social interactions, humor, and building connections. The service leverages SMS telephony APIs for messaging and integrates user profile functionalities to manage personal interests and connections.

title: Mashup: RandomCloud
description: RandomCloud is a mashup that leverages SoundCloud's extensive library to offer users a seamless and randomized music discovery experience. Users can select a specific genre or opt for the 'All Genres' option to have RandomCloud play tracks from across all genres. This mashup provides an innovative way for music enthusiasts to explore new songs and artists without the need to browse through extensive lists.

related_apis.title: SoundCloud API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: SoundCloud is the leading audio platform that enables anyone to upload, record, promote and share their sounds across the web. The SoundCloud API makes most of the features from SoundCloud.com available to app developers. With the help of its SDKs it's easy to integrate functionality like audio sharing and recording directly into iOS, Android and web apps.

title: Mashup: AMEE Location Footprinter
description: A travel carbon footprint estimation mashup that uses Foursquare data to calculate the environmental impact of your journeys. It integrates check-ins from Foursquare to provide weekly personalized summaries, including the total carbon emissions, to help users monitor and reduce their travel footprint.

related_apis.title: AMEE API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: AMEE is a platform for greenhouse gas calculation, with access to emissions factors, calculation algorithms, and storage for data history. Our science team take the published methodologies from the science community and put them into a simple unified API, so you don't have to trawl through PDFs and spreadsheets to work it all our yourself. With over 8 million possible calculations, the platform covers everything from simple electricity calculations through to insanely complex industrial processes. If you need to work out the environmental impact of an activity, AMEE has the environmental intelligence you need.

related_apis.title: Foursquare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Foursquare Places API provides location based experiences with diverse information about venues, users, photos, and check-ins. The API supports real time access to places, Snap-to-Place that assigns users to specific locations, and Geo-tag. Additionally, Foursquare allows developers to build audience segments for analysis and measurement. JSON is the preferred response format.

title: Mashup: Hotels Near To
description: A travel mapping service that helps users find hotels near specific locations, landmarks, or attractions in London. The mashup uses a combination of geolocation and mapping APIs to display hotels close to the user's desired location. It also provides information about local tourist attractions, enabling users to plan their stay effectively.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: BusyLunches
description: BusyLunches (BL) is a social eating platform that facilitates organizing and attending lunch events with colleagues or friends. The mashup allows users to create lunch events, find nearby restaurants, search for alternative venues using Foursquare data, and plan other social gatherings like dinners, breakfasts, birthdays, or team events. Users can discover and share their unique experiences with others in a community-driven environment.

related_apis.title: LinkedIn API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
LinkedIn is the world's largest business social networking hub. Launched in 2003, LinkedIn has millions of users and is implemented in over 200 countries. One purpose of the site is to allow registered users to maintain a list of contact details of people with whom they have some level of relationship, called Connections. Users can invite anyone (whether a site user or not) to become a connection.
The LinkedIn API is a RESTful platform that provides a simple, consistent representation of people, companies, jobs, and the interactions and relationships between them. Our query language lets you read data in XML and JSON at the granularity and aggregation that you choose. Use OAuth 1.0a to authorize users and begin making REST API calls using any programming language.The API’s access is restricted to authorized developers.

related_apis.title: Foursquare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Foursquare Places API provides location based experiences with diverse information about venues, users, photos, and check-ins. The API supports real time access to places, Snap-to-Place that assigns users to specific locations, and Geo-tag. Additionally, Foursquare allows developers to build audience segments for analysis and measurement. JSON is the preferred response format.

title: Mashup: ThyNews
description: A personalized social news aggregator that enables users to curate and share a custom online newspaper page, featuring headline links from their preferred news sources. This mashup integrates social media sharing capabilities with customizable news feeds, allowing users to stay informed on topics that matter to them by selecting trusted news outlets and sharing curated content with their networks.

related_apis.title: Janrain Engage API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Janrain Engage (formerly RPX) is a service that allows customers to add social networking logins to their websites and applications, using a single login for their website.
The Janrain Engage API allows developers to access and integrate Janrain Engage functionality into other sites and applications. Some example API methods include retrieving user data, managing account information, and accessing analytic data.

related_apis.title: AddThis Sharing Endpoints API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
AddThis is a free way to boost traffic back to your site by
making it easier for visitors to share your content. The API is a set of URL endpoints that allow you to share content from your website to any of the AddThis 200+ supported destinations. Lets you share links as well as embeddable content.

title: Mashup: BookDip - Kindle Ebook Deals
description: BookDip is an automated digital book deal finder that leverages the Amazon Product Advertising API and WordPress API to continuously monitor and deliver discounted and free Kindle ebooks across all Amazon categories. The mashup updates every 2 hours, ensuring users have access to the most current deals. It integrates seamlessly with Amazon's product data and WordPress's content management capabilities to provide a streamlined experience for finding and sharing ebook discounts.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

related_apis.title: WordPress.org API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: WordPress.org is home of the installable version of WordPress. The WordPress.org API provides a series of call exposing various informational assets and tools. Available resources include stats on systems running WordPress and contributor information. Tools include a secret key generator and access to WordPress plugins and themes.

title: Mashup: Explore To Yellow Pages
description: A revolutionary approach to internet yellow pages (IYPs) by combining business listing data from Factual with social media content from Flickr, Twitter, and Facebook 'Likes' to create a more comprehensive, 'Social Local' search experience. The mashup uses a relevancy algorithm to prioritize results and incorporates Bit.ly for easy social sharing.

Reducing the URL length makes sharing easier. bit.ly can be accessed through their website, bookmarklets and this open API. bit.ly is also integrated into several popular third-party tools such as Tweetdeck and is used extensively on services like Twitter. Unique user-level and aggregate links can be created and let users view complete, real-time traffic and referrer data, as well as location and metadata.

related_apis.title: Factual v3 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Factual is an open data platform for application developers that leverages large-scale data aggregation and community exchange. Our focus is on making data more accessible (i.e. cheaper, higher quality, less encumbered) for machines and developers, to drive and accelerate innovation in an unprecedented way. We take on the dirty work of data management and data curation, letting developers focus on higher value and more productive tasks. We provide clean, structured data with complete source transparency to developers via both download and API access on liberal terms.

title: Mashup: The Rap Map
description: The Rap Map is a comprehensive mapping service that plots significant locations in hip-hop history, including those mentioned in popular rap lyrics. It combines music and mapping technologies to provide an immersive exploration of rap culture, allowing users to delve into the rich history and geography of hip-hop through interactive maps and location-based content.

This health-focused app leverages modern communication technologies to provide real-time assistance and encouragement, making it an essential tool for those seeking to improve their health and well-being through smoking cessation.

description: An information aggregator that consolidates various communication channels such as email, meeting schedules, instant messaging, and news updates into a singular, easily navigable view. The mashup streamlines information management by providing a unified interface for real-time monitoring and interaction across different platforms.

related_apis.title: Google Talk API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From the site: As long as you adhere to the requirements of the XMPP specs, you should be able to connect to the Google Talk service. Other clients that can connect include [[http://gaim.sourceforge.net/ GAIM]] and [[http://www.ceruleanstudios.com/learn/ Trillian Pro]].

related_apis.title: Google Calendar API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Calendar Data API lets users perform most of the operations a normal Google Calendar user can on the Google Calendar website. Google Calendar allows client applications to view and update calendar events in the form of Google data API, GData, feeds. The Calendar Data API lets users incorporate Calendar functionality into their own application or website. Users can edit calendars, create and delete events, query for events that match particular criteria, send invitations, and more.
There are many possible uses for the Calendar data API. For example, users can create a web front end for a group calendar that uses Google Calendar as a back end. Or a public calendar can be generated for Google Calendar to display, based on a company event database. Or users can search relevant calendars to display a list of upcoming events on those calendars.

related_apis.title: Yahoo BBauth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: You build great web applications. We have millions of users who store their data on Yahoo!. Browser-Based Authentication (BBAuth) makes it possible for your applications to use that data (with their permission). BBAuth also offers a Single Sign-On (SSO) facility so that existing Yahoo! users can use your services without having to complete yet another registration process. The first time a user visits your web site, you redirect them to a specially constructed Yahoo! URL where they can login and grant your application permission.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: Google Single SignOn API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) is an XML standard that allows secure web domains to exchange user authentication and authorization data. Using SAML, an online service provider can contact a separate online identity provider to authenticate users who are trying to access secure content. Google Apps offers a SAML-based Single Sign-On (SSO) service that provides partner companies with full control over the authorization and authentication of hosted user accounts that can access web-based applications like Gmail or Google Calendar. Using the SAML model, Google acts as the service provider and provides services such as Gmail and Partner Start Pages (PSP). Google partners act as identity providers and control usernames, passwords and other information used to identify, authenticate and authorize users for web applications that Google hosts.

title: Mashup: Afrous Mashup Builder
description: A versatile, JavaScript-based mashup platform that operates directly within the user's web browser, eliminating the need for software installation or server hosting. This engine facilitates the integration and mashup of various web services, allowing for the creation of dynamic, multi-functional applications that can include video, maps, and photo services. Users can leverage a wide range of web services to create customized mashups, enhancing their online experience with rich multimedia content and interactive features.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

related_apis.title: del.icio.us API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: del.icio.us is a social bookmarking website -- the primary use of del.icio.us is to store your bookmarks online, which allows you to access the same bookmarks from any computer and add bookmarks from anywhere, too. On del.icio.us, you can use tags to organize and remember your bookmarks, which is a much more flexible system than folders.
The API provides read/write access to Delicious bookmarks and tags via an HTTP-based interface. The RESTful API returns responses in XML.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

The mashup facilitates easy navigation to bank locations and provides essential banking information to aid in financial decision-making.

title: Mashup: tourfilter
description: tourfilter is a music discovery platform that leverages the power of social media and real-time data to help users find and enjoy live performances of their favorite bands. The mashup aggregates music content from various sources, including MP3 and RealAudio tracks, blog listings, and live event calendars. The mashup utilizes APIs from social media platforms and music blogs to provide users with a comprehensive and up-to-date list of upcoming shows and performances.

title: Mashup: Your Mapper
description: Your Mapper is a comprehensive platform that utilizes cutting-edge mapping technology combined with local crime data, news services, and restaurant information to provide users with an immersive and informative experience. This mashup leverages its proprietary API to seamlessly integrate diverse data sources, offering real-time updates and detailed insights into community safety, breaking news, and dining options. By consuming its own API, Your Mapper ensures the integrity and relevance of the information it provides, making it an invaluable resource for those seeking localized, up-to-date content.

related_apis.title: Google AdWords API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google AdWords API allows apps to interact directly with the Google Ads platform, vastly increasing the efficiency of managing large or complex Google Ads accounts and campaigns. Some typical use cases include:Automated account managementCustom reportingAd management based on inventoryBid management based on business dataWith the AdWords API you can build software that manages accounts from the customer level down to the keyword level. The API can do almost everything the Google Ads UI does, but programmatically.The types of companies that have benefited from the AdWords API include:Ad agenciesSearch Engine Marketing (SEM) companiesBig brands managing a large number of accounts, with needs beyond what's possible within the Google Ads UI.The API relies on SOAP and WSDL technologies to offer its services. You set up API access by obtaining a few required authentication credentials, creating some test accounts, and adding the authentication and account details to a configuration file for your client library. Authentication is via OAuth2.To help you get started, they offer client libraries in Java, .NET, Python, PHP, Perl, and Ruby.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. related_apis.title: geocoder API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Geocoder.us is a public service providing free geocoding of addresses and intersections in the United States. Using the service you can find the latitude & longitude of any US address and much more. Geocoder.us offers four different ways to access our web services: an XML-RPC interface, a SOAP interface, a REST interface that returns an RDF/XML document, and a REST interface that returns a plain text comma separated values result. The methods and return values are equivalent across all three interfaces.
