related_apis.title: Cafe Press API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Allows developers to make queries and run searches against Cafe Press' store and product database.

related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

Your site or application can display some of Competes most powerful data by using the Compete SnapShot API.

related_apis.title: Google Static Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Static Maps API lets you embed a Google Maps image on your webpage without requiring JavaScript or any dynamic page loading. The Google Static Map service creates your map based on URL parameters sent through a standard HTTP request and returns the map as an image you can display on your web page.

related_apis.title: Google Earth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Earth Engine API allows developers to run algorithms on georeferenced imagery and vectors stored on Google's infrastructure. The Google Earth Engine API provides a library of functions which may be applied to imagery for display and analysis. Earth Engine's public data catalog contains a large amount of publicly available imagery.

related_apis.title: Google Webmaster Tools API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Google Webmaster Tools allows client applications to view and update site information and Sitemaps in the form of Google Webmaster Tools Data API feeds. Your client application can use the Google Webmaster Tools Data API to view sites in your account, add and remove sites, verify site ownership, and submit and delete Sitemaps.

related_apis.title: Social Share Count API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Social Share Count API enables users to count inbound and outbpound clicks from the ShareThis platform buttons and links. ShareThis lets you share to all of your profiles, blogs, friends and contacts. If you see something you want to share, simply click the ShareThis button on the webpage or your browser plugin for instant sharing. Use the Social Share Count API to get access to total sharing activity for a URL. Use it to display share counts on your social buttons or anywhere else in your application.

versions.version_title: Social Share Count REST API v2.0

related_apis.title: Google Analytics Managment API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Google Analytics Management API to leverage Google's extensive website analytics tools. The API uses GET requests over HTTPS and JSON for requests/returns. Some of the functions available with the API are: List Account, Property and View (Profile) information for a user; manage properties and goals; manage user permissions; and upload cost data to Google Analytics for non-Google paid campaigns. See the extensive documentation for code samples, detailed method descriptions, and more.

related_apis.title: Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Bing Maps REST Services is a REST API that allows you to perform tasks like finding an address, retrieving a map with a pushpin and a label, or getting driving directions. It provides a way to create a static map with pushpins, geocoding an address, retrieving imagery metadata, or creating a route etc. Microsoft Bing is a web search engine.

related_apis.title: Your Mapper API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Your Mapper aggregates local government data from cities across the nation, standardizes it, geocodes it, and keeps it up to data for you to use in your apps and services. The Your Mapper API allows developers and entrepreneurs to integrate the data into their websites or mobile applications. Users can either use the embedded map service for their sites, or grab the data in standard formats to create apps.

title: Mashup: Free WiFi Hotspot Finder
description: A location-based directory service that provides users with a searchable map of free Wi-Fi hotspots across the United States. This mashup integrates geolocation services with a database of free Wi-Fi hotspots to enable users to find and access free Wi-Fi in any area. It uses mapping APIs to display real-time hotspot locations and provides detailed information on each hotspot, such as the name of the hotspot, its location, and user reviews. The service is optimized for mobile devices and is particularly useful for travelers and remote workers who need to stay connected while on the go.

The platform supports the purchase of databases and provides users with more than 4000 customizable sorting options to efficiently identify and connect with new potential customers.

This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: LinkedIn API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
LinkedIn is the world's largest business social networking hub. Launched in 2003, LinkedIn has millions of users and is implemented in over 200 countries. One purpose of the site is to allow registered users to maintain a list of contact details of people with whom they have some level of relationship, called Connections. Users can invite anyone (whether a site user or not) to become a connection.
The LinkedIn API is a RESTful platform that provides a simple, consistent representation of people, companies, jobs, and the interactions and relationships between them. Our query language lets you read data in XML and JSON at the granularity and aggregation that you choose. Use OAuth 1.0a to authorize users and begin making REST API calls using any programming language.The API’s access is restricted to authorized developers.

related_apis.title: GitHub API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: GitHub is a repository of public open source and private business code. Is is a fast, efficient, distributed version control system ideal for the collaborative development of software. Use it to fork projects, send pull requests, monitor development.

description: A comprehensive search and e-commerce mashup that consolidates information about notable people, including celebrities, musicians, writers, historical figures, and sportspeople. The mashup features automatic ranking of individuals based on the density of recent news coverage and provides automatic analysis of connections between these individuals. It integrates search functionalities with e-commerce capabilities, allowing users to discover and explore profiles of notable figures, view relevant photos, and connect with video content related to these individuals.

title: Mashup: Explore App
description: The "Explore" app is a quantified self and big data mashup that integrates with sensors in Android smartphones and wearable devices to collect and analyze a wide range of personal data. This includes tracking location, environmental conditions, mood, physical activity, general health metrics, and personal behavior patterns. Users can visualize this data through an interactive user interface, which helps them gain insights into their daily habits. The app ensures user privacy by anonymizing and aggregating the collected data before sharing it with Datarella partners to enhance their customer data portfolios. This mashup aims to provide users with a comprehensive understanding of their lifestyle while helping companies expand their customer data analytics capabilities.

related_apis.title: Datarella API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Datarella is a big data collection company based in Germany. Their "Explore" app accesses sensors in smartphones and wearable devices to record data like location, environment, and personal behavior. This data is then aggregated and issued in a way that respects user privacy to Datarella partners to help increase their customer data portfolio. The Datarella API provides a way that users may access these data sets to consume real time analytics from Explore app users. In addition to OAuth, the API accepts a user's Explore App login email and password for authentication.

title: Mashup: AllinOneMart
description: A comprehensive shopping and e-commerce platform offering millions of products, a wide range of brand shops from various countries including the USA, UK, Ireland, Canada, and India, classified ads, deals, rebates, clearances, promotions, specials, and detailed buying guides.

related_apis.title: Commission Junction API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Commission Detail Service is a REST-based API that enables advertisers and publishers to access real-time commission and item-detail data. Advertisers and publishers that wish to receive commission reporting updates in near real-time or to request new commission data on a regular basis can use this API to create in-house tools that access real-time commission data from the CJ network. Developers may search by any number of criteria including price, currency, country, serviceable area and UPC. A SOAP API is also available but will eventually be deprecated.

related_apis.title: Oodle API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Oodle makes it easy to use online classifieds. We bring together loads of listings from hundreds of local and national sources and help you find exactly what you\'re looking for

related_apis.title: Shopzilla API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Shopzilla, Inc. Catalog API provides access to the Shopzilla, Inc. inventory of catalogued products, merchant offers, and merchant ratings & reviews content through a query-based RESTful web service, responses formatted in XML or JSON|P.
Managed through the Shopzilla Publisher Program, a CPC affiliate marketing program, publishers are able to monetize using this API. Users of this API are able to choose between two versions, each providing logic native to its corresponding Shopzilla, Inc. property: Bizrate.com or Beso.com.
Bizrate API: Provides access to the entire Shopzilla, Inc. offer universe, exposing content from 8,000+ merchants. You would use this version to create a full comparison shopping site.
Beso API: Provides the opportunity to create a style-based experience with a curated set of offers focused in soft goods categories. You would use this version to create a fashion-oriented shopping site.
Both APIs provide access to the merchant ratings and reviews collected through the Bizrate Insights platform.
International? APIs also available for the United Kingdom, Germany, and France.

Vreetings offers a user-friendly experience, making it easy for anyone to produce engaging and unique video greetings without the need for technical expertise or professional editing skills.

The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: OpenLayers API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The OpenLayers API allows developers to include dynamic maps in their web pages. These maps can include map tiles, vector data, and markers loaded from any source. Mobile support is included. OpenLayers is provided for free and is open source under the 2-clause BSD License. This API can be accessed via its JavaScript SDK.

related_apis.title: Wiki-Data API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Provides basic information about companies, corporations, and other business entities including legal name, country of incorporation, and primary operational location details: country, state/province/region (for U.S., Canadian, and Australian entities), and city. Intended to facilitate a common standard for business entity data with crowd-sourced verification of accuracy. Free to promote interest in Avox data services.

related_apis.title: NOAA Climate Data Online API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The service gives access to accumulated data on climate for locations worldwide but with emphasis on the continental United States. Data sum conditions recorded annually, by month, by day, and even hourly. Available data include recorded temperatures, normal temperature ranges, heating and cooling degree days, precipitation, and drought conditions.
API methods support retrieval of data for a specified time range, annual, monthly, daily, or hourly. Requests specify dataset, locations and location types, reporting stations, and particular data elements to be returned.

versions.version_title: NOAA Climate Data Online REST API v2

title: Mashup: Hell Horror
description: An interactive horror community platform that allows users to rate and comment on various horror films, books, and games. The mashup seamlessly integrates with Amazon's eCommerce services, enabling users to directly purchase recommended items from the horror genre, thereby enhancing the user experience by providing both critical evaluation and direct access to horror merchandise.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

related_apis.title: IVA Video API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Internet Video Archive's Entertainment Express API connects you to our movie, TV, and Video Game metadata services as well as our large collection of promotional video assets and images.
Our video assets include: movie trailers, TV series, season and episode trailers, video game trailers, music videos and much, much more! Our data collection is expanding daily and our API is designed to easily allow you to aggregate our data to your application or web site.

title: Mashup: TrailChaser
description: An interactive community platform that serves as a central repository for trail enthusiasts to share, discover, and explore a wide range of outdoor activities. The mashup integrates mapping services with social features, allowing users to post, view, and discuss trails, directions, and photos for various activities such as hiking, mountain biking, running, road riding, and city tours. It promotes community engagement through sharing and encourages active lifestyles by providing accessible information on outdoor recreational opportunities.

title: Mashup: Captcha Bypass Service
description: A sophisticated Captcha Bypass Service that utilizes advanced algorithms and machine learning techniques to efficiently solve Captchas. This service enhances user experience by bypassing the need for manual Captcha solving, thereby increasing efficiency and reducing the time spent on repetitive tasks. It is particularly useful for users who need to complete forms or access websites that require Captcha verification. The service can also be integrated into various applications to automate Captcha solving processes.

related_apis.title: SecureNet API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The service provides a secure payment platform for integration with applications needing checkout functions for credit card and ACH (automated clearing house) transactions. Existing shopping cart packages already integrate with the service, creating a range of solutions for applications.
API methods support submission of customer identity and payment information, either credit card number, expiration, etc., or bank account information for ACH transactions. Transaction submissions can also specify product specific information for the hotel, auto rental, and other industries.

related_apis.title: CaptchaCoin API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: CaptchaCoin is a captcha solving service that allows users to both use the service to have their own captchas solved, or users can solve captchas and receive payment for the service in bitcoins. The CaptchaCoin API allows users to submit captchas to be solved. The API uses REST calls, and an account is required with service, as well as an API key.

title: Mashup: Blue One Realty Related Directory
description: Blue One Realty is an online directory that aggregates and displays real estate-related websites and companies. The mashup leverages Yahoo Maps and Flex to provide a visually rich and interactive experience. Users can submit their own real estate-related websites and companies, which are then curated and displayed on the platform. The integration of mapping technology allows for location-based searches and displays of real estate-related entities. The mashup serves as a comprehensive resource for users seeking information on real estate services, properties, and companies.

title: Mashup: Tour Tracker
description: A live tracking application for cycling races, particularly designed for the Tour of California. This Flash-based mashup integrates real-time GPS data for rider positions, live video streams, live audio updates, text updates on race progress, detailed course profiles, a chat room for user interaction, and comprehensive race statistics. The application provides a multi-dimensional user experience by combining various live data feeds into a single platform, allowing users to follow the race with multiple forms of real-time information.

title: Mashup: Look4it New Brunswick
description: A local-first search engine optimized for New Brunswick, this mashup prioritizes search results from within the specified geographic area, ensuring users are presented with the most relevant and proximate content. This mashup combines geolocation services with local content databases to provide a personalized search experience tailored to the user's location. Key features include a focus on local sports, enhanced with information from various sports organizations and platforms, making it a go-to resource for sports enthusiasts and local event seekers.

related_apis.title: ESPN API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
ESPN.com is an online platform for multiple sports news, statistics, team information, and player information. ESPN.com offers sports scores, standings, and other statistics for a variety of sports.
The ESPN.com API allows developers to access and integrate the data of ESPN.com with other applications and to create new applications. Some example API methods include retrieving sports information, team information, and league information. Interested developers should sign up here for an API key: http://developer.espn.com/member/register.

title: Mashup: Boston Universities Map
description: An interactive map showcasing the locations of various colleges and universities in the city of Boston, combining educational institutions' data with geospatial mapping technologies to provide a comprehensive visualization of the educational landscape in Boston.

title: Mashup: Asiya Travels Online
description: A comprehensive travel booking platform that aggregates and offers a wide range of travel services for domestic and international travel. Users can book flights, buses, trains, cars, hotel packages, and amusement park tickets through a single online interface. The platform consolidates booking services from major travel agencies across India, providing users with a centralized resource to compare and select the best travel options available. It leverages APIs from various travel service providers to ensure real-time availability and competitive pricing for all travel categories.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Travel API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: Yahoo! Travel is also launching API access to trip planner data through a REST-like interface. With the Yahoo! Travel Trip Plan APIs you can search for trip plans by Yahoo! ID or by search query, or retrieve a specific trip plan by ID.
The Yahoo! Travel Trip Plan APIs have been designed to operate just like the Yahoo! Search APIs, so if you've already written code for Yahoo! Search you can start using Travel almost immediately with only minor modifications. And just like Yahoo! Search, the Yahoo! Travel APIs support both XML and JSON output.

title: Mashup: omniMarket
description: A retail-focused mashup that harnesses the power of Amazon, Twitter, and YouTube APIs to create a unified shopping experience. The platform integrates product listings, user reviews, social media buzz, and video content from these sources to provide a comprehensive retail overview. It aims to expand its API integration to further syndicate data and media, enhancing the depth and breadth of the retail experience for users.

title: Mashup: California Solar
description: An interactive heat map of solar power generation in California over the last decade, allowing users to select a specific year and visualize the distribution and intensity of solar power across the state. This mashup integrates historical solar power data with geographic mapping services to provide a comprehensive view of solar energy trends and growth in California. Users can analyze the spatial and temporal distribution of solar power, identify areas with high solar potential, and track changes in solar power generation over time. The mashup supports data-driven decision making for sustainable energy planning and policy development.

description: An integration service that enables users to sign electronic documents directly from their HTC tablets using DocuSign's Electronic Signature platform. The service leverages the HTC OpenSense SDK for enhanced pen input capabilities, providing a seamless and immersive signing experience on the device. This mashup caters to users who need to sign documents on-the-go and benefits from the precision and ease of use provided by the HTC Scribe Pen.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: Surf Search
description: A comprehensive, multi-modal search mashup that aggregates and presents video, news, and photo content from various sources. Users can search for specific topics and receive results that include video clips, news articles, and high-quality images, all integrated into a single, user-friendly interface. The mashup leverages advanced search algorithms and data aggregation techniques to provide users with a rich, multimedia search experience.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: twopular
description: A comprehensive aggregator that identifies and displays the most popular Twitter trends in real-time, leveraging the Twitter API for data collection and analysis. The mashup provides a centralized platform for users to discover trending topics, hashtags, and discussions, facilitating social media monitoring and content curation. It supports multiple languages and locations, ensuring a diverse and inclusive representation of trending topics.

title: Mashup: Photobucket Mobile
description: A mobile photo search application that allows users to access and search the Photobucket photo-sharing platform via WAP-enabled phones. Users can initiate searches by entering 'bucket' followed by their query. The application then quickly returns a list of matching photos, providing users with immediate access to Photobucket's rich photo content on the go.

title: Mashup: DocuSign + Box.com Integration
description: A seamless integration between DocuSign and Box that enables users to send files for electronic signature directly from their Box account. By adding the DocuSign action to your Box account, users can easily initiate the e-signature process by right-clicking on a file within Box, entering their DocuSign credentials, or creating a free trial account. The integration streamlines document review, recipient addition, and document sending, making the e-signature process more efficient and convenient.

title: Mashup: BetTips365
description: BetTips365 is a sports betting tipster service that provides daily verified soccer match tips, claiming a high winning rate. The service verifies each game to ensure integrity and to identify the best betting opportunities. BetTips365 displays the odds provided by bookmakers and alerts users to potential issues, such as possible game fixing.

related_apis.title: Sportradar API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Sportradar API allows developers to integrate their applications with the Sportradar service, using RESTful methods. Sportradar is a provider of sports data and content for over 40 different sports. They are also the official partner with the NBA, NFL, NHL & NASCAR.

title: Mashup: ExactTarget + DocuSign
description: A multi-channel social media campaign management platform that leverages ExactTarget's capabilities to create targeted campaigns and integrates DocuSign eSignature for seamless approval processes and critical sign-offs. This mashup enhances campaign efficiency by enabling real-time approvals and improving customer loyalty through personalized and relevant campaigns across various channels.

title: Mashup: HuffPost Politics Election Dashboard
description: A comprehensive election monitoring tool that uses real-time electoral data and interactive maps to display state-by-state and national electoral vote counts for the 2012 elections. The mashup provides users with up-to-date information on how votes are being cast across different states and how these votes translate into electoral college votes. It integrates various data sources, including voter registration databases, polling data, and election results feeds, to create a dynamic and informative visualization of the electoral landscape. Users can interact with the maps to explore voting patterns and trends, making it an essential tool for political analysts, journalists, and citizens interested in following the election closely. The mashup ensures accurate representation of the electoral process through the integration of authoritative government data sources.

related_apis.title: Huffington Post Pollster API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Huffington Post is a news website and blog featuring content covering many areas including politics. The Pollster API from the Huffington Post gives users access to results from opinion polls going back to 2004 as well as current opinion on a range of tops and candidates. Data that can be accessed by users is categorized into charts, single chart and polls. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in XML and JSON.

versions.version_title: Huffington Post Pollster REST API v2

title: Mashup: eBay Real Estate
description: A real estate listing mashup that integrates eBay's auction listings with Google Maps to provide a visual representation of property listings across various regions. This mashup allows users to search for real estate on eBay and view the properties on an interactive map, enabling them to explore locations and listings in a more intuitive and location-based manner. The mashup leverages eBay's real estate data and Google Maps API to offer a unique way to browse and potentially purchase real estate through online auctions.

The mashup combines Amazon's extensive product database with translation APIs to provide seamless, multilingual shopping experiences across borders.

It enables you with the ability to create a custom dictionary to correctly and consistently translate terms that are customer-specific and to make an asynchronous request to translate large amounts of text. The Cloud Translation API lets developers programmatically integrate the service with third party sites and applications.

title: Mashup: Detroit History
description: An interactive historical mapping mashup that overlays historical aerial photographs of Detroit from various years (1949, 1952, 1956, 1961, 1976, 1981, 1997, 2005, and 2006) onto contemporary satellite imagery, allowing users to visually explore the evolution of the city's landscape over time. This mashup integrates historical imagery data with modern mapping technologies to provide a dynamic and educational tool for understanding urban development and change.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

description: A powerful contract management system that combines the robust capabilities of Ecteon Contraxx with the secure electronic signature functionality of DocuSign. The system is built on extensive feedback from thousands of contract managers and insights from experienced consultants, ensuring flexibility, scalability, security, and seamless integration. Key features include document creation, e-signature capabilities, contract management, and analytical tools for better decision-making.

title: Mashup: Simple Energy
description: Simple Energy is a platform that leverages gamification and social mechanics to create an engaging environment for energy consumers. By integrating social media and game elements, it motivates users to actively participate in reducing their energy consumption. The mashup offers tools and features to track and monitor energy usage, with the goal of promoting sustainability and energy conservation among users.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD

This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Amazon EC2 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) API is a web service that enables you to launch and manage Linux/UNIX and Windows server instances in Amazon's data centers. Giving users the ability to "compute" in the cloud, it provides users with complete control of their computing resources and lets them run on Amazon's computing environment. Amazon EC2 changes the economics of computing by allowing users to pay only for capacity that is actually used.
This is a REST-based API. The SOAP interface was deprecated on 1 December 2015.
The WSDL for each supported API version is available from the following URI:
http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc//AmazonEC2.wsdl

related_apis.title: Zillow API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Zillow API Network turns member sites into mini real estate portals by offering fresh and provocative real estate and mortgage content to keep people coming back. There are four categories of APIs. 1) Home Valuation API: Search results list, Zestimate™ home valuations, home valuation charts, comparable houses, and market trend charts. 2) Property Details API: Property-level data, including historical sales price and year, taxes, beds/baths, etc. 3) City and neighborhood market statistics and demographic data4) Mortgage rates and monthly payment estimates

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: SendGrid API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
SendGrid's cloud-based email helps keep emails out of spam folders, provides a cloud service that scales with email demands, and provides email analytics to track opens and clicks.
SendGrid has a Web API that allows customers to retrieve information about their account such as statistics, bounces, spam reports, unsubscribes, and other information. In addition, the Web API allows customers to create sub-accounts and control the settings of these accounts for an OEM setup.
With the SendGrid API, developers can:
* Get real-time web hooks for events such as bounces, clicks, and unsubscribes
* Send multiple emails and customize plugins
* Access parsed incoming emails with attachments
* Write plugins to alter emails or deliver to other mediums
* Manage subscriptions for resellers and subusers

related_apis.title: Amazon RDS Relational Database Service API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Amazon Relational Database Service, aka Amazon RDS, is a web service that lets you set up, operate, and scale a relational database in the cloud. It provides cost-effective and resizable capacity. Amazon RDS gives you access to the full capabilities of a MySQL database. Thus the code, apps, and tools you already use today with your existing MySQL databases work as-is with Amazon RDS. The API provides

versions.version_title: Amazon RDS Relational Database Service RPC API

related_apis.title: Amazon SES API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Amazon Simple Email Service, or SES, provides cloud-based email as a service. Amazon SES simplifies sending emails from applications being hosted on services such as Amazon EC2. Because email services are often used by spammers, Amazon SES provides each user with a quota. EC2 users can send 2,000 emails per day for free.
The service allows developers to send either raw email or formatted email using Amazon's SMTP servers. Any spam complaints or other issues bubble back up to the developer. Similar to other Amazon Web Services, Amazon SES charges per gigabyte for transfer in and out of its systems.

title: Mashup: Kulisha
description: Kulisha is an innovative social feed aggregation tool that enables users to consolidate and visualize their social media content from various platforms into a single, unified view. This mashup leverages advanced algorithms to aggregate posts, comments, and shares from multiple social networks, providing a comprehensive overview of a user's social activity. Users can interact with these aggregated feeds by liking, commenting, or sharing directly within the platform, enhancing the overall social experience. Kulisha supports a wide range of social media platforms, ensuring that users have access to a complete and cohesive representation of their online presence.

The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: Ewelike
description: Ewelike is a comprehensive, user-driven platform for comparing prices and reading reviews of various products such as books, movies, video games, music, and perfume. It allows users to contribute their own reviews and ratings, making it a collaborative hub for product information and opinions.

related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

related_apis.title: Google Books API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Google Book Search Data API to get and modify Book Search content via feeds. Submit full-text searches for books and get book information, ratings, and reviews. Optionally get individual users' library collections and public reviews. Submit authenticated requests to create and modify library collections, ratings, labels, reviews, and more.

related_apis.title: Goodreads API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Use the Goodreads API to get the books on a shelf, get your friends' updates, link to a book by ISBN or other method, get the url for a book or author, get a members' friends, look up a member by email address, and get reviews by ISBN.
The Goodreads API allows developers access to Goodreads data in order to help websites or applications that deal with books be more personalized, social, and engaging. The API can be used in many ways, including:
Review Syndication: Goodreads has 10 million reviews across 700,000 titles. The API lets users display these reviews on their website.
Goodreads Connect: Members can connect to their Goodreads account, and developers have full access to the books, ratings, and reviews the member has in their shelves, as well as the member's friends. This can be used to personalize an ecommerce store, power recommendations, show a widget of a member's favorite books, build a mobile or desktop client app, and more.
The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in XML.

related_apis.title: Google Analytics Managment API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Google Analytics Management API to leverage Google's extensive website analytics tools. The API uses GET requests over HTTPS and JSON for requests/returns. Some of the functions available with the API are: List Account, Property and View (Profile) information for a user; manage properties and goals; manage user permissions; and upload cost data to Google Analytics for non-Google paid campaigns. See the extensive documentation for code samples, detailed method descriptions, and more.

related_apis.title: Amazon Marketplace Web Service API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Helps sellers automate listings, orders, payments, reports, and more. By exchanging data, sellers can integrate Amazon marketplace into their current applications and workflow.

versions.version_title: Amazon Marketplace Web Service REST API

related_apis.title: Facebook Graph API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Graph API is a simple, consistent view of the Facebook social graph, that uniformly represents objects in the graph and may include people, photos, events, and pages etc., the connections between them, friend relationships, shared content, and more. Public information can be accessed without a developer key/application key, but is required for private data access. Facebook Developers enables you to build, grow and monetize amazing applications.

title: Mashup: twittervision
description: A real-time, dynamic mapping service that visualizes Twitter activity geographically, providing users with a live, interactive map that updates continuously to display the latest tweets and their respective locations, offering a visual representation of global communication trends.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD

The widget provides personalized tips and strategies tailored to individual spending habits and financial goals, leveraging user data and financial analytics. It includes a curated selection of external resources for deeper exploration of money-saving topics, ensuring users stay informed and motivated to achieve their savings objectives.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

title: Mashup: NFL Player Stats
description: A mobile-focused sports statistics mashup that provides real-time NFL player stats, including league leaders and offensive/defensive statistics, directly to users' mobile phones. Users can access this information via text messaging (using the keyword 'nflstats') or through a mobile web interface (WAP).

title: Mashup: Equidistant Eats
description: A mapping-based food discovery service that assists users in selecting equidistant restaurants from two or three provided addresses. The mashup uses geolocation data and restaurant APIs to identify restaurants that are equidistant from the given addresses. It then presents these restaurants on a map with marker popups displaying detailed information including addresses and phone numbers for easy contact.

title: Mashup: Video Maps Japan
description: An interactive map-based platform that overlays user-submitted videos onto geographical locations in Japan. The mashup utilizes Google Maps API to provide a visual and auditory exploration of various regions, allowing users to experience different places through video content. It serves as a tool for cultural discovery, travel inspiration, and community engagement in the context of Japanese culture and geography.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD

Users can easily browse and discover new artists by visiting the designated mobile-friendly URL (wap.411sync.com) and entering the keyword 'topartist'. The mashup integrates MySpace's artist data with mobile web technology to deliver artist information, including blog updates and other details, directly to the user's mobile browser. Ideal for music enthusiasts who prefer to stay updated on their favorite bands while on the move.

title: Mashup: Scrabb.ly

Utilizing the Pusher API, players can engage in collaborative gameplay where words are continuously added and updated in real-time, fostering a sense of community and competition among participants.

related_apis.title: Pusher API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Pusher is a simple hosted API for quickly, easily and securely adding realtime bi-directional functionality via WebSockets to web and mobile apps, or any other Internet connected device.
We offer a rich suite of libraries that you can use within your applications, including a JavaScript client library for web and HTML5 apps.
Our event based abstraction makes it simple to bind UI interactions to events that are triggered from any client or server.
We use WebSockets (with 'fallback to Flash' in the JavaScript client library) to future proof your applications and make it easy for you to add bi-directional communication to your apps whilst keeping data usage to a minimum.
As well as a WebSockets API, we have a REST API for publishing your messages. This is ideally suited to web server technologies and we have a set of REST API libraries in many common languages to help you to do this.
We have a simple Publish/Subscribe model based on channels that allows you to filter and control how people receive your messages.
We supply functionality such as authentication mechanisms for private channels, and presence functionality for keeping track of who's online.

title: Mashup: OggChat - Live Customer Chat
description: OggChat is a comprehensive live chat solution designed for customer support and sales integration within websites. This mashup leverages Google Talk and GMail APIs to provide real-time chat capabilities. Key features include customizable chat window designs and skills-based routing, ensuring that customer queries are directed to the most suitable operator. OggChat routes all incoming chats directly to each operator's Google Talk account, streamlining the communication process and enhancing customer service efficiency. It is particularly useful for businesses looking to enhance their online customer engagement and service delivery.

related_apis.title: Google Talk API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From the site: As long as you adhere to the requirements of the XMPP specs, you should be able to connect to the Google Talk service. Other clients that can connect include [[http://gaim.sourceforge.net/ GAIM]] and [[http://www.ceruleanstudios.com/learn/ Trillian Pro]].

related_apis.title: Google Contacts API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Contacts Data API allows client applications to view and update Contacts content in the form of Google Data API feeds. Your client application can request a list of a user's contacts, edit or delete content in an existing contact, and query the content in an existing contact.

title: Mashup: WTF should I go for beer?
description: A humorous, location-based web application designed to assist users in discovering nearby bars. The mashup leverages geolocation services to provide quick and entertaining recommendations, enhancing the social aspect of bar-hopping by suggesting venues close to the user's current position.

description: A user-friendly web application that automates the creation of personalized, music-enhanced videos using photos from users' Instagram accounts. Users can select a desired music track from either Beatport or iTunes, and the mashup integrates these media elements to produce a cohesive video product. The system employs Instagram API for photo sourcing and utilizes music streaming APIs to facilitate the music selection process, offering a seamless and creative video-making experience.

related_apis.title: ImpossibleFX API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The ImpossibleFX API allows developers to create dynamic movie templates from scratch or to script and extend existing movie templates created with the ImpossibleFX Editor. This API is RESTful and uses the JSON and Protobuf formats. ImpossibleFX is a video personalization platform that offers personalized content, dynamic story flows, adaptive rendering, compositing, and more.

title: Mashup: ELCIES dev
description: ELCIES dev is a Personalized Workouts API designed to integrate into digital workout and exercise platforms, accelerating their development by providing a Personalization Algorithm. This API is part of the ELCIES lifestyle data platform, which collects and organizes fitness and health data for businesses, simplifying the integration process for external Personal Training Platform and App developers.

related_apis.title: ELCIES Connected Services API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The ELCIES API allows developers to create applications that take advantage of data coming from different wearable and health devices. By using this API, you can access physical activity and health data stored in your ELCIES Business Account for users that already provided your company or app prior consent for data collection.

versions.version_title: ELCIES Connected Services REST API v1.1

title: Mashup: BlastFollow
description: A social networking service that leverages Twitter's user data and interests to facilitate connections between users with similar interests. The mashup streamlines the process of finding and connecting with like-minded individuals on Twitter by providing a platform for users to identify potential followers and initiate follow requests with minimal effort. It integrates Twitter's API to access user profiles and interests, thereby enhancing the user experience and promoting community building.

This tool is particularly useful for businesses needing to conduct outgoing calls in a secure and controlled environment, leveraging web technologies for ease of use and management.

title: Mashup: Suburbified

Users can explore detailed town profiles, including housing, lifestyle, and community information, all mapped out for quick reference and easy comparison. The mashup leverages geolocation technology and real estate data to provide a rich, location-based experience, enabling users to make informed decisions about where to live in the New York City area.

related_apis.title: OpenStreetMap API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: OpenStreetMap is the free wiki world map, an open volunteer-driven initiative to collaboratively create a map of the world, and release the map data under a free and open license.There are actually many different APIs in and around the OpenStreetMap ecosystem. Many developers searching for an API, may actually be looking for an JavaScript web mapping library. There are a few of these to choose from including free and open source options such as LeafletJS. These work by fetching map "tiles" from a tile server, and there are several of these to choose from too (the main OpenStreetMap server is not the only option)Some developers may be looking for data downloads. You can download the entire planet's worth of map data from planet.openstreetmap.org, and keep in syc with community map updates, using the "diff" downloads. Or you can download smaller more manageable country-sized, or city-size "extracts" of OpenStreetMap data.We do have a thing called the "OpenStreetMap API". This provides read and write operations on the raw map data of the OpenStreetMap database. It is actually primarily for OpenStreetMap editing software, and although any developers can create a new editor tool, this is not a small undertaking, and should be carried out with careful consultation with the OpenStreetMap community. In other words... this thing called the "OpenStreetMap API" is probably not what you're looking for!You can use the OpenStreetMap API to download small chunks of map data, but for this purpose it's also worth checking out some other options. In particular the OverpassAPI offers some flexible querying by tags etc, which may be useful for your app.Whether you're wrangling raw geo-data or presenting a web-map mashup, the possibilities provided by OpenStreetMap, and by third parties within the OpenStreetMap ecosystem, offer endless potential for geo map hacking fun! If you need help with development, join the osm-dev mailing list, or other OpenStreetMap contact channels

related_apis.title: The New York Times Article Search API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The New York Times Article Search API is available to look up articles by keyword. Along with standard keyword searching, the API also offers faceted searching. The available facets include Times-specific fields such as sections, taxonomic classifiers and controlled vocabulary terms."

versions.version_title: The New York Times Article Search REST API

title: Mashup: FotoViewr
description: A user-friendly 3D slideshow and photo gallery widget that seamlessly integrates your Flickr and Smugmug photo collections, offering an immersive viewing experience. This mashup is available as a widget for iGoogle, as a plugin for Facebook and WordPress, and offers a unique interface for navigating through your photo albums in a 3-dimensional space. It leverages the APIs of Flickr and Smugmug to fetch and display high-quality images, providing users with a modern, interactive way to view their photos.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Smugmug API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From the site: Everything in the hacks section is provided as-is unless you specifically have a contract with smugmug. They're not supported, endorsed, or guaranteed in any way. We'd love to fully support the API and other goodies with smugmug's AAA customer service, but we're just not there yet. Soon, we hope." Note they also offer a WebDAV interface for upload, as https://upload.smugmug.com/smugdav.mg.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

title: Mashup: TextOrder.net
description: TextOrder.net is an all-encompassing solution for businesses to facilitate text message ordering and customer engagement. The platform enables businesses to promote specials, new items, and news to customers through text messages, acting as a powerful word of mouth marketing tool. By leveraging telephony and messaging APIs, TextOrder.net provides a seamless and real-time communication channel for businesses to interact with their customers, enhancing customer engagement and driving sales. It integrates with eCommerce systems to process orders directly from text messages, streamlining the ordering process and providing a convenient way for customers to make purchases.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: Singapore Breaking News Headlines.
description: A news aggregation service that compiles the latest breaking news headlines from top sources on the internet. The mashup integrates data feeds from various sources, including the Straits Times, Channel News Asia, Asia One, Google, YouTube, Bing, and Ask, to provide users with a comprehensive overview of the most current events in Singapore. It offers a centralized platform for accessing diverse news content, enabling users to stay informed about the latest developments in a single location.

related_apis.title: Bing API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [The Bing API is now the Bing Web Search API. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Bing API provides an experience similar to Bing.com/search by returning search results that Bing determines are relevant to a user's query. The results include Web pages and may also include images, videos, and more. Free trial keys are available here: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/try/cognitive-services/?api=bing-web-search-api.

title: Mashup: About Pune City
description: A comprehensive city guide mashup that integrates multiple data sources to provide users with detailed information about Pune City. The mashup includes interactive maps, curated lists of restaurants and hotels, historical overviews, and visual content such as photos and videos. By combining various online resources and APIs, About Pune City offers a one-stop platform for travelers and residents seeking to explore and understand the city better.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Silvawood Events Map
description: A comprehensive digital map providing real-time information on local entertainment events, including concerts, plays, films, talks, magic shows, and comedy performances. This mashup integrates various event databases and location services to display events happening in your area, allowing users to easily plan their entertainment activities based on their location.

title: Mashup: Fan TV
description: An advanced entertainment discovery platform that enables users to explore a wide range of content based on their preferred genre, including live TV, Video On Demand, and various streaming services. Fan TV utilizes a recommendation engine to curate personalized content suggestions, taking into account user interactions with friends, critics, and trending items. The platform allows users to create and manage watch lists, streamlining the content discovery process. Fan TV integrates with multiple content providers to offer a comprehensive viewing experience.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: iTunes and iTunes Connect API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: A simple REST web service to access the iTunes App Store and iTunes Connect data. Get information about apps, reviews, ratings, ranking, iTunes Connect sales data and more.

versions.version_title: iTunes and iTunes Connect REST API

related_apis.title: Rhapsody API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Developers can easily integrate with the Napster third-generation friendly API and SDKs used by hundreds of partners and businesses worldwide. The API features OAuth 2.0 support, data services including metadata, search, playback, library, account, commerce, extract, and download, personal recommendations, session management, and more. Interested developers can contact the provider through a form on the business services page.

title: Mashup: Plymouth Half Marathon

It incorporates an embedded Flash video within marker pop-ups, providing a dynamic and engaging way to explore the event. The mashup showcases the event's location on a map, offering a spatial context for participants and viewers alike.

related_apis.title: Wikipedia API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The unofficial Wikipedia API. Because Wikipedia is built using MediaWiki, which in turn supports an API, Wikipedia does as well. This provides developers code-level access to the entire Wikipedia reference. The goal of this API is to provide direct, high-level access to the data contained in the MediaWiki databases. Client programs can use the API to login, get data, and post changes. The API supports thin web-based JavaScript clients, such as Navigation popups or LiveRC, end-user applications (such as vandal fighter), and can be accessed by another web site (tool server's utilities).
The API uses RESTful calls and supports a wide variety of formats including XML, JSON, PHP, YAML and others.

Users take photos and can share them with Instagram contacts, as well as friends on other social networks like Twitter and Facebook. The Instagram API provides access to user authentication, friend connections, photos and all the other elements of the iPhone app--including uploading new media.

With the UWA, you only need one API to build widgets for a host of environments.

title: Mashup: PokerDIY - Local Poker Games Map
description: A mapping service that utilizes geolocation data to provide users with a real-time view of local poker games, leagues, groups, and players on a Google Map interface. description: The SocialSearcher Android app is a sophisticated tool designed to facilitate keyword searches on Facebook without requiring users to log in. This application empowers users to discover current conversations and discussions happening across the platform, supporting all languages for seamless global search capabilities. It offers several advanced features, including the ability to open search results directly in the user's preferred Android web browser, allowing for deeper exploration and engagement. Additionally, SocialSearcher provides options for sorting search results by date/time and by the number of 'likes,' enhancing user experience and relevance. The app also includes a country filter, enabling users to focus their searches on specific geographical regions, thereby enriching the search experience and providing targeted results.

related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

related_apis.title: Google Static Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Static Maps API lets you embed a Google Maps image on your webpage without requiring JavaScript or any dynamic page loading. The Google Static Map service creates your map based on URL parameters sent through a standard HTTP request and returns the map as an image you can display on your web page.

related_apis.title: Foursquare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Foursquare Places API provides location based experiences with diverse information about venues, users, photos, and check-ins. The API supports real time access to places, Snap-to-Place that assigns users to specific locations, and Geo-tag. Additionally, Foursquare allows developers to build audience segments for analysis and measurement. JSON is the preferred response format.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

related_apis.title: CityGrid API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The CityGrid network APIs give developers access to premium local content including user reviews, editorial content, merchant messages & more, across 75K neighborhoods nationwide. CityGrid Media is an online media company that connects web and mobile publishers with local advertising organizations by linking them through CityGrid, its local content and advertising network. Currently CityGrid offers the following APIs:
Places API - Provides functionality for information on local businesses, including search, detail, user content submission, and predictive text.
Offers API - Provides coupons and special offers from businesses based on geographical location and category
Reviews API - Displays customer reviews based on listing IDs for certain geographic/category attributes All APIs have been instrumented with impression tracking feeding our new beta reporting dashboard.

related_apis.title: Google Maps Places API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google Maps Places API is a service that returns information about a "place": an establishment, a geographic location, or prominent point of interest using an HTTP request. Place requests specify locations as latitude/longitude coordinates.
Methods are available for place search, details, photos, and autocomplete queries. The Places API returns mapping data in JSON and XML formats, after making URI requests, and authenticating with API Key.

related_apis.title: Google Geocoding API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Geocoding API is a webservice for the Google Maps API. The Geocoding API provides a direct way to access a geocoder via an HTTP request, though it must be used in conjunction with Google Maps. Additionally, the service allows you to perform the converse operation (turning coordinates into addresses); this process is known as "reverse geocoding." Also, you can choose to limit your search to certain bounded areas (Viewport Biasing) or regions (Region Biasing).

title: Mashup: GmapWiki.com
description: GmapWiki.com is a collaborative mapping platform that utilizes Google Maps as its base layer. It serves as a comprehensive repository of satellite imagery and geographic information, allowing users to explore and contribute to a library of interesting places captured by satellite photography. The platform integrates seamlessly with Google Earth, offering users the ability to dive deeper into the visual content and explore these locations in a more immersive 3D environment. It provides a rich database of geospatial data, enabling users to create, share, and interact with maps that highlight the unique features and points of interest from around the world.

Some example API methods include pulling a user's bookmarks, searching and retrieving search results, and accessing top level pages. Internet Archive is a non-profit that offers free online library and repository with free books, music, movies, software, and websites.

title: Mashup: Singapore Shopping Tour
description: A comprehensive mapping tour service for Singapore, providing users with detailed information on the best shopping destinations in the city. The mashup combines location-based services with retail data to create an interactive shopping itinerary, helping users discover new stores and plan their shopping routes efficiently. It integrates mapping APIs with retail databases to offer personalized shopping recommendations and detailed store information, including product listings and real-time availability.

title: Mashup: Lookzi
description: An HTML5-based mashup designed to present real-time information about the user's current geographic location. This mashup integrates mapping services with aggregated data from various sources to provide a comprehensive view of the local environment. Users can expect to see relevant information such as nearby points of interest, traffic conditions, weather updates, and other location-specific details. The mashup leverages geolocation APIs and other data sources to deliver this information in a user-friendly HTML5 interface.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: indeed API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Indeed is a search engine for jobs - with a radically different approach to job search. In one simple search, Indeed gives job seekers free access to millions of employment opportunities from thousands of websites. Indeed.com includes all the job listings from major job boards, newspapers, associations and company career pages - and we continue to add new sites every day. The Indeed API allows developers to integrate Indeed’s employer interface or job seeker interface in apps. The API returns responses in JSON or XML format.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

Groupon gets discounts you won't find anywhere else through the power of group buying. The goal of Groupon API is to allow applications to directly interact with Groupon via a REST API.
