title: Mashup: Dom by Domino's Pizza
description: Dom, the innovative virtual assistant by Domino's Pizza, offers a hands-free ordering experience through voice recognition technology. Available as a feature within the Domino's app, users can place orders for pizza using simple voice commands. This mashup is accessible on major platforms including the Apple App Store, Windows Phone Store, and Google Play. It provides a convenient and efficient way to order food, leveraging the power of voice interaction to streamline the ordering process.

title: Mashup: Text-A-Tree
description: A mobile application that allows users to plant trees and then report the location of each tree by sending a text message. The locations are then plotted on a Google Map, making it possible for everyone to view and track the trees planted by users.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: Website Screenshot Generator
description: A tool that enables users to generate high-quality screenshots of any website URL. Users can specify the device type (desktop, tablet, or smartphone) for the screenshot, and then further customize the screenshot by cropping, resizing, or adding a frame. The screenshot generator is designed to provide accurate visual representations of websites, allowing users to easily create and share screenshots for various purposes, such as documentation, design reviews, or social sharing.

related_apis.title: Page2Images API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Page2Images is a website thumbnail creater optimized for mobile devices. Page2Images exposes its service through a REST API. The API allows websites and applications to generate thumbnails of a given URL. The API is able to specify image size, device, screen size, and more.

title: Mashup: Kwik-Loan + DocuSign
description: A comprehensive loan origination and servicing platform that integrates with DocuSign's electronic signature solution. Kwik-Loan, from Compass Technologies, offers automated underwriting, loan application management via a secure web portal, electronic signature capabilities, and document imaging for streamlined loan processing. This mashup enhances lending operations by providing an end-to-end solution for decision-making, application management, document signing, and storage, all while leveraging DocuSign's electronic signature technology for secure, efficient document handling.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: eppraisal.com
description: eppraisal.com is a powerful real estate platform that provides instant access to comprehensive property data across the United States. With a database containing over 70 million properties, the site offers daily updated information, including detailed maps and estimated home valuations. This mashup leverages advanced mapping technologies and real-time data updates to offer a robust tool for both professionals and consumers in the real estate sector.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: Ringostrack.com
description: A comprehensive online platform for discovering, streaming, and purchasing soundtracks. The mashup integrates Amazon's extensive product catalog with specialized soundtrack databases, enabling users to search for and listen to soundtracks directly on the website. It offers a multimedia-rich experience, including detailed album descriptions, user reviews, and comprehensive Amazon search functionality for soundtrack enthusiasts and collectors.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

title: Mashup: Homo Britannicus
description: A promotional site by Penguin Books showcasing the UK tour of a woolly mammoth. Visitors can upload photos of the mammoth to Flickr and share opinions, which are then mapped using Google Maps. Photos are organized by city, while opinions are categorized by postcode, allowing for a rich, interactive experience that combines book promotion with social sharing and mapping capabilities.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: FreelanceApp
description: A search engine for freelance job opportunities that aggregates job listings from Indeed, one of the largest job search engines. The mashup allows users to search for freelance jobs by keyword, location, and other criteria, enabling them to easily find job opportunities in their desired field. It serves as a one-stop resource for freelancers and job seekers looking for freelance work, providing a simplified way to discover and apply for freelance jobs.

related_apis.title: indeed API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Indeed is a search engine for jobs - with a radically different approach to job search. In one simple search, Indeed gives job seekers free access to millions of employment opportunities from thousands of websites. Indeed.com includes all the job listings from major job boards, newspapers, associations and company career pages - and we continue to add new sites every day. The Indeed API allows developers to integrate Indeed’s employer interface or job seeker interface in apps. The API returns responses in JSON or XML format.

title: Mashup: Catalist Homes California
description: A real estate search platform for Southern California that leverages mapping technology to allow users to search for properties based on specific criteria. The mashup integrates real estate data with mapping APIs to provide an interactive map where users can hover over specific properties to view detailed information including address and price. This tool is particularly useful for homebuyers, real estate professionals, and anyone interested in exploring real estate options in Southern California.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: Nexmo SMS Spreader
description: A mobile messaging application that enables users to send SMS blasts to their contact lists sourced from Google Spreadsheets. The app utilizes the Nexmo API for SMS delivery, requiring a valid Nexmo API key for operation.

related_apis.title: Vonage Nexmo SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Vonage SMS API allows developers to integrate their applications with the Nexmo SMS services, enabling their users to send and receive messages through Nexmo directly from their applications. Nexmo provides customers a way to communicate with one another domestically and internationally.

versions.version_title: Vonage Nexmo SMS REST API v1.0

title: Mashup: Politics in Korea
description: A comprehensive political information hub focusing on South Korea's legislative system. The mashup provides detailed profiles of over 14,000 candidates and elected officials from the National Assembly Election, along with real-time updates on key political bills and policies. Utilizing government open data APIs and official political databases, it offers a centralized platform for tracking and understanding the political landscape of South Korea.

related_apis.title: Team POPONG POODL API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: POODL (POpong Open Data Library) is an API that allows users to retrieve legislative data from South Korea, including information on the National Assembly's members, candidates, and bills. Automated tools gather new and updated data from the National Assembly's website every day. This data is distributed through the API for use in research and application development.

title: Mashup: Let's Make a Puzzzzle
description: Let's Make a Puzzzzle is an engaging photo-to-puzzle creation tool that enables users to upload their favorite photos and convert them into interactive puzzles. Users can select from a variety of difficulty levels

related_apis.title: Aviary Effects API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Separate from its flagship Aviary API, an embedded photo editor, this API provides filters and effects. Developers can automatically fix red-eye and color adjust photos. Create watermarks so that all your uploaded photos are automatically copy-protected. In all there are currently over 20 filters, effects and other operations.

title: Mashup: US Towns with Holiday Season Names
description: A Google Maps mashup that displays towns and cities in the United States whose names are associated with Christmas or other holiday seasons. The mashup provides a geographical representation of these towns, allowing users to explore their locations and learn about the origins of these festive place names. It leverages Google Maps API for location data and potentially integrates with additional databases for historical or cultural context of the town names.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Appites
description: A comprehensive marketplace for downloading a wide range of applications and games tailored for Android and iOS devices. The platform features a responsive, device-agnostic design, allowing seamless access and downloading on various devices including smartphones, iPads, iPhones, and PCs.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Mobile Phone Megastore API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Your application can use the Mobile Phone Megastore API to search for mobile phones. Partners and other developers can then publish this information on their websites.
The main benefits of the mobile phone API Web Service is that you can access just the data you require without downloading the entire product database. This allows you to easily publish the data on your website needing to separately process the XML.

title: Mashup: Best Cities for Singles
description: A comparative analysis mashup that ranks major US cities based on various factors relevant to singles living alone, including socio-economic characteristics, entertainment options, and community engagement opportunities. This mashup combines demographic data from national surveys, urban planning reports, and local news sources to provide a comprehensive overview of the best environments for single individuals.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD

title: Mashup: UP▲HAIL
description: UP▲HAIL is a real-time transportation cost comparison service that leverages Uber and Lyft APIs to provide users with instant price comparisons for ride-sharing services. Beyond price comparisons, UP▲HAIL can also offer users real-time information on nearby rideshare opportunities, current price surges, the nearest cities with on-demand rideshares, availability of larger vehicles such as SUVs or vans, and any active promotion codes. The service supports multiple U.S. cities including Atlanta, Baltimore, Boston, Los Angeles, New York City, Pittsburgh, San Francisco, Seattle, and Washington D.C.

related_apis.title: Uber API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Using the Uber API, developers can integrate the power of Uber into 3rd party applications. Calls to the API can be made to request information on available car types, driver location expressed in geo-coordinates, time estimates, estimated prices (including currency conversion when applicable), as well as user account history and activity. The Uber API documentation describes deep linking techniques to programmatically launch the native app from iOS or Android, or the Uber mobile site from mobile web. The API comes with a detailed style guide and asset package for implementing licensed brandings. The Uber API Affiliate program grants cash and issues Uber credits for new user onboarding through a 3rd party app.

title: Mashup: TodoToday for Hiveminder
description: A task management application that provides a simple todo list interface to display current due and overdue tasks from the online task management tool Hiveminder. The mashup integrates with Hiveminder's API to retrieve and present task data in an easy-to-use format on mobile devices.

title: Mashup: Last 10K: Financial Statements
description: Last 10K: Financial Statements is a comprehensive financial analysis tool that simplifies the exploration of 10-K Annual and 10-Q Quarterly reports filed with the SEC. This mashup offers an interactive catalog of key financial metrics, including earnings, revenue, cash flow trends, debt load, and more. Each metric is accompanied by detailed tables optimized for mobile viewing, facilitating in-depth analysis and quick sharing. The platform is designed to assist investors in forming unbiased stock analyses and assessing the financial health of companies through accessible, real-time financial data.

related_apis.title: Last 10K Company API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Integrate SEC filing data within apps using the Last 10K API. The Last 10K developer portal facilitates the rapid creation of applications that inter-operate with Last10K’s RESTful service, providing access to SEC filing data and support services to help developers.

title: Mashup: Sing The World
description: A multimedia jukebox that leverages Flickr for image search, Google Maps for geographical exploration, and Seeqpod for music playback. Users can explore the world through images and music by selecting a keyword, such as "cloud," to display related pictures and play associated songs.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. title: Mashup: Furthere, Your Twitter Driven Weblog
description: A versatile blogging platform that leverages Twitter as its primary content source, transforming tweets into cohesive blog posts. Furthere automatically aggregates tweets from users and their selected friends, allowing for easy content creation, curation, and collaboration. Users can enrich and elaborate their tweets with additional details or combine them with others for comprehensive posts. The mashup integrates over 10 APIs to provide a seamless user experience and a rich set of features for content creation, management, and sharing.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: SlideShare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: SlideShare is the world's largest community for sharing presentations on the web. The current API is based upon the REST model and allows you to perform the following actions: Uploading Presentation(s), Retrieving EmbedCode for Slideshow(s), Retrieving Slideshows for User(s), Retrieving Slideshows for Tag(s), Retrieving Slideshows for Group(s)

related_apis.title: Google Cloud Translation API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: This version is currently in beta. The Google Cloud Translation API is a part of Google's larger Cloud Machine Learning API family. This API translates text between thousands of language pairs, with new features for this latest version that includes; Glossaries and Batch requests. It enables you with the ability to create a custom dictionary to correctly and consistently translate terms that are customer-specific and to make an asynchronous request to translate large amounts of text. The Cloud Translation API lets developers programmatically integrate the service with third party sites and applications.

versions.version_title: Google Cloud Translation REST API v3.0

related_apis.title: Vimeo API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Let Vimeo take care of all your video needs. Their API handles uploading, transcoding, hosting and playback of any video type. Embed the videos in your own website, or share them with the large community of filmmakers that call Vimeo home. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON

related_apis.title: Scribd Platform API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: A REST-based API with methods for uploading, converting, editing, deleting, and searching documents. Using the API, you can use Scribd as a back-end for an application that needs to process documents, without needing to write a document processing system yourself. Use the Scribd API to harness the full power of Scribd's scalable conversion system, storage system, ad network, search engine, and iPaper viewer on your website. The Scribd API is the most powerful and customizable way to upload documents to Scribd, convert documents to iPaper, manage existing documents on your website, and find the content you need.

related_apis.title: LongURL API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the LongURL API to expand shortened URLs from TinyURL, etc. Submit a shortened URL and then get its long equivalent returned. You can also use the API to get a list of known shortening services along with the domains they use (or view the main site's home page for a list, too). If you use the JSON return format, you can also identify an optional callback function.

related_apis.title: TwitPic API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The TwitPic API lets you upload and post images to your Twitter account. You can upload an image for later posting or upload an image to TwitPic and automatically send it as a status update to Twitter.

related_apis.title: ImageShack API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: ImageShack offers image hosting, free photo sharing and video sharing. The ImageShack platform allows integration of ImageShack's services into any website or software via the use of its XML API.

title: Mashup: RealMapz
description: A real estate mashup that integrates property listings with interactive maps to showcase homes available for sale on the California central coast. Users can search, filter, and explore properties based on location, price range, and other criteria, providing a comprehensive view of the local real estate market.

title: Mashup: LOOP for Box.net
description: LOOP for Box.net is an integrated service that combines Drawloop's advanced PDF conversion capabilities with Box.net's secure online storage platform. This mashup enables users to easily convert individual files into PDF format or merge multiple documents into a single, cohesive PDF file. Designed for professionals and businesses that require efficient document management and secure file sharing, LOOP for Box.net streamlines the process of creating and managing PDF documents, ensuring that all data remains accessible and secure on the cloud.

related_apis.title: Box API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Box is a modern content management platform that transforms how organizations work and collaborate to achieve results faster.Box Platform provides content APIs to build secure content experiences in custom apps. With Box Platform, organizations can bring content management and collaboration services to their own custom apps or build custom integrations with Box.

title: Mashup: Neartime
description: A bookmarklet that leverages Flickr's geotagged photo database and mapping services to find photos taken in close proximity to any given geotagged Flickr photo, both spatially and temporally. Users can click on the bookmarklet while viewing a geotagged photo on Flickr to retrieve a list of other geotagged photos that were taken near the same location and around the same time. This mashup combines geospatial data from Flickr with real-time mapping capabilities to provide a unique way of exploring and discovering related content.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. title: Mashup: Day One App
description: Day One is an innovative journaling platform designed to facilitate the recording, preservation, and future retrieval of personal memories. By leveraging advanced search and discovery mechanisms, Day One ensures that users can easily and effectively access their stored data, while also adhering to the principle of data ownership. This app offers seamless integration across multiple devices, including Mac, iPhone, and iPad, utilizing fast syncing capabilities through iCloud and Dropbox to maintain data consistency and accessibility. Recognized by Apple as the Mac App of the Year in 2012, Day One exemplifies excellence in personal data management and long-term memory preservation, providing a valuable resource for users seeking to document and reflect upon their life experiences.

related_apis.title: Handset Detection API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Handset Detection is a real time, self updating, database of thousands of mobile phones. The RESTful API allows users to query the service with XML or JSON and retrieve information such as a list of vendors for all devices in the system. Libraries are available in PHP, Python, Java and ASP.NET.

related_apis.title: AerisWeather API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: AerisWeather is a site that provides traditional weather content such as local weather and weather maps. AerisWeather's core product is an API that provides the necessary weather data to power services such as hosted weather sites and weather application development. The API gives developers access to data such as weather advisories, forecasts, geographic locations, storm reports and more. It uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON and JSONP.

title: Mashup: Global Flood Map
description: An interactive mapping tool that visualizes potential flood risk areas based on user-specified estimates of sea level rise due to global warming. Users can input their own estimates of sea level rise and the mashup will display which cities and regions are likely to be affected by flooding. This tool utilizes geospatial data, weather data, and user input to provide a dynamic visualization of the potential impacts of global warming on coastal areas.

related_apis.title: MapLarge API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: MapLarge offers an API to embed interactive maps on a website, blog or news story. MapLarge is the creator of some of the largest Google Maps implementations on the Internet. MapLarge uses patent pending methods to create simple map visualizations from complex data. With the API users can geocode upto 2,000 records daily for free. Datasets mapped with the geocoder can be mapped on top of Google Maps, Bing, ESRI or Open Street Maps. The API uses RESTful protocol.

title: Mashup: DecorStuff
description: A home automation and e-commerce mashup that leverages Amazon's product recommendations to curate and update a real-time inventory of home appliances and garden decor products. The mashup utilizes Amazon's API to provide users with an always up-to-date shopping experience, ensuring that recommended products are current and free of outdated or junk items. Additionally, it integrates a remote shopping cart feature, allowing users to browse and add items to their cart as if they were shopping on their own Amazon page, while benefitting from the curated selection of home and garden products.

title: Mashup: NYC Marathon Course
description: A mapping application that displays the course of the 2005 New York City Marathon. This mashup combines geolocation data with sports event information to provide a detailed visualization of the marathon route. Users can explore the course and see key points of interest, such as start and finish lines, major landmarks, and water stations. The application offers insights into the marathon's layout and can be useful for runners, spectators, and event organizers.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Geospeaker
description: A real-time, location-based communication platform that allows users to broadcast messages to people in their immediate vicinity. Users can create and send voice messages that are received by others within a certain geographical radius. The mashup combines geolocation services with voice messaging technology to facilitate localized communication. It is designed for use in public spaces, events, and other situations where people seek to communicate with those nearby.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: Flickr Lightbox Slideshow
description: A dynamic slideshow that presents the most interesting and recently uploaded photographs from Flickr using the Lightbox Ajax toolset. This mashup allows users to browse through an ever-changing collection of high-quality images, providing an engaging and visually stunning experience. It utilizes Flickr's API to fetch the latest images and Lightbox's JavaScript library for seamless image display and transition effects.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: AmzWish
description: An eCommerce wishlist widget that combines the Amazon API and RSSBus to create a dynamic, personalized shopping list. This mashup allows users to receive monetary compensation when others purchase items from their wishlist via a referral program. It enhances the traditional wishlist functionality by integrating social sharing and providing financial incentives for users to maintain and share their wishlists.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

title: Mashup: Loudoun County Stream Assessment
description: A comprehensive web-based platform that visualizes and analyzes the health of streams in Loudoun County, Virginia. The mashup integrates EPA data, local environmental assessments, and user-submitted observations to provide an interactive map with real-time stream condition updates. Users can contribute to the assessment by submitting their own observations, and the platform offers educational resources on stream health and conservation efforts.

title: Mashup: LocateA
description: A mobile mashup that transforms your Java-enabled mobile phone or your PDA mobile phone running Windows into a real-time personal location tracking solution. This mashup leverages GPS capabilities and mapping APIs to provide users with their precise location and track their movements in real-time. It is designed to be used on-the-go, making it ideal for individuals who need to monitor their location or that of their belongings in a dynamic environment.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

title: Mashup: Raffle Swag
description: A mobile-friendly raffle entry system that allows attendees to participate using their smartphones without the need for downloads. The mashup integrates with various mobile operating systems such as iOS, Android, BlackBerry, and Windows 7 to facilitate seamless entry for participants. The system utilizes telephony and messaging APIs to handle entries and randomly select winners, providing a modern and convenient alternative to traditional raffle ticket methods. It is designed to work effectively across different mobile platforms, ensuring wide accessibility and ease of use for users.

related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: CamMap USA
description: An interactive map mashup that integrates real-time web camera feeds from various locations across the United States, overlaying them onto Google Maps. This tool allows users to navigate through different regions of the country, viewing live video streams and images captured by webcams. The mashup is primarily focused on providing visual content from specific geographical points of interest, though the available content is currently limited.

title: Mashup: DrinkDeal.com
description: An interactive map-based platform that leverages Google Maps API to aggregate and display real-time drink specials in New York City, allowing users to filter and view offers by specific neighborhoods and days of the week. The mashup integrates with local bar and restaurant APIs to provide up-to-date information on promotions and discounts, enhancing the user experience for those seeking nightlife deals.

title: Mashup: Reading Radar
description: An automated reading list mashup that aggregates the New York Times Bestsellers API and the Amazon.com API to create a real-time, curated list of top-selling books across various genres. Users can browse and purchase these bestsellers directly through the mashup, which also provides detailed book descriptions, author information, and user reviews from associated sources. The mashup is designed to cater to book lovers, literary professionals, and anyone interested in staying updated with the latest bestsellers.

related_apis.title: The New York Times Best Sellers API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The New York Times Books/Best Sellers API lets you get data from all New York Times best-seller lists including rank history for specific best sellers. Four request types are available: get a best-seller list, search best-seller lists, get the history of a best seller and get the names of Times best-seller lists.

versions.version_title: The New York Times Best Sellers REST API

title: Mashup: EVE iPos
description: A Google Gadget designed for EVE-Online players, this mashup provides real-time monitoring of Player Owned Structures (POS). It includes features for tracking skill training progress and monitoring the fuel levels of POS. The gadget is customizable, allowing users to create multiple instances for tracking various accounts simultaneously.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

title: Mashup: I Do Voices
description: A voice-based game mashup that allows players to text "play" to a designated number to begin. Upon starting, each player receives the name of a famous person or character. Players then text this name to the number without speaking it aloud (text "pass" to skip). Points are awarded for correct guesses or when a player guesses correctly. The first player to reach a predetermined score wins. This mashup integrates voice and text messaging functionalities with game mechanics to create an engaging and interactive experience.

title: Mashup: Ness Dining Guide
description: Ness Dining Guide is a personalized restaurant discovery platform that utilizes machine learning to recommend dining establishments based on user preferences and usage patterns. By integrating user feedback and location data, Ness provides tailored restaurant suggestions that improve over time as the user interacts with the service.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Foursquare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Foursquare Places API provides location based experiences with diverse information about venues, users, photos, and check-ins. The API supports real time access to places, Snap-to-Place that assigns users to specific locations, and Geo-tag. Additionally, Foursquare allows developers to build audience segments for analysis and measurement. JSON is the preferred response format.

title: Mashup: Genealogy of Influence viewer
description: An interactive visualization tool that displays the influence network within the Freebase database, illustrating the relationships and influences between individuals, works, and events throughout history. The mashup visualizes the connections and impacts across various domains, such as literature, science, politics, and more, providing users with a dynamic and insightful exploration of the historical and contemporary influence landscape.

title: Mashup: Chicago Transit Authority Bus Tracker
description: A real-time bus tracking mashup that displays detailed information about Chicago Transit Authority routes and statuses. Users can click on a link to view Route Progress, which provides an overview of the bus's location and estimated arrival times. Additionally, the mashup allows users to set an alarm to receive a pop-up notification on their computer when a bus has reached a selected stop. This mashup integrates data from various sources, including GPS tracking and schedule APIs, to provide accurate, up-to-the-minute bus information to users in the Chicago area.

title: Mashup: Gengo YouTube Translation
description: A service that automatically translates the captions of YouTube videos into various languages using human translators, allowing creators to effectively reach a global audience.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Gengo Human Translation API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Gengo is a Tokyo based startup, founded in 2008 with the aim of making high quality human translation simple and easy to integrate into virtually any web or mobile application or service. Gengo's hybrid translation platform, accessed via a well documented REST API, enables applications to request any combination of machine and human translations at varying service levels to optimize for speed, quality and cost.
Gengo has been integrated into a wide range of localization, digital publishing and communication services, and in addition to being integrated into popular systems, is directly accessible via the REST API, as well as pre-built client libraries for popular languages including Java, PHP, Python and Ruby.

title: Mashup: Metro Mapper
description: Metro Mapper is an interactive mapping solution that aggregates and visualizes data from various government sources for the Metro Louisville, Kentucky area. It offers a comprehensive view of different datasets by overlaying them on a single map, enabling users to explore and analyze urban statistics and demographics. The mashup utilizes API integrations with government data repositories to provide real-time data updates, ensuring users have access to the most current information available. It is designed to support both local planning and policy-making efforts by offering a user-friendly platform for data exploration and analysis.

related_apis.title: Your Mapper API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Your Mapper aggregates local government data from cities across the nation, standardizes it, geocodes it, and keeps it up to data for you to use in your apps and services. The Your Mapper API allows developers and entrepreneurs to integrate the data into their websites or mobile applications. Users can either use the embedded map service for their sites, or grab the data in standard formats to create apps.

title: Mashup: Travel Around the World
description: An immersive travel experience mashup that combines high-quality images, detailed descriptions, and informative videos of global tourist attractions. This mashup allows users to virtually explore various countries, providing insights into their unique cultures, histories, and popular tourist destinations. It leverages image, video, and text data sources to create an engaging and educational travel guide, enhancing user understanding and interest in global tourism.

title: Mashup: USA Name Data (BigQuery Public Dataset)
description: An interactive data exploration tool that leverages Google BigQuery's USA Names public dataset and Looker visualization tools. This mashup embeds Looker visualizations within a 3rd party website, enabling users to visually explore and analyze demographic data related to names in the United States. It combines the power of BigQuery's large-scale data processing capabilities with Looker's intuitive visualization tools to provide an in-depth understanding of name demographics across the USA.

related_apis.title: Looker API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Looker RESTful API integrates data analytics for business services via reports and dashboards. It is available with HTTP requests and JSON responses, API Key to authenticate, and SDK to interact with various parameters.

related_apis.title: Google BigQuery API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google BigQuery service allows users to run SQL-like queries against very large datasets, with potentially billions of rows. BigQuery works best for interactive analyses, typically using a small number of very large, append-only tables. Users can access BigQuery using the BigQuery browser, the bq command-line tool, the REST API, or Google Apps Script.

title: Mashup: blogloc
description: A location-based mashup that integrates real-time GPS technology and mobile Java support to provide a dynamic map badge for embedding on websites. This badge showcases your current geographical location and allows for updates through multiple channels, including the web, mobile phones, and GPS-enabled devices directly. It enhances user engagement and location awareness on digital platforms.

related_apis.title: GeoNames API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Geonames is a geographical database with web services that let users extract useful information about different places, such as weather, timezone and post codes. The GeoNames geographical database covers all countries and contains over eight million placenames that are available for download free of charge. Users can edit, correct and add new names using a wiki interface.Geonames provides a suite of Webservices including the following categories:Fulltext searchPlace HierarchyWikipediaPostal CodesReverse GeocodingThe APIs use RESTful protocol and responses vary in format between XML, JSON, CSV, and TXTWhile the GeoNames data is free, the data is available without costs, there is a Service Level Agreement available for premium web services.

related_apis.title: Google Static Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Static Maps API lets you embed a Google Maps image on your webpage without requiring JavaScript or any dynamic page loading. The Google Static Map service creates your map based on URL parameters sent through a standard HTTP request and returns the map as an image you can display on your web page.

title: Mashup: WeatherBug Maps
description: A comprehensive weather information platform that leverages the Weatherbug API, Microsoft Virtual Earth, and Flash popups to deliver detailed weather data from hundreds of weather stations. Users can visualize and interact with real-time weather conditions through an intuitive, rich map interface, enabling them to track weather patterns, get alerts, and plan accordingly. The mashup offers a seamless blend of location-based services and weather data to provide a robust, visual weather experience.

title: Mashup: Yidio
description: Yidio is a comprehensive streaming media platform that aggregates content from various sources, offering users a single destination to search, discover, personalize, and watch TV shows and movies, both free and on subscription. The service integrates with multiple streaming platforms and content providers to offer a unified viewing experience, accommodating a wide range of user preferences and content needs.

related_apis.title: iTunes and iTunes Connect API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: A simple REST web service to access the iTunes App Store and iTunes Connect data. Get information about apps, reviews, ratings, ranking, iTunes Connect sales data and more.

versions.version_title: iTunes and iTunes Connect REST API

title: Mashup: Music Mash
description: Music Mash is a user-friendly Google Gadget that integrates Rhapsody's extensive music catalog and YouTube's vast video library to provide an innovative content discovery experience. It allows users to search for millions of songs and videos by entering lyrics, making it a powerful tool for music enthusiasts and video viewers alike. The mashup leverages Rhapsody's music APIs and YouTube's video search capabilities, combining them into a single interface for easy access and seamless browsing.

title: Mashup: The Onion Atlas
description: An interactive, humorous news service that maps global points of interest, providing satirical insights into lesser-known countries. Users can explore a virtual globe, clicking on scattered pins to discover amusing factoids. The service updates weekly, offering a lighthearted lens on world affairs and cultural trivia.
