description: A social media aggregator that compiles news articles, multimedia content, and user-generated content into a single platform. Key features include tag browsing for categorized content exploration, and RSS feeds for personalized content delivery based on specific tags. Users can engage with content, share it across various social networks, and receive updates on their preferred topics in real-time. The mashup leverages social networking APIs, news feeds, and multimedia content providers to offer a comprehensive and interactive social media experience.

related_apis.title: del.icio.us API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: del.icio.us is a social bookmarking website -- the primary use of del.icio.us is to store your bookmarks online, which allows you to access the same bookmarks from any computer and add bookmarks from anywhere, too. On del.icio.us, you can use tags to organize and remember your bookmarks, which is a much more flexible system than folders.
The API provides read/write access to Delicious bookmarks and tags via an HTTP-based interface. The RESTful API returns responses in XML.

related_apis.title: CNET API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: this service will make a wealth of data available to the mash-up community in the creation of rich consumer sites. The initial dataset will include the full CNET catalog of technology products and software titles. This is the same dataset that drives the highly trafficked sites of CNET Reviews, Shopper.com and Download.com. Over time, the API will add news articles, community content, blog posts and full product reviews. The API is designed for easy data discovery and integration. The interface is REST-based, supporting both XML and JSON response formats. It has undergone extensive performance optimization, in order to ensure rapid response times. To simplify query creation, a tool called the Dashboard is available that allows the user to interactively select data sets to include in the response stream.

title: Mashup: Park It DC
description: A transportation and parking information mashup that overlays parking availability and rates on the map of Washington DC, leveraging Google Maps for navigation and location services. Users can search for parking spots, view real-time availability, and navigate directly to their chosen parking locations using Google Maps' directions and navigation features.

description: A social media-driven video search engine that aggregates and curates high-quality, user-generated video content from multiple sources in real-time. By leveraging social media platforms and video hosting sites' APIs, Viirl provides a dynamic, up-to-the-minute stream of relevant, entertaining videos. It utilizes advanced search algorithms and user feedback to filter out outdated and low-quality content, ensuring users experience a constantly updating, engaging video experience.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: LOOQ Here, Buy on eBay
description: A search tool that facilitates broad searches on eBay, allowing users to filter results based on text, price, and additional criteria. By integrating eBay's API, this mashup streamlines the process of finding and purchasing items on the platform, potentially saving time and effort in the search process.

related_apis.title: SpokenBuzz API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: SpokenBuzz is an innovative voice portal that gives you voicemail, call forwarding, call screening, outbound calling and many more services. Many features are free if you use the web interface to make calls. The only time you must pay is if you want a Custom inbound telephone number. You can now access our voice messaging service from our free API. Currently, we have one service available that allows you to make a request to initiate a phone call to any number and allow the recipient of the phone call to record a short voice message. We return the URL of a web-page that you can link to play back the message. You may use this link in any way that you want to enhance your service or build mashups.

title: Mashup: Evergreen Content
description: Evergreen Content is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to enhance the freshness of written content by dynamically updating specific attributes with the latest information. This mashup leverages APIs to fetch real-time data, such as movie ratings from IMDb, and integrates it seamlessly into static content. By doing so, it ensures that the content remains relevant and up-to-date without requiring manual updates.

related_apis.title: WebKnox Keywords API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Begun as a research project from the Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology and the University of Technology Dresden, WebKnox is an ontology-driven fact extraction engine built to provide direct, fast, and complete answers to questions on any topic a user can think of. To answer a question WebKnox uses external services that might have previously provided an answer or computes an answer using its knowledge base. If those options fail, WebKnox tries to find an answer on the fly.
WebKnox hosts a suite of REST APIs delivering a range of web services. The WebKnox Keywords API provides developer access to keyword data such as how often they are searched and how many competing pages are on Google. The API can also return a list of related keywords.

title: Mashup: NDA Corp DocuSign Integration
description: Network Design and Analysis Corporation (NDA) offers a comprehensive solution for telecom providers and agents, focusing on electronic signature, document management, and automation. Since its founding in 1983, NDA has honed its expertise in understanding and implementing the complex business logic that governs telecom services and pricing. This expertise enables NDA to provide tailored, high-quality solutions to its clients with remarkable speed. The core product can be customized to reflect unique business rules, custom rates, and provider agreements, ensuring accurate and up-to-date pricing information for quotes. NDA's robust document management system, integrated with DocuSign, streamlines the entire process, from quote creation to document signing, enhancing productivity and reducing operational costs. The solution supports seamless integration with internal applications, leveraging the latest technology to maximize efficiency and scalability.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: My Saved Tracks
description: The My Saved Tracks mashup is a web application that enables users to access and view their saved tracks from their Spotify account. Utilizing the Spotify Metadata API, the app provides an interface for users to grant permission and then automatically fetch their saved tracks. These tracks are presented in a user-friendly list format. This app was developed by Paul Lamere and its source code is available on GitHub.

title: Mashup: JobKaster

Users can plot job locations on a map, facilitating easy navigation and proximity-based searching. It integrates job databases with mapping APIs to provide an intuitive, location-aware job search experience, making it the simplest way to discover jobs nearby.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Cat Breeds
description: A comprehensive resource for cat enthusiasts, Cat Breeds leverages the PetFinder API to provide detailed information about various cat breeds. Users can explore breed characteristics, origins, and care requirements, enhancing their understanding and appreciation of these feline companions.

related_apis.title: Petfinder API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Petfinder is a website that lets users search for pets that are up for adoption. Petfinder offers a RESTful API that allows developers to create their own applications that query the Petfinder database. Searches can be by breed, pet, shelter, or by breed/pet at a specific shelter.

title: Mashup: Cemetery Map
description: A customized Google Maps mashup that overlays cemetery grave locations from PDF, JPG, and GIS formats, allowing users to view and search for grave sites on an interactive map. The mashup integrates geolocation data with cemetery records to provide a user-friendly interface for exploring and locating graves.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Photo Feed Slideshow Wigdet
description: A dynamic photo slideshow widget that integrates RSS feeds to display continuous updates of latest albums and other photo collections. Users can embed this widget on their blogs or any social platform to showcase their photo feeds in a visually engaging manner.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

title: Mashup: Giftivo
description: Giftivo is a social gift recommendation platform that leverages Facebook profile data and personalized customization to suggest gifts for friends and acquaintances within your social network. This mashup integrates social networking data with personalized gift recommendation algorithms to offer tailored gift ideas. It can also suggest gifts for individuals with limited Facebook profiles or those who are not on Facebook, through a customizable dashboard that allows for detailed gift selection preferences.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

title: Mashup: Ultimate Gift
description: A comprehensive online gift shopping platform that leverages the Amazon eCommerce API to provide users with a wide range of gift options. Users can browse, search, and purchase gifts from Amazon's extensive catalog, conveniently and efficiently through one interface.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

title: Mashup: categola
description: A multimedia trivia site that aggregates and displays various data points related to media content, including user bookmark counts from del.icio.us and Amazon sales rank graphs for the latest week. The mashup combines social bookmarking data with sales analytics to offer insights into the popularity and trends of different media items.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD

The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

related_apis.title: del.icio.us API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: del.icio.us is a social bookmarking website -- the primary use of del.icio.us is to store your bookmarks online, which allows you to access the same bookmarks from any computer and add bookmarks from anywhere, too. On del.icio.us, you can use tags to organize and remember your bookmarks, which is a much more flexible system than folders.
The API provides read/write access to Delicious bookmarks and tags via an HTTP-based interface. The RESTful API returns responses in XML.

title: Mashup: Call My Wall
description: A telephony-integrated social media platform that enables Facebook users to call in and verbally post comments or messages on their Facebook wall. The mashup leverages voice recognition and integration technologies to convert telephone conversations into digital text posts, providing an innovative and humorous way to engage with Facebook content via telephony. It also offers real-time posting capabilities, allowing users to interact with their Facebook wall in a creative and unconventional manner.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: Geograph Map Clusters for Google Maps
description: A comprehensive mapping tool that integrates the Geograph British Isles archive of over 1.5 million geographically representative photographs, enabling users to explore and discover the complete collection of images across every square kilometer of Great Britain and Ireland. The mashup leverages Google Maps technology to provide an interactive and visually rich experience, allowing users to zoom in and out to view the dense clusters of photographs, each representing a unique snapshot of the landscape and culture. This mashup serves as a valuable resource for geography enthusiasts, travel photographers, and researchers interested in the visual documentation of the British Isles' geography.

related_apis.title: Geograph API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Geograph England and Ireland project was established to create geographically representative images and data of every square kilometer of the two countries. The Geograph API makes it easier for third-party developers to deploy the Geograph data in the applications. Its deployment requires API key authentication.

title: Mashup: Wimbledon Live on Mobile Phones
description: A real-time sports news and score update service tailored for mobile devices, providing subscribers with instant notifications on Wimbledon matches directly to their mobile phones through SMS, WAP, and email. This mashup aggregates live sports data, leverages mobile communication technologies, and delivers targeted sports updates to enhance the fan experience during major sporting events.

title: Mashup: TextEcho.com
description: A visual search engine that enables users to search Flickr's massive repository of images using specific tags. This mashup leverages Flickr's API to provide a powerful tool for discovering and filtering large volumes of visual content based on user-defined criteria.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: Connected
description: Connected is a comprehensive personal relationship management tool that aggregates and unifies your contacts, conversations, and interactions across multiple platforms including email, social networks, calendar, and phone calls. It serves as a centralized hub for managing all aspects of your personal and professional relationships, enabling you to stay organized and connected with ease. The mashup consolidates data from various sources, providing a unified view of your contacts, their communication history, and upcoming events, all in one place. It is designed to streamline your social and professional networking efforts by integrating and synchronizing information, allowing for more efficient and effective relationship management.

related_apis.title: Google Calendar API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Calendar Data API lets users perform most of the operations a normal Google Calendar user can on the Google Calendar website. Google Calendar allows client applications to view and update calendar events in the form of Google data API, GData, feeds. The Calendar Data API lets users incorporate Calendar functionality into their own application or website. Users can edit calendars, create and delete events, query for events that match particular criteria, send invitations, and more.
There are many possible uses for the Calendar data API. For example, users can create a web front end for a group calendar that uses Google Calendar as a back end. Or a public calendar can be generated for Google Calendar to display, based on a company event database. Or users can search relevant calendars to display a list of upcoming events on those calendars.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: LinkedIn API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
LinkedIn is the world's largest business social networking hub. Launched in 2003, LinkedIn has millions of users and is implemented in over 200 countries. One purpose of the site is to allow registered users to maintain a list of contact details of people with whom they have some level of relationship, called Connections. Users can invite anyone (whether a site user or not) to become a connection.
The LinkedIn API is a RESTful platform that provides a simple, consistent representation of people, companies, jobs, and the interactions and relationships between them. Our query language lets you read data in XML and JSON at the granularity and aggregation that you choose. Use OAuth 1.0a to authorize users and begin making REST API calls using any programming language.The API’s access is restricted to authorized developers.

related_apis.title: Google Contacts API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Contacts Data API allows client applications to view and update Contacts content in the form of Google Data API feeds. Your client application can request a list of a user's contacts, edit or delete content in an existing contact, and query the content in an existing contact.

related_apis.title: Google Gmail OAuth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Google Gmail now supports the standard IMAP and SMTP protocols for accessing and sending e-mail messages. The Gmail IMAP and SMTP servers have been extended to support authorization via the industry-standard OAuth protocol. This allows third party applications to access a user's email account with their permission.

title: Mashup: How Far Does Santa Have To Travel
description: A holiday-themed mashup that combines geolocation services with distance measurement APIs to calculate the travel distance from the North Pole to the user's location. The mashup provides a visual representation of this distance on a map, enhancing the holiday spirit by engaging users in an interactive way to explore the concept of Santa's journey. It integrates real-time geolocation data with mapping services to offer an entertaining and educational experience.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. title: Mashup: SpeedyiTunes Planet
description: The SpeedyiTunes Planet mashup is a comprehensive content search engine that aggregates and indexes multimedia content from various popular platforms including YouTube, RapidShare, MegaUpload, and others. It offers users a streamlined interface for locating, accessing, and managing diverse multimedia content types such as videos and music across multiple online sources. The mashup's core functionality revolves around providing a unified search experience for multimedia content, enhancing accessibility and user convenience.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Google Custom Search API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Custom Search Engine API is a RESTful API that allows developer to get web or image search results data in JSON or Atom format. With the API, developers can add web search and/or site search capabilities to their website, blog or collection of websites.

versions.version_title: Google Custom Search REST API v1

title: Mashup: MapMate
description: MapMate is a location-based social update service that uses Microsoft Virtual Earth for geolocation. It allows users to update their Facebook status and plot their current location on a map, enabling them to share their whereabouts and status updates with their social network. The mashup integrates Facebook's social networking capabilities with Virtual Earth's mapping and geolocation services for a seamless user experience.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing Maps API and Interactive SDK features an AJAX Map Control. Use BM to build maps which can include routes and traffic info. Gives developers the ability to code the controls, shapes, and layers of the maps, and can summon the birds-eye, 3D, and aerial imagery. For commercial applications Bing Maps Web Services is a set of programmable SOAP services that allow users to integrate maps and imagery, driving directions, and other location features into a Web application.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

title: Mashup: Cycling the Alps
description: A comprehensive resource for cyclists interested in exploring the Alps and the Tour de France. This mashup provides an immersive experience through Google Earth 3D tours, streetview tours, interactive cycling games, educational videos, and community discussions. It offers detailed information about every pass in the Alps and all climbs featured in the Tour de France, allowing users to plan and enjoy their cycling adventures with ease.

related_apis.title: Google AdWords API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google AdWords API allows apps to interact directly with the Google Ads platform, vastly increasing the efficiency of managing large or complex Google Ads accounts and campaigns. Some typical use cases include:Automated account managementCustom reportingAd management based on inventoryBid management based on business dataWith the AdWords API you can build software that manages accounts from the customer level down to the keyword level. The API can do almost everything the Google Ads UI does, but programmatically.The types of companies that have benefited from the AdWords API include:Ad agenciesSearch Engine Marketing (SEM) companiesBig brands managing a large number of accounts, with needs beyond what's possible within the Google Ads UI.The API relies on SOAP and WSDL technologies to offer its services. You set up API access by obtaining a few required authentication credentials, creating some test accounts, and adding the authentication and account details to a configuration file for your client library. Authentication is via OAuth2.To help you get started, they offer client libraries in Java, .NET, Python, PHP, Perl, and Ruby.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

related_apis.title: Google Picasa API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [Editor's Note: Per provider, this API will be deprecated in January 2019. Developers are encouraged to migrate to the Google Photos Library API]From their site: The Picasa Web Albums data API allows client applications to view and update Picasa Web Albums content in the form of Google data API GData feeds. Your client application can request a list of user albums, photos, comments, or tags, edit or delete content in an existing entry, and query the content in an existing entry.

related_apis.title: Google Earth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Earth Engine API allows developers to run algorithms on georeferenced imagery and vectors stored on Google's infrastructure. The Google Earth Engine API provides a library of functions which may be applied to imagery for display and analysis. Earth Engine's public data catalog contains a large amount of publicly available imagery.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

related_apis.title: Google Analytics Managment API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Google Analytics Management API to leverage Google's extensive website analytics tools. The API uses GET requests over HTTPS and JSON for requests/returns. Some of the functions available with the API are: List Account, Property and View (Profile) information for a user; manage properties and goals; manage user permissions; and upload cost data to Google Analytics for non-Google paid campaigns. See the extensive documentation for code samples, detailed method descriptions, and more.

related_apis.title: Google Fusion Tables API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Google Fusion Tables is a free service for sharing and visualizing data online. It lets you upload data, share and mark up your data with collaborators, merge data from multiple tables, and create visualizations such as charts and maps. The API lets you update and query your dataset in Fusion Tables programmatically. The API lets you import data from other data sources, whether a text file or a full database.

related_apis.title: Google Maps Elevation API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google Elevation web service provides you a simple interface to query locations on the earth for elevation data. Additionally, you may request sampled elevation data along paths, allowing you to calculate elevation changes along routes.
The Elevation service provides elevation data for all locations on the surface of the earth, including depth locations on the ocean floor (which return negative values). In those cases where Google does not possess exact elevation measurements at the precise location you request, the service will interpolate and return an averaged value using the four nearest locations.

related_apis.title: Google Latitude API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google Latitude API allows for websites and developers to integrate with Google Latitude, which lets users update and read their current location, their location history, and other geo-related information.
In Latitude, a location is a record of where a user was at a given time. A location always contains a latitude, a longitude and a timestamp. It might also contain more details about the position of the user at that time, such as altitude, or metadata about how the position itself was captured, such as accuracy.
A user typically has a current location, which represents the most recent known position of the user. In some cases, however, a user might decide to temporarily hide, making their position invisible to Latitude friends. A hidden user has no current location.
A user can opt to have their locations stored as a time series by Google. This collection of positions is called the user's location history.

related_apis.title: Google Geocoding API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Geocoding API is a webservice for the Google Maps API. The Geocoding API provides a direct way to access a geocoder via an HTTP request, though it must be used in conjunction with Google Maps. Additionally, the service allows you to perform the converse operation (turning coordinates into addresses); this process is known as "reverse geocoding." Also, you can choose to limit your search to certain bounded areas (Viewport Biasing) or regions (Region Biasing).

title: Mashup: Flickr Album Maker
description: A user-friendly tool that allows users to create customized photo albums and slideshows from their Flickr photo collections. The mashup generates embeddable HTML code for seamless integration into blogs or websites, providing an easy way to share and showcase personal or professional photo content.

Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

title: Mashup: Newspaper.li
description: A comprehensive news aggregator that combines visual content, social media interactions, and community discussions. The mashup provides a one-stop solution for staying updated on current events by integrating image galleries, video clips, real-time tweets, Q&A sessions, and forum posts. It leverages APIs from various social media platforms and news outlets to deliver a rich, multimedia experience for users interested in diverse perspectives and interactive engagement.

related_apis.title: Omgili API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Webhose.io is a specialized search engine focused on "many to many" user generated content platforms including forums, discussion groups, news groups, mailing lists, answer boards, opinion sites and others. It provides a way to find subjective information. Most technical questions out there have been answered and this service is designed to find those answers. The Webhose.io API allows developers to build applications that can access data collected from discussions across the web. This data can be integrated into media monitoring systems, databases, data warehouses, big data solutions, social media analytics services, ad tracking reports, algorithms and more. The Webhose.io API provides structured results in multiple formats (JSON/XML/RSS) that includes the clean textual content, the date and time, author name, language and much more. The API also offers a firehouse solution to enable data acquisition in real time.

title: Mashup: SMS Garage Door
description: A Twilio-powered smart garage door system that integrates an Arduino microcontroller with an Ethernet shield and additional electronic components. This system can detect the open or closed state of the garage door and can be activated via SMS messages to open or close the door. Additionally, a scheduled program runs every 15 minutes to check the garage door status after 8:00. If the door remains open, it automatically sends SMS notifications to the homeowner's (in this case, the wife's) phone. The homeowner can then respond to the SMS to close the door remotely.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: Geek Shout Map
description: A mashup of Google Maps and a "shout" site that allows users to track the location of a "roaming geek" and post messages on the map at any given location. This mashup enhances the traditional shout site by integrating it with Google Maps to provide a dynamic and interactive way to communicate and share information with others in real-time. It combines geolocation services with a social media platform to create a unique and engaging user experience.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: ThinkBigBeBig
description: A social curation platform for real estate enthusiasts to discover and share must-have products and services tailored for the real estate industry. This mashup combines social media features with real estate insights, allowing users to follow and contribute to discussions on essential items such as home improvement tools, financial services, and legal resources, all within the context of the English real estate market.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: '08 celebrity pictures, videos and news
description: A comprehensive platform for celebrity enthusiasts, integrating various media sources to provide a one-stop solution for the latest news, high-quality videos, and captivating images of celebrity actresses, models, and singers. This mashup seamlessly combines Yahoo's photo library with YouTube's video content, along with breaking news from multiple news outlets, creating an immersive experience that caters to fans seeking the most up-to-date information on their favorite celebrities.

title: Mashup: Union County Community Mapper
description: A web-based mapping application specifically designed for Union County, North Carolina, leveraging the Union County NC GIS and the Union County GeoData API. This mashup offers users a straightforward interface to explore, analyze, and interact with geospatial data pertaining to Union County. It integrates various layers of geographic information, including land use, infrastructure, and community resources, to provide a comprehensive view of the county's landscape. The application supports real-time data updates and interactive map features, enabling users to perform searches, visualize data overlays, and gain insights into local geography and community assets.

related_apis.title: Union County NC GIS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Framework that allows spatial analysis to be performed on GIS data from Union County, North Carolina, through simple HTTP requests. Methods create and execute spatial queries against a PostGIS database (spatially enabled database). Analysis results depend entirely on user input and response format preference. Sample Community Mapper application uses these services almost exclusively to perform spatial analysis and return relevant results to users.

versions.version_title: Union County NC GIS REST API

title: Mashup: Ratified.org
description: A platform that leverages the Technorati and Feedburner APIs to rank Philippine blogs based on various metrics, providing a comprehensive view of the Philippine blogging landscape.

title: Mashup: Keep Track of My Games
description: A mobile app that utilizes the Twilio and Twilio SMS APIs to help users manage and track their game collections, receive reminders for upcoming games, and stay updated on new releases. The app allows users to store and organize game information, set reminders for specific games, and receive notifications via SMS about new games and updates.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD

This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: Google Apps and Box.net
description: Google Apps and Box.net are integrated to provide a seamless experience for users. This mashup allows Google Apps users to access their Box files directly from Gmail, enabling them to create file-based events in Google Calendar and create Google Sites with content from Box. This integration enhances collaboration and productivity by combining cloud storage with email and calendar functionalities.

related_apis.title: Box API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Box is a modern content management platform that transforms how organizations work and collaborate to achieve results faster.Box Platform provides content APIs to build secure content experiences in custom apps. With Box Platform, organizations can bring content management and collaboration services to their own custom apps or build custom integrations with Box.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

title: Mashup: Jauntlet
description: A travel planning tool that allows users to merge their travel itineraries and maps with popular social media and blogging platforms such as MySpace, Facebook, and Blogger. Users can easily share their travel plans, maps, and experiences with friends and followers in real-time, while also having the ability to save and track their travel routes through these integrated platforms.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

related_apis.title: Blogger API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Blogger Data API allows client applications to view and update Blogger content in the form of Google Data API feeds. Your client application can use the Data API to create new blog posts, edit or delete existing posts, and query for posts that match particular criteria.

title: Mashup: Comprendo
description: A music and lyrics analysis platform that allows users to explore the meanings behind song lyrics, providing interpretations and the ability to share personal insights. The mashup integrates song databases with lyrics and user-generated content, offering a unique way for music enthusiasts to delve into the deeper messages of their favorite songs and engage in discussions with others.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

title: Mashup: How to say
description: A mobile application for Android that leverages the Forvo API to provide users with access to a wide range of pronunciation guides and language learning resources. The mashup combines the power of voice-enabled technology with the extensive language database of Forvo, enabling users to hear accurate pronunciations and learn new words and phrases in a variety of languages.

related_apis.title: Forvo API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Forvo API allows users to integrate the functionality of Forvo into their websites or applications. Forvo is the largest pronunciation guide in the world, the place where you will find millions of words pronounced in their original languages. Ask for that word or name, and another user will pronounce it for you. You can also help others by recording your pronunciations in your own language.
Currently the API allows users to read or listen to word pronounciations with future functionality to include search, languages and standard pronounciations. Possible uses include adding pronunciations for your dictionary or creating a better Google Translate with real human pronunciations. This RESTful API returns responses in either XML, JSON or JS-tag format.

title: Mashup: YouTubede
description: A curated video platform that aggregates and presents YouTube videos in an organized manner. The mashup allows users to browse, search, and watch a wide variety of videos from diverse creators, covering topics ranging from entertainment and education to technology and news. It integrates YouTube's API for content sourcing and provides a user-friendly interface for seamless video discovery and consumption.

title: Mashup: devChirp
description: A developer-focused discovery platform that aggregates and organizes public Twitter profiles of software developers and designers worldwide. The mashup allows users to search and discover top professionals based on their Twitter activity, providing insights into their work, interests, and projects. It acts as a real-time directory for connecting with and learning from industry experts.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: All Information Network
description: A location-aware event discovery mashup that aggregates local event data from Eventful and displays it on Google Maps. Users can search for and view events in their vicinity, facilitating social planning and community engagement. The mashup utilizes Eventful's event database and Google Maps' geolocation services to provide a comprehensive and convenient platform for discovering and engaging with local events.

related_apis.title: Eventful API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Eventful is the world's largest collection of events, taking place in local markets throughout the world, from concerts and sports to singles events and political rallies. Eventful.com is built upon a unique, open platform that enables partners and web applications to leverage Eventful's data, features and functionality via the Eventful API. The Eventful API provides access to the entire site database enabling developers to integrate it and the functionality of the Eventful platform into web applications. Common API tasks include event and venue search. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in either XML, JSON or YAML.

title: Mashup: Courts Of The World
description: A comprehensive online community platform dedicated to streetball players and basketball enthusiasts. The Courts Of The World (COTW) mashup provides an extensive database of basketball courts worldwide, allowing users to easily locate and reserve courts in their vicinity. The platform integrates with geolocation services and social media to create a vibrant and interactive community where users can share experiences, photos, and videos related to their basketball adventures. It also offers a platform for users to connect, organize games, and share tips, fostering a sense of community among basketball lovers globally.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: Google Static Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Static Maps API lets you embed a Google Maps image on your webpage without requiring JavaScript or any dynamic page loading. The Google Static Map service creates your map based on URL parameters sent through a standard HTTP request and returns the map as an image you can display on your web page.

related_apis.title: Google Earth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Earth Engine API allows developers to run algorithms on georeferenced imagery and vectors stored on Google's infrastructure. The Google Earth Engine API provides a library of functions which may be applied to imagery for display and analysis. Earth Engine's public data catalog contains a large amount of publicly available imagery.

related_apis.title: Google Analytics Managment API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Use the Google Analytics Management API to leverage Google's extensive website analytics tools. The API uses GET requests over HTTPS and JSON for requests/returns. Some of the functions available with the API are: List Account, Property and View (Profile) information for a user; manage properties and goals; manage user permissions; and upload cost data to Google Analytics for non-Google paid campaigns. See the extensive documentation for code samples, detailed method descriptions, and more.

title: Mashup: 4sqtransit
description: A mobile messaging service that integrates Foursquare's location-based check-in feature with real-time transit schedule information. Whenever a user checks in at a location near a transit stop, 4sqtransit sends a text message with the latest schedule for the nearest transit options. This service leverages Foursquare's API for location data and integrates with transit schedule APIs to provide accurate, real-time information to users, enhancing their travel experience and convenience.

title: Mashup: Motorola Mobility + DocuSign
description: A mobile electronic signature solution that allows customers to access and sign various types of documents using Motorola devices. Utilizing Motorola's next-generation devices and the Android user experience, DocuSign provides a seamless way to sign documents electronically from any location at any time, enabling secure and efficient document management.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: Takih
description: A powerful search engine that integrates multiple content types such as videos, photos, and maps. Users can input specific keywords to retrieve relevant multimedia content directly, such as searching "youtube susan boyle" to view the YouTube video of Susan Boyle. Additionally, the mashup provides geographical context by displaying maps and photos related to the search query.

title: Mashup: Twitter Earth
description: A geo-spatial data visualization mashup that integrates tweets with Google Earth's 3D globe interface, allowing users to explore and analyze social media data in a geographical context. The mashup leverages the Google Earth plug-in to display tweet locations as markers on the 3D globe, providing a dynamic and interactive way to visualize global conversations and trends. It includes features such as zooming, panning, and filtering tweets based on location and time. This mashup is particularly useful for gaining insights into public opinion and social events across different regions.

title: Mashup: Techweet
description: Techweet is a tech news aggregator that uses natural language processing to identify key topics within each story, such as companies, products, or people. By categorizing news based on these topics, Techweet provides users with a more organized and insightful way to consume tech news. It offers a feature to discover the most trending topics and top stories, enhancing the user experience in staying updated with the latest tech developments.

related_apis.title: Wikipedia API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The unofficial Wikipedia API. Because Wikipedia is built using MediaWiki, which in turn supports an API, Wikipedia does as well. This provides developers code-level access to the entire Wikipedia reference. The goal of this API is to provide direct, high-level access to the data contained in the MediaWiki databases. Client programs can use the API to login, get data, and post changes. The API supports thin web-based JavaScript clients, such as Navigation popups or LiveRC, end-user applications (such as vandal fighter), and can be accessed by another web site (tool server's utilities).
The API uses RESTful calls and supports a wide variety of formats including XML, JSON, PHP, YAML and others.

related_apis.title: Bing API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [The Bing API is now the Bing Web Search API. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Bing API provides an experience similar to Bing.com/search by returning search results that Bing determines are relevant to a user's query. The results include Web pages and may also include images, videos, and more. Free trial keys are available here: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/try/cognitive-services/?api=bing-web-search-api.

title: Mashup: AlgoLint
description: AlgoLint is a versatile, web-based platform designed for algorithm development and practice. It provides a clean, intuitive interface for coding in C/C++, Java, Ruby, and Python, facilitating the creation and execution of algorithms. Users can leverage pre-built code templates to solve complex problems efficiently and save their own templates for future use. Additionally, AlgoLint integrates with Dropbox, enabling seamless synchronization of practice code between the platform and the cloud, thereby enhancing accessibility and collaboration.

related_apis.title: Dropbox API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Dropbox is a storage service that syncs files online and across your computers via installed software. The API allows read/write access to the same files, piggybacking on Dropbox's file synchronization and storage.

title: Mashup: Updated California Solar
description: A dynamic heat map visualizing the distribution of solar power generation in California from 1999 to 2011. Users can interact with the mashup by selecting specific years to observe the changes in solar power deployment over time. This updated version enhances our 2008 version with improved data accuracy and interactivity, making it a valuable tool for understanding the growth of solar energy in California.

title: Mashup: Mobile Bargain Shopping
description: A mobile shopping service that leverages SMS, WAP, and email to provide real-time deals and price comparisons for products. Users can search for bargains by sending a message with the keyword 'bargain' followed by the product name. The service aggregates data from various retailers, allowing users to check if a product is available on sale before purchasing. It optimizes mobile access for an efficient shopping experience.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing API enables developers to embed a flexible and powerful search engine as a custom search component in their sites and applications. Bing API offers open, flexible options for building or enhancing your site or applications. With the API users can search for web content, images, stories and more. Users can also monetize their applications with advertisements. It uses a RESTful protocol with results formatted either in XML or JSON and also provides support for SOAP protocol.

title: Mashup: CoverPop
description: A visually compelling mashup that leverages the Amazon toolkit to merge hundreds of similar product images into an interactive single-page display. Users can engage with the combined images to purchase products directly or can embed the interactive banners on their own websites. The mashup integrates Amazon's product data API, image processing techniques, and interactive web technologies to provide a unique shopping experience.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

title: Mashup: The Recycling Center
description: A comprehensive recycling guide and locator mashup that integrates mapping technology with environmental data to help users find nearby recycling centers and learn about recycling best practices. Users can search for recycling centers by location and access a directory of products and services related to recycling. The mashup also includes a shopping component for eco-friendly products.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: BelizeMapia
description: A mapping service that combines visual representations of attractions in Belize and other Central American cities with interactive YouTube video content. The service enables users to explore and discover points of interest on an interactive map, with the option to click on tabs to access related video content, providing a dynamic and engaging experience for travelers and tourists.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

title: Mashup: Fix it repair guides Playbook
description: A comprehensive repair guide app that aggregates thousands of step-by-step guides for a wide range of devices. Users can easily search and access detailed instructions accompanied by pictures, making it an invaluable tool for DIY enthusiasts and professionals alike. The app's interface allows for quick navigation and seamless integration of guides, enhancing the repair experience.

related_apis.title: iFixit API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The iFixit API provides programmatic access to iFixit enabling anyone to write applications and utilities on top of the repair database. iFixit is the world's largest collection of free photographic repair manuals. The API provides access to iFixit's repair manuals (step-by-step guides and Device namespace pages) and device "area" hierarchy. It does not (yet) provide access to the parts or Answers Q&A database. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are formatted in JSON, JSONP and XML. Underlying XML schema returned in via API is IEEE 1874 (oManual - http://www.omanual.org): learn more about this format at oManual.org. iFixit.com is powered by the Dozuki platform (http://www.dozuki.com), a documentation engine for visual instructions, which features a full-blown API in each implementation.

title: Mashup: Trendsmap - Real-time local Twitter trends
description: A real-time, geospatial visualization tool that analyzes over 5 million tweets per day to identify and track emerging Twitter trends on a global, regional, and city level. By leveraging big data processing and geolocation capabilities, it provides a dynamic map that highlights trending topics, enabling users to monitor the impact of news events as they unfold across different regions and cities around the world.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: What The Trend? API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Find out what's trending on Twitter and why. For each trend, What The Trend provides a quick explanation of why it's trending (these blurbs are edited by users, wiki-style). You can also see the latest tweets, Flickr photos and news stories.

title: Mashup: AbouThiSite
description: AbouThiSite is a comprehensive website analysis tool that provides users with an easy-to-understand overview of any website's key metrics and details. This mashup offers insights into the site's ownership, geographic location, daily visitor statistics, neighboring IP addresses, and other relevant information, making it accessible for both technical and non-technical users.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Alexa Web Information Service API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Alexa Web Information Service makes Alexa's repository of information about the traffic and structure of the web available to developers.

versions.version_title: Alexa Web Information Service RPC API

title: Mashup: World of Warcraft Maps
description: An innovative integration of the Google Maps API with the virtual world of the game 'World of Warcraft'. This mashup allows users to interact with the WoW map using standard Google Map controls such as zoom, pan, and drag. It demonstrates how real-world mapping technologies can be adapted to control non-standard, game-based maps, providing a familiar interface for navigating a virtual environment.
