title: Mashup: Molu - The Search dog
description: Molu is a high-speed vertical meta search engine designed for rapid information retrieval across multiple categories simultaneously. Unlike traditional search engines, Molu does not collect or store user search histories, ensuring privacy. Additionally, it presents direct answers at the top of the search results, enhancing user convenience and efficiency.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Aonaware Dictionary API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Aonaware Dictionary API provides access to dictionary definitions pulled from multiple databases. This API accesses the resources of dict.org to generate results. It uses SOAP protocol and responses are formatted in XML.

related_apis.title: True Knowledge API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: True Knowledge is a new class of Internet search technology aimed at improving the experience of finding known facts on the Web. The True Knowledge Answer Engine gives consumers instant answers to complex questions. Request information on any topic and get back results in a processable form. Early areas of strength include geographic knowledge, local time, and geolocation. Natural language questions can also be processed. View demos at their website.

related_apis.title: Bing API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [The Bing API is now the Bing Web Search API. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Bing API provides an experience similar to Bing.com/search by returning search results that Bing determines are relevant to a user's query. The results include Web pages and may also include images, videos, and more. Free trial keys are available here: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/try/cognitive-services/?api=bing-web-search-api.

title: Mashup: GoTime for iPhone
description: A location-aware calendar event management app that integrates with the iPhone calendar, address book, and GPS to provide real-time travel time estimates and navigation to appointments. The app syncs with your personal calendar and contacts, utilizes your current location to adjust travel time estimates in real-time, and alerts you when it's time to depart for meetings or events. It combines calendar, contact, and GPS data to offer personalized, dynamic travel guidance and reminders.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Google Maps Places API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google Maps Places API is a service that returns information about a "place": an establishment, a geographic location, or prominent point of interest using an HTTP request. Place requests specify locations as latitude/longitude coordinates.
Methods are available for place search, details, photos, and autocomplete queries. The Places API returns mapping data in JSON and XML formats, after making URI requests, and authenticating with API Key.

related_apis.title: Google Geocoding API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Geocoding API is a webservice for the Google Maps API. The Geocoding API provides a direct way to access a geocoder via an HTTP request, though it must be used in conjunction with Google Maps. Additionally, the service allows you to perform the converse operation (turning coordinates into addresses); this process is known as "reverse geocoding." Also, you can choose to limit your search to certain bounded areas (Viewport Biasing) or regions (Region Biasing).

related_apis.title: Google Distance Matrix API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google Distance Matrix API is a service that provides travel distance and time for a matrix of origins and destinations. The information returned is based on the recommended route between start and end points, as calculated by the Google Maps API, and consists of rows containing duration and distance values for each pair.
The Distance Matrix API has the following limits in place: 100 elements per query. 100 elements per 10 seconds. 2500 elements per 24 hour period.
The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in XML and JSON.

title: Mashup: Audio Transcription
description: An accessibility-focused mashup that offers quick and accurate audio transcription services, enabling persons with hearing impairments to access content in electronic format. Transcription Place provides affordable services, transforming audio into text to enhance inclusivity and readability.

related_apis.title: US Yellow Pages API MASTER RECORD

title: Mashup: Sports History Widget
description: A Google Gadget featuring daily historical highlights from professional and major league sports teams. Users can explore the rich history of sports, including teams, players, and significant events, with each day dedicated to a different team from the past or present. This mashup integrates sports history data with interactive Google Gadget technology to provide an engaging and informative user experience.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

title: Mashup: Second Life Weather
description: An interactive weather display widget for the virtual world Second Life. This mashup integrates the Yahoo Weather API to fetch real-time weather data for any specified US zip code or international country code. The data is then dynamically updated to reflect current weather conditions, such as temperature, humidity, and forecast. The widget is designed to be seamlessly integrated into the Second Life environment, providing users with a visually appealing and informative weather display that can be customized and placed within the virtual space.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Travel API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: Yahoo! Travel is also launching API access to trip planner data through a REST-like interface. With the Yahoo! Travel Trip Plan APIs you can search for trip plans by Yahoo! ID or by search query, or retrieve a specific trip plan by ID.
The Yahoo! Travel Trip Plan APIs have been designed to operate just like the Yahoo! Search APIs, so if you've already written code for Yahoo! Search you can start using Travel almost immediately with only minor modifications. And just like Yahoo! Search, the Yahoo! Travel APIs support both XML and JSON output.

related_apis.title: SecondLife API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Second Life is a 3-D virtual world entirely built and owned by its residents. Since opening to the public in 2003, it has grown explosively and today is inhabited by nearly 100,000 people from around the globe. The Second Life Webmap API allows you to embed Second Life Maps onto your web pages. Note: A JavaScript model similar to Google and other map APIs.

title: Mashup: Where a Bill becomes a Law
description: An interactive and educational tool that tracks the progress of U.S. legislation in real-time, using mapping technology to show the physical locations of each stage of the legislative process. This mashup provides a visual and engaging way for users to understand how bills become laws, with detailed information on the status of legislation at various points along the decision-making journey, including committee hearings, floor debates, and voting sessions. It combines legislative data from official sources with mapping APIs to create an accessible and informative experience for both educators and the general public.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. title: Mashup: Click2Map
description: A web-based tool that enables users to generate custom Google Maps by adding personalized points of interest without the need for programming knowledge. The mashup simplifies the process of creating interactive maps by leveraging the Google Maps API to allow users to easily add, edit, and share map content. It is particularly useful for individuals and small businesses looking to create visually engaging maps for various purposes such as tourism, event planning, or real estate marketing.

title: Mashup: YouTorials
description: YouTorials is a comprehensive platform that aggregates free video tutorials from YouTube, offering users a wide range of educational content, from basic skills like solving a Rubik's cube to more advanced topics such as break-dancing. The mashup provides an intuitive search feature that allows users to discover and access these videos easily. Additionally, users have the capability to upload their own instructional videos, fostering a community of shared knowledge. Subscriptions via RSS are available, enabling users to stay updated on new tutorials as they are added.

title: Mashup: Agumbo
description: An e-commerce search application that utilizes the Commission Junction network to offer users the ability to search for and compare popular products from various retailers. The mashup integrates with Commission Junction's API to provide real-time product information, pricing, and availability. It serves as a comprehensive platform for users to find and compare products across multiple online marketplaces, enhancing the shopping experience through seamless integration and access to extensive product data.

related_apis.title: Commission Junction API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Commission Detail Service is a REST-based API that enables advertisers and publishers to access real-time commission and item-detail data. Advertisers and publishers that wish to receive commission reporting updates in near real-time or to request new commission data on a regular basis can use this API to create in-house tools that access real-time commission data from the CJ network. Developers may search by any number of criteria including price, currency, country, serviceable area and UPC. A SOAP API is also available but will eventually be deprecated.

title: Mashup: Pennsylvania Wines
description: An interactive mashup that utilizes Google Maps to provide a comprehensive guide to wineries located in Pennsylvania. Users can explore the map to discover and learn about various wineries, enhancing their knowledge and planning for potential visits. This mashup combines tourism with a localized focus on Pennsylvania's wine industry, providing a unique and user-friendly experience.

related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Journamatic
description: A comprehensive social media journaling service that automates the creation of daily journals from your social media activities. By connecting your social media accounts, Journamatic can compile a full day's worth of updates, including check-ins, photos, tweets, and status updates, into a single, cohesive journal. This mashup simplifies the process of tracking and documenting personal or professional activities, providing a convenient way to view and share a summary of your day's social interactions. It leverages APIs from various social media platforms to ensure the seamless integration and automatic updating of your daily journal.

This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Tumblr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Tumblr API allows users to read and write Tumblr blog and post data, retrieve posts by tags, get user information, follow blogs and like posts. Data is formatted in JSON and support for JSONP is included.

related_apis.title: GetGlue API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
GetGlue is a social networking service where users "check-in" to share what movies, videos, or TV shows they are watching, what they are listening to, and what they are reading with their friends.
The GetGlue API allows users to access GetGlue's information and functionality to create new applications. Some example API methods include checking in, liking or disliking an object, accessing user information, searching by categories and more, and adding friends to the user's network.

related_apis.title: Foursquare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Foursquare Places API provides location based experiences with diverse information about venues, users, photos, and check-ins. The API supports real time access to places, Snap-to-Place that assigns users to specific locations, and Geo-tag. Additionally, Foursquare allows developers to build audience segments for analysis and measurement. JSON is the preferred response format.

related_apis.title: Miso API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Miso platform lets people share what they are watching on TV in a fun and easy way. Miso's REST API enables developers to access relevant information in real time about shows, movies, users, checkins and more from their consumer website or mobile application. The Miso APIv1 gives you access to all of the data used by the Miso mobile application, such as the user, follower, media, and checkin information.
Miso is now out of private beta, and launched publicly. The API is still in an experimental stage, although the interactions and authentication mechanisms have been tested both through automated and manual procedures.

related_apis.title: Instagram Graph API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Instagram is a photo sharing iPhone app and service. Users take photos and can share them with Instagram contacts, as well as friends on other social networks like Twitter and Facebook. The Instagram API provides access to user authentication, friend connections, photos and all the other elements of the iPhone app--including uploading new media.

related_apis.title: PicPlz API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Photo sharing mobile application picplz has a new API that has entered beta. The service provides read/write access to the picplz platform for sharing and editing photos. Developers can upload photos and use filter effects including "Instant Film," "Russian Toy Camera," "the 70s" and "High Contrast Monochrome." The API also provides read access to others' photos. Like its mobile apps, the API likely lets you add a caption and tag your location.

title: Mashup: API discovery with Scheme
description: A demonstration of using Scheme programming language for interacting with web APIs, specifically showcasing its capabilities through integration with the PDX Council Connect API. This mashup highlights how Scheme's functional programming paradigm can be effectively used for API discovery and manipulation, providing developers with a unique approach to API-driven development.

related_apis.title: PDXCouncilConnect API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
PDXCouncilConnect is a service of the Portland, Oregon, eGovPDX group. The city technology department makes the API available to access city council agenda and voting information. The PDXCouncilConnect API provides developers access to agenda, session, and item information. The data includes the location and time, as well as bureaus affected. When a vote occurs, the API also will return voting information.
This government API has a RESTful interface and provides data as JSON.

title: Mashup: Environmental Mining Claims
description: An interactive mapping mashup that showcases satellite imagery of mining impacts on the environment, as well as the potential future locations of mining activities. Utilizing satellite imagery API and interactive map interfaces, the mashup provides a visual representation of existing mining sites and their environmental impact, as well as predictive mapping of future mining locations. This tool is designed to raise awareness about the environmental consequences of mining and to facilitate informed decision-making in the realm of environmental protection and resource management.

title: Mashup: Twilleetio
description: A personal branding application that integrates Twilio's telephony API with Twitter's social media platform and Django's web framework. Users can call Twilleetio using their phone to record and upload short audio segments which are then automatically tweeted by the @Twilleetio Twitter account, providing an innovative way to share content and interact with followers through both voice and social media.

related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: Giddi
description: Giddi is a product-rating engine that aggregates product data from various sources, including web crawlers and APIs, to build a comprehensive database of over 600,000 products and more than 1.6 million reviews. This data is then processed through a proprietary algorithm to generate detailed, proprietary ratings for each product. The service is designed for eCommerce and search applications, providing users with a valuable resource for making informed purchasing decisions by offering unbiased, algorithmically-generated product ratings.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

related_apis.title: Shopping.com API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API has been acquired by eBay and now exists as eBay Commerce Network. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]With the Shopping.com API you can integrate relevant product content with the deepest product catalog available online. Add millions of unique products and merchant offers to your site. Shopping.com, an eBay company, is the world's online comparison shopping service leader. Its global websites (Shopping.com, DealTime, and DoorOne) carry one of the world's largest product catalogs and offers from more than 6000 merchants.
The Shopping.com XML API uses a RESTful interface and can be used to feature dynamic Shopping.com content on your web pages. It offers capabilities such as keyword search, refining and sorting search results, finding product reviews, reading product specs, comparing products and prices from different merchants and controlling the number of results and navigating between pages.

title: Mashup: MSN Restaurant Finder
description: A comprehensive restaurant search and discovery platform that leverages the MenuMania API to provide detailed information about New Zealand restaurants, including menus, reviews, and location-based search capabilities. The mashup integrates the MenuMania API with MSN.co.nz to offer users a seamless experience in finding and exploring restaurants in their area.

title: Mashup: Digg City
description: A real-time visualization mashup for popular news stories, integrating the Digg API. Digg City displays the 10 newest popular stories, with building heights representing story popularity. As a story gains popularity, its corresponding building grows taller. Each new 'dig' adds a stick figure representation of the user who dug the story, which then appears inside the building, creating a dynamic and engaging visual representation of user engagement and story popularity.

title: Mashup: gReactions
description: A Firefox extension that allows users to view comments and reactions to posts from various sources directly within Google Reader. It leverages the ContextVoice API to aggregate and display content from different platforms, enabling a comprehensive browsing experience for social interactions.

related_apis.title: Context Voice API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Context Voice gets comments, twitts, digg comments etc for an URL (to a blog post, picture or video). You pass it an URL and pull reactions using a RESTful API.

title: Mashup: CD Collection Browser
description: A music collection browser that allows users to search and browse their CD collection online. The mashup integrates music metadata from various sources to provide a comprehensive view of the user's CD collection, including album covers, track listings, and artist information. It supports searching by artist, album, and genre, and provides links to streaming services for users to listen to their favorite songs.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

related_apis.title: MusicBrainz API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The MusicBrainz database contains a huge amount of music metadata, which is maintained by the MusicBrainz community. Find information about artists, albums, tracks and labels. Mash the data with your web app, media player, CD ripper, tagger or other applications requiring music metadata. The service's architecture follows the REST design principles. Interaction with the web service is done using HTTP and all content is served in a simple but flexible XML format.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

related_apis.title: iTunes and iTunes Connect API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: A simple REST web service to access the iTunes App Store and iTunes Connect data. Get information about apps, reviews, ratings, ranking, iTunes Connect sales data and more.

versions.version_title: iTunes and iTunes Connect REST API

title: Mashup: YouLyrics
description: YouLyrics is a website that combines the features of Youtube and ChartLyrics to provide users with a simple way to view their favorite songs' videos alongside the lyrics. It also offers a surprise element by displaying real-time search results based on the current viewership of the videos. This mashup enhances the user experience by integrating multimedia content with lyrics, creating an engaging and interactive platform for music enthusiasts.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: ChartLyrics Lyric API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: ChartLyrics is a lyrics database sorted by artists or songs. The Lyric API uses either a SOAP or REST interface to allow users and developers to access the database. The API provides 2 functions. SearchLyric to search the available lyrics and GetLyric to retrieve the lyric.

title: Mashup: Get Directions
description: The Get Directions mashup is a robust navigation solution that integrates the mapping services of Google Maps and Bing Maps to offer users precise route planning capabilities. Users can specify their origin and destination, whether these are cities or specific landmarks, and the tool will accurately calculate the distance between them, providing clear directions for travel. Additionally, the tool includes a comprehensive database of cities and places, enabling users to explore and plan their journeys more effectively. This mashup is ideal for travelers and commuters looking for reliable, up-to-date route information.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Bing Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Bing Maps REST Services is a REST API that allows you to perform tasks like finding an address, retrieving a map with a pushpin and a label, or getting driving directions. It provides a way to create a static map with pushpins, geocoding an address, retrieving imagery metadata, or creating a route etc. Microsoft Bing is a web search engine.

title: Mashup: MapRuta.com
description: MapRuta.com is a travel planning tool that utilizes the Google Maps API to calculate and display the fastest route with multiple stops between various destinations. Users can input their starting point and a series of waypoints or final destination, and the mashup will generate an optimized route considering factors such as traffic, road conditions, and travel time. This tool is particularly useful for planning road trips, business travel, or any journey involving multiple stops. It provides real-time traffic updates and allows users to customize their route preferences for the most efficient travel experience.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Rent Compass for Android
description: A mobile app for Android that combines mapping, search, and real estate data to help users find apartments and houses for rent in Canada. The mashup allows users to explore neighborhoods while walking or commuting, search for rentals based on location, contact landlords directly through the app, and share rental listings on social media platforms like Facebook and Twitter. The app leverages geolocation capabilities to provide targeted rental listings and integrates with real estate databases to ensure accurate and up-to-date information. Users can easily access rental listings, contact landlords, and share rentals with friends and family through the app's intuitive interface.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Diccionarios Elhuyar
description: A comprehensive Basque language development tool that offers an integrated language service focusing on customer language needs, providing accurate translations and dictionary functionalities.

related_apis.title: Forvo API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Forvo API allows users to integrate the functionality of Forvo into their websites or applications. Forvo is the largest pronunciation guide in the world, the place where you will find millions of words pronounced in their original languages. Ask for that word or name, and another user will pronounce it for you. You can also help others by recording your pronunciations in your own language.
Currently the API allows users to read or listen to word pronounciations with future functionality to include search, languages and standard pronounciations. Possible uses include adding pronunciations for your dictionary or creating a better Google Translate with real human pronunciations. This RESTful API returns responses in either XML, JSON or JS-tag format.

title: Mashup: Classifieds on a Map
description: A location-based classifieds listing service that combines classifieds data from Windows Live Expo with geocoding provided by Yahoo. Users can view classifieds listings relevant to their zip code on an interactive map interface using Google Maps. The mashup integrates classifieds data with geolocation services to enable users to search and browse classifieds listings based on their geographic location.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: AuctionSound
description: AuctionSound is a comprehensive management tool designed specifically for eBay Trading Assistants. It provides an integrated platform for handling all facets of the consignment business, including customer relationship management, automated listing processes, customizable auction templates, secure image hosting, streamlined shipping solutions, and detailed financial reporting. The mashup aims to centralize these operations, enhancing efficiency and productivity for professionals dealing with eBay auctions.

related_apis.title: PayPal API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: PayPal offers online payment solutions and has more than 153 million customers worldwide. The PayPal API makes powerful functionality available to developers by exposing various features of the PayPal platform. Functionality includes but is not limited to invoice management, transaction processing and account management.

related_apis.title: FedEx API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: FedEx web services allow businesses to integrate FedEx shipping functionality into their existing warehouse management systems without hosting on-site.Developers can access the FedEx API via SOAP or HTTP POST transactions. The following functionality is available: Rate Services, Service Availability, Tracking and Visibility, FedEx Locator. Further services are available but require the completion of a certification process.

related_apis.title: del.icio.us API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: del.icio.us is a social bookmarking website -- the primary use of del.icio.us is to store your bookmarks online, which allows you to access the same bookmarks from any computer and add bookmarks from anywhere, too. On del.icio.us, you can use tags to organize and remember your bookmarks, which is a much more flexible system than folders.
The API provides read/write access to Delicious bookmarks and tags via an HTTP-based interface. The RESTful API returns responses in XML.

related_apis.title: UPS Shipping API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The UPS Shipping API provides UPS shipping functionalities to be integrated into websites and enterprise applications. This API enables the networking of shipping activities at different locations, dealers, and offices. Business customers will be able to utilize the breadth of UPS services and capabilities.
This API is available in XML format which allows the flexibility to integrate into website and application design and layout.

related_apis.title: USPS Track/Confirm Fields API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The USPS Track/Confirm Fields API allows developers to get detail and summary information for a shipment broken down by fields. Developers can include up to 10 tracking IDs in each request.This API is part of the USPS Web Tools API library which provides access to USPS data free of charge.

versions.version_title: USPS Track/Confirm Fields REST API v3.6

related_apis.title: Basecamp API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From 37signals. Basecamp is a unique project collaboration tool. Projects don't fail from a lack of charts, graphs, or reports, they fail from a lack of communication and collaboration. Basecamp makes it simple to communicate and collaborate on projects. The Basecamp API is implemented as vanilla XML over HTTP.

related_apis.title: Google AdSense API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google AdSense API is ideal for developers whose users create their own content through blogging, web publishing, forum/wiki/community creation, or any other application where substantial web content is generated.
Using the AdSense API, developers can let users sign up for AdSense through their site or program, generate detailed performance reports for users, and choose how the AdSense revenue is shared with our revenue sharing program. Additionally users can create accounts to store publisher website information, then generate ad code snippets and filter out unwanted ads.
A previous SOAP version has been deprecated in favor of REST with responses formatted as JSON.

related_apis.title: Blinksale API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Blinksale is a web application that allows professionals and small businesses to send invoices on the Web. Users can create invoices from a template or choose to customize the design. The API allows developers to integrate Blinksale to work with other applications in thier business workflow. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in XML.

title: Mashup: Jammap iPhone
description: Jammap iPhone is a location-based mobile application designed for iOS devices such as iPhone and iPad. It provides users with access to a wide range of creative commons licensed music from Jamendo. By using the built-in map feature, users can easily navigate to different countries and explore available albums. Once an album is selected, the application streams the music directly, allowing users to enjoy a seamless listening experience. This mashup combines music streaming capabilities with geographical data, enabling users to discover new sounds and artists based on their current location or desired region.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Jamendo API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Jamendo API offers users and developers access to Jamendo's database of albums, artists, tracks, playlists, reviews, and more. The API can be used through a RESTful protocol, and data is returned in formats ranging from XML to JSON to others. Signup is required at devportal.jamendo.com

title: Mashup: Bitcoin Ego
description: A comprehensive platform that aggregates real-time data on Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, providing users with up-to-the-minute market trends, historical performance, and portfolio analysis. The mashup integrates multiple blockchain data sources to offer detailed insights into the cryptocurrency market, including current prices, trading volumes, and market capitalizations. Users can also track their investments through customizable dashboards and receive notifications on significant market movements.

related_apis.title: Bitcoin Charts / Markets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Provides financial and technical data related to the Bitcoin network, including market activity, both current and historic, and weighted prices for several world currencies for use in pricing goods in terms of Bitcoin. Bitcoincharts provides a simple API to most of its data; developers can integrate the data into their websites or applications.

related_apis.title: CryptoCoin Charts API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: CryptoCoin Charts provides charts on the long-time prices of altcoins (i.e. cryptocurrencies other than Bitcoin) along with an order book. There are a lot of altcoins available, and CryptoCoin Charts is intended to help users identify ones worth investing in. CryptoCoin Charts currently stores over 50 million trades for 263 currency pairs, collected from 27 different exchanges. Developers can access some of this information via REST calls.

title: Mashup: TagTV
description: An interactive interface that enables users to search for Flickr photos and YouTube videos by tag using Flash technology. The mashup was initially developed by Ted Patrick for an Adobe Flex demo at Mashup University. Users can easily browse through and view search results in a visually engaging and interactive manner.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: Break The Ice For Me
description: A messaging service that provides users with SMS-based ice breakers (conversation starters) to help initiate and engage in social conversations, promoting social interactions and enhancing social skills in various settings.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: Mist.io
description: Mist.io is a cloud server management platform that aggregates and unifies the monitoring, analytics, and security of a user's cloud servers into a single, unified interface accessible via web, tablet, and mobile devices. The platform supports a wide range of cloud providers, including Amazon Web Services, Rackspace, DigitalOcean, and Google Cloud Platform, among others, leveraging their respective APIs. Users can monitor server status and activity in real-time, view detailed analytics with built-in visualization tools, manage servers and accounts, and apply robust security measures directly from the Mist.io web interface. The primary functionality relies on the Mist.io core API, which facilitates seamless integration across various cloud service providers, enabling comprehensive oversight and management of cloud infrastructure.

related_apis.title: Mist.io API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Mist.io aggregates a user's cloud servers to help them monitor status and activity with a single unified interface. Mist.io displays real time analytics and visualizations of system metrics, and offers the ability to create, manage, and edit existing servers and accounts with quality security measures. The service is compatible with Amazon Web Services, Rackspace, DigitalOcean, Google Cloud Platform, and additional major server providers. Aside from their mobile & web interfaces, developers may also extend site functionalities into 3rd party applications via the Mist.io RESTful API.

related_apis.title: Amazon S3 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Since 2006 Amazon Web Services has been offering web services commonly known as cloud computing. AWS Provides a reliable, low cost infrastructure platform that powers hundreds of thousands of businesses.
Amazon S3 API, the Simple Storage Service provides a simple web services interface used to store objects using the Amazon online storage infrastructure. Users can then download the data or use the data with other AWS services, such as Amazon Elastic Cloud Computer (EC2). Using this web service, developers can build applications that make use of Internet storage.
The API uses Buckets, Objects, Keys and Operations. An object has four parts: value, key, metadata, and an access control policy. Objects are stored in buckets. The API is REST based. Responses are formatted in JSON.

related_apis.title: Rackspace Cloud Servers API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Rackspace Cloud Servers is a cloud based platform of on demand virtualized servers. The API can be used to interact with the Cloud Servers instead of using the online control panel. Features of the API include the ability to reboot and rebuild servers, create custom images, schedule backups of servers, share IPs and more. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in XML and JSON.

related_apis.title: DigitalOcean API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DigitalOcean provides a simple, cloud based virtual server (droplet) service. With over 13,000 cloud servers currently in operation, DigitalOcean is a well-established provider of online storage solutions with fast, realtime control. With a streamlined interface, users are able to create and start utilizing a virtual server in under a minute.
The API provides all the same services as the web control panel to allow full control over your Droplet virtual servers. Using a simple, REST interface you can make calls for: shutting down, power cycling your virtual server, show all active droplets, take a snapshot, rebuild your droplet, and more. The API supports all major droplet functions allowing you to effectively run your server through the API.

related_apis.title: SoftLayer API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: Our optional server management API was developed in-house at SoftLayer Technologies to give our customers the choice of taking control of their hosted servers using any program capable of handling the XML-based SOAP network protocol. This API may be used in tandem with our management portal, in lieu of it, or not at all.

related_apis.title: Nephoscale API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The service provides remote, cloud-based application hosting and data storage under Windows and Linux servers. It includes full controls for provisioning and removing functions within a customer's hosted infrastructure as well as managing currently active functions. Examples include defining storage structure within purchased storage space, installation of applications and utilities, and configuration of security and other access restrictions.
API methods support using all of products and services offered by the platform, including server definition and configuration, containers and objects within storage space, and a proprietary "CloudScript" language for managing infrastructure as a service (IAAS) resources.

related_apis.title: Linode API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Linode API lets you programmatically manipulate Linode Manager for virtual hosting. More features coming, such as provisioning, statistics, reboots, and deploying.

related_apis.title: OpenStack API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: OpenStack is an open source cloud computing platform for public and private clouds. The Keystone Identity Service allows clients to obtain tokens that can be used to access OpenStack cloud services. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in XML and JSON.

related_apis.title: Google Cloud SQL API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Google Cloud SQL provides a cloud-based MySQL database that is recommended for small- and medium-sized applications. It offers the same abilities and functions as MySQL along with some additional features. The RESTful Google Cloud SQL API provides methods for working with instances and retrieving information. The API can be used to create, delete, restart, and restore instances as well as import and export databases. Users can also get information on instances and backup runs along with lists of project instances and available tiers of service.

related_apis.title: Google Cloud DNS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Google offers access to a Domain Name System (DNS) management service utilizing Google's global infrastructure of name servers. The Google Cloud DNS API allows developers to store and look up IP addresses, and to offer services and applications without purchasing additional DNS servers and software.

title: Mashup: MiserlyMonkey.com
description: A comprehensive shopping comparison platform that integrates Amazon's product databases with additional sources, offering users the ability to search for products, view detailed information, and compare prices across multiple retailers. The mashup leverages Google Maps API to provide location-based search capabilities, allowing users to find nearby stores that carry the desired products. It combines multiple data sources and APIs to deliver a seamless shopping experience with real-time product information and price comparisons.

related_apis.title: Amazon Product Advertising API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: What was formerly the ECS - eCommerce Service - has been renamed the Product Advertising API. Through this API developers can retrieve product information. The API exposes Amazon's product data and e-commerce functionality. This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. Both REST and SOAP APIs are provided, this profile is for the REST API.

versions.version_title: Amazon Product Advertising REST API v1.0
Amazon Product Advertising REST API v5.0

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Google Campus Map Development
description: A video tutorial on developing a campus map using Google Maps API, presented by ThinkWrap. This detailed guide covers the step-by-step process of integrating Google Maps with campus-specific data to create an interactive and user-friendly map for educational institutions. The tutorial includes topics such as geocoding, map overlays, and custom markers, providing a comprehensive resource for educators and developers looking to enhance campus navigation and wayfinding capabilities.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Kent County Council Traffic
description: The Kent County Council Traffic mashup provides real-time information on road traffic conditions in the UK, focusing on the Kent region. It incorporates live camera feeds to visualize traffic flow and congestion levels, allowing users to make informed decisions about their travel routes. The mashup leverages geolocation services to deliver localized traffic data and integrates with transportation APIs for up-to-date traffic status updates. It is primarily aimed at motorists, commuters, and transportation professionals in the UK, particularly in the Kent area, providing them with essential information to navigate the roads effectively.

related_apis.title: Multimap API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: One-stop service for global AJAX mapping, routing, geocoding, searching and POI from Europeï¿½s #1 provider of mapping and location services to consumers and businesses.

title: Mashup: Yaktrak
description: A service that tracks FedEx package delivery in real-time, providing detailed CO2 emissions estimates for each segment of the journey. This mashup integrates shipping logistics data with environmental impact calculations to offer users a transparent view of their shipping choices' ecological footprint.

related_apis.title: FedEx API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: FedEx web services allow businesses to integrate FedEx shipping functionality into their existing warehouse management systems without hosting on-site.Developers can access the FedEx API via SOAP or HTTP POST transactions. The following functionality is available: Rate Services, Service Availability, Tracking and Visibility, FedEx Locator. Further services are available but require the completion of a certification process.

related_apis.title: Brighter Planet CM1 API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: This web service, part of Brighter Planet's carbon middleware suite, enables developers to build flexible, real-time carbon footprint estimates from sources such as cars, flights, and houses into business applications. Brighter Planet delivers cloud-based web services providing on-demand carbon information for a fraction of a cent per query, meant for enhancing existing operational data with environmental intelligence that matters. The emission calculation service provides greenhouse gas emission estimates for a variety of emitters of arbitrary description. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses can be formatted in XML and JSON.

title: Mashup: IMWhiteboard
description: A plugin for AOL Instant Messenger (AIM) that facilitates real-time collaboration and creativity by allowing users to draw synchronously with their contacts. This feature is ideal for sharing ideas, brainstorming, or simply having fun with friends. Users can save their drawings, use them as wallpaper, or share them further with other individuals.

title: Mashup: Lematizador.com
description: Lematizador.com is a Spanish language tool powered by the Lemmatisation API on Apicultur.com. It provides users the ability to find the lemma, or canonical form, of any Spanish word, along with its corresponding grammatical category. This tool simplifies the process of understanding and working with Spanish words by offering quick access to their base forms and grammatical details, making it useful for linguists, language learners, and developers working with Spanish text data.

related_apis.title: Apicultur Word Lemmatizer API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Apicultur is a platform for APIs. The Apicultur APIs are primarily linguistic APIs to process and analyze texts and words. The word lemmatizer API uses the lematiza-clasico method which gives users all the lemmas of a word that has been entered and their part of speech (including both the traditional part of speech as well as our own classification from Molino de Ideas). The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON.

title: Mashup: FindBoo
description: An all-inclusive multimedia search and entertainment platform that streamlines access to various online video platforms, live music radio stations, and free online games. By consolidating these services into a single interface, users can browse, search, and enjoy content without the need to navigate between different websites or apps. The platform offers a user-friendly experience with one-click playback capabilities, enabling seamless access to diverse media content.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

related_apis.title: Last.fm API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Last.fm API gives users the ability to build programs using Last.fm data, whether on the web, the desktop or mobile devices. The RESTful API allows for read and write access to the full slate of last.fm music data resources - albums, artists, playlists, events, users, and more. It allows users to call methods that respond in either XML or JSON.

title: Mashup: Formula One Grand Prix Circuit
description: A mashup that visualizes and analyzes historical Formula One Grand Prix Circuits from 1950 to 2007. This tool integrates a map service with a comprehensive database of Formula One circuits, allowing users to explore circuit layouts, view race results, and track historical trends. It targets Formula One enthusiasts, racers, and professionals in the auto and sports industries. The service requires a stable internet connection and is not location-specific. It provides static data, with no real-time tracking features.

title: Mashup: Map of deprivation in Wales
description: An interactive map visualizing the Welsh Index of Multiple Deprivation (WIMD) for the year 2011, utilizing Google Fusion Tables for data management and D3.js for dynamic data visualization. The mashup integrates data from the Welsh Government to provide a comprehensive view of deprivation across different regions of Wales, allowing users to explore and analyze the socioeconomic indicators that contribute to deprivation. This mashup serves as a valuable tool for policymakers, researchers, and the general public interested in understanding the distribution of deprivation in Wales.

related_apis.title: Google Fusion Tables API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Google Fusion Tables is a free service for sharing and visualizing data online. It lets you upload data, share and mark up your data with collaborators, merge data from multiple tables, and create visualizations such as charts and maps. The API lets you update and query your dataset in Fusion Tables programmatically. The API lets you import data from other data sources, whether a text file or a full database.

title: Mashup: Google Map Atlas
description: Google Map Atlas is an interactive world atlas that integrates Google Maps API with satellite imagery to provide a dynamic view of geographical features such as mountains, rivers, and cities across the globe. Users can explore detailed maps and high-resolution earth images categorized by various place types, offering an immersive and educational experience.

related_apis.description: [Editor's Note: Per provider, this API will be deprecated in January 2019. Developers are encouraged to migrate to the Google Photos Library API]From their site: The Picasa Web Albums data API allows client applications to view and update Picasa Web Albums content in the form of Google data API GData feeds. Your client application can request a list of user albums, photos, comments, or tags, edit or delete content in an existing entry, and query the content in an existing entry.

related_apis.title: Google Earth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Earth Engine API allows developers to run algorithms on georeferenced imagery and vectors stored on Google's infrastructure. The Google Earth Engine API provides a library of functions which may be applied to imagery for display and analysis. Earth Engine's public data catalog contains a large amount of publicly available imagery.

title: Mashup: TweetScribe
description: Creates custom RSS feeds based on Twitter searches, allowing users to receive regular updates on specific topics rather than individual accounts. This mashup integrates the Twitter API with RSS feed generation, enabling real-time topic-based updates without the need to follow or monitor individual users.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: Google Hot Trends + Twitter + Google Maps
description: A dynamic, location-based mashup that combines real-time data from Google Hot Trends, Twitter, and Google Maps to provide users with an interactive map displaying trending topics and related tweets across various locations. The mashup integrates Google's trending keyword data with Twitter's live tweet stream, geotagging the tweets on a map for visual representation of trending topics in different regions. Users can interact with the map to explore what's trending in specific areas, enhancing the context of social media conversations with geographical insights.

title: Mashup: dumpr.net
description: An online platform that integrates Flickr's image manipulation tools with a community-based photo search engine to enable users to find, edit, and manipulate images. Additionally, the mashup offers a service for custom print-on-demand products including t-shirts, mugs, and stickers, allowing users to turn their edited images into tangible items. It combines social image sharing with e-commerce capabilities for personalized product creation.

related_apis.title: Flickr API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Flickr API can be used to retrieve photos from the Flickr photo sharing service using a variety of feeds - public photos and videos, favorites, friends, group pools, discussions, and more. The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: del.icio.us API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
From their site: del.icio.us is a social bookmarking website -- the primary use of del.icio.us is to store your bookmarks online, which allows you to access the same bookmarks from any computer and add bookmarks from anywhere, too. On del.icio.us, you can use tags to organize and remember your bookmarks, which is a much more flexible system than folders.
The API provides read/write access to Delicious bookmarks and tags via an HTTP-based interface. The RESTful API returns responses in XML.

related_apis.title: Cafe Press API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Allows developers to make queries and run searches against Cafe Press' store and product database.

title: Mashup: GlobAround
description: GlobAround is a desktop mashup that leverages the APIs from Booli and Nestoria to provide users with a comprehensive platform for searching free classified ads from around the world. It also includes dedicated sections for job listings and real estate search. The mashup integrates multiple data sources to offer a one-stop solution for users interested in finding free items, exploring job opportunities, and searching for real estate properties.

related_apis.title: booli API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Booli is a Swedish real estate search portal. The booli API allows developers to connect programmatically with boolis data. The API is RESTful and returns JSON formatted data.

related_apis.title: Nestoria API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Nestoria is a vertical search engine for property in the UK and Spain. The site offers an API to their database of geocoded properties.

title: Mashup: WishGenies
description: A personalized gift recommendation service that leverages social network analysis to suggest gifts for individuals on your shopping list. By integrating social media data and user preferences, WishGenies provides tailored gift ideas based on the interests and likes of the intended recipient. The service enhances the gift-giving experience by offering a curated selection of products that align with the recipient's tastes and preferences, ensuring a more meaningful and appreciated gift.

This allows developers, web site publishers and others to leverage the Amazon Product Discovery features that Amazon uses to power its own business, and potentially make money as an Amazon affiliate. Additionally, the API has features allowing developers to advertise proucts, let users search for Amazon products and help users discover Amazon products. related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

title: Mashup: Real Ale Hunter
description: A comprehensive, interactive guide to British pubs specializing in real ale. The mashup provides users with detailed information on real ale-serving establishments across England, including user-generated reviews, visit logs, photo galleries, and an active forum for discussion. It integrates mapping services to highlight pub locations, making it easier for enthusiasts to plan their pub crawls and discover new real ale drinking spots.

The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: Your Zodiac Sign, Health and Yoga
description: This Facebook app combines astrology with health and fitness, focusing on how your zodiac sign influences your mental and physical well-being. It provides personalized health and yoga recommendations based on your sun sign, helping you to explore the connection between your horoscope, your mind, and your body.
