With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

related_apis.title: Google App Engine API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
[This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Google App Engine Admin, Google App Engine Task Queue, Google Cloud App Engine Tasks, Google App Engine Admin RPC. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]
Use the Google App Engine platform to run web apps on Google's infrastructure, the same scalable systems that run Google applications. Use the platform to run your apps reliably, even if you have heavy load and data needs. The environment has dynamic web serving, persistent storage with queries, sorting and transactions, automatic scaling and load balancing, APIs for authenticating users and sending email using Google Accounts, and a local testing environment.

title: Mashup: Realestate news in Real Time
description: A real-time news aggregator that combines property listings data from Trulia, social media updates from Twitter, and market insights from Zillow to provide users with the latest real estate news and trends. The mashup collects and integrates data from these sources to deliver a comprehensive view of the real estate market in real time. It is designed for real estate professionals, investors, and home buyers looking to stay up-to-date with the latest developments in the real estate sector.

related_apis.title: Zillow API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Zillow API Network turns member sites into mini real estate portals by offering fresh and provocative real estate and mortgage content to keep people coming back. There are four categories of APIs. 1) Home Valuation API: Search results list, Zestimate™ home valuations, home valuation charts, comparable houses, and market trend charts. 2) Property Details API: Property-level data, including historical sales price and year, taxes, beds/baths, etc. 3) City and neighborhood market statistics and demographic data4) Mortgage rates and monthly payment estimates

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: ProntoScreen
description: ProntoScreen is a comprehensive background check service that provides efficient access to extensive criminal records data through its proprietary database and integration with various public sources. It offers a range of search solutions tailored to meet diverse needs, including instant background checks that search through court records, incarceration records, prison records, and probation & parole release information. This powerful, user-friendly platform enhances security and compliance across various sectors such as banking and criminal justice.

related_apis.title: IMSAS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: IMSAS LLC is a leading provider of Web Service solutions across a range of background screening data, MVR records, income and medical license verifications. IMSAS products are delivered using XML based languages to ensure cross-platform compatibility. The suite of search APIs give users access to data with a range of search solutions that meet the varying needs of your software applications. The IMSAS criminal records database alone contains more than 400 million records. The accessible data includes criminal records, SSN screening, sex offender records and tenant background screening. The APIs uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in XML.

title: Mashup: Patent and Application Relationship Timeline (PART)
description:
PART is a dynamic, interactive mashup that generates a live timeline depicting the relationships between a patent ID, patents it cites, and those that cite it. It also provides a comprehensive table that aggregates and displays applicants that frequently appear in these relationships. Clicking on any entry in the table either opens the source document or initiates a new visualization based on the cited or citing application or patent.
This mashup is a rudimentary prototype that utilizes 'screen scraping' techniques, implemented in PHP 7, to extract data from Google Patents. The extracted data is then formatted into a timeline that users can engage with directly. It has been tested and is compatible with the Google Chrome browser, requiring JavaScript to function properly. As a screen scraper, there may occasionally be unexpected results, but this method was necessary following Google's discontinuation of its direct API. It utilizes real-time, updated data from Google Patents (both the legacy and current versions). For comments, feedback, or requests for additional features, please click here to contact us.

title: Mashup: Outfit Editor
description: An online fashion mashup that allows users to create and share personalized outfits on social networks. The mashup integrates the Stylight API for clothing selections, Google Gadget for interactive user experience, and soon-to-be integrated Google OpenSocial for enhanced social features. Users can select and combine clothing items from various brands and styles, and then share their unique outfits with friends on social media platforms. The mashup's primary functionality is to provide an engaging and visually appealing fashion creation tool, targeting fashion enthusiasts, designers, and social media users. It integrates real-time clothing data from Stylight and leverages Google's technologies for a seamless user interaction.

related_apis.title: Google Gadgets API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: The Google Gadgets API provides a way to put third-party content onto the Google homepage. The main use of the Google Gadgets API is to create gadgets (mini-applications) that users can add to their Google personalized homepages and other Google properties. For example, you could create a photo album gadget, or a gadget that displays an interactive game. The API is designed to be simple enough so that anyone can turn his or her web page or application into a gadget.

related_apis.title: OpenSocial API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: OpenSocial provides a common set of APIs for social applications across multiple websites. With standard JavaScript and HTML, developers can create apps that access a social networks friends and update feeds. There are two ways to access the OpenSocial API: client-side using the JavaScript API and server-side using RESTful data APIs. Note: This is an API standard used by many API providers, not just Google. For all compatible APIs listed on ProgrammableWeb, use the [[/apitag/opensocial opensocial tag]].

title: Mashup: Locate Colleges in California on the Map
description: A map-based tool that enables users to locate colleges in California, including universities of California, state universities, private colleges, and community colleges. Users can filter institutions by city or county for a more specific search. The mashup combines geolocation services with a college database API to provide a comprehensive list of educational institutions in California, making it easier for prospective students to find and compare colleges in the state.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

title: Mashup: iSpecies
description: iSpecies is an innovative mashup that tests E. O. Wilson's concept of creating a comprehensive web page for every species. Developed by Glasgow-based Roderic Page, this mashup aggregates and presents data from various sources to provide detailed information about each species. It includes scientific classifications, distribution maps, images, and references to relevant literature, making it a valuable resource for researchers, educators, and enthusiasts in the field of biology and zoology. The mashup leverages advanced search capabilities to enable users to explore and compare species data in depth.

related_apis.title: NCBI Entrez API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The NCBI Entrez Utilities Web Service enables developers to access Entrez Utilities via the Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP). The Entrez database contains bioinformatics data.

title: Mashup: EveryBlock classroom fundraisers
description: A localized educational fundraising platform that integrates with the EveryBlock service to display local classroom needs within 16 U.S. cities. Subscribers to EveryBlock will have access to local classroom projects on their EveryBlock homepage and in their e-mails, receiving updates on new project postings from teachers in their area.

related_apis.title: DonorsChoose API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DonorsChoose.org is an online charity that makes it easy for anyone to help students in need.Here's how it works: public school teachers from every corner of America post classroom project requests on DonorsChoose.org. Requests range from pencils for a poetry writing unit, to violins for a school recital, to microscope slides for a biology class.
Then, you can browse project requests and give any amount to the one that inspires you. Once a project reaches its funding goal, we deliver the materials to the school.You'll get photos of your project taking place, a thank-you letter from the teacher, and a cost report showing how each dollar was spent. If you give over $100, you'll also receive hand-written thank-you letters from the students.DonorsChoose.org's simple JSON API allows developers to pull DonorsChoose.org classroom project listings into their website or application using project selection criteria of their choosing.The JSON API has been used by DonorsChoose.org partners like Chevron, SONIC Drive-In, NBC Universal, Bing, PayPal, and others to build high-profile highly customized giving and cause marketing experiences.The API also enables developers to donate to projects or purchase gift cards without routing users to DonorsChoose.org for payment.

title: Mashup: MCF Technology Solutions + DocuSign
description: MCF Technology Solutions is a leading operations and information management consultancy that specializes in crafting and deploying customized software solutions to enhance efficiency, control, and transparency in supply and information chains. By integrating DocuSign's eSignature solution, MCF Tech offers its clients an advanced eSignature capability that streamlines their business processes, improves contract signing times, and ensures legal compliance. This integration is particularly beneficial for businesses involved in complex transactions requiring multiple signatures, such as financial services, real estate, healthcare, and legal sectors. The eSignature technology from DocuSign enhances MCF Tech's service offerings by enabling electronic document exchange and digital signature capture, reducing paper usage and eliminating the need for physical document retrieval or mailing. Additionally, this integration provides real-time tracking and audit trails, ensuring document integrity and compliance with regulatory requirements.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: Prosper202
description: An open-source tracking and analytics platform designed specifically for online marketers. This tool allows users to monitor and analyze the performance of keywords and placements that drive calls to their call centers. By integrating the Twilio Client, Prosper202 can track the exact keywords and channels that result in call conversions, enabling users to optimize their advertising spend based on real-time data and insights. The platform offers a comprehensive view of marketing effectiveness, providing detailed analytics to help users make informed decisions about their marketing strategies.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

title: Mashup: QuickBase PowerTools with Click-to-Conference
description: A browser extension for Firefox that enhances QuickBase's CRM capabilities by integrating click-to-conference functionality, enabling real-time currency conversion, and providing interactive maps for sales teams. This mashup allows sales professionals to streamline their communication processes, improve efficiency, and gain insights into global markets and locations.

related_apis.title: QuickBase API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: QuickBase is a low-code platform that unifies IT and Business to quickly & easily build, iterate, and maintain highly scalable business productivity applications with right-sized governance and control. The QuickBase HTTP API enables developers to extend platform functionality by creating robust integrations with other external solutions.

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD

It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: Best Dining
description: A comprehensive local restaurant guide that combines user-generated restaurant ratings and reviews, exclusive restaurant coupons, interactive maps, and a vast directory of local eateries to provide a comprehensive dining experience.

The API can also be used to upload photos and video.The Flickr API supports many protocols including REST, SOAP, XML-RPC. Responses can be formatted in XML, XML-RPC, JSON and PHP. Documentation is included for 14 API Kit libraries.

related_apis.title: PayPal API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: PayPal offers online payment solutions and has more than 153 million customers worldwide. The PayPal API makes powerful functionality available to developers by exposing various features of the PayPal platform. Functionality includes but is not limited to invoice management, transaction processing and account management.

related_apis.title: Yahoo Local Search API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Yahoo! Local Search APIs give users access to a comprehensive database of information and content in Yahoo! Local ranging from business information to user comments to ratings. Data includes business address and phone, category, rating, distance, URL and traffic alerts. Yahoo! Local makes a great addition to any mashup, bringing in location-based relevancy and the additional context of what real people have experienced in these places.
Version 3 of Yahoo! Local Search adds even more features! Users can now request individual business records by using the Yahoo! Local listing id. Yahoo! supports search categories to help users narrow their queries. Finally, results now return the first few lines of the last user review for each listing. The API uses a RESTful protocol and responses are formatted in either XML, JSON and PHP.

title: Mashup: idproxy.net
description: An OpenID proxy service that leverages the Yahoo BBAuth API to allow users to authenticate with their Yahoo accounts for accessing OpenID-enabled websites. This mashup facilitates single sign-on (SSO) by enabling users to use their existing Yahoo credentials to gain access to OpenID providers without the need to create separate OpenID accounts.

related_apis.title: Yahoo BBauth API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: From their site: You build great web applications. We have millions of users who store their data on Yahoo!. Browser-Based Authentication (BBAuth) makes it possible for your applications to use that data (with their permission). BBAuth also offers a Single Sign-On (SSO) facility so that existing Yahoo! users can use your services without having to complete yet another registration process. The first time a user visits your web site, you redirect them to a specially constructed Yahoo! URL where they can login and grant your application permission.

title: Mashup: Limeades For Learning (SONIC Drive-In)
description: A donation microsite that leverages the DonorsChoose API to display educational projects in need of funding. Users can browse and donate to these projects, with SONIC Drive-In matching donations up to a certain amount to support education initiatives. The mashup facilitates the process of finding and contributing to educational programs, bridging the gap between donors and schools in need.

related_apis.title: DonorsChoose API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DonorsChoose.org is an online charity that makes it easy for anyone to help students in need.Here's how it works: public school teachers from every corner of America post classroom project requests on DonorsChoose.org. Requests range from pencils for a poetry writing unit, to violins for a school recital, to microscope slides for a biology class.
Then, you can browse project requests and give any amount to the one that inspires you. Once a project reaches its funding goal, we deliver the materials to the school.You'll get photos of your project taking place, a thank-you letter from the teacher, and a cost report showing how each dollar was spent. If you give over $100, you'll also receive hand-written thank-you letters from the students.DonorsChoose.org's simple JSON API allows developers to pull DonorsChoose.org classroom project listings into their website or application using project selection criteria of their choosing.The JSON API has been used by DonorsChoose.org partners like Chevron, SONIC Drive-In, NBC Universal, Bing, PayPal, and others to build high-profile highly customized giving and cause marketing experiences.The API also enables developers to donate to projects or purchase gift cards without routing users to DonorsChoose.org for payment.

The mashup leverages mobile technology to deliver targeted marketing campaigns, allowing businesses to engage with their audience through personalized, real-time interactions. description: The 'Map of the Dead' mashup is a crucial survival tool for those preparing for a zombie apocalypse. It utilizes mapping APIs to pinpoint the locations of potential safe havens, such as fortified buildings and remote areas, while integrating supernatural-themed data sources to highlight areas with rumored paranormal activity. The tool also includes a humorous twist, reflecting the absurdity of such a scenario, making it an engaging and entertaining resource for enthusiasts and preppers alike.

related_apis.title: Foursquare API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Foursquare Places API provides location based experiences with diverse information about venues, users, photos, and check-ins. The API supports real time access to places, Snap-to-Place that assigns users to specific locations, and Geo-tag. Additionally, Foursquare allows developers to build audience segments for analysis and measurement. JSON is the preferred response format.

related_apis.title: Mapbox API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Mapbox is a suite of open source mapping tools. This API can be used to create interactive maps using a wide range of file formats and databases. It also allows users to host their maps so that they can be embedded on webpages and shared with a wider audience. All maps created using Mapbox are compatible with Android and iOS devices.

title: Mashup: CouponMoto
description: CouponMoto is a comprehensive online platform that offers a wide range of verified and updated discount coupons and exclusive deals for online shoppers. This service aims to help users save time and money across a vast array of online retailers. CouponMoto utilizes real-time data synchronization with various e-commerce platforms to ensure the accuracy and validity of the discounts provided. Users can access CouponMoto through its mobile app available on Google Play, which enhances the convenience of finding and applying coupons to their online purchases.

related_apis.title: Coupomated Coupon DataFeed API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Coupomated REST API, available in XML, CSV and JSON formats, is an automated coupon content distribution platform based in India. It provides coupon website development, price comparison website, & affiliate products from 2000+ Indian merchants.

versions.version_title: Coupomated Coupon DataFeed REST API v1.2

title: Mashup: Go Velos
description: Go Velos is a web-based transportation booking platform specifically tailored for Greece. Users can leverage the Limo Anywhere API to search, compare, and book rides effortlessly. The platform integrates real-time data from various transportation providers, ensuring accurate and up-to-date information for seamless booking experiences.

title: Mashup: PropRover
description: PropRover is a real estate price tracking and comparison tool that utilizes APIs from various sources to provide the latest information on resale opportunities in Hyderabad, India. It aggregates data on property listings, prices, and trends, allowing users to track real-time property price movements and make informed decisions on buying or selling properties.

related_apis.title: Google My Business API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google My Business API allows business enterprises to create and edit locations for purposes of updating or publicizing their physical addresses. The API enhances the visibility of the location of a business in Google maps and search results, making it suitable for integration with online advertising apps. The RESTful API sends and parses request data in HTTP format, and returns responses in JSON format. Version 3.1 brings real time push notification for listing updates.

versions.version_title: Google My Business REST API v4.0

related_apis.title: Google Maps API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Google Maps' services have been split into multiple APIs, including the Static Maps API, Street View Image API, Directions APIs, Distance Matrix API, Elevation API, Geocoding API, Geolocation API, Places API, Roads API, and Time Zone API.This page is maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Google Maps API allow for the embedding of Google Maps onto web pages of outside developers, using a simple JavaScript interface or a Flash interface. It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: Facebook Business Mapping API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Business Mapping API by Facebook is useful for businesses that are operating several Facebook Apps and require the user ID to be the same between them. This is a common procedure for games studios that need to support cross platform or fraud detection. In these cases, businesses may require that the user's ID be identical between apps. The Business Mapping API has 3 main methods which can be used to map the same user across multiple apps.

related_apis.title: Twitter API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. It has been split into multiple APIs, including the Twitter Ads API, Twitter Search Tweets API, and Twitter Direct Message API.This profile is maintained for historical, research, and reference purposes only.]The Twitter micro-blogging service includes two RESTful APIs. The Twitter REST API methods allow developers to access core Twitter data. This includes update timelines, status data, and user information. The Search API methods give developers methods to interact with Twitter Search and trends data. The API presently supports the following data formats: XML, JSON, and the RSS and Atom syndication formats, with some methods only accepting a subset of these formats.

title: Mashup: DGMapper - Disc Golf Tournament Map and Calendar
description: DGMapper is a comprehensive mashup that utilizes multiple scrapers and APIs to deliver an interactive, real-time map of all upcoming disc golf tournaments and events. It offers advanced filtering capabilities and provides essential information for planning a successful disc golf experience. Key features include live updates, weather forecasts, wind speeds, and elevation data. Additionally, users can access links to nearby disc golf stores, restaurants, hotels, and more, making travel and planning more convenient.

It is designed to work on both mobile devices as well as traditional desktop browser applications. The API includes language localization for over 50 languages, region localization and geocoding, and has mechanisms for enterprise developers who want to utilize the Google Maps API within an intranet. The API HTTP services can be accessed over a secure (HTTPS) connection by Google Maps API Premier customers.

related_apis.title: NOAA National Weather Service (NWS) NDFD SOAP API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The NOAA National Weather Service (NWS) NDFD SOAP API provides programmatic access to forecasts, weather watches/warnings, current observations, tropical cyclone advisories, and storm prediction center forecast products. This information comes from the National Digital Forecast Database (NDFD) and is intended for use by government agencies, commercial enterprises, and the general public. The API returns responses in an XML language called Digital Weather Markup Language (DWML).

versions.version_title: NOAA National Weather Service (NWS) NDFD SOAP RPC API v1.0

related_apis.title: Google Maps Elevation API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Google Elevation web service provides you a simple interface to query locations on the earth for elevation data. Additionally, you may request sampled elevation data along paths, allowing you to calculate elevation changes along routes.
The Elevation service provides elevation data for all locations on the surface of the earth, including depth locations on the ocean floor (which return negative values). In those cases where Google does not possess exact elevation measurements at the precise location you request, the service will interpolate and return an averaged value using the four nearest locations.

related_apis.title: Google Geocoding API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Google Geocoding API is a webservice for the Google Maps API. The Geocoding API provides a direct way to access a geocoder via an HTTP request, though it must be used in conjunction with Google Maps. Additionally, the service allows you to perform the converse operation (turning coordinates into addresses); this process is known as "reverse geocoding." Also, you can choose to limit your search to certain bounded areas (Viewport Biasing) or regions (Region Biasing).

title: Mashup: FunFriendFotos
description: An interactive social media application designed for users to playfully manipulate and edit their friends' Facebook photos using the Picnik photo editing API, providing a light-hearted and humorous experience that enhances the sharing and fun aspects of social media photo interactions.

related_apis.title: Facebook API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: [This API is no longer available. Its functions have been split among the following APIs: Facebook Ads, Facebook Atlas, Facebook Graph, and Facebook Marketing. This profile is being maintained purely for historical and research purposes.]The Facebook API is a platform for building applications that are available to the members of the social network of Facebook. The API allows applications to use the social connections and profile information to make applications more involving, and to publish activities to the news feed and profile pages of Facebook, subject to individual users privacy settings. With the API, users can add social context to their applications by utilizing profile, friend, Page, group, photo, and event data. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are in JSON format.

title: Mashup: Top 99 Women on Google Maps
description: A mashup that combines the top 99 women as voted by readers and staff of Askmen Magazine with the mapping capabilities of Google Maps, providing a visual representation of these notable figures and their locations.

title: Mashup: LeadTrac & DocuSign
description: LeadTrac is a comprehensive web-based platform designed for businesses requiring a secure and feature-rich online system for managing leads, campaigns, agents, appointments, agreements, and electronic files. It offers a seamless integration with DocuSign, allowing users to populate data onto PDF agreement fields and easily generate pre-filled agreements. With just a few clicks, these agreements can be sent directly from LeadTrac to clients, leveraging the power of DocuSign's electronic signature capabilities. This mashup enhances efficiency in lead and client management by providing a streamlined process for handling appointments, agreements, and electronic file management, ensuring secure and user-friendly operations.

related_apis.title: DocuSign Enterprise API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
DocuSign is a Cloud based legally compliant eSignature service. DocuSign service provides an intuitive web, mobile and an API interfaces. DocuSign API allows an application to connect DocuSign service or embed parts of DocuSign user experience.
By connecting to DocuSign web services applications can create electronic signature transactions, retrieve electronically signed documents, get up to date status on outstanding envelopes and do other Create/Read/Update/Delete operations.
By embedding DocuSign interface applications can provide single-sign-on capability and insert signing or sending user experience into their applications.

title: Mashup: Map on a WAP Mobile Phone
description: A mobile mapping service that delivers detailed, street-level map images to WAP-enabled phones. Users can request maps of any location, and the service will provide comprehensive, high-resolution images that include detailed street information, landmarks, and points of interest. This service enhances navigation and location-based services on legacy mobile devices by leveraging WAP technology to deliver high-quality mapping data.

title: Mashup: MSN Spaces on Your Phone
description: A mobile blogging platform that allows users to read and interact with their friends' MSN Spaces directly from their mobile phones. The mashup utilizes SMS and WAP technologies to enable real-time updates and alerts, providing a convenient way to stay connected with friends' activities. Users can access their friends' Spaces by sending an SMS message with the keyword 'spaces' followed by the user handle. Additionally, users can set up alerts to receive notifications about their friends' updates.

related_apis.title: Microsoft Bing API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Bing API enables developers to embed a flexible and powerful search engine as a custom search component in their sites and applications. Bing API offers open, flexible options for building or enhancing your site or applications. With the API users can search for web content, images, stories and more. Users can also monetize their applications with advertisements. It uses a RESTful protocol with results formatted either in XML or JSON and also provides support for SOAP protocol.

title: Mashup: SmartRatings
description: A consumer electronics review aggregator mashup that combines expert reviews from multiple web sources with real-time pricing data from PriceGrabber API. Users can find highly-rated gadgets within their budget by accessing a consolidated view of the best reviews and the lowest prices available online. The service focuses on providing a comprehensive and cost-effective shopping experience for electronic devices.

title: Mashup: Our Places
description: An innovative Facebook application that merges Google Maps, Bigtribe Geohana, and Facebook to create a highly social and feature-rich alternative to Yelp. Users can explore, compare, and reserve restaurants, golf courses, and hotels directly from the app. It leverages social networks for recommendations and reviews, providing a seamless integration of location-based services with social media platforms.

title: Mashup: ESPN News Service
description: A responsive news aggregation site that leverages the ESPN API, PHP, and Bootstrap to deliver the top news stories in various sports to users. The mashup integrates multiple data sources and provides a simple, visually appealing interface for users to access the latest sports news. It is designed to be accessible on various devices, ensuring a consistent user experience across platforms.

related_apis.title: ESPN API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
ESPN.com is an online platform for multiple sports news, statistics, team information, and player information. ESPN.com offers sports scores, standings, and other statistics for a variety of sports.
The ESPN.com API allows developers to access and integrate the data of ESPN.com with other applications and to create new applications. Some example API methods include retrieving sports information, team information, and league information. Interested developers should sign up here for an API key: http://developer.espn.com/member/register.

title: Mashup: BlueHire
description: BlueHire is an innovative recruitment tool that integrates an interactive voice response (IVR) system with job applications and screening processes. Candidates are required to participate in an online interactive audio interview, which is part of their job application process. Their responses are recorded and stored for future reference and review by the prospective employer. This mashup streamlines the recruitment process by enabling automated audio interviews, thereby enhancing efficiency and consistency in candidate evaluation.

related_apis.title: Twilio API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
Twilio provides a simple hosted API and markup language for businesses to quickly build scalable, reliable and advanced voice and SMS communications applications. Twilio provides a telephony infrastructure web service "in the cloud", enabling web programmers to integrate real-time phone calls into their applications. Twilio's simple Pay-As-You-Go pricing model means customers pay for capacity only when they need it, not before. Voice applications written on Twilio's cloud solution scale transparently, eliminating programming, operational and contractual headaches frequently associated with rapid growth or traffic spikes.
Twilio provides a cloud API for voice and SMS communications that leverages existing web development skills, resources and infrastructure. It minimizes the learning curve required to build advanced, reliable voice communications applications that solve critical business needs. The syntax and programming model are focused on making application development as close to the request/response model of web application development as possible. The API uses a RESTful interface and responses are formatted in HTML, JSON, XML or CSV.

related_apis.title: Twilio SMS API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The Twilio SMS API allows developers to send and receive SMS messages, track sent messages, and retrieve and modify message history from their applications. This API uses a RESTful interface over HTTPS.Twilio is a cloud communications platform that provides tools for adding messaging, voice, and video to web and mobile applications.

title: Mashup: SendMusic2.Me
description: A social music discovery platform that allows users to share and recommend their favorite music with friends. SendMusic2.Me leverages user networks to curate personalized music recommendations based on friend's tastes and preferences. The service integrates social media APIs to facilitate sharing and communication, and uses user-generated data to provide targeted music suggestions. It offers a fun and engaging way to explore new music and connect with friends through music.

related_apis.title: YouTube API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description:
The Data API allows users to integrate their program with YouTube and allow it to perform many of the operations available on the website. It provides the capability to search for videos, retrieve standard feeds, and see related content. A program can also authenticate as a user to upload videos, modify user playlists, and more.
This integration can be used for a variety of uses such as developing a web application allowing users to upload video to YouTube, or a device or desktop application that brings the YouTube experience to a new platform. The Data API gives users programmatic access to the video and user information stored on YouTube. This can be used to personalize a web site or application with the user's existing information as well as perform actions like commenting on and rating videos. This RESTful API provides responses in XML format.

title: Mashup: Fix it Repair guides Android
description: An Android application that offers a vast library of repair guides and tutorials for a wide range of devices, including game consoles, mobile phones, computers, household appliances, and cars. This app serves as a comprehensive resource for users seeking to fix or enhance their devices, providing detailed step-by-step instructions that cater to both novice and experienced users. It combines educational content with practical repair information, making it a valuable tool for anyone interested in learning how to maintain or repair their technological possessions. The inclusion of tutorials for household devices and cars expands its utility beyond electronic gadgets to include all aspects of device and vehicle maintenance.

related_apis.title: iFixit API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: The iFixit API provides programmatic access to iFixit enabling anyone to write applications and utilities on top of the repair database. iFixit is the world's largest collection of free photographic repair manuals. The API provides access to iFixit's repair manuals (step-by-step guides and Device namespace pages) and device "area" hierarchy. It does not (yet) provide access to the parts or Answers Q&A database. The API uses RESTful protocol and responses are formatted in JSON, JSONP and XML. Underlying XML schema returned in via API is IEEE 1874 (oManual - http://www.omanual.org): learn more about this format at oManual.org. iFixit.com is powered by the Dozuki platform (http://www.dozuki.com), a documentation engine for visual instructions, which features a full-blown API in each implementation.

title: Mashup: HDTV Finder
description: An interactive map-based mashup that provides a comprehensive directory of high-definition television (HDTV) stations across major US markets. Users can explore the map to find HDTV broadcast stations and access detailed information about each station, including its broadcasting power. This mashup integrates geospatial data with HDTV station information to offer a visually intuitive and informative experience for HDTV enthusiasts and viewers searching for HDTV coverage in their area.

related_apis.description: From their site: The English Standard Version (ESV) Bible is a new, essentially literal Bible translation that combines word-for-word precision and accuracy with literary excellence, beauty, and depth of meaning.

title: Mashup: Document Sign and Verify
description: A real-life Blockchain mashup that enables users to sign and verify digital files using the public Bitcoin blockchain. This mashup leverages the document and Blockchain capabilities of the Sphereon platform. Users can upload up to 5 files at a time, free of charge. It provides a secure and decentralized solution for document authentication and verification, utilizing the Bitcoin blockchain's consensus mechanisms for tamper-proof record-keeping.

related_apis.title: Easy Blockchain API MASTER RECORD
related_apis.description: Easily store entries within multiple blockchains. Hides the complexities of the underlying technologies, such as multiple complex calls, wallets, coins, etc. The Easy Blockchain API is blockchain agnostic. Currently it stores entries using different blockchain technologies, such as Factom, Multichain and Ethereum.

This tool is ideal for outdoor enthusiasts, hikers, and cyclists looking to plan and share their routes.

title: Mashup: RunKeeper
description: RunKeeper is a comprehensive fitness tracking app available on iOS and Android platforms. It utilizes MapBox's Walking directions API to suggest optimal routes for users engaging in walks, runs, or jog workouts. By integrating RunKeeper's Health Graph API, the app can analyze and provide insights into users' fitness data, including performance metrics and workout patterns. This integration helps users optimize their exercises and monitor their progress effectively.

title: Mashup: Best Cities For Singles
description: A location-focused mashup that ranks cities based on their suitability for singles, considering factors such as cost of living, career prospects, nightlife, and other parameters. The mashup integrates data from Forbes rankings with geolocation services to provide users with a visual representation of the best cities for singles. It offers real-time insights into city rankings, enabling users to make informed decisions about where to live or visit next. The mashup utilizes mapping APIs and Forbes' data to deliver location-aware recommendations and comparisons.
